title: Horseshoe Bay Chinese Restaurant
address: 6612 Royal Ave, West Vancouver, BC V7W 2G5
descriptions: Casual eatery offering sesame chicken, curry beef & other Chinese food, plus combination meals.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robert Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlAkMc5h58DpsuTOrDV5dMZ_QamLBJDA5p60lG4V6c6STBi6Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here while waiting for our ferry. Ordered the broccoli with garlic sauce, ginger beef, dry chicken with spicy salt, and a small bowl of rice. Was quiet when we came and the server was helpful and relaxed. The food was great. Every dish met our expectations. The texture of the beef was not as crisp as other places. Loved the broccoli. The chicken was tasty and good for kids, as long as they can handle some spice. We like to come here when we get the chance. Thinking of trying this place?  We recommend it. It‚Äôs a reliably good experience (taste, service, quality). Hope all goes well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVMpMbSf14-iIEjsKBmQlEKcAmMuBsggqNzZOE&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Nia Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzm7r5EyiIivaijjZVsl1Al5sOsn5T1gvDLLIP3XlDqF65G68=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super cute little place. While inside, many people came in and said it was the best Chinese.

Got combo #3. My husband and I shared it, and it was a perfect sized meal for the both of us for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtEb3DV2dP0QBOdXg92X9cNT0J4Ef4LJ1SlHyP&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We happened upon this restaurant while coming back from Whistler and it was a nice surprise. Cook and service person were all Chinese, so we knew we were getting the authentic food. The interior was very basic with plastic table cloth on tables. The menu was quite extensive and there were lunch options available. The most memorable item we ate was the shrimp fried rice which very much had a wok taste and was the best that we had on our trip. The lemon chicken and the corn soup were just average. Service was quick and food came out piping hot. There is available parking right outside the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRS74LoF4z_a6vL3gC-gZ98KtueY2hzqR-RjTn&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Kris A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDlJaeEnAXUHWa1SaIdprFr8gNIXDzNIgC0vQ89sRYiQ5Bxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst Chinese restaurants I been to. Fried rice was bland. Honey garlic chicken was dry. I highly don‚Äôt recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBcLT2WUtaxfDPouvNxUghUQO3fXSCo9UaojHz&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Shane Mahendran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD32nTOGZDrcGEcO0nogQjQEwve7bhkO4jwoo8X_T6-TbPJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is above aboce average, serving size isnt great. I like the scenery and service was great. 4.4/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjzgsp6Tivh-JcEHBK2abzHE1HwGnkb-_nrNwS&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Emma Van Achte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGfHWJKSxl1J18RCp2cIP3ui7nS8CuVrlnCPx6q83_5C_WzI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No exaggeration, the BEST Chinese food I have ever had.
The food came out super quick, absolutely no chance of missing your ferry because of food delays.
The almond chicken is a must, I love it so much. Everything else- also yum

The portions were generous, I shared a meal for one with my bald father and it was more than enough for the two of us.

However, I hope in the future that you are blessed with fortune cookies from this divine establishment, as we unfortunately did not receive any.

Overall I‚Äôd rate it a yum yum yum in my tum.
(That means it was good)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erick Wisler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjNRAolTnE5eiw_s64wLpwY2OEnjYBWpOune-Hae1-vLE0NZvC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch there on July 23, 2023. Service from the owners was really great. The Chicken with black bean sauce was delicious. The portion was large and the price on the sweet side at $15 / CAD.
I ate outside as the day was warm and sunny. The plate with plenty of vegetables, mushrooms and chicken looked so good that several people asked me what that was and share the same thoughts: really appetizing :)
Some guests had a combo and the portions were really large!
Based on my experience I can certainly warmly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMNON3QhAZ54AFBA-yY8iIZnEG9XNFM67LIi_V&fid=0x0:0x83f1b61e6c8fd971"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Lucia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHb2c60y6MmGl9jItrkO9gc_8_Q9xITfabXl_QdqPW050T46g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here but not the last time!
Even tho this place doesn't look very modern, the food is great!!ü§©

As a vegetarian it‚Äôs not easy to find a place with tasty veggie options. I was amazed, how chef handled my Tofu Chop Suey, it was incredibly tasty and veggie done just right!!üëè
My company‚Äôs chicken Chao Main with sweet&sour pork was great too.

Don‚Äôt worry if you‚Äôre not familiar with Chinese cuisine, the staff is very helpful, explains everything and they‚Äôre super patient lol.
Huge portions!!! Loads of veggie.

Forgot to take pics as I came hangry üòÖ

Definitely give this place a chance, you‚Äôre gonna be pleasantly surprised!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought a cup of coffee while waiting for the ferry- it was just the right temperature and not bitter surprisingly.

Got a cinnamon bun too and they warmer it up - so delicious!!

Overall a good stop before boarding the ferry with friendly and efficient staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh_MYnEg6RTvvQVtnl-bIiyEmKpP2HPmrwoSL3&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Pat Waslen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkC-Tyq5Sy6eH64VG6FwtcQj-OJYnSvli4ZLpkEY8S6PBvQxBoIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovey little cafe with reasonable prices, good coffee, espresso and lovely service.  Latte was hot and good tasting.  We need more of this size of little take out cafe in the Vancouver area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLCIBfVbDk9lafzi_CxE5QlVeRh1EN9Eo_3C3_&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Lisa Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcXsx7uHun-K919EjJxZ0bCwyCFjB9RgQJSa_1WQHuJzm5SC7l8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived late and had to wait 2.5 hours for the next ferry. I grew hungry and then hangry.

Thankfully, good karma was served. The cinnamon roll is ooey gooey, covered in cream cheese icing and warmed up. It made a miserable wait into a poetic moment. Not sure about the other staff, but the young man who helped me out was polite and friendly. Get the cinnamon roll, you‚Äôre worth it ü•∞ü•∞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7IbaNj3YbBDYZw8rK5yfZFRhj-YejUsOs_4cA&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2021-9-27"},{"Name":"Gale Leitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEjg3TtUewZPz6iqqgj3xHn24A56Z4LL1fyOXhgtZWQxAIeXQf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible coffee. Two shots of espresso were requested in an Americano. Customers have no choice how much cream. The stupid girl put way too much cream in it. All I can taste is cream and sugar. WHERE IS THE COFFEE?  The coffee here SUCKS.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Rocco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv2JaC9JKdnpXRiKbk22whl_pc0fzZTSpWo9NVL81uQgBtvSKL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ferry travel can be tedious, but ‚ÄúThe Good Karma Cafe‚Äù in the Horseshoe Bay Ferry Terminal is a place I look forward to going. I believe they serve the best coffee in the lower mainland. We like the coffee so much we bought a five pound bag so we can enjoy it at home. I just finished eating one of their fruit and flax muffins. Very hearty and nutritious. It will more than keep me going through the journey ahead. You can expect great service from the friendly staff. They also have oat milk. A great fuel stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4C-mxJwmI6sqsMr2xC4I0Q43KjLUPSAF2cjo1&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2023-9-16"},{"Name":"Ryan Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnWku3j0CZMNCsei3m0vOrdZAdUfzVvR154Ojdba66S2a7XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staffs are friendly and have pretty quick service. However, the coffee size is small and the taste is blend, and pretty expensive, so if you can wait, Starbucks on the ferry would be a better choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb2mH8nSX1ko_zscgzBTWoJ6ccDckpOuRGhL9m&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2018-12-25"},{"Name":"Miruna Alexandru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHgzfQaNL4yr8HlTAW1t9pWpdcn82wgV2ycFYDE5A3efdp72Zz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Brutal service. Great bagel, but smoothie was made with zero care of great ingredients. Love that owner is pushing veggie/vegan, but should hire people that give good karma to their business","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allen Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuVE_WE8vewNrNDTzO1x5qptZqWw9u99U1EDdTLUCUHh7t0ohoQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This stall is the only option when you arrive at the ferry terminal. You can leave the terminal to grab other items (highly recommended).
We only ordered an oat milk latte and Americano. Coffee lovers - this is not good coffee. It barely passes as a decent cup - period.
The grind is not configured correctly, or the roast is just premature... Perhaps, they skimp on the ratio of grinds to each cup - I'm not sure. This is not what is expected of coffee. I'm sorry for leaving a bad review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPX7UH4484VS42iBJU6Hpmc7byO-LjThyfSLLY&fid=0x0:0xa99dbd8f3e3610ff"],"When":"2022-9-29"}]

title: C-Lovers Fish & Chips
address: 6640 Royal Ave, West Vancouver, BC V7W 2B8
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"All you can eat","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gerald Shaffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuWCjKUEpSn8PC51gwUhFUMP1RPD-5YHye8CmIeW0xB9e7fdhStw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic British Fish and Chips Experience!

C-Lovers in Horseshoe Bay is an absolute gem for anyone craving the taste of traditional British-style fish and chips. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that feels both cozy and classic. The fish is always fresh, perfectly battered, and fried to golden perfection‚Äîcrispy on the outside, tender and flaky on the inside. The chips are thick-cut, just the way they should be, and seasoned to perfection.

One of the highlights of C-Lovers is their generous portion sizes. Whether you're here for the classic cod, halibut, or even their other seafood options, you won't leave hungry. The tartar sauce is homemade and pairs wonderfully with the fish. I also appreciated the excellent customer service‚Äîfriendly, efficient, and always with a smile.

For those looking to enjoy an authentic fish and chips experience with a beautiful view of Horseshoe Bay, C-Lovers is the place to go. It‚Äôs become my go-to spot for comfort food by the water. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1oKUYi2j1xIEHxSGWTJp2JqleP3Sakl6SOIUH&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited here and tried the Ultimate Platter Dinner for 2, along with a Caesar salad. The platter included a generous assortment of fish and chips, but unfortunately, the fish was a bit overcooked and greasy, which detracted from the overall experience. The Caesar salad wasn't to my liking either, primarily due to the Caesar sauce, which didn't quite hit the mark for me. On a positive note, the customer service was outstanding; the staff were attentive and friendly, which helped make the visit enjoyable despite the food shortcomings. Overall, while the service was commendable, the food could use some improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhK1SZMccdSovzH5909PMo2FvHg9s-zlW7Sn21&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had late lunch at the c lover horseshoe bay location. The store was clean and staff were nice and friendly. We ordered the ultimate platter and two pieces cod fish and chips. All the food was delicious. Pretty basic restaurant settings and services.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoHdJ1dgEF_othGLEfIOegb9kfPHn1_PGytnmM&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the all you can eat  fish üêü and chips üçü  and bottomless pop ..... the location is nice here in horseshoe bay  ...inside & outside seating areas  .... its good money's worth  .....the quality is like around  between a McDonalds and trolls restaurant type for fish and chips  .....I really enjoyed it and definitely will be back   to this chain of fish & chips restaurant  ....they got dine in & takeout  window here ...parking around in horseshoe bay & public transportation  around the area ....staff friendly and good service ....its can get busy here....the fish & chips all you can eat is all day/ anytime too ....I added the menu Pictures in the post","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb0nlxkRBtonH5epEu956rviwbrft8LY_hsuSc&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Fraser Redlick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDGRm-qLKRtGlalAZndF03RhUPGRiI49aC-Ti2GQ10raEZNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food that I had left a little more to be desired I ordered take out which I think was the first issue. The take out container was a folded up paper wrap which is classic, however the heat had no place to escape and the batter of the fish got wet and soggy. It tasted good but the parts that were crispy were even better. if my entire meal tasted like those crispy sections of the fish that I had, it would have been great. Recommend eating in I believe it will be better that way.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not too crisps for fish and chips, bought oysters and prawn add-ons. Oysters is very big and tasty, perfectly cooked. The prawn, the same as fish, is not too crisp. bring home and air fry them, and it taste better.  Packets souces. Service is ok quite friendly but bit slow, I think they are busy, as during dinner time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxoBnR0pDoBSm_Zoae3wDJAObMG1vNfLU2eKJS&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Ellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKd57xHCmdONmKOsfqwXqAvDamqWX7XCQkyYvx2lWw37yBFPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I know the place is famous for their all you can eat fish n chips; but it was not our choice. We tried halibut sandwich, cod fish n chips and kids meal which all of us were happy with taste. The only food item disappointed us was fried pickles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUYUBR4RQdhR5vuVwc9j0q3A2Xr8TwJLTtKYx0&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally got a chance to try their fish and chips. First of all it was all you can eat for me. We also tried halibut burgers and cod. All of the were fresh and oily. Their Tatar sauce was good and our waiter smile were the cherry on top of them all. Very good experience and not so expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHNyD7Nh-hMT1_Tg0MaACLhCl9Xrk4om3bxOH0&fid=0x0:0x15a7f2c91cff8d8c"],"When":"2024-2-16"}]

Nice location close to Ferry Terminal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOnSbvPiC2NqfZteFqMBYEXFfKjx8sSdY2nXtw&fid=0x0:0xd57fdbd228cad03f"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Benediktas Striska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViEgCTCRm8wZufGHrt3BJomHgir_HrnepFZAv9GStLFSSv_YS6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience! The pizza was delicious, and the service was incredibly kind and attentive. Push was super kind and made us feel right at home. It‚Äôs clear they care about making their customers feel welcome. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_z0KQOrzOPrVHVzRkgtFbUkybmQwL00isAp2H&fid=0x0:0xd57fdbd228cad03f"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Derek Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQM54FCT_td7BeLOFyGEHNhjBo_BUaQdEiJpT935vMFiZIZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Owner is super friendly. Pizza was good. Had the pepperoni and donair pizza. Both delicious. Crust is really crunchy and light. They also have donairs starting at 1pm. Owner said they sell out by 4. They must be good. I‚Äôll try that next time I‚Äôm in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shiva koirala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaelE53Nhg_a1pOXdL3uIN2EXrPbGvVIhRp0PdCEg9bZTDymQt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had the misfortune of trying a BBQ Chicken pizza with no cheese, no toppings, and an uncooked crust. It was a terrible experience. The dough was raw and unpleasant to eat, with a sticky, gooey texture that made it hard to swallow.

Without cheese or toppings, it was utterly tasteless. There was no flavor, no crunch, and no enjoyment. It felt like eating a mistake rather than a meal. I tried to eat two slices but this was one of the worst food experiences I've had, and throw remaining on garbage. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

Save your time and money‚Äîthis so-called "pizza" is a complete disaster.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj3SNfhWqhBsMuUjTq51QFPGoZBik5CmQznfGx&fid=0x0:0xd57fdbd228cad03f"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"marika maris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt5KcvJummBzEkzz-FsC7KNGYluYsmYfo-WE2hfD6I7GiMWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greeted with a very friendly smile tonight followed by such a delicious ham and pineapple half chicken bbq pizza! 29 weeks pregnant and exactly what baby and I needed! Thank you for the best crust and the amazing sauce and the perfect crispness on the pizza! Definitely coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnAmiZ0fkdndkItK6z1-iTgQFvFWJN_rtAfUaK&fid=0x0:0xd57fdbd228cad03f"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Simran Khurana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg3ffRTTmq918XD_7j_7XXiWNnngrjssRVxaBzZXGD9JOq9RBjfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I must say I loved every single bite of this scrumptious pizza. The crust was perfectly baked and, had a good portion of veggies too .
Also, thank you for the complimentary pizza, much appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFuN5skYmF3t1RCxMPbiUgjMMwP7vsF9Oj0Agi&fid=0x0:0xd57fdbd228cad03f"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]

[{"Name":"Kelly O'Donnell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvHfEViz_Y80E4h7oFuKzdXwES1jdRgOd9hpjJ_A807hHwS_Cl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been coming here for many years, and have always had a wonderful and consistent experience. Such fresh fish, delicious rolls and nigiri, and they are always so lovely. They often have remembered my order and are always polite and kind. Such a great neighbourhood establishment - definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Anyone else feel like the old lady taking orders is really unfriendly with her tone? ‚ÄúBye!!!‚Äù It is like she was shouting at us to get our food and leave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm4DgT_SfwHkozabD1BRigex17O_iC8SdeWT9_&fid=0x0:0x4867bbb95398fbcd"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Stephanie Cain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqWnDY1GAucMp-9sH-Oi18R0zkhhJjAqtnU5MGT2L0xd249W9y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered some sushi for takeout and the owners were super sweet and helpful. My boyfriend has a strong gluten intolerance and they were very helpful and kind about going through all the food to make sure nothing would make him sick. They were super meticulous with the packaging, my gluten stuff separate boxes from my boyfriend‚Äôs meal. The food was awesome and a good value!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8agT-vaXg9-GpYIJCEV6HVSI1P8kxqlDgcHlL&fid=0x0:0x4867bbb95398fbcd"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Abbie Howes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgxNwbJ_A03P8g9a7f7Nz0TB3Z-E1pmQCG-VqwSP3lPiqQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My partner and I sat down to order food, the initial energy the lady had towards us was unwelcoming. I wondered if they were closed? No wonder why they were empty once we experienced the lady‚Äôs attitude as we ordered. We felt rushed to order . We ordered well over $20 of food on a bill we planned to pay together, the lady said I hadn‚Äôt ordered over $10 and I asked if I needed to when my partner had ordered multiple items. I asked for the menu again so I could choose another item and she dismissed me and stormed into the kitchen, asked if I wanted my edamame warm or cold- I was confused as at every sushi restaurant I‚Äôve been to, it‚Äôs been steamed. I heard her throw it in the microwave and based on the low quality customer service, my partner and I stood to say thank you but that we will cancel our order. They yelled at us as we left the restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkYbCzMVCviIHMKZt-cD-m3hQYta8SM93QA9NrSmD-WBq9Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Didn't ask me if I had any allergies. I was just ordering a salmon/avocado roll....who knew they would sprinkle sesame seeds all over? Anyways, I thought "no problem" and I asked them to cut the rice with sesame seeds off. They refused saying it was "sticky rice and there's only a few". I tried insisting that they cut it off and I would have been quite happy as the portions were generous. They told me it was my fault for not telling them.

Anyways, in this restaurant the customer is never right.

Too bad: the sushi was actually quite good and reasonably priced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"phoebe gilday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-9fYAf2YbfZUQ-81_gv2q2BDdEHT9vqJF9hDvBaHs1L2yh0Xe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is hands down the best place to eat in horseshoe Bay. Having spent years waiting for the ferry I've eaten here many many times. The fish is fresh, the owners are kind, and the restaurant is a cozy place to wait for the boat. The chopped scallop salad is my absolute favourite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"May Mackenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMpExAbQZ0tIddAH1I5fd3ew4Q5g-LLHAApYWLZ5LLHGu5Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible service, very rude and terrible food. Do not recommend

Update after their reply:
I did not enter their restaurant until after my father had ordered the food for my three younger siblings. All under 12 years old so yes a California roll and cold edamame tied them over until we could get home for dinner. We used the bathroom as my little sister got your hand sanitizer in her eye. I asked four times for a cup of water to get it out and YOU told us to go to the bathroom. We were in there for 3 min max. That is a lie that we used it messy. And we waited outside on the curb for our food not at a table. I was in your restaurant for 5 minutes max. And two of those you were talking bad about me saying I‚Äôm so picky. Again I‚Äôve never had edamame cold, and I asked very nicely if you could heat it up. And you agreed and said out out out to everyone but I stayed and that‚Äôs why I heard you. You are so rude. Do not come here they are liars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zach Greenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-xomQqO9acbnJV3g_QkCphCtWUHD6WB33bYSW-lzkkzP-hGc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious. Great little shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnTrEZCbiDND5tQRxBxcPMzfbm1Bg1hWQ9c-wI&fid=0x0:0x4867bbb95398fbcd"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

[{"Name":"Joseph Aguilar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtRN79QkpWpCYGCP6wjALS8wZbY1vWZgLWFwJoeWDWeLd7Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time coming to this place and it has shown me the true colors.

The owner is very driven and knows what he‚Äôs doing. You walk in and can tell he is straight to business and knows you will like the food.

He pays attention to detail and help you decide on what you like.

The atmosphere was very warm. Felt like I was in a Christmas town and everyone was very calm and respectful.

10/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Loraine Lalonde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1S7LnSvrD0vnPYQFk8PjgsrbIseBy6Xxn9IXLvi4BZAYTXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly fast hot delicious pizza, very clean too I recommend and will return any time at horseshoes bay ferry","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfLMo5xp4xPlMirB9XqxXOMJiPPP3q7psMhWKq&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs been a while since I‚Äôve been here to see Gio so dad and I went. We got the XL Captain and a couple sodas. It‚Äôs a great experience here and the pie is always fresh. There is also an incredibly unique soda selection that seals the deal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGyDlJ6Ig5VgmtGQf4zbn1HRecl_XVD13JLVvl&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Montserrat Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYOQ5MkfC1RifyP_aPSn-sFLkFRMCCEemioK7_hwT03w_z5gqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always go from Vancouver for the alfredo pasta with sausage and 1 slice of pizza. This time there was no Alfredo but you can't miss the opportunity to try a delicious handmade sauce at this place. spectacular","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-HkYKcTHCM7zfycyKhnrgZ3Mx32Ih_jgQDZLF&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Tristan M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSF1DpUkbtPJnHfOpmP6azThycqlS2xh4HNQzp4jmq8oqZOjOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you want into Pudgies you feel like you're home. Reminds you the time when you were a kid, and got treated with pizza for dinner. You get a large portion, and it's some of the best crust I have ever had. Highly recommend üëå  worth the stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLg5UpNF1zwWyhwjKnqOEeaKSbHk5s51GF16ta&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"John Addison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIwszdgodyomej0Q63waLNw288WchyZZUITitR5CZwMD67_O5QyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good pizza. We got there just at closing along with several others when our ferry was delayed. He stayed an extra 45 minutes to feed us all. We also enjoyed the amazing variety of soft drinks. We could see it was a local hangout as people came in and joined a table of regulars until their food was ready. Nice oasis to wait for your ferry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFPSKyGZ1S3JF2Ufikzk27M8-wa26Ogw5RMitT&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2023-8-1"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Locally owned ! Very nice and friendly staffed. It was only one guy working when we came in on the Saturday but he kept everything moving very smoothly. The pizza itself is pretty expensive for the quality of pizza. It didn‚Äôt have much flavour too it and the pizza dough/crust was very dry tasting. Normally we can finish a pizza but we had a bunch of slices left over just because it wasn‚Äôt very satisfying. Presentation was good though, and they seem to use very fresh ingredients!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjiHXzbFZ_mt7joDCaqwdCRx8OaWz3IvddPGwk&fid=0x0:0xa233476048389c6e"],"When":"2021-3-2"},{"Name":"J B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGr2zwYuS5wGzkxw2rXh-W0Rhqj_a642MEtW4b3oPKPt4-dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I generally avoid pizza places in tourist areas but so very glad I didn‚Äôt do so here! Pizza is awesome, specially the Italian sausage. And the atmosphere inside was so collegial, almost entirely filled with regulars which attest to how good the food is. Lovely place, I‚Äôll be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Having a slushie on the patio under an umbrella watching ferries is a great way to kill time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq36kimmmmn_WfgQz3Mo2s20ebYvss1j64J5NN\u0026fid=0x0:0xe8465a9420e2912c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Mark Gage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbO0-HSaUc0gMdkyR9RxQRDTOtRISGgQ8SKVhMXk4VmO4LBMpG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The coffee is great, the service is good, the view is amazing. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maine McEachern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlz31X2ti2QuObf-fpXhEG5kfDA1xaq9niqnUg2DfajhLD-Ja_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a beautiful spot - enjoyed a table near the patio overlooking the sailboats in the cove with palm trees out front and early December sunshine streaming in. The oat milk and honey latte and JJ‚Äòs burger were delicious; the beef patty was generous and succulent and slightly crispy on the outside. The new owners, Mara and Charles, are incredibly hospitable people and are working hard to bring this unique gem of a West Van eatery to the next level!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6xxxg4gfZMgaHcQy-n_wGOY5IAGMLG3nKJ_zv&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Stefanie Donohoe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVboqz1nRgeMLbHq255CAd1LTt4LehGSW4_owKeo3T_7xFF8ern8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem!  We went on a Wednesday because they have live music on Wednesday and Saturday.  The atmosphere is great, the restaurant is tastefully decorated, and the food is very flavourful and beautifully presented.  The staff is friendly and helpful... Cheryl was our server and she was delightful. I will definitely go again.  We had Carpaccio, Seafood linguine, Scallops and Prawns.  A great evening overall!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXWRQQl7nLbx-vurZ2MHXqfOe-s-7Tg84x25cH&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2023-9-1"},{"Name":"TheFoodie CarGuy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVz0O2Ya1pe-HczZKOvxHhJ-R45LOtjQUCNZBjCgsZFCQ8gt0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our second time trying this place. The Seafood Linguine and Truffled Spaghetti & Meatball pastas are really good & very reasonably priced for the quality. Beautifully decorated inside. Loved their ‚ÄúLambourgini‚ÄùCoffee too!  Service was great! Will definitely be back to try the Mixed Grill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIRHY9DcrE2OcAY3kPwjm_h7NOYWv14E7-h5Uw&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Kevin Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCYMSBm8dqcUvZK-hVak7kMzewF_rnlyCVsKM7DX05YbO8eEZF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, it was kinda luck that we fell into this place.  After 9 hours of travel and downtown vancouver traffic, we had to find a place to eat on our way to whistler.  We arrived at 430, and this place is a hidden gem.  They were setting up for a paety but had the time to take care of us, and the head waitress was a gem.  The lamb, ahi tuna, and salmon were awesome.  Defintley will make this place a stop everyime we come up!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfvCvIsd8lEmRpKLNa6wnlkdoaxJHCxb9fdIGQ&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2023-12-24"},{"Name":"Jacky Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuAstnSDOiKIC0ITUfM4IT777FKvU-oVy2TFi6l2Ynz81P8FcRGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had a birthday lunch with my wife. Cozy environment, home feeling decoration and very welcoming vibe. We ordered mussels and carpaccio for appetizers, seafood linguine and burger üçî for main course. Foods are great overall, just the scallop kinda overcooked in the pasta. Service was great too but we didn‚Äôt have the dessert menu at the end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfjdeh3Om_l3R8CUnfXpXbNfv3icJ7z_3JD4DW&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2022-9-29"},{"Name":"Oleksii Necheporenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMq8dsiQhIfCo34Gi0w56T8i-_39c-qQru6M47Ew14q-cv0nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered burger and beer for 15$ in happy hours, I didn‚Äôt aspect nothing special but you know what.. it was the best burger I eat! Also ordered pasta with meat balls for my son, it also tested delicious.
Beautiful view, friendly stuff, wonderful life music.
Recommend this place 100%.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-yH1Xh2i4eI52ZXwj8O_KH6Mt5VBoXbbpYFWm&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Sabrina Haloulakos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9qlhpXdSXa2tXrSnRMw1BAh-xt7dUPU7qkDPnV6xlZODAVIKQnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service! Had the mac & cheese balls and the pasta w/ sundried tomatoes. My only suggs. is to tend to the washrooms, no TP or soap. Either way the food and ladies who run the place make up for that, I will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4PfUkoF1bXP_d6PF92fwXdXA-9zlp_c_dDePQ&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"JJ's Kitchen is tucked away in the West Vancouver neighbourhood of Eagle Harbour. It's a lovely spot surrounded by trees, boats, and water. Tranquility is what we found when we came out here. A birthday in the family is what brought us to @jjskitchenbar and I can't even remember how I first heard of this place but I'm ever so glad that I did. We enjoyed some amazing food at this restaurant.

Mussel
Crispy Calamari
Mac and Cheese Ball
Smoked Salmon Lox
Seafood Linguini
Prawns & Scallops
JJ's Home Burger

One thing that stood out to us consistently at this restaurant was how good they were at grilling their food. We noticed it first with the Smoked Salmon Lox. The "Smoked Salmon" was the smokiest Smoked Salmon I've ever tasted, and I mean that in a really good way. Our Smoked Salmon Lox was served with toasted bagel, and even the bagel carried that same smoky, grilled flavor. This "grilled" flavor continued to pop out at us in several other dishes that night. I feel like we struck gold with this restaurant and very much look forward to going there again one day.

Service: Good
Parking: Free
Location: 5775 Marine Dr., West Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO46pvy21nRP_1dRXzQNS8Jg2gVR2ZtU8bdaOb7&fid=0x0:0x3d51262f1a522eb"],"When":"2023-5-2"}]

[{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food! Calamari is awesome and highly recommended. The oyster burger is okay. Oyster is very tasty but small. New England Seafood Chowder is very delicious. Price wise is a bit over price for the amount of food. service bit slow. The atmosphere is a bit dark. I was seated on the back close to the garden/parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuZpTVLfMIvcNsKbjJl20Xchzsse8yfxRV_kVC&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"denis2v","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUOmjTXhdTIIFK_8Wn9_RQwfy_5pnjbyQBuIKe-rVI2MDKPRQ3Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quaint little place that was full and had great atmosphere. Excellent menu with mix of Korean and Ocean/BC Coast favorites.

We had the New England seafood chowder and Cod fish and chips, it was Friday after all!

Both very tasty and Cod was excellent with light batter and not oily.

Recommend a stop if visiting or waiting for a ferry.

Best of all, they are dog friendly on back patio!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZidB4phwpbJoEIZAEvBxWALvgqtwk6VjvzIvu&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"moisanjes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkxUWk0NjzLguNT_fEwiazrGqobFhNNxhxFtUyAxNvHOyL6oP2CQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice comfy place. I liked the menu: different and delicious.   We arrived early before 6pm on a Saturday.  A nice walk at the Pier is a must!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAOY54lqw2YCnFxv7rPbjTL6igFmAMo4RX94IO&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Ralph .Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPrnoHvIbXUzH1-PtyjkU6dG-_ANKAdi0DGzO96s7km5aE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service. The chowder was wonderful, nice and hot. Tge fish and chips were a good size for an average person. The wife liked the service button on the table. It  was great for re ordering a round if drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUq88PYuqiRG0ajCdFiYcoWZTRpVBmxWLuRp4&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Sun J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVbKM0olAjpYjFiTrqrvUc6QACwnFpYUPKzVdLq5T5M4hcxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their dishes are amazing! Australian Lamb Shank, Ebi mayo, Oyster Tempura Burger & Fries, and Brandy-raisin Bread Pudding are highly recommended! The servers were very attentive and took great care of the table. I also enjoyed the beautiful interior of the place. Before hopping on the ferry, it's definitely worth checking out this lovely restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdLS5rea-UMwM3jgY2CEbHHZYat_gUKp_aDJZz&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Leila Haddadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW28uWNGMoLexX0ykMLvdhO-gxPcZLcuE9qH3Pa05tjs33XIc4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this place it‚Äôs cozy and nice‚Ä¶ foods are always fresh and tasty and waitress is very cool ‚Ä¶ only they r bringing bills very fast ü§£ü§£ü§£ always feel that needs to leave fast ü´£ü´£ü´£","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrLbIimx-VIk3LbsXJTE5lht1GQZhECN5JzCAl&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Umay T√ºrk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM5LsuizQHe9OUJgVxemaAhnf9tlxh1gXHEHkiaoP658zHDJZO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High quality foods and professional customer service. Also I tried beets soup for first time. It was deliciousü§©üëçüèΩüíØ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa0Wk8eREOhwYGLW9vMJm84WjwybFTMK-d-qcP&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Pedro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoI8LjCHjd9ANvKKV8DCOt-fYpB657QVq9TTPiKv83DO_I0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a gem in Horseshoe Bay. It begins with the staff, they're super friendly and very accommodating. We had our puppy with us, she was able to join us on the outside patio. Without asking, our server brought some water for the puppy. The outside seating is great, lots of space between the cute little pods/cubbies, it's such a lovely atmosphere.

What's a restaurant if the food isn't good? Well, our meals were great. My daughter had the fish and chips, which she devoured, ending with a proclamation that it was just about the best she's had.

I had the Thai Beef Panang Curry and it was delicious, the meat was really tender and the veggies & rice were great. My reaction was simple, it was the meal I didn't know I needed today.

We're very satisfied with our visit today, thanks Oliver & Anchor!

Update: been a second time and it was as great as the first time. This time we got to try the fish tacos, roasted mushroom soup, burger and of course some fish and chips again. Service was wonderful and everything was smooth with our puppy again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1bYamGaBINjKfafHhHVnrJBeK-XpfdmiSIIbX&fid=0x0:0xf2941f26ad44c619"],"When":"2023-9-2"}]

[{"Name":"J.J. LaRocque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1wnHH1wE-6ehYO1ShgkgKN3A6ZFemN0kZy8RwdiX8HwJ30lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic menu and a hidden gem in West Van! The menu here is sneaky and very well thought out. Excellent options for food and drinks. Servers were friendly and lots of seating. Nice little patio, but we‚Äôre cooking in the heat like a sauna when it was enclosed. Spinach dip and sure and turf were awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJUzFcXMspFFYacUoUL95ZLlFmm1nYYRMdzuwq&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Ebrahim Shayei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXAhZuMD9cKlExP7O-qI2MXgABEM4sMl6t7Diz_BRj16K8ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a nice place to dine. You can enjoy watching golfers play and enjoy the green grass view of the golf course, if you choose to sit on the patio. The server was very polite and attentive (I think she was Bulgarian). Everyone of us was happy with their order of  brunch. Although I could probably appreciate a tiny bit bigger portion of my brunch. They also offered loose leaf tee which I loved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1WIwPzhFrc74pZWPCs85ZHfIfEdsMJvMVnFgq&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"Ferial Fahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgwqxNvBQbJPV5Tl-uzRHmdKej1Bp0eSdLVDKXycTsty1bBtRl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can‚Äôt praise this place enough.

Firstly, we visited on Easter Day with a group of 12 people. The staff were incredibly friendly, and the service was exceptional.

I ordered their Espresso Martini for a drink and absolutely loved it, while others opted for their Caesar cocktail.

For appetizers, we shared their Yam fries and Calamari, both of which were delightfully crispy and delicious.

For my main course, I enjoyed the poke bowl, which was incredibly tasty, especially after I customized it with extra veggies.

I highly recommend sitting outside to enjoy the golf view and the cozy fireplace ambiance. And don‚Äôt leave without trying their homemade apple cake, which stole the spotlight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgDfwQtWXodFB3l-eKxaGq4ZDob3DBTYzLoyK-&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was pretty good, but what stood out was the service. The server was incredible friendly and accommodating - at one point, he asked how the music volume was and adjusted it to our taste. Truly a beautiful view, even on a rainy morning. I recommend coming here to enjoy a slow morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTs-aJcX1lu6uNR9Sv2LYWr3hSkUr9ttZxIbjY&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"Steve Nipps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxR9_QZ5toqToUupIPc4xEwUIkfmNn-gWcHihCqsmqg8vLkKMA-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In our last couple of years in the Lower Mainland, we've discovered many gems hidden in plain sight in the form of local businesses in Metro Vancouver, all of which we have thence kept going back to as repeat customers. Speaking of inconspicuous gems, the recentmost one that we stumbled upon is The Orchard Gleneagles Clubhouse.

Cradled by the Gleneagles Golf Course which itself is nestled on the pretty slopes by Larson Bay in West Vancouver, driving to this pretty location is a treat in itself! A local business which is "run by locals, for locals", they do their very best to achieve their aim of "creating a feeling of a holiday experience, offering something beautiful and immersive, with lots of fresh flowers and expansive outdoor spaces."

After arriving at the beautiful venue, we entered the pretty, bustling restaurant having a warm and inviting ambiance with a cozy atmosphere. We were greeted by a combination of cheerful staff, pleasant music being played live by a local artist, and gorgeous water views from the indoor and outdoor seating areas! We chose to sit by the fire in the patio, and had the pleasure of sharing a table with friends for the entire evening.

After a quick tour of the lobby and the aptly named Great Hall and dance floor (its almost 4000 sq. ft. being ideal for hosting weddings and banquets) at the Clubhouse, we grabbed a glass each of yummy refresher drinks, and settled into our comfy seats. What ensued was fun conversations interspersed with neatly plated delish appetizers and canapes being served by the crew of Aoife, Kat, Libby and Melissa. These kind and hard-working ladies sure did a lot of heavy-lifting for the evening!

We just couldn't get enough of the Buttermilk Crispy Chicken w/ Gochujang Sauce and Wild Mushroom Risotto, so ordered more of these along with the staff-recommended libations - Margarita and Mai Tai! Rest assured that we ended the evening with on a high with our hearts and tummies full! ü•Ç

If you are looking to go "somewhere unique" for good food in Metro Vancouver, and/or catch "some of the best views on the North Shore", especially when the weather is amazing, then The Clubhouse is the place for you. 5 stars and counting on all fronts, Team Orchard Gleneagles - thank you for having us, and we can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPANWq1laHC44NOEbnrCojadEYmweRwiCkFPu7G&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Zane Erickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyuKKqkuzKUW-9qhJLQJt0mrgnRDbjpiqRvzzVywhPy_mBE3VuhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"At The Orchard Gleneagles Clubhouse restaurant, I indulged in the baked onion soup and the beef dip sandwich. I really loved the presentation of the soup with the puff pastry on top üé©  The ambiance around the fire table added to the experience, and the cold beer was a refreshing touch. While I personally found the food a bit under-seasoned, it occurred to me that the clientele might lean towards simpler flavors, evident from the many visitors with a touch of grey hair. It's a place where classic tastes are likely cherished, creating a cozy and familiar atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH4Eb9rmuoqaoBmZgl_2i_agO5kAmA-PVULMxc&fid=0x0:0x4ee2212c5849f995"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"James Finley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZ1TmJY9CKcwUxA3LjEGZiglxZKS3SfxaYJvWlLKje5ofVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a regular at The Orchard since it opened and have always been very pleased with the ambiance, food and service. My most recent visit was however very disappointing. I ordered one of my favourites the Thai Chicken Salad. Previously a very nice Thai Chili Lime dressing with chopped peanuts. Tonite no Thai dressing but a very strange peanut butter like sauce. All I could taste was peanut butter. I had a few mouthfuls and gave up. I ordered an Orchard Burger‚Ä¶.another of my favourites‚Ä¶. the patty was way too salty. Something has changed in the kitchen. Not good at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arshveer Rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJiFKOffQ7si3_y4vPsWRRZNTOaNNp1WDVA3N7zMyNB5XBXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food and views are amazing, but when it came to hospitality and service, we were extremely let down. Other than taking our order and bringing us food, the waitress did not come to our table to see if anything else was needed. We noticed other people that came in after receiving their meals before us, no water refills, or in general any sort of hospitality. We‚Äôre not sure if this was an act of racism since we were the only people of colour there, but definitely left a sour taste in our mouths and ruined our evening. We brought up the concern with the manager and owner and they were very apologetic regarding the situation, but it was sad to see these types of things still happening in 2024.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nasim Yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWtFJYE2BnCXlIXcLOK5rDCE2MeW-Fdmu3YQ2gy8dbEC6F7Ybt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love going to Trolls for their amazing brunch. Every family occasion or after every long hike, we plan to go there. Thats my special treat to spend quality time with my loved ones. The atmosphere is really cozy and welcoming, perfect for hanging out with friends or just enjoying a relaxed meal.

They recently adjusted their prices, but the quality of the food is still satisfying . Their famous Fisher Man Breakfast is a must-try ü§© it comes with a complete breakfast along with tasty french toast. Its a great choice for starting your day right.

The staff is friendly and  make sure you have everything you need. Whether you're in the mood for a classic breakfast or something a bit fancier, this place has it all.

Overall, Trolls is my favorite brunch place worth driving all the way from Vancouver to Horseshoe Bay. Good food, nice atmosphere, and great service make it a five-star experience. Definitely check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPqNusO_LK3uhxAPnPMmA0OhvhwOgCzCBlbRUu&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Dr. Mia Su Cary she, her","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX0ay0WWh40rWSlPBlQhavq5E9g6PC56oWWaeoYgQcCQIXGnoS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely dinner last night at Troll's. My white sangria was perfection and I enjoyed my huge garden salad and crab cakes. Hubs said his salmon salad was yummy as well. The staff is super friendly. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvL8ZBqF0XAAgdtKa6ZAYxlsclXDprAT78zD2C&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Christina Marsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9c4eZPWLuQLZPkmX8QcmGbDEAUPPYdz76J_7XvaPo1190EJOv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic genuine family-style restaurant! We stopped for lunch while waiting for our ferry to Nanaimo. The staff were wonderful, and there were plenty of food options. The menu even included directions to the ferry terminal, which is helpful since Google Maps can be a bit confusing here. A great little find!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-XfTJJWjuPpB5e5kPFsSJfA8KpeaeblWzps7A&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Dashsooz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdgvBFGlxwdW74W_DUW6uvT5FtjfSnDk5-N2McPzidYYQj7iE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had Fish and chips. The fish was OK but I never thought that french fries can be bad until I ate these ones.  calamari was good as appetizer and the portion was big. A servant broke a glass just beside our table which is a normal accident but no one even check on us if we are doing good although the glass splashed under our table near our feet and no one even bother themselves to clean it up!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsb-sxbmU63uvkUTtL1hJoV1NCBsBOSzsSYxo&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Michel Duran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Kv7CM1dVq6YsDr8fOsdpEzPTAFIJPTlcK9psOYmI6Z2GTDpz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trolls became along the years a tradition when we are in Horsebay. Cool and relax atmosphere, great fish & ships and friendly staff. Tonight was another great evening, the fog in the harbour brought a misty and serene atmosphere and the  waiter was super friendly. He made our day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJNjZcv049PDMktmqJ42DyuQT9o7NzGDrne4jG&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Dion D'costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEDcds3m8-YTObSYeeyfq2dQzRBZTcmBx5GqbBBM80J6IOr79SFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the Oyster burger. Love it! Famous for fish and chips but I find it pretty oily. Nonetheless food taste great. Overall wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM7z_2dXURpycEcIS3uML0MOEFC4oVQRHNeAB-&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Natasha Wambui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo8SJyE9H2VZvnEX4BgdpL1ToPoybRbxGbvS45BnuzRaOTzPCCCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and amazing service. They offer gluten free options though limited but not short of amazing. I had the gluten free bun with the salmon it was truly delightful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOePO9cr1sfdIS-Ela83OCI3aTBuKmAbbseFls4&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Trolls restaurant! The seafood was fantastic, especially the calamari‚Äîdefinitely one of the best in Vancouver. Megan provided outstanding customer service, making the visit even more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre a seafood lover, Trolls is a must-try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_izLWgmaosH4BpFnc3VNl8VnjyuSdITVGx5HM&fid=0x0:0x67d4b7900359871b"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

[{"Name":"R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRCydtZa7j0hekSetuq86KNzAAIWDIpxqNhY-n6N_GhxT_Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place was great! As soon as I saw Yorkshire puddings on the menu it was an easy decision. Manager? was super cool and tried to sell me some shoes. Food was amazing, great service from manager and other staff. Great vibe and easy to get to the ferry line up when your finished. 10/10 definitely will be back next time out this way","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7KgaKsrwhnK0pCctRy5EIzjg4sYuvOEuGTKYz&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by this bar/ restaurant. The server was attentive friendly and helpful even if it was near closing time. I had one of the best reuben sandwiches I've had in Vancouver, Great bread, well toasted with cheese, sauerkraut, pastrami and overflowing with thick crunchy fries. I had a Pina colada inspired sour beer which was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2nStAJbz0ZePwjzmZRZV4hudVOEWanIvb4CqZ&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tyler makes the best drinks, especially the Margherita. Old fashioned and bramble too!

Very nice chill atmosphere üëå

If you like wings you better order the Hot ones with the blue cheese so you don't die without having ever lived!

They remember my name.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQCWRYtHMeGSIIZEaNDV9sDCLjjEzyWZ9pa5Bs&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"A Willems","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7lPGykAC2QqhNmHyO9vFjlVxuXS8JKqhXU5Hg5a5AsE-YTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great, our server was personable and fun; we watched the whole place fill up quickly, and everyone pitched in to help out - love the comradery of their crew! .... cooks had no issues keeping up with the pace of orders. 10/10 would go again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsW2qXkr5OuoT2Jgr10kGRNo-7mrTQ5hmKINm3&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"S F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnY48k9dw6Om9WabF40Bw69EBPi6HZUiOlBiXI59gXYPI1ZsWp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is cozy, self-seated place.
Fish and chips and pulled pork sandwiche were surprisingly good, very filling and well-cooked.
However the service was slow  and blunt from blonde female server never checked on us and took forever to get the bill.
For next time, might get takeout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcuFF8TbnvJsowcGgE6T4lZ21W94_gRz1tAvR6&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Elaheh Mahraban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM7Oi6ZA5Fr6MkruIzoopb-zB6aVtEKxKffUhhlHzjMxNIqDrL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second visit, and once again, I ordered the fish and chips. The portions are quite generous, the cod fish is of excellent quality, and the chips are perfect. Every item on the menu is worth trying, not just the fish and chips. Specially Yorkshire pudding üëåüëå.Last time, the owner mentioned he's proud of the food, and I couldn't agree more. He should definitely be proud of the food quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlldg1I0NZOu2RD15221_RvJ6-dRuLRf1HNVIO&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Barbora Frasy≈àuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7UZvKP_BFb-0Nybly2gSuwzYlsZzIP5hGGc26uGO9XG9AJ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good place when you wait for ferry.
Food is 50/50 sometimes it‚Äôs great sometimes not. Same with the service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8LU_3Bn0N93QRcDkMNDaVDzldD0MnqCJRhUYe&fid=0x0:0xe4629af095684b77"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Jason May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2jazgHbT_ic2wRpKdw0Yjdu_4eGP1C-GnvIUYckRRJ2OaSuprMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you have to wait for the ferry, where are you going to go?? Will come back for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deep Deep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNEyFMAcbEhqA5oCdn20LEbCnoyc647QxMLswXtC6v29Aee6aJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sandwich was fresh and delicious. I had a great experience and would definitely recommend this Subway to others.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oldskool Vlog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsiExVkzgAOg2zu4co8m_3WB8m0ct8-RcKf18NM8E76HtSscg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Great experience at Subway today! Friendly service, good location near the ferry and a nice view at the bar seating

Clean restaurant and well prepped veggies","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS5lL55quNfMHbXBFCrolLoXvFkYlun1QOYXUg&fid=0x0:0x59652f7753d9d3da"],"When":"2019-11-12"},{"Name":"maninder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQBeDvxSOjgNxF4OVWAIKoZ-rGxHGqAc3SGEkFT3QSTnR6qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Location is very well maintained in hygiene and cleanliness. I always come here for sandwiches and they‚Äôre yummy every time. Staff is very friendly specially Jashan and Harman.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Briggs (Wolf Flow)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVunyOhHBKyGytS8NOVgPnv67UtCY8UW06dhf6BMmyPeLLMQwjLdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was stoked to see a subway at the ferry terminal village, as we don‚Äôt have one where I live on the island! Although when I went to use the washroom, RIGHT after I went into the single bathroom the girl working there starting loudly knocking at the door‚Ä¶. It was so strange haha. She watched me walk in and before I could sit down she was banging on the door..
I‚Äôm not usually one to make reviews but this was so strange I couldn‚Äôt not laugh.
I could barely believe my eyes when I saw it was a Subway employee banging on the door like that!?
Once I left she gave me quite the dirty look and the other woman made my sandwich,
While she glared? Haha
STRANGE to say the least!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

In waffle cone for 7.49CAD","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDmHxVyXD0lePrAK6Lo9rExzg0cN2_STgo2CeJ&fid=0x0:0x7acd08d64273bc6d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Emma Van Achte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGfHWJKSxl1J18RCp2cIP3ui7nS8CuVrlnCPx6q83_5C_WzI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The milkshake was quite yum, however, they were unfortunately all out of the most magnificent flavours, and I was forced to settle for a basic mint flavour.

Don‚Äôt get me wrong, it was good. But for the price‚Ä¶ it could a few more cups of the good stuff, if you pick up what I‚Äôm putting down. It was quite expensive, I don‚Äôt blame you if it‚Äôs out of your price range.

The interior was small to say the least. A tight hallway, with nowhere to sit and enjoy your frozen sweet treat.

I wish I could say the service was amazing, however, that is simply not the case. It was extremely slow, and I was disappointed by this.

Thank you for reading my review, I hope the has aided your journey of finding a nice dessert.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Phelps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMcmstB-sPSqKlM7NfWrBrDgbYIyRwUXk5mwYgENf4IqIVKSrvZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":""ZERO stars" but had to give it one star just to review. Will never be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joker M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8s9fGAnAjb6hgwM-FZyKOyei0JL8FgWpxRT-7TXRlUuYsirg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5JUUMON points!

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Polina Nekhaeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMvcGqRnVSmKfZ-8PHuxIjw-0gERGw2FVwyensDuRhEd_vnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cutest locally owned spot in this area. Kind and welcoming atmosphere with professional and helpful owner. The drinks and food were better than in a restaurant. Will be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFETq6P-AOSDf_IReLJ0SGs_gg0j0TSOODYdid&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"annamaezingmeow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpq-jMtXiAHAv8ZK68Ae5qgPYDDQILYAC5eJQKWJRgux2KolTyFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Menu is unfortunately confusing, if you do have preferences you will need to state them upfront because she will not ask. Each sandwich cost $12 (+$2 for cheese, which we wanted but weren't asked lol). $28 total for two sandwiches and a carrot cake loaf. Was very tasty for what it was and convenient for grabbing near the ferry but I would recommend subway over this spot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxvU2OlsquOgCwg-Weq1aWM9Ds_guUDiPYarc3&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Janice Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVuB0K-5M1meSEpaNhkSCxzMPwN-1TgA7zbcO9oRfCt3rzUnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really homey and cozy cafe. I liked the little touches of newspaper clippings, photos, and momentos pinned on the walls inside. Local newspapers and tourist magazines are available so it's a nice place to spend half an hour while waiting for the ferry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDRtu03eoKc7uN5I_0nXnRqxuI0N3h8zJ-gs-B&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little local cafe in Horseshoe Bay.
Interior is small but cozy with a good vibe with just a couple of seats and tables.
Food and coffee was not exceptional but still good.
I still prefer this local cafe over Starbucks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYLCgTVSAfLe3I2jegZ8fZB0TTosSXDuJ4Gf1_&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Quinn Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY2QdQYVqfpGNwtjggHktblvZSmbHIJsZC9kLsVLJDUcmOUHKb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If your grandparent were to open their kitchen to the public, it would be this spot. Super welcoming & cozy spot filled with wholesome family photos run by a lovely lady that serves, hands down, the best sandwiches I have had in a very long time. They are so simple, but SO delicious.

There are a few tables where you can sit and enjoy your meal, a window bar with a pretty view of the calm street, and even a little spot to play chess if you're so inclined! While enjoying my visit, there were quite a few locals that came in for a snack, coffee, or just a chat and you can just tell how much of a gem this is to Horseshoe Bay. 10/10 would recommend and go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuu0_DqqgGpPNlnBwTYn5pG4Fmaw0xvex4Ty_B&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2023-1-30"},{"Name":"ÎÇòÎ£®Ìò∏ÎèÑÎÑ§","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWA8b_aIHWtg7sEu0HRwQ5jp14X6kctADdvRcQ9uQgR5LzDSY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady who works here is really friendly. I had a breakfast sandwich and a drip coffee. Everything was really good and tasty.

One thing i want to mention is that the laday made my sandwich with bare hands. I believe her hands were clean but it would be much nicer if she has used any kind of vinyl gloves.

But still this became my favorite cafe in Horseshoe Bay. Nice and cozy place to have a cup of coffee.

Please come and enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObQcNVehZuhepuOiDJHKM7FGxH6KVmrJ_j-OUX&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Gabriella Michelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7hfxCZ2QcQ2Wd12Ylf74KeOsUMOnrcfrpjNdFyEHVHhpp8Z5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fresh ingredients and warm customer service. Second visit and love the sandwiches. Relaxing and central location.  Easy walking distance from ferry and attractions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODNHEc45Fyki2G8_icbq5QIwHSmnQGf2UQc1uP&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Ayesha Madan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIyrGZPA7xeg37e5OJjMuIzB5GORWRDMC5Dlq3zHuGCJAb60XqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy and warm. Lovely service and I loved the apple ginger beet carrot juice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjVMtJwiPNvsW1zpe5Ckh2ewqG58ZDAlhXW9M8&fid=0x0:0xf77097253e2bada3"],"When":"2024-8-28"}]
