[{"Name":"Brayden M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPBZNPVNqHW8dSCFike-NLUMkuCrsmT6ZW7ysivwMhyRbgUxkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great first experience at Tenton today for dinner! We went in near 8pm closing time, but the staff were still extremely accommodating and we did not feel any rush whatsoever.
ordered the Regular Ramen with karaage. The broth was flavorful but light and refreshing, while there were many other toppings. I do wish the fried chicken was served separately, however. It quickly got soggy.
The restaurant is decorated pleasantly, with special seasonal decor for Halloween.
Service wise, the staff mainly stayed in the kitchen, but our wishes were to quickly and efficiently, especially considering we had a party of 10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrdWMV2kEjdPlZV9lHzHWG_71Cv2IW8wzco1F8&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Michi Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyOrUffao0E0zmQusTlzqDl7kydxPWRviHbO10MxhVoFhPlpKG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really yummy and cozy restaurant.
Their ramen is really tasty and big portion. The katsu was really soft and crispy outside. Green tea gelato was so delicious. I wish there was another location in Burnaby.
I remember the previous owner was a close friend of mine and I was expecting to see him here but I heard there‚Äôs a new owner. Keep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN17VfhAMVnuG1dup-Xywe6XgtwIfyG1hFBx1G2&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff are friendly and provide great service.
Atmosphere is warm, mild,  welcoming, they play soft Korean music, and they have an xmas tree and tasteful festive decorations and lights.
I ordered the Cheese Katsu, and my partner ordered the Black Ramen.
The ramen was rich, full of toppings, the black garlic oil was a good addition to the flavor, it's a very well balanced bowl of ramen.
My Katsu was fried to perfection, light and crispy, cheese was melted and full flavored, all wrapped in a juicy layer of tasty pork that when dipped in the sauces, complimented the Korean rice like pepperoni on an Italian pizza.
If you're in West Vancouver, head over here, they don't compromise on quality, and that's what your deserve.
The pricing is a little above average, but worth every penny.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7yOQ79glAzTswa80qRK-2CRQnN8WwTuvB1Ifg&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Pauline Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUayAv1Zl_xIZgXwyVXPcCU_sottyua22R7IjEybm_PcvcLUyQe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service were so amazing! It was just the right amount of food too. Not too pricey...just right.

If you like spicy, definitely ask for the hot sauces because they're super yum.

Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTHCnkalN7qVCnwX-eskZhQieotI5h1YLTmmqa&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Aydean Mehri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7vsez26Z2HmbRPWHEjpz0jN2LhiuT-gyNLWVk7RTpbV3-1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been here and now a handful of times. compared to other places, they‚Äôre Katsu and especially the curry is untouchable

The Portions and quality aren‚Äôt even a question they‚Äôre very fair and super delicious.

Their ramen is also very delicious

it has a very homie-friendly vibe. Service was honestly so good, especially the last time we went to our server Reina?! went far and beyond and made sure we were taken care of.

going to be my go-to stop for me and my lady.

Can‚Äôt wait to go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYQvsGfDk_TbdXO43tM8MGsnHll-CH3IhltfAK&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Kingramen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU35K9K-3WDR1LhMOarmobzfUiY3qJQT45Dn4vfHiWAkp32qFPGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I come here occasionally for a bite while waiting for the stupid traffic jam going back South to clear. The Tonkatsu was crispy and juicy and of good portion. Ramen broth was rich and can choose Karage (fried chicken) instead of Cha Siu. Good service and kids friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMrJOl6PDZuuauUTM8Zrkzz8HaRoLufvVlCAjo&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been toTenton Ramen and Tonkatsu a number of times already but this is the first time we got around to trying their Tonkatsu. Traditionally, tonkatsu is a breaded, deep fried pork cutlet. I was elated to read the menu and see that they not only have a Vegetarian option but they have a new House Special version of it that comes with melted mozzarella cheese!

Featured here:
Takoyaki
Seafood Tempura Udon
Original Ramen with Karaage Chicken
Hire Katsu
Tofu Teppan Katsu

Started off the meal with Takoyaki which was hot with a wonderfully soft and gooey centre.

Both of our katsu dishes were superb. They were crispy and didn't feel excessively greasy. I really loved the cheese on my Tofu Teppan Katsu, and the sauce was very flavorful. Also, a big fan of food that arrives on a sizzling hot iron plate! There's an option of regular or spicy on the menu, so do make sure to inform your server of which one you'd like.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 1731 Marine Dr., West Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCSRjCeOCNzdOrQ-AZT0ThLKnIK40b24wRaxRx&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Penny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ3oBauwGVnx96QWK0EHWBTPtE1tMELvOQ5NvGBnKlsn3_73wl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to the Ambleside beach and found this place nearby.  We ordered pork katsu and fish katsu. The pork katsu tasted good but we all agree that the fish Katsu was the best! We highly recommend it. I love they have kid menu. The plating looks great. My son enjoyed his meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5A25UoESCa485f5Yyldy4OUqtHUt-G23jh2LK&fid=0x0:0x3fe394c193acc54d"],"When":"2024-3-17"}]

[{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great location, stunning views of the burrard inlet and very good food.

This place is very reasonably priced, ample portions and best of all, high quality seafood.

We came here on a tuesday lunch time and it was 85% full which is excellent.

Was originally looking forward to trying out their brunch menu but realized that was only served on weekends. Next time perhaps!

Would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRFDzzbC2sJ_zLGA7E5YEVK_FgiJ8WA2LipHex&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Mehrad Sy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB-6JDyON_IDZEHTV79ioDT4wrwKlr8C-OL9ywTu-SZfxLkD0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Beach House Restaurant is an absolute gem! The food was flawless every dish, from the fresh and flavorful salads to the perfectly prepared entrees, was a delight. The stylish decor and classy vibe made the experience even more special. What truly sets this place apart is the amazing view it is breathtaking and adds so much to the ambiance. Dining here feels like a treat for all the senses. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a perfect meal with an unforgettable setting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjnQVTdkxQZA-c34EQhA7snMCxuaERqa_bTV66&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"eva lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG6_-zQP_odjQCD6-QyiUAohJJqHIlSZOxxzIrErs4yEpQng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing!!! 100% recommend the clam chowder. Very beautiful view and service was great as well. Generally very good vibes. Would definitely come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMobjRWVg8FiH4Daqw3pHdGmULuvBOq5bsegXRE&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"N ‚ÄúMinaoka‚Äù N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLM29oukNuw0VGmRupQYbXCWQVv9sqfg5h3FP5AbyXShl2bASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It is a beautiful restaurant with great view of the ocean. I was looking forward to be here then quite disappointed with overall experiences. The ambiance and food were great yet the services were rather disappointing. The wait time for food and hostess was both long although there are many staffs on the floor and quite available tables. There are a lot of service staffs who are talking to each other. As a result very hard to get attention of the service team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP876NLaG-WPWVcquZtdm00UMteo2WRRFtPX1sj&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Tila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoRHgXrJg9iOU3Mw1o8w5u4XX6zcRgAhJ08dQtEK1Jz5bymkqmWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Beach House Restaurant has really stepped up its game! This visit was even better than my previous ones. The biscuit is a must-try‚Äîfluffy and delicious. The crab cakes were perfectly seasoned, I like how it's just seared on the outside making it crispy, oysters good; and the mussels were simply outstanding. I'll definitely be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSdEyoMmWjC-bFk3pxgTZKmLjhCRCM9qrquU2X&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a lovely visit to Horseshoe Bay, we decided to try the beach house restaurant around 9 PM on a busy weekend. The atmosphere was lively yet inviting, and the service was impeccable.

Our large group sampled various dishes, each bursting with flavor and creativity. The clientele leaned older, adding a charming sophistication. In short, the beach house resturant is a must-visit for an exceptional dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkTwj7iv9aDfbZiITPvAy9vIF-Cw9sJde19q5s&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Jenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRm654M6WEPKpMVyI_-_CuYSSnZvfd29M3aYNWNqYhiLyRGrBS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have a friend who loves this place and could not stop recommending it. Finally got a chance to try! I really enjoyed the starter we got, the chorizo mussel bowl. Very nicely seasoned and the server recommended we ordered a side of toast to add to the 2 it already came with, so they we can dip it in the sauce. Great idea! My entree, the sablefish was nicely done, but the sides were under seasoned and not the best. The asparagus especially was super tough. My partner was disappointed in his steak as he found it underwhelming. The coconut cake for dessert was light and airy. Didn‚Äôt feel like I was eating such a big slice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrQFeVIzfAmGn12V4sDFfw95r1ViVKe_1vJTiW&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beach House is a gem nestled by the ocean at Dundarave Beach in West Vancouver. The seafood was exceptionally fresh and flavorful, and the drinks were refreshing and well-prepared. The host was incredibly polite and attentive, making us feel warmly welcomed. With stunning ocean views and a relaxed atmosphere, it‚Äôs a perfect spot for a memorable dining experience. I‚Äôll definitely be returning to enjoy this beautiful setting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwS9Xv-vA_mZrcm-IQ0u_jBvlX7w5lVImPaGbc&fid=0x0:0x757c2924db616af4"],"When":"2024-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"George Koshy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0iXq2nGQtOWw3Kl2FTmL4nQj3i933aKVfu31WovvAJ5X0i-gsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice and lovely Italian fare that is as authentic as it is and proudly so!. so much so that a whole bunch of things we usually order were clearly not here 'coz it ain't original really!. the quality of the food, the ingredients used, the ambience, the flavors all of them come together perfectly to build an amazing experience here!

Lovely people who take you through things and food that arrives amazingly quickly! would definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEjYGfolXGd4zgJr5eDvmsgIsmbnuyrBiCeqwR&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Koneko The Awesome","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgzpQblxjwL2Ws9zNbaGcGuSPk6YiH1Kcjebrxc_Gs5AdfV_Pm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious pizza and best cotton candy gelato I've ever had!
Loved the vibe of the restaurant, very chill and perfect for hanging out with friends! Staff were friendly too.
My little brother is normally super picky about his food, but their special pizza of the day (blue cheese and pepperoni?) was so good he ate it all! I also liked their soup of the day, pototo with croutons on top drizzled with something yummy üòã
Personally, it's a little out of my budget, but I'd definitely recommend coming here to try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKdxib1xd_9Lr5YL7aHukzhlzdUSf9YMDIhZgV&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Apurva Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5hRcaiF4BbbcDNUqASORhuIxmSgbPSLlcg03Iasxe413grN0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i had an amazing dining experience at this Italian restaurant! The food was absolutely delicious, with authentic flavors and perfect presentation. The atmosphere was cozy and welcoming, and the staff were friendly and attentive. I highly recommend trying their pizza and homemade desserts; they are simply divine. Overall, a fantastic restaurant for anyone craving authentic Italian cuisine. I'll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0NbKSrOJByAET2YLQdRBC3eVmiRHvcGnHUKx3&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"J. Peterman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7DId1Zi2m_akALnxNUhOmEhFIV8V9p-iYCBXHES59Ox9i09PLEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful authentic Italian eatery, with friendly staff and great food - now serving dinner and lunch/brunch. Fantastic pizza and pasta, all made fresh in house. Very family and kid friendly - space available for booking cooking classes up to a party of 8. The best Italian food in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfPiD4GoQ1JlVELXKtb3uYFun9eTkvPl_BZ0FB&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Casual Italian near West Van rec center. This place is open, bright, and airy with sunshine filled patio. It would be lovely sitting outside sipping a drink or two in summer.

We had pasta and pizza and both were good. I liked my potato pizza. Enjoyed chewy texture of the crust a lot. Would live to come back and try their drinks and dessert next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBdthn3BEReZQoZgRzWWF0ZQE8zyS5R4aIHudJ&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an amazing place to pass an afternoon. The espresso is authentic and not acidic. Their gelato is first class, fior de latt√© and hazelnut stand out. They're not as busy at lunch time and the afternoon. Really nice ambiance. The owner is also really friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRoQLzTC2H7ewrap2MpRoKd-1CP2r52l7oOdoT&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Sarah Aziz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXepc6ygw8TqD13mRhiwwdGfCQq3-hagzOZ7BMDGDYneOmihgjt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to eat! This has been my go to for any birthdays and events, I‚Äôve come here several times for solo dinners with my husband and we also chose to have my husbands birthday dinner party here last year! Also just recently had a beautiful baby shower as well! I love the environment, the food (pizza, pasta, paninis) and more. The staff are extremely helpful, hardworking and kind. They did an exceptional job at the baby shower it was made into such a classy event! I highly recommend coming here either for coffees, lunch, dinner, and especially events where you can use the semi separate room with the large tables! We have also had great conversation with the owner several times and she truly pours her heart into this restaurant in every aspect! Absolutely recommend again and again! üôå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdIEpb9nd3tSGApqs1DbIsHUcppyJiR5Yd2dEo&fid=0x0:0x917f193eb031ae1c"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"Ann Christin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkaPGoBAfOUBpdq7LgI88Lqqjh4lRNwP1WCArmmLqgGAD7uwpc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was amazing. We spent December 24 for Pizza, Pasta and the Christmas Eve Menu. 5 stars for authentic Italian food and service! Keep up the good work guys!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Kris Klimek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMSLi-T7uazZiiEH5yOo8-72eKA7SjpNRON2kHN4Ke_G2S_k4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A charming place with a warm atmosphere that took me back to France. Unpretentious but sophisticated at the same time. Fantastic cocktails that are a cut above. Menu was just right in their offerings, many dishes I would have liked to order so I will have to return to sample others.  This was our second time dining here and our experience was memorable once again. Our meals were rich with flavour and portions were ideal. Even the cr√®me br√ªl√©e had a nice twist without loosing the traditional taste. A local gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOps-npCSzLbG-pgoOPoHk12uwj0diKmNqaBZPU&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Berkley McNamara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJcSyHXbikFhetkOpS2qcYrW1JwPpLwmx2yNmAaiASz5jYuwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was one of the best meals I‚Äôve had in years.  The food was inspired and the service added to the experience in all the right ways.  I would repeat my entire meal over and and over again. Cannot wait to come back !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP11e8sNTtKkOUB6X7mH_BWxrUjF0zM9SIBtNwF&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Hanif M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUffyC8zNMufrv130HoQIUZhrgzgxk_iDPTgtNVSsLcoEZ6LvtH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is fairly intimate but the food is very tasty. All the dishes were excellent. The prices are a bit on the high side but that is probably due to the quality of the ingredients which are excellent. My only suggestion for them is to have a more approachable wine option as most of the wines are very pricey. Overall a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwJYOarYXDzOq2QfIc73cyypKwpUJnGEZ2vAlE&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Ali Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3PxD7u8hAuIIfsHPwY3qF1Vf2akitCmCQsH6To47GSdPMek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I give it 5 start, but certainly does not deserve it, i just really wanted this place to be great and it sort of was, the service was beyond great, 2 out of 5 meals we ordered was not on the menu but they made it for my kids,  the decor, vibe and drinks are just great. However actual main food quality and taste was not really there, over flavor under flavor wrong steak cut just all over the place. Also this place needs a pastry chef, store bought bread is not the way to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcUSY5o5NuvktX_aEcYFswLBMuyw4W_4lfJOo&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful early dinner recently at Mereon, arriving just before the end of happy hour.  Shared Crevettes √† la Parisienne, truffle fries and a couple of glasses of white wine off the HH menu. Also tried the French Onion Soup Gratin√©e. A very nice start to the meal.

For mains we had the West Coast Risotto, House Smoked Sablefish and Beef Bourguignon.  Could recommend any of these as they were all excellent, but the beef drew raves from my son.

To finish, we sampled the dessert menu, having one each of the Lemon Cr√™pe, Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e and  Chocolate Fondant.  All delicious.

Overall, a very memorable meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3BQfL_S0qbrzg7wD2ZmTGfe8ipyze7mjtZXdR&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"TJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2_JMf3cx_NP0F-ciEBkmvu0XTQXYY0_9kJ96D6_oMe7D-DQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for happy hour on a Sunday afternoon after coming across the restaurant on my IG feed. I had recently came back from a trip to France and was craving anything that would bring me back to feeling like I was there again. The restaurant is cute and cozy and had nice finishing touches to it. Definitely loved the atmosphere!

We ordered the Charcuterie Platter, cauliflower bites, truffle fries, and the Crevettes √† la Parisienne (my fave out of all 4), and all were well portioned and delicious. We also enjoyed their cocktails as well. Appreciated the nice little surprise from the owner in end with a complimentary cocktail on the house - such a nice gesture.

Looking forward to coming back for a brunch or dinner time meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_6QCihDmIa75Cj0S2PCk5UmqCjx4sm7Tf_e-A&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Maryam A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJCbw_3nUeFYieQMOLdHNK7mcnuHxlZEJrmEtPYBJtORo2vgwr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tucked in a cozy corner with a charming vibe and live music, this restaurant was a delightful find. We didn't expect a fully booked restaurant on a Sunday night in West Vancouver, so we were glad we made reservations in advance.
Once we entered, we were immediately greeted at the door and shown to our table. I had the margarita which was tasty. For appetizers, we had French Onion Soup Gratin√©e, smoked olives, and Heirloom Tomato & Bocconcini Salad. All were excellent ‚Äì a solid 10/10.

For the main course, we had West Coast Risotto, Beef Bourguignon, Steak Au Poivre, and House Smoked Sablefish. While all the dishes were a bit on the salty side, our server mentioned that other tables had similar feedback that night, suggesting this might have been a one-off issue. Despite this, the portion sizes were generous, and our overall experience was fantastic.

For dessert, we tried the passion fruit cr√®me br√ªl√©e, which was perfectly balanced and not too sweet ‚Äì just the way I like it.

I highly recommend this place and will be back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHuWELMMRQehS_h0cxqYVeaPvevoHFYQsZiEQt&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Thomas Kyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIKLSJ3mYH11F9QOmze4Vx8ALJBw2IwmZnvpaWrhddBPldvjLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had brunch at Mereon yesterday. Located on the north shore tucked away on a lovely little side street. I was greeted warmly when I arrived and given a choice of seating. The server immediately made sure I had water and my beverage of choice as I waited for my friend to arrive. The menu while not expansive does offer a variety of (predominantly) French cuisine choices. Once my friend arrived we were given time to scan the menu and make our choices. I ordered the Croque Monsieur and my friend ordered the prime rib burger. The food arrived in good time - not too fast but also not slowly. We both enjoyed our meals and found them satisfying and tasty.  The only tiny complaint I might have is I think the presentation of the food could be turned up a notch. Following our main course we both shared the Lemon Crepe which did not disappoint. Overall we really enjoyed our meal. We were helped by a couple of servers and both were outstanding! Thank you we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo5ASTktWDTGTCBo7CoyDBh-SiyAfQRGdr1ScT&fid=0x0:0x3d79547687451db2"],"When":"2024-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Salmon House in West Vancouver offers stunning views of the city, creating a beautiful ambiance that's perfect for a special night out. The tasteful decor and interior design truly enhance the dining experience.

I highly recommend making a reservation, especially during peak hours. While the food was decent, I have to admit that the seafood chowder was a bit disappointing. I was expecting a rich, creamy clam chowder, but the taste was just okay and didn't quite meet my expectations.

One thing that caught me off guard was the $7 charge for the bread basket. Most other restaurants provide this complimentary, so it felt a bit off to pay for something that is typically included.

On a positive note, the Alder Grilled Salmon Trio was fantastic‚Äîdefinitely the highlight of the meal! The Alder Grilled Beef Tenderloin was just okay; it was cooked more to medium than the medium rare I had requested.

Desserts were a delightful finish to the meal. The Affogato and the honey and rosemary cr√®me br√ªl√©e were both excellent!

Overall, while there were a few misses, the ambiance and some standout dishes make the Salmon House worth a visit, especially for the views. Just keep in mind to manage your expectations with some of the menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqnHf-Crwxc5MysKMIlIQ956v9unggokTrQhXx&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the BEST and underrated restaurants for food and view jn the city. We come all the way from Langley for this incredible service and seafood. My partner doesn‚Äôt enjoy steak unless it‚Äôs here ! We‚Äôve previously tried scallops, prawns, crab, lobster, risotto, steak and every single thing is a perfect 10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-SCsa3JDuG7GdVtPpAQ2a5xW_GU_8kQLjh1Wx&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Veronika S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4Qv4g9Jkf6KRIHVw7FujPaFMxBGsR6W-mLDX333k9R-vMdKvD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seafood tower for two is so fun for a date/celebration! Everything tasted great, some things were particularly spectacular like the in-house candied salmon, the crab salsa, the butter for lobster and the sauce for the oysters. The view can‚Äôt be beat too.  Service was the best I have had in a really long time. I‚Äôm really surprised that I have lived here for so long yet never heard of this place. Give it a try if you haven‚Äôt yet!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi-2vZeXyYfC_qMv4DQIhnNXTd0AIFtk_xdej3&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Salmon House on the Hill is as its name suggests, perched high on top of a hill in West Vancouver. The view from this restaurant is breathtaking and it would be challenging indeed to find another restaurant with comparable views to the ones found at Salmon House on the Hill.

Featured here:
Salmon House Seafood Chowder
Salmon House Sampler
Alder Grilled Salmon Trio
Dark Chocolate Lava Cake
Affogato

Did I mention how great the view is from this place? The food here is way overpriced so it's really the view that you're paying for when you come here.

The Seafood Chowder was a very tasty soup but really not our idea of a chowder. Chowders are usually thicker whereas this consisted of a thin, light broth. It was a wonderful soup and the light broth was perhaps better for our stomachs than a typical chowder would have been. Just that it didn't quite fit our concept of a chowder.

Some of us found the salmon to be a bit overcooked. The restaurant was good enough to have the kitchen cook another order of it for one of us (only one of us dared to complain about it), and they didn't charge us for the first order. The second one was an improvement, but could have still been a bit more moist.

One person in our group who has a nut allergy began to have a bit of an allergic reaction to something he ate. After consulting with our server who then went and checked with the kitchen it was discovered that pecans had been used to make a sauce that had been on top of his food. The restaurant apologized and didn't charge us for this dish either.

It's really quite surprising that they didn't think to list the pecans on their menu. When so many people in the world have nut allergies, it should be standard procedure for any restaurant that uses nuts, to list those nuts on the menu. This would enable customers with nut allergies to make more informed decisions when choosing what they'd like to order from the menu.

Oh, and the Dark Chocolate Lava Cake wasn't very Lava-ish. Having already deducted two entrees from our bill though, we weren't about to go and make a fuss about the Lava Cake.

Service: Good
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: 2229 Folkestone Way, West Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNMUgslD8v3Wwzgp2HL2I9PRvWIkwAUmkhazko&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Joanna Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo3CUdy70AYCLA_JiRqJIn6ZW8IfTtpsEncXt2po_QrN_S4wuPVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been years since we've eaten dinner here, went here for Valentine's dinner. They had a fabulous set menu, all were delicious and the special hibiscus margarita was awesome. ‚ù§Ô∏è Always a great experience eating here, wish we were sitting by the window but it's still ok. Great view of Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfE1SZHBIVh13XLeCXV2KSCiNjFMlB3cg7tMmv&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"Merv Jersak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7JNZRFVkcE9dCTLVdjEvIhilDbiYnGSyFEnGU-VlTdHEe0LBS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A favorite each time we return to Vancouver. Unbelievably beautiful views. Excellent seafood choices. Delicious meals. Attentive servers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAo0h5Ja0-Nv-qqewxzE9aNisL0EyQPP_MX3bm&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update September 2024: Beautiful night, excellent service. The lemon-pesto salmon dish was fantastic, and the salmon was cooked to perfection. The Affogato dessert with delish cookies and Baileys was amazing, the ideal sweet finish. They're likely open into late 2025, make sure you stop in!
---
August 2021: Pricey but excellent service and delicious food. Ideal for special occasions and out-of-town guests. Salmon Wellington is wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2WZhnXXtlYez_MlinP_4uYw3ZnDwpaPgq4vIr&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2020-11-3"},{"Name":"Anahita Keshavarzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ5IFXDXGeJFKNTRgR2oPfZzy3NNLLGXYQt_BTEOepMZzQIZ3C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, and lovely service. Their specialty of the day was their halibut which was very tasty. Our friends shared their seafood tower and they loved it! We will definitely go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5BwU--ZDCorsAoaKWb7Byr-q68uexoVX_kb_g&fid=0x0:0x5aae5c7f78f58e0"],"When":"2024-5-7"}]

[{"Name":"farzod darzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6S_yag_YL4YiZjd4sFjFB-maQTEZb8UDuM1Z0oL02xjRA8mT7AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new favorite Persian restaurant. Diba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOo3jA0Ln_wug6YtPTDGlZxem1_tGn3cJLDPsJ-AoDtjDM-egl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Persian food in Vancouver!

The kabobs were juicy, the rice was fragrant, and the sides were seasoned just right. The service was also excellent, with a warm and welcoming atmosphere that made the experience even better. If you're craving authentic Persian cuisine, this is the place to go. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOloTf-dJ87I-fOEuXiYvQKpDKYhAoLHYjHuBFa&fid=0x0:0xc2c2423b8facf56e"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Negin Ebrahimian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItLgGCKoA5z23ibKYcSBynR4GMVcNOdS4PKePSnB9WUXQo7Js=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic experience! The food is simply exquisite. The ingredients are fresh, and the portions are generous.

If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic Persian dining experience, Miraas is the place to go. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Trudy Chapman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSiOKbpYRkzYEmEmM5H8SbnjS4IwdN8lQskVGJx6kGT-um7Jlbcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey! I've been told that I posted my review for the wrong location...  Apologies! Here's my review for the right location this time...  :-)
Had dinner at the West Van location on Thursday night  2024) (Sept 18, 2024) and it was a truly outstanding experience! We had a series of starters, all fresh and each one tasted better than the one before! The beet salad was beyond outstanding though, I must say! For our mains, I had the roasted cauliflower and my husband had the duck. Again, they were wonderful. A beautiful mix of Peruvian and Japanese flavours. The service was swift and attentive without being over bearing. Our server knew the menu inside and out, giving us great advice. Although we live in Ottawa, we‚Äôll be back when next in West Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl7xJqtIeKk2U3Uj8REQVbvyK0v_AabKwREPQq&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"April","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlKY6gDYkk6ATbaZCFZffBjnuW8BPndntWAkSybL5P35CsbfwJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's unfortunate that the sushi chef wasn't available at the time, but we still had a great experience with excellent food and service. Our server, Tetyana, was kind and attentive. We‚Äôll definitely return for sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTVqyd1jKM49nogt8u0spI5_3D-n8P2hjzY4or&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Ambleside unit of the Ancora Waterfront restaurant is gorgeous! We had an awesome experience overall. Phenomenal service from start to finish and great selection of sushi and appetizers. The lobster roll was out of this world, just a bomb of different flavours; my favourite was the ceviche mixto though. The dining room has a wonderful decoration and the view to the Ambleside Beach is glorious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFIKMOBgcZTvEZWNDTSSD8VyBalYuQC1PKCbZQ&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for my partner‚Äôs birthday. Nice decor and ambiance, good location and friendly staff. We ordered several different dishes, but the Ancora glacier platter stood out the most to us, as the quality of the seafood and the flavour profiles were fantastic. The food was delicious, but the octopus tagliatelle‚Äôs noodles were cooked unevenly, and when we were offered a birthday ‚Äúdessert‚Äù it was two tiny cookies, which I found odd. Pricing and portion sizes are typical for a seafood restaurant of this standard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcdbtTgiZytmpeevK06P0xfwoxKbKZuhHc_9gB&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yummy food, very careful with allergy complications, they are very mindful! I recommend do not sit in patio because service is much slower! We ordered and it took about 1hr to get our food and the complementary bread did time even come in that wait time, it arrived 2 mins before food and we were super hungry, but sushi pizza was tasty, duck was super hot, very very very spicy i think more than usual. Inside looked much nicer and better vibe we sat outside to catch sunset but ended up not having a super experience, still food tastes fresh tbh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMEePxcVCb1U0Ymi_ONK-blOcfcdgmvtM7dZVa&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"By the waterfront‚Ä¶

Original plan didn‚Äôt turn out so decided to give this place a try. It‚Äôs located along the newer strip of restaurants on Ambleside overlooking the beach. There are both  pay and free parking along the surrounding streets.

Inside has that modern contemporary look and layout. There are both tables and booth seats available. A cross between a casual and semi formal atmosphere.

Here were the food I ordered;

1. Classic Caesar & flor de fresa. The drinks were okay, on the lighter side taste wise.
2. Complimentary bread with pumpkin spread. Fresh and warm, the pumpkin spread was tasty.
3. 1/2 dozen premium fresh oysters. Very fresh with a rich flavour.
4. Bluefin tuna tataki. It was okay but hardy notice the bluefin flavour.
5. Lobster maki roll. A little disappointed on this one. The lobster taste and texture were near nonexistent. And the rice was over pressed, lost its texture.
6. Hamachi, bluefin, uni nigiris. The portion was very generous but the sushi rice needed some proper seasoning.
7. Yuca soup. It was hot and I quite enjoyed it.
8. Large mussels. I don‚Äôt know about large but they were good size.
9. Octopus anticucho. The Smokey flavour and aroma is okay but the texture wasn‚Äôt, it was like chewing on rubber.
10. 10oz ribeye. Taste wise it was okay but it was too dry and plain to satisfy my tastebuds.
11. Complimentary little desserts.

Overall, the atmosphere was quite causal, I can see it being busy during the warmer weathers especially when it‚Äôs by the beach and tourist area.

The service was okay but could be a bit more attentive by the staffs especially when there were less than a handful of table of customers.

As for the food, the quality overall fell a bit short for the price. I definitely think it needs to bring a notch up to retain the repeats of the locals. after all, locals will not just pay a higher price because it‚Äôs by the waterfront‚Ä¶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaVX21BEdcfLJ8nfSIW1bkwhifm3IkbxgwdKXf&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Ali Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3PxD7u8hAuIIfsHPwY3qF1Vf2akitCmCQsH6To47GSdPMek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is hard to rate this restaurant, on one hand its beautiful, great location by the sea, great service and great music, on the other hand very mid food, taste wise just not matching the price and freshness is a hit or miss, loved the yucas bravas though. Also shoutout to our waitress who i forgot ur name, u were amazing. Btw the restaurant had no customers at all, and in two hours we were there only one other table was occupied ( weekday 7ish pm)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS28brJU1prc1FNsM6G6DaR2QYlXYpTbjn6JU&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Maggie LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrVcdJRWQA1wXNnkIPcpufdeeu0XM9TyHmEcU8wjLd3hsL12B1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were one vegan, two non vegans, and a (calm, quiet, well-behaved) dog ‚Äî they accommodated us all. We enjoyed cocktails and food with a view of the water from their dog friendly heated patio. Perfect lunch spot after walking for hours at Capilano.

Idk what our waitress‚Äô name was ‚Äî a blond woman with an Eastern European accent ‚Äî she was excellent, really knew the menu and how to accommodate my vegan requests. She even suggested a dish for our dog. So thoughtful.

Vegan ate: the tempura yam? Sweet potato roll + mushroom side, bok choy side ‚Äî all good. Otono 2.0 cocktail was also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgPQ_XTDUf7F45z41VtKNq4MYvgp1eBfk1kAd3&fid=0x0:0x3c4ebe2b6013a07d"],"When":"2024-6-5"}]

od and nice service. The chairs were a little bit wobbly. I had the Asari Miso soup üç≤,  Nigiri Tobiko, Sunset Roll and the Salmon box .when I wanted more Tobiko they brang it out really fast. Super friendly servers.

I will visit here again for sure!

üç£ üç£ üç£ üç£","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpCFRwFMuu4yJNwtHOvHY5wmTW9dOA-3PwwMsK&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Tara Jalali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpD1zIdHthiv4E_zptAjGdYsGaog2kdoJN9t4UImZKj3f1WFfu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Relatively expensive for the potions but the taste and freshness makes it worthwhile. No need to use the soy sauce as each roll was full of flavour.  Unique items and beautiful presentation üç£","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNY9mqi2jQBydeL2QKv6bzfTP9bSmQpLg3ymkZ&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was passing by Raku and ordered take out to enjoy on a hot sunny summer day. Great food and I saw comfortable inside and patio seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOir1WU87oI6QnTQgGGUilry7cKrMbIpqT-BztZ&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Bank Apisit Suparan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLVGZqooX70iTAVXuVWOQdxzltdpf5cSOqPks98JPcrI0saeTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Raku Japanese Kitchen in West Vancouver is an absolute gem. This restaurant has consistently delivered an outstanding dining experience every time I've visited. The food is not just tasty; it's a culinary delight that leaves your taste buds dancing with joy.

Their commitment to using fresh ingredients is evident in every dish. Whether it's the perfectly sliced sashimi or the expertly crafted sushi rolls, you can taste the quality in every bite.

But it's not just about the food; the service here is top-notch. The staff is attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. They make you feel welcome from the moment you walk in, and they're always ready to provide recommendations if you're unsure what to order.

Raku Japanese Kitchen is not just a restaurant; it's an experience. It's my go-to spot for Japanese cuisine in town, and I can't recommend it highly enough. If you're looking for delicious food, excellent service, and a memorable dining experience, look no further than Raku Japanese Kitchen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOZ4bpB1qsr_KNFlrOU_PUGpgOv4CjphQnuVNC&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2023-9-30"},{"Name":"YU U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0nH1IDVl5JKBE-6ym-GzRTN424F1AIj9FKlXASZfTI9-nMv1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sushi selection at this place is undeniably delicious, showcasing a range of flavors that truly impress. However, I did notice that the portion of salad provided was rather modest, leaving a bit to be desired in terms of quantity. Additionally, while the sushi shines, I did encounter a slight disappointment in the freshness of the accompanying salad. Despite this, I wholeheartedly recommend trying out their sushi series ‚Äì it's where their culinary expertise truly shines. With some improvements in the salad department, this spot could easily become a go-to destination for sushi enthusiasts seeking a delightful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRaEj2udk5uYl4S0UKbJUzhCFUSKfeAkD24j9i&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Alireza Moazeni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULSYtygjWstQXIfZw_H4fbvb7SaRU177UhrvsGS6ewV6OOJaRx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although we arrived late, but the service and food was amazing. The taste and food design was amazing compared to other places. Strongly suggested!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBSTvS2sc6BnCqDWPhI4wbkl7pP2YlxoR8ouTr&fid=0x0:0xc58e300adf9ee91d"],"When":"2024-9-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cindy Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2x3WTsaq24Va-C0OXivTxrAK9IBM0CBE-EtTx2p0pPPdLzcxqkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice interior and ambiance compared to my local Earl's! The food was really good and consistent with the usual quality at other locations. (Pizza mightve been slightly betterü´£)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg5VXVGtWjWpislJpmy5yiIqLW_pEINcqTunlv&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Saina Ghatei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOGatxFGT_I6c29aOlHgsP3xJujVMY__Y2JwIsQEdUVFMoSR4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic dinner tonight at Earls Ambleside, thanks to Aidan at the bar for making it amazing!
He was  thoughtful and made our night so fun and enjoyable. The food and drinks were definitely on point!
I had the Santa Fe Chicken and the Winter Sangria (Red). The Santa Fe Salad was fresh and bursting with flavor, and the sangria was a perfect holiday drink.
I definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSN4Ky7MdZydQrWjCBLHV_2jD4p2P1KZI3M_-2&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Peter ‚ÄúPJ‚Äù Csanky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURuIZzzcoU-exPrQqhYjagAhvs4uT3-sZfsEntgLOo7qw6WTFF9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our Christmas dinner party at Earls Ambleside, and it was an absolutely incredible experience from start to finish! The Seafood Tower was a showstopper‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The calamari was next-level delicious, easily some of the best we've ever had. And if you're a fan of sushi, you have to try their Spicy California Rolls‚Äîan absolute must!

For the mains, everything was cooked to perfection. Each dish was bursting with flavor and showcased the attention to detail in the kitchen. The service? A flawless 5-star experience. The staff was attentive, friendly, and ensured that every detail of our evening was perfect.

Earls Ambleside truly delivered a magical evening for us. If you're looking for a spot to celebrate a special occasion or just enjoy an amazing meal, look no further. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPePyussfZ-V1-m6nde_G8m9IQPv_zc39HrAqjs&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjDFHDIcbtV_DjbplKljLcAMOcHcimjCyqMXoLTCCbOhYL58Lu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, friendly service (though slow). Washrooms are incredible. Modern, clean aesthetic. Good location. Love the bamboo straws, so much better than paper. Unfortunately, the food is way overpriced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMETqq2tU2jXnay12cmmlHDTpKTegD86nA_GZLA&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"carol liem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUCuYohzwvL-I_7dNVbbjdcGA122HF_X2tQ1V3VyXmvEJB9WWU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious. I was sharing the full rack of ribs with my husband and they split the ribs and plated them nicely into 2 plates. They even gave a free dessert to my friend who was visiting from overseas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkOYimBPtn8ZTYmuNR6lNvGuRa7FNOjAyXmOuK&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Earls Ambleside is always a lively, scenic and savory choice when looking for dining options on the Northshore.

A family friend was visiting from overseas and noticed the restaurant at the corner of  Grosvenor Ambleside overlooking the park and harbour.

We went inside -- arriving during a busy mid-week afternoon "happy hour" -- were received by a very welcoming host and given a great table with nice view of Ambleside Pier.

Our server, Brandon, was not only an attentive but positively engaging guy. He took our drinks order, gave us time to peruse/check out the menu, and also suggested to us the afternoon's featured items.

I opted for the very positively promoted 6oz Filet Mignon (terrific choice btw - thx Brandon bro) with side Caesar Salad while the family friend had the amazing Caramelized Vanilla Cheese Cake.

The whole experience at Earls Ambleside, both in terms of food, people and atmosphere, was beyond positive. Definitely will be back again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh6mW8GGH3D51eI44ttgtfW66zR5yWcP-E77Ch&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Maddie Threndyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnaEP8Gr0Ke0jKpcLmEQvTNH6BD_US0ZX6ciYA_vIIAFOKfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic meal for my brothers birthday. I usually don't write reviews but this was an amazing experience. I haven't been to Earls Ambleside in a few years as it was never anything to write home about but tonight was really great. Our server Juliette was so kind and attentive. She did a great job of reading body language and being able to tell if anyone needed anything before we even asked. She surprised us with two birthday desserts for our table which was so kind and is something that restaurants never do anymore. There was a guest experience lady who came and hand delivered my brother a birthday card too. Nothing beats a hand written card! The bus boy who was helping her was great too. He noticed a glass was dirty when we sat down and he discreetly replaced it before we even asked and immediately filled our waters throughout the night. Food and drinks were excellent. Earls has really worked on its food quality and presentation and it is so much better than it was when I used to work there! You can tell lots of love goes into the food. The quality of the staff is incredible too, I imagine this is all a reflection of management. Good job team!! Hope to be back soon! Please share my thanks with Juliette and the staff that contributed to our great night :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY7eMLbATuffZ7AIFf2zXG3kT-0CZQY5DNkmtx&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite earls  restaurant locations its got beautiful views around  ...the restaurant itself is beautiful inside and outside  ,lots of seating areas  to choose from  , staff are friendly,  service is good  ,quality is good  ,lots of verity of food and drinks üç∏... they got comfortable padding chairs,  they got a bar area were if people need to plug in electronics they got power outlets under the bar  table  area  . I definitely would recommend this earls location  ...there is car  parking  and public transportation bus stops  around....this earls restaurant is next to Ambleside beach  ‚õ±Ô∏è  . I added menu pictures in the post too .  This earls location draws more of a mixture of a crowd singles ,couples , all  age  types , families  , lots of family gatherings  üçùü•óüç≤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaHt7_0QAOkn1vMMpT24TwBQShFFaaRB4pY00C&fid=0x0:0x23daa081a695acd2"],"When":"2024-8-19"}]

title: Carmelo's Ristorante Italiano

descriptions: Cozy Italian mainstay dishing up pasta, meat dishes & thin-crust pies for dine-in or takeout.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Britt Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUltldoJf_ZTfOiZJVrw8x3rcH9rptEu4doGlUAwdyPucEw3F0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, lots of locals. Excellent service from the two waitresses. Food was authentic, felt like we were back in Europe. The menu had plenty of options that were impossible to choose from - just a lovely experience from start to finish! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9EMCsCvM1D4HfUjYW1c-W8snIfiUD9fL60vc&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came on a Tuesday for dinner. The whole restaurant was pretty packed by 6pm. Mostly local people who live around here. Very cute mom and pop place

The servers were fast and knew what they were doing. They had servers just for grating cheese and pepper and taking away plates and others just for taking your order

Carpaccio (21) - we enjoyed the carpaccio. Not overly done with cheese or greens. Not too chewy either

Prawns appetizer (22) - cooked perfectly and seasoned well. Could do with a little more vegetable

Linguine vongole (26) - tasted like the sea. Noodles could have been less cooked but then again it depends on your audience. The clams tasted fresh and were sweet.

Seafood pasta of the day (26)- had squid in it. Also tasted like the sea (in a good way). Pasta was the same as the one above except the toppings were different

Arugula pizza (24) and Primavera pizza (24) - the pizza dough is obviously the same on both but both were delicious. Well cooked and chewy. The toppings were different. I preferred the meat one more just because I love proscuitto. Well balanced. Would recommend the pizza over the pasta

Tiramisu (12.50) - pretty standard. Not overly sweet. Generous portion for the price. Wouldn't order it again

Overall I thought the food was not bad and the service was pretty good. The seafood pasta flavours were something you can't make at home. The pizza was also good. This is a cute neighborhood joint. The prices are also good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxQFHcQ4xG3wDQ52RY1Edk5RCH_RBFvBmd1S7q&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Tony Yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsPN6-L8WCfEdqMhEgkWezEIVTPz104I5idsjGqVIIGPqSSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience! We ordered the fettuccine fungi and the clam linguine, both are amazing. Sauces and the texture of the pasta are perfect! If you are a fan of garlic you must love their pasta. Staffs are so kind and the atmosphere is warm. Can‚Äôt wait to come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_r0STqwx_C0FfWtOiZi5cwxnIOHgzp9g-tCLo&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a nice dinnner here with my Mom!  We shared the Ceasar salad and it was fresh and flavourful!  I had one of the features, 10oz Baseball Sirloin with Tiger Prawn and seasonal veggies!  The steak was a bit tough‚Ä¶however I think that has more to do with the cut than the execution!  There were only two small prawn so not a big deal there..which made sense for the price at $38‚Ä¶which is a very fair price for such a large amount of steak.  The gravy and veggies were delicious and everything on the plate had great flavour!  My Mom
Had the Lasagna which she always has when she goes there as she says it‚Äôt the Best!  Our server was Amazing and we had a great experience all around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqO9_zNwgVjRewQQcakEEJJKyuBQ1X55V7Llx4&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Eat Eat (Icaneatanelephant)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLILOjBQv6wZV1kDSPRQ8jIv4U9s8U1sYFT2UEYd46rc1-4VWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had prawn, scallop, and clam risotto with lemon zest, white wine.

As well as spaghetti meatball.

Side dish of their in house bread.

First of all, yo better order their in house bread as a starter because they have a secret spread sauce for the bread . Don‚Äôt miss out that !

The risotto is very good, because it is very well balance of the sauce and slightly touch from the lemon zest to bright up the seafood. (They know what they are cooking )

The meatball I believe is a pork and beef in house meatball, very nicely made.

Nth more can say, will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtg4VI7OVUpRJbgIXrpY7u-ZDCOHyqe4f4tGSc&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Tom Karoutsos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ7Fiqyz7PugFL_L_FcNh7ihSu9RRAYiDTFthVN2r2j6uOZR8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Best enjoyed with a reservation; we went in without one so we were offered a table that was reserved about an hour later so we were a bit nervous not knowing how long food would take to arrive. In the end it worked well. Food came quickly and it was delicious.  We had two kinds of pasta with seafood.  We will go back some day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherry Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHau4-ktP3F_MZ-5fU_mmgqxiZeynZ-k5dFD9nkZBxvYzTloCsZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were seated and served quickly. Staff was helpful and friendly. The food was delicious. The pasta of the day and Fungi pizza. The pizza crust is thin and light. I loved that they loaded on the mushrooms! The fish in the pasta dish was delicious and cooked perfectly. The restaurant filled up with diners as we were there just after 5pm on a Thursday. They do take reservations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-BYrOEe3Mn_OF-BnGE3RIUpfwUgSK6zmsP-FK&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2023-9-29"},{"Name":"Momo K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDtBdog4DZtyNcOUkVP14exKOvJ3BCsAuumJ8dw8p4bFC5Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Traditional Italian. Prices were decent.
It was really cold inside so us and other tables were still wearing our coats inside. Everything tasted good. Best was the butternut squash soup. Pasta special was crab and lobster ravioli with lemon based sauce. It was ok but not the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP81GKNjOKI6Zczfneamjiq6A5FRMy9qKmfJVPF&fid=0x0:0x94686eb273b6c8c2"],"When":"2024-2-25"}]

[{"Name":"zari showqi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk2vrvV2Rv2mI9sLlIatL82SYuaMlqExkXaMJrzA94bMhB_l8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so glad I came back to Branch Restaurant for the second time! This place truly is a fantastic breakfast spot. The customer service is outstanding - the staff is friendly and attentive. And the food? Absolutely delicious! Shaun, the chef, is a culinary mastermind. We shared a few dishes and enjoyed every single bite. Can't wait to come back and try more of Shaun's creations!
5 stars isn't enough - this place deserves a shining review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgT8G-859LRS17Q5uccC9AZYDNyxdY89Y6pqR0&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Maura Austin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQZS1BkyBZ5u7D-oM8oIZUBU9HXKY1j-aMz6x8rjK3uKOOvktz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever I want delicious brunch food; I will drive all the way from Everett, WA to West Vancouver just to dine at OEB! My husband and I enjoy coming up here frequently because it‚Äôs just such a great time! 5/5 for food and service! I am giving a 4/5 not for anything the establishment has done, but because other guests speak a bit too loud and it‚Äôs a bit annoying to hear the shenanigans they‚Äôre speaking about while I am trying to eat my food. Other than that; thank you OEB West Vancouver! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwQqPuserIgGadSwJHrQ-_DyvVhJKxRSzvjncC&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Eiman1984 Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJo_JgD646PPajzKd2xQ_cihSpEVJ_tXNNy1x9c1x_eDk7zb8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this breakfast restaurant, and I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the experience! From the moment we walked in, the staff greeted us with warm smiles and were incredibly attentive throughout our meal. They made us feel right at home, which set a great tone for the rest of our visit.

The menu offers a fantastic variety of options, catering to all tastes and dietary preferences. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for a classic breakfast, something sweet, or a healthy option, there‚Äôs something for everyone. I decided to try the chef‚Äôs special, and it was absolutely phenomenal! The ingredients were fresh, the flavors were perfectly balanced, and the presentation was beautiful. It‚Äôs clear that the chef puts a lot of thought and creativity into every dish, making each bite a delight.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is cozy and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a relaxed breakfast with friends or family. The staff‚Äôs friendliness and professionalism really stood out to me‚Äîthey were quick to answer any questions and made sure we had everything we needed without being overbearing.

Overall, this restaurant exceeded all my expectations. The combination of delicious food, a welcoming environment, and top-notch service makes it a must-visit. A big thank you to the chef and the entire team for creating such a memorable dining experience. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back soon!

I highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUVm7OsShDaAwzcgjhwQ84JBlfYjVnVQwYZ9_J&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"OEB Ambleside
1390 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, BC V7Y 1B5

OEB Ambleside has garnered significant buzz, often boasting long wait times and high expectations. I decided to experience the hype for myself during a visit to the area. Upon arrival, I was informed of a 20-30 minute wait, which I opted to endure given the time I had to spare. Unfortunately, what awaited me fell far short of expectations.

Food

Korean Bulgogi Benny
This dish, consisting of Korean-style shaved inside-round beef, peperonata, eggs, and waffle fries served atop a butter croissant, had potential on paper. The beef itself was tender and well-seasoned, offering a pleasant balance of sweetness and savory flavors. However, the dish faltered with its execution. Both the croissant and the waffle fries were served cold, which significantly detracted from the overall experience. For a dish priced at a premium, the lack of attention to basic temperature standards was disappointing.

Rating: 5/10

Breakfast Tacos
The breakfast tacos were, regrettably, forgettable. While competently assembled, they lacked the bold flavors or unique twists that would set them apart. The result was a dish that felt more like a generic offering than a signature item on the menu.

Rating: 5/10

Drinks

Vanilla Latte and Pomegranate Nojito
The drinks provided a rare bright spot in an otherwise lackluster meal. The vanilla latte was rich and well-balanced, while the pomegranate Nojito was refreshing and thoughtfully prepared. These beverages stood out as the most enjoyable aspect of my visit.

Service

Service is often the backbone of a memorable dining experience, yet this was where OEB Ambleside faltered the most. The server was inattentive, failing to engage or follow up after delivering the dishes. Basic courtesies, such as checking in on the table or ensuring drinks arrived in a timely manner, were conspicuously absent. The lack of professionalism was glaring and left much to be desired.

Rating: 1/10

Ambiance

The restaurant‚Äôs atmosphere was lively, but not in a way that enhanced the experience. The space was overly crowded, and the noise level made conversation difficult. Furthermore, the pacing of service was poorly managed; drinks took 15 minutes to arrive, while the food followed almost immediately afterward, disrupting the flow of the meal.

Rating: 2/10

Price

For a restaurant with high pricing, the quality and execution did not justify the cost. The cold dishes, small portions, and lack of attention to detail made the experience feel overpriced and underwhelming.

Verdict

OEB Ambleside may attract crowds, but my visit left me questioning the source of its popularity. While the drinks were enjoyable and the menu concept intriguing, the execution was lacking in nearly every other aspect. Poor service, subpar food quality, and an overcrowded ambiance overshadowed the positives. For those considering a visit, temper your expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWWN_dRBn3Y92xVmQPN51-hUkiHuJahtvmPUAG&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"shabnam naghibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd6csLq_Plgoil1-oRcblVIUe4ZOew5Yy14HIazDukVO-9IIeH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this charming breakfast place and had a delightful experience. I ordered toast with salmon, and it was absolutely amazing ‚Äì the flavors were perfectly balanced and the dish was beautifully presented. I also tried their chai latte, which was rich and flavorful, the perfect accompaniment to my meal. The ambiance of the restaurant was cozy and inviting, and the service was friendly and attentive. Overall, I highly recommend this breakfast place for a delicious meal and a wonderful dining experience.very nice manager üòä(Lina)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqa_R2WcS0OMxNu8tHlR9uvHShl9fuMLEtkdmZ&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgKXDcGIDcbkesef0FqudeAjvBmr8QtlNItEK7Lr5yWNkI3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It felt like a bit of racism. When I asked for the bill, the server made gestures and asked what I answer back 4 times as if she didn't understand me. Why can't she understand? The people I dined with understood what I was saying and thought it was strange that the server couldn't understand me. There wasn‚Äôt noisy. I had a delicious meal and felt really bad at the end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO73d-f7QxEuaVhyW2C8H4yo7jZkwrHLb5cFF2W&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Here we have breakfast/brunch chain trying to be fancy, complete with morning Mimosas to make you feel a bit posh, which is great if you ask me. The atmosphere is nice, the service is on point, and the menu has some interesting twists. But for me, confit de canard poutine was a real letdown. The duck tasted like it was dug up from yesterday‚Äôs leftovers, dry and sad. On the flip side, the Croque Madame was actually stellar. While this place was a mixed bag, there are still some dishes I‚Äôm curious about, so I might give it another go, maybe at a different location, hoping for a better hit-to-miss ratio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1PLMkWj5RmfK18huALT-PF07xqixCuihu_MuV&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Rina Molenderas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhcg0GPCaLVBeTS_F8Oew4ceXFyQgS6n93EMJ03mak-c-4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had Montreal Smoked Brisket Benny - Perfecto! Meat tender and the smokiness taste is just so yummy! Portions are big. Great choice. We also had Duck/Fowl Benny - it was soo good! For dessert had their Crepe dessert - not too sweet and the crepe, berries, custard, whipped cream with the  syrup was just perfection!
Will definitely be back and spread the word around. Staff is just so friendly! 5 star in everything!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSC2ZiiHhNdC8Bp7o9UXexfaQO2Kr9zD1B6kY&fid=0x0:0x9408b85a90ea9ed4"],"When":"2024-8-5"}]
