[{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely restaurant! Highly recommend the Korean fried chicken cheese flavor! It‚Äôs one of the best I have tried so far, crunchy and cheesy. The soup I ordered was pretty good and good portion size. The interior is cozy and the staff was friendly and very attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBofQEIHrhJ4dtawwmVEAsri8msrLgkT8mOOyW&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried out Ssal Korean Cuisine for a Saturday lunch. Service was mediocre. There's three daily lunch specials (11:30am to 3:00pm).

- Banchan - bean sprouts, kimchi and sliced fish cake. Kimchi was disappointing
- Jang-uh dup-bap ($19.00) - deep fried BBQ eel was nicely done. Lightly fried, soft and tender. Salad was watery, standard miso soup
- Gung-jung tteok-bok-ki ($18.00) - weirdly more veg than tteokboki. Wanted a chewier texture. Flavours were one-dimensional
- Spicy squid dol-sot-bab ($24.00) - priciest bibimbap we've come across. Squid was good but the flavours were bland and had zero spice (waiter said it was spicier than normal)

Wasn't impressed with Ssal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy0Jk1PDWRH6-XNYGadl--pXlhwYIyu4Xrxf5-&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The servers were quite bored as they greeted us. Instead of giving the three side dishes to each of the three who ordered them, they gave only two of the three and told them to share. The house salad that I ordered was okay for the price, but it was very liquid. I think the udon was better though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4iZDQqA6j8teFZDCVUlxzvxRIaG6488vKjtra&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always good.

This time had the Tofu broccoli salad. Seafood noodles and as always the Kimchi and fish cakes

Go try this place out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS3CsX8UX0JGMYsx0pdDbcmjJHIiiaAxwfWQPX&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Idil Yaktubay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqBo9b1WeR5S5YkIxgSFOYXmfyOoPwijfDGjPUX2huA0mVjAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place had one of if not the best tteok-bokki's I've ever had. The flavor was amazing, the spice level was just right, and it was loaded with a lot of things like noodles, dumplings, a boiled egg and veggies - and it was only $15!! Normally, you would have to pay extra for things like noodles etc. We also got the spicy fried chicken as an appetizer and it was so delicious! It was crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, and the sauce tasted amazing.
Our waiter was super polite, friendly, and helpful, so service was also five stars.
I LOVED the cozy Christmas atmosphere they created with slow jazz music, holiday decorations, and dim light.
I've been to a lot of Korean restaurants in my life and this is definitely one of the most memorable ones. 5/5 would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harry Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-XfQ_1GUTY03K0yC5R9PSoFya2l3Gd1-bY7IxIroOc7egQf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most valuable Korean restaurant I had in Vancouver, there on were else you could get food that‚Äôs so cheap. I love their fried chicken but it might be to much for 1-2 if your ordering other things. The food also comes with some free sides.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCB_7PHSlcr0G-PpPuqwYmTls0GYxY280Ciou7&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to lunch during the week and it was very calm. The food was really good, I had a seafood hot pot and it was full of it. But they need more tasty garnish (they were not really tasty). The staff were friendly and fast. The restroom is really clean and beautiful. I totally recommend the place. Price is reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bianca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq-Rj01K4A6mjApbbQa7vB5VCCGeExHGfo6T75ld_zsyAfXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible KFC (original), cucumber salad, kimchi, bulgogi and INSANE veggie dumplings. Terri the manager -  always makes you feel welcome. I try to eat something different every time I go and I haven‚Äôt been disappointed yet. YUM 5 STARS","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv4N5spuiE6rjHB0q0I1i1VmPxtkfKGemQ9iqM&fid=0x0:0x1c3a79ce77769db3"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been a while since we've been here but glad we went back. Very friendly staff and excellent service. Great beer selection. The pepperoni pizza was excellent as were the other dishes people had. We'll definitely go back and it's an alternative to some of the others in the area on occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlFScTYWkirPRd0F74H8r-Clw3TCYAUMEbquCY&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good stop for a menu with a variety of food options. Kind service.
- Cocktails: Well made. The spicy margaritas were delicious.
- Brussels sprouts: crispy with parmesan and the dip was good as well.
- Calamari: pretty small peices with way too many jalapenos. Was not the best.
- Fish tacos: Fresh. The pickled onions were a great accent to the fish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8tpPj3_8mt-gBIR1O-MKKpcYZpa5-f7nknzty&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"John Raises","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlsUaYnZw9EIlaSCJk8ViCTEaS0th3JB3PhpEbJoEn1j8RpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza üçï!!  The whole family went for the amazing pizzas, which did not disappoint!  Thin crust which had a good chew on the end plus each were loaded with toppings including quality cheese.   There is a large beer selection as well as cocktail, in which I enjoyed both a Caesar plus a few pilsners.   THE NOTORIOUS pizza was heavily topped with intense meats including loads of bacon!  Great family meal, lots of sports up on the TVs, excellent service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGNT6P0jWJyFTBnH1Elx1OsvCEhbW6IuMfjj2g&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Roksolana Prudyus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXffb6czBrN9CaBY1c9PWaw4vOAuThKRuhI_x-7hqJxi4nz-5Jy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by Village Taphouse in West Vancouver hoping to enjoy some coffee and dessert. Unfortunately, they were out of espresso, which was a bit disappointing. We decided to try the Cloud 9 and the Warm Pretzel Crunch Brownie. The Cloud 9 was delicious. However, the brownie didn‚Äôt quite hit the mark; it was overly sweet and so dense that it felt sticky and heavy. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it, especially if you prefer lighter desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1a0YJ_szf6fdKn1kn8QSAtriGsb0MrWWNRzMu&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Belinda Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn7TTMzcgQmmumaUE-aWmYGctragvugCfl1hNlTJMZXNxjoJwLTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Village Taphouse, located in West Vancouver, is known for its cozy atmosphere, making it great for gatherings. The menu includes burgers, tacos, and salads, along with local beers and wines. The staff service is average, and the overall dining experience is decent. However, the menu lacks variety, and it can be quite noisy during peak hours. I ordered pizza, which tasted good, but I hope there will be more options. It‚Äôs suggested to add menu items suitable for seniors and children.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfFKVVkoGdOXVs6QFLdjgkHx3i1tt1v7jH58Lv&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Rene Naude","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8TwAufdmOAvI362Cprmn68D3DH_uv2jKxGUIthd6ggkwHYyGc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An overall great dining experience. The hostess was quick to get our table ready and get us seated. Samantha, our server was great...very attentive and friendly. The beer, of course, is always good, and i appreciate the varied selection. The food was delicious (I had the Malibu Club with fries), if a little sparse. Don't get me wrong, it was plenty of food for me (too much food ruins my buzz üòÖ), but I would appreciate a better value. A small gripe in a suffering economy. Thanks for everything! I'll be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"farnaz rahnama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEonqzoEfySPBCeMeoUq2t9wG8Fu2I6_tJCZ5NUHZzqZWHTqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was ok and the atmosphere was really noise for me.
Nothing really wow from my point of view.
I would rather to go to Earls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAs4OzOQvlFfnC3itKyajLXo6bv7DwODOzZF7z&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Deepak Palvankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVscSKXQ5lavNIyt2f0h1IQbN1S44V5gEr-AvBdjho2vngXKaYxEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed our time at the Village Taphouse. A nice atmosphere with good choice for beers and food. Good service and very friendly staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-HkO9ArgvfKo2efudXhG1ADSIXL_YW5B582zh&fid=0x0:0x54f9e589498b1529"],"When":"2024-11-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A friend recommended this place and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. We came here for lunch and ordered the roast beef sandwich and the quiche with a side kale salad.

I had them toast the sandwich. I was told the quiche would take 15 minutes to be ready. It would be nice to get all our food at the same time. Both lunch entrees were tasty and fresh. The kale salad had some sweet potatoes in it. It needed a bit more salad dressing.

There are some vegan options and they definitely had a good selection of treats to accompany tea or coffee.

The decor is simple inside but they also have an area out front for outdoor dining. There‚Äôs enough room for baby strollers and dogs. They‚Äôre open 8 am to 4 pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgf9FsoF_ewXGmcyNcNFdAqi1nEJ1vSlWYZIyG&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Cindy Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2x3WTsaq24Va-C0OXivTxrAK9IBM0CBE-EtTx2p0pPPdLzcxqkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Items ordered: roast beef sandwich, prosciutto and apple sandwich, flat white

Sandwiches were super tasty! Flat white was just ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJtTKHtkH12OSvqIjcerxlIvVGTrH-Wv0hWgBd&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are many reasons to stop at The Modern Pantry: baked goods, unique breakfast buns, frozen and ready-to-bake pot pies and desserts, or just have a restful break in their outside patio. We needed to eat before getting on the ferry at Horseshoe Bay, so we stopped here and ordered a breakfast bun, grilled sandwich, two coffee drinks and a chocolate brownie. All the food we ordered were good. The breakfast bun was a savoury version of cinnamon bun with cheese and vegetables inside ‚Äì very creative. Frozen ready-to-bake versions are even available. The frozen chicken pot pies looked really good, except I was told they would have garlic inside (aarg!). They make their own jams and pasta sauces as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBFUIdUKQDQDq-04vZRUImH-0GYJvFzAey1MWN&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2023-9-21"},{"Name":"Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpNyvrxCSIFzaWXsvbh60FJcbwdzgmNlwUQG23SnZxq6dIQWI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in after a light jog and ordered the prosciutto sandwich. It tasted nice and the atmosphere was brilliant and the store had nice views and a nice patio -- a good place for a date, meeting, or rendezvous. The sandwich was $14.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-nS2sDBeWBZRNQuF4Epx2Ix5JK2bfLTeHa9yw&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"HL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSqAWPJXpOlqUn852Q39EE_iHsFkq0EJ_Y83_M8oqs5b0eF2KT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! The sandwiches were amazing and they have a cute backyard patioüíï","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbupbcVgIFiY8i4-gsyiElzKy98AbYrPlLanU4&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bakery is a hidden gem. They make their goods fresh so you have really good and tasty croissants, rolls and pastries. The coffee is nice and not too acidic. But the real kicker is their patio which has a nice garden and view of the sea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6CRBvkdp1dlyM6lanCmiBMA-T6hu8af4yorxj&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Diego Arroyo (REALTOR)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM1-b49cPBd6QMGpVQH1GU061LnBQ5ttDOhkAX0Mq4yKO1A3Tc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to go for a coffee or to have a chat with friends or business. Enjoy your coffee, sandwiches, and some delicious treats. Staff is nice and caring. Nice patio for warmer days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOffgJX3ztMlFDxw6z8fYTM8AhrGaQQln-RAYSk&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"nixuhs gnef","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKw4R4i5IbZ45tinA9PD6xmM1Z3TESlak2Z0yICLuYyRToQY5P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, great service, comfortable and pretty atmosphere. 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7nBiCaCKFxx27yorJWo4yv4ggzG_GBKCbo6UV&fid=0x0:0x2b87f50caac14d7a"],"When":"2024-11-1"}]

descriptions: Well-appointed restaurant offering traditional Italian fare, a wine list & an outdoor patio.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Belleville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-f2XnYD-rDqHGDIHdtAIiJFCNw0nbgSAstJ5q9A_PHAPSmow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blown away by the food and service. I‚Äôve lived in West Van for the majority of my life and today was my first time. And I will be back again and again. Calamari fritti was fresh, light and airy and came pretty quickly. The focaccia was so soft and chewy and supple, we ended up ordering a second serving (it‚Äôs small, only 4 slices, so we didn‚Äôt feel too guilty). Pasta was fresh (we ordered the veal meatballs and the sauce had bone marrow in it and the shaved tenderloin pasta dish) and offerings were unique to what were typically used to at an Italian restaurant. Service was top notch. Tables cloths and cloth napkins kind of place ‚Äî anyone under age 49 there I‚Äôd consider to be young :) Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhbGLD4FG_G4RSSfkm0hLR2QWwFjxLqRiUFlsm&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Grace Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB5Ko5X-4yjWjHOjLKw5WXnl3mUxcKWzK7uWbdsW3KfCyUg00t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dishes we ordered were blowing minds away. For the starters, the mussels and raw beef were so tender and juicy. For entrees, we ordered lamb, cod, pasta that are all well cooked and delicious. We ordered pudding for dessert which is also outstanding.  The service was perfect! This one is such a gem in West Van. We often go to Beach House. To be honest, the dishes here are beyond my imagination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcgk4sty6pRzOXf09nQdye25Qs4hnz7x30cH8_&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"T C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCa27Q_o09NYHH2Dj_capgzW27KF9Wcw8jPl5vp1wpQqLNUN8Hog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Vibes:
- A lot of seniors in the restaurant
- good service: got our appetizer order wrong but nicely corrected it after serving the wrong dish

Food: Appetizer was insanely salty, not very flavorful aside from salt. We asked our server to tell chef to keep the pastas low sodium, but my boar meat sauce pasta was still very salty; besides sour and salty, the flavor profile is extremely bland and flat. Several strands were completely stuck together. Also chewed on sand or something (probably the spinach base‚Ä¶)

The black cod tagliatini was nice and flavorful though - would recommend. The chicken/sausage orecchiette relied much on the sausage pieces.

Looks like one of the nicer restaurants in West Van, but overall would not recommend at least the dishes I got (veal meatballs and boar meat sauce tagliatelle).
I HAD A WONDERFUL TIME WITH THE PEOPLE I WENT WITH THO! ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtGZinfaWai3-_BuvO8udwGv8PW7Dje09HOCzm&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a lovely restaurant filled with elders. While the servers were friendly and the overall vibe really soothing, the food was really salty. We asked for low sodium, but the sauces still came out too salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh-urh5fgccHV1nHpbgaQB0w_SrLRnVE_yn9_E&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"David W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID6lhyvxxjLoiNVH6F-JS37I4FbT1Y7sdBK739dGIF0EhUpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place!
Price is high but I felt like I got what I paid for.
The rack of lamb, scallop potatoes and the vegetables were great! My date had the mushroom pasta with veal, that was equally amazing.
Can not wait to go back again, was recommended by a great co-worker that I work with","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG_mQd4DmD9lLP2bAHkEJbsybWwb-ucuSTFsK-&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Italian food done right, with a great wine selection.  The food was delicious, but I wish the portion was a little more generous. Service was friendly but on the slow side, that said the young helper was the star! Our water glasses were never empty. My favorite dish by far was the squid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNth7_KQbm1ZR1yu5LgGB1si_WsPd5yf8Ev07qh&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2022-5-24"},{"Name":"K Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl-gOdqBZjsY7ydaeNok1u9sAbHcmSM26Y90aybgRZSY06nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is perfect here! A must try!
We sit outside in its garden, very cozy environment with a beautiful fig tree.
The fig pudding is warm topped with gelato, one of the best dessert I have ever had!
Frito Misto is deep fried calamari, shrimp and crab cake, they‚Äôre so crispy outside and tender inside, so good!
Brianna served us, she‚Äôs so good, she always come at the right time, so patient and so sweet!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMixVyeW1B56tnb9DSOySHvjpn4OABRc7zZbQCZ&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with family friends for a birthday. We were attended to wonderfully for such a large party. I personally was v happy w my dish: the 40 day dry aged beef. 10/10.
Other shared dishes:
- bacon wrapped scallop w risotto: 7/10. Mid for thr scallops but risotto was good
- spaghetti w gambari: 9/10. Very fresh and herby
- cod: 8/10
- squidink (?) pasta w salmon: 7/10. Abit too soft
- spiked affogato dessert (forgot the name): 3/10. The liqor was too strong for me

The pinot grigio: 9/10. Nice and dry.

Loved the atmosphere. The cobble stone floor reminded me so much of eating outside in italy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLpkjtxyqUR9JJx68dTCbOXsEwpI4kj2efneO4&fid=0x0:0x9d4b0df32e9e25c1"],"When":"2023-12-29"}]

title: The Red Lion Bar & Grill
address: 2427 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, BC V7V 1L3
descriptions: Familiar British meals, draft brews & cocktails round out the menu at this homey bar with a patio.

[{"Name":"karina nakahara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAoSmFzu0jOxKcysChPpo2LAxmZGY_L4R5Kty2fzmOGs0xjGr1xA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy, classic & charming atmosphere! We were sat by the stone fireplace and big window, and there was a piano player which added to the already lovely ambience! We shared some delicious smoked sausages for appys and then enjoyed some beer battered fish and chips. Quite tasty and satisfied our cravings. I found the Dark and Stormy was done well. The Irish lads with us loved the Guinness, so big ups to this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRgqMkF3VNV2nYFiRxUkO9zICa8CoYjGc-b3rP&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Jason Gardiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmYfX-ZRJM4SZ0OD4ncBAb9A84dMfn2swh03k68XM6Pw-t1BfE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful spot on Marine Drive for a bite to eat!  The fish & chips were yummy, just a bit too much batter for my loving!

Drinks were tasty, plus the service and outdoor seating atmosphere were perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMawFcKG-YYoJsRH7hK7leMJUr_2abDmXKp6mXr&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The afternoon was swelteringly Summer-heat-wave hot after nearby appointment, but inside the Red Lion Pub, in the very heart of historic Dundarave, cool air-conditioned respite, many savory menu choices, and welcoming servers awaited to  make a really great experience!

Opted for the "Red Lion Burger" platter. Beef was tasty and nicely seasoned, accompanied by bacon, cheddar, and romaine lettuce. The side fries -- perfectly crispy outside and tender fresh inside.

The restaurant interior definitely takes equal billing with the terrific cuisine:  classic British pub atmosphere and fascinatingly divided into several  cozy semi-private alcoves, dining/entertainment areas: i.e., self-contained dining room with focal stone fireplace and facing conversation area; sports-bar zone at rear on 2-levels with upholstered booths /bar stools / table-seating  -- plus 2 large screens for watching hockey/football matches -- all  dominated by the backdrop of dark carved-wood bar; and finally the signature Red Lion patio space fronting Marine Drive with its forest of red umbrellas.

If you're interested in Dundarave -  West Van history and cool memorabilia, the interior vibe is truly like a "way-back machine" and all the artefacts will give you almost as much enjoyment as the brilliant menu and friendly people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeVtNi32z42Bq-OZl6K745MhzDJKcK_dU_vb2x&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Jackie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKJIK4sXRl-zjzEJLYsMD3zC5Qwfx_YAc8nlg0UIVZaZVALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed a beautiful evening on the outdoor patio of the Red Lion while visiting West Vancouver. The service, drinks, and food were all fantastic! The calamari and mussels were incredible!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAE6a2FFQ7YCQc1a1Ki2lvmVq7ja8KuoF4FGZb&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"J Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZCK_Dwit38tgGB6wCDQgn_t0VvLEAlRjrv6_w2VfOSJRvoeNFrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We dropped in after spotting the outdoor patio, and as luck would have it happy hour is from 3 till 6 so we  took advantage having shrimp gyoza and tempura shrimp. And a couple of sangria..the menu coveted most pub meals and a full bar...bon App√©tit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE5qjeiSjjSOfc0_lvNNSO_b9Jw2Xx4Q4yg8KO&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRwpWAz0-Yg4cI6ZsOAY9CncZqRN4a6o8nP7KlskI9G71qjLadgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped here near Dundarave to have a quick bite to eat .. was so glad there was indoor eating as it was hot outside üî•ü•µ travelling from Niagara Falls and I thought we had it hot there üôÑ

I had one of the best cheese burgers I've ever tasted. Apparently it is from Blue Goose Certified Organic Beef . You could tell the difference ! The tasty fries complimented this dish .

Enjoyed my dinner here and the atmosphere was nice as well as having AC. They also have a great happy hour 3pm till 6pm ..too bad I don't drink üçª

Thanks Michca for great service . I'd definitely recommend this place here for a bite to eat. üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwEUoZ7EoSTf0eX-04CTvaV6pbM92AB6t3G4el&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"Lisa Piovesan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaTNU1Vbx4iGPZkLxbTeE3BimoNsxsF2Sj0h8hiLJjnd69sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My server was a very sweet lad.  Looking around, he was even wiping down the handheld debit machine between customers.

Didnt throw a fit when I asked for half soda half coke.

I opted for a Ceasar Salad with grilled salmon.  Salmon was cooked to perfection, and salad had a great balance of dressing, croutons, and cheese.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwB8LqHbzP4N7AzF3ms-Mpb7tCBQ8AilXxaPD4&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"jim witte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbxQbIvKzmAW50TOEazulbtKB1ZpnCVmoxx8co1yCdDWAaqhAK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a long day flying we found the Red Lion on our way through town and enjoyed a nice meal and relaxing break. The pub/happy hour menu was broad so all in our group found a favorite. A nice assortment of craft beers and cocktails made everyone happy. The fireplace was lit and the glow against the dark stained woodwork made for a cozy spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOPcj2jONRnlvDGfLzoTRQUyaKUqSQGBxJNV3a&fid=0x0:0x81ed9d3a2fdcff3c"],"When":"2018-3-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"You know what pisses me off more than disappointment? Laziness.

Their menu states they serve Persian "Sangak" bread. They don't.
What is irritatingly stupefying here is that there is a Persian Bakery right across the street from them.

With their approximately 10 seater dining table and 5 staff on hand someone could've done what?.....Yes!...jumped across the street to the bakery and stocked up on the bread they promised the customer on their menu before opening....Or am I just crazy?

Well...I guess if they had done that....they wouldn't have had the time to giggle about it in the back like little school girls. Moving on......

The French Toast -
Undercooked & doughy in the middle. Way too bare and unimpressively lacking in presentation. I mean you're paying for these dishes. I've had my 10 year old nephew make better French Toast.
The bacon was tasty and the coffee was decent....even came in a cute little cup.
So, that's something....

Breakfast Burrito -
Good for an appetizer...Oh wait...it was an entree dish....enough said.

Fancy Benedict -
No, it wasn't fancy...that's the name of the dish ironically.
It was cold, the salmon lacking and clearly someone's first attempt at making a Benny.

The Service -
We had to ask for everything. There was an underlying impatience with our server....like we were keeping her from something. Finally someone else came by with more coffee.
Not the end of the world, but not charming either.

This place reminded me of a first year medical student trying to do brain surgery. Education, Experience, Commitment.

Then open your doors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-Z1C-tnmDGAG10MaGkQs4rOiEK5_KAz_rS1Rf&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Dave DeBruine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYEhm1DgVq7TLPB11i7kNy_W29mRC4vLw57yvxEspzN-KFZg54=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic brunch! We had the waffles and the green benny.  Both were excellent.  Fair prices.  Great service. I would definitely be a regular if I lived near here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmDsdUQO3rXhC0CMNk5UM5lUkSlvsx0zBIzMJS&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Sherry Ahmari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzZjpgnbFzMAdoLwNn-kzRLUMAt8kquABzgD2ac3X12G-Wogw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy little cafe in the heart of West Vancouver. The food was delicious and the homemade salad dressing is delightful. Amazing service and beautiful decor!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCc7SYWctdT-S1kNrzhLJa9glEYfxW5hVGrXPf&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got here after a hike. It was packed but still had room for me and my friends. Ordered their french toast with eggs and turkey sausage. It was a filling breakfast. Had free flowing syrup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDVzmh2ExKMPdMD8mo-MSOyAunQ6SfXYYnGb61&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Sadegh Hp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIyNzY298XcojqVk3zyahlwJ4FyQPLet8w3dVRylNP835sKeE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got Fancy benny and green smoothie. Both of them were so delicious. The service was great. They also offered us a delicious pumpkin pie because of thanksgiving:)
It's a nice cosy brunch place. I recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEUJHQ5K323yQPbBfwrK_O9jlikev0Cp7ZSsp6&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Bohdana Makarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7L24PPn7DLA9zCSgNnqsrI1S-Dqh1aC5OTmckTXcMUKjDbBV61g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited Cindy‚Äôs Caffe for a late breakfast, and it was an outstanding experience. We ordered the Belgian waffles with fruits, Fancy Benny eggs with salmon, and coffee. Everything was absolutely delicious! The waffles were perfectly crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, topped with fresh, vibrant fruits. The Fancy Benny eggs with salmon were cooked to perfection, and the flavors melded together beautifully. The coffee was rich and aromatic, providing the perfect complement to our meal. The ambiance was cozy, and the service was warm and attentive. We will definitely be returning to Cindy‚Äôs Caffe for another delightful meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQdw4I1f_5n6pbqaolh4G9VkwUuNsC6kj4PWmF&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"M Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3SLRQ7GpEHn44kmQJwvAZOKpGxEPoyKfPiKnR9-KG7sdBVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I passed by this place before and it was packed. So I gave it a try‚Ä¶. Ordered a classic French toast and it was truly disappointed. It‚Äôs like three pcs of toasts with almost no eggs on it and a thin layer of cinnamon like jam on it. Served w one piece of strawberry and a small plate of jam. And it‚Äôs $15.99 for three pcs of ‚Äòtoast‚Äô.

My husband ordered an egg Benedict and it‚Äôs like $18.99‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs alright‚Ä¶ like a normal Benedict, nothing special. Not cheap.

Don‚Äôt think I will go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGIT5ag3Jr6Nc0b8T1awByunkOCF3XIOjo_twD&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Penny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ3oBauwGVnx96QWK0EHWBTPtE1tMELvOQ5NvGBnKlsn3_73wl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I am glad to found this brunch place and I was surprised by the mothers‚Äô day specials: live music, gifts for both me and my son, and a free coffee. My son loves Belgium Waffle. Fruits and whipped cream are perfect combinations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrSrBltKbxw7VvchO0qlL9gaMy_AMfp5MHCGDl&fid=0x0:0xc99d1e2476cd846e"],"When":"2024-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Noelle Natraoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_qbakhSDtcesHljF7A3XEpwBIz9hv2IAqnb_BZpK1JZueuoY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the lemon grass noodle salad with chicken & minus the serrano peppers.  It was still a bit too spicy for me, maybe because of the thai basil? In general it is a good salad, the chicken was really good a d i'd order again but ask all hot spice ingredients be removed. Family member ordered the Green goddess salad with chicken,minus feta & tomatoes and they were enjoyed their salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5KtIW6qnYP9kEfOaS99UftqnQiMUNCx66L3Hf&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Alireza Mahdian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UiNNVRyZjtmU8TuMFZWagjDEpOucA4a-KVpCiuYYILJ-rcBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Despite its strong following in the area, Cactus Club Cafe didn‚Äôt meet my expectations. While many people seem to enjoy it, I personally find the food to be a bit overrated. The burger I ordered was very ordinary in both taste and quality. It lacked the flavor and freshness you'd expect from a restaurant with such a big reputation. The Szechuan dish was another disappointment ‚Äì it was overcooked and lacked the balance of flavors I was hoping for.

The only part of my meal that stood out in a positive way were the yam fries, which were crispy and well-seasoned. Unfortunately, that wasn‚Äôt enough to redeem the overall experience.

With so many fantastic dining options in this beautiful city, I think I'll pass on trying Cactus Club again. There are better choices out there if you're looking for a memorable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJZn6lt_DAuZ-PHBswonyLliAdDwOjKgQ8eW9F&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"oscdu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj8rxjf-TN5HjIqjZwPEx1S5_KL2Vw-pGunjM3z2CURCsWD60F3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an exceptional experience at Cactus Club! I visited during their happy hour, which runs from 2 PM to 5 PM, and it was fantastic. The deals are incredible, starting at just $5. The atmosphere was vibrant and welcoming, ideal for gathering with friends and family. The staff was attentive and friendly, ensuring that our time there was enjoyable. I highly recommend Cactus Club for anyone looking for a great happy hour experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKDrMMNJHEWHIMQYCTzRKb3mjJB_mV-a_lRWyZ&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very flavourful and great quality food! Service was good but a tiny bit slower than usual as it was a busy Friday night. Staff were friendly ‚ò∫Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQpXP6EZSpCFirkLRzoy9tvwQ_fxIfAM34gb0R&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Earoel Kennedy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrrpm8GNHIihoGKNh71CAo3pYVVXD8RbedfhD2ATacWKwZ7Qo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a delightful lunch at Cactus Club. The Bellinis were absolutely fantastic, perfectly refreshing.

The Blacken Chicken dish was delicious with great flavor and cooked to perfection. Though, I was slightly disappointed with the steak as it was a bit overcooked for my liking, considering I ordered it medium rare.

Nonetheless, the overall experience was enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgNaUeLG0lg91k0_Ascn12GZFn5GxEZVoP0K9o&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Pony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUzfhwEAFzGqMo4PKR4FSy2dbFksArPMhGSE58oi-2vZQxJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love to come here for happy hour. I like steak fries. The steak comes with kale salad making a healthy yummy meal. The fried was perfectly made. Today, I ordered a glass of lager and asked for ice cubes as usual. Our server Jerry was the first one bringing me the ice cubes with spoon. ( I always got only ice cubes and used fork putting cubes in the beer awkwardly). He is very considerate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjB5NdHuHjhsuEeTJ4_yCypTCARo0V387c4Mw9&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Connie Mera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5Z1YNNhQOHeE0sr9LRXXPkpTmbjDLI_8kK723H_THXKuNXqR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience at the bar for solo dinner. I really appreciate the staff giving me space while still being attentively.
My steak ordered rare was perfectly delivered.
Only reason I couldn‚Äôt give it a 5/5 was because the washrooms were very dirty. Please keep up with the hygiene.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuu4Hll7q5wgXJ9EonRSGaYjc9BFtfSwlYtL-q&fid=0x0:0xa46bbd643d8ad98a"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Tami Hassett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoqc74NLyV8bf8h2dzzg3MpSBrvcxl3d_1nLzP9ADtdVtupQY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food with amazing service. The med bowl is AMAZING! We had a young lady Melody as our server and she was so sweet and attentive. She went above and beyond to make us feel  very welcome and we truly felt appreciated. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Morgan Mansfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfXCweDHOEc_BEVihs2VtgNtjEOqSIL7L9dWFTi8WJ6xGp3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go to for sushi.. the tempura is amazing, the fish is super fresh. I highly recommend the long bean tempura, and temaki.. also the presentation is top notch. Service can seem a bit flustered at times but all in all a great place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRfldhiUB8mm6moUHaKcqjtqj2FebXuDtTDQck&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJg51dkTiELfwGSC3YeGg0Cqc2FbwTcp56uR5oMbjvMxs9-kgt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kiisu was good before the renovation and is just as good if not better now. The new modern interior is nice, however I personally preferred the old more traditional design prior to the remodel (but that's just me)
Food wise, it's great and well-priced. The salmon is very clean and has little to no miware from what I had. Recommend! Probably one of the better sushi places you can find in West Van","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpLT_N4yebudOIAK_aNfLdxPa1iC-7QBb_TTxD&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Amir Safarkhah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD5LVG68j65aOfawHnN2abdd4A8PbpFpbHqeepwzmw8hoQ_uKe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried this beautifully designed and renovated Resturant in the downtown of West vancouver this weekend. Nice decoration and simple design of the restaurant made it very comfortable, especially the beautiful and comfortable white leather seats.
Food menus had plenty of options. We ordered a couple of launch boxes as well as sushi rules and starters. Food were all great, fresh and tasty . The portion was generous and the prices were reasonable and very competitive.
The service was so fast and great. In less than 1 minute we seated, our server brought us tea and water and handed out the menu. Food also served in less than 10 mins.
We had a great experience here and would like to recommend it to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQZ_sFfYb7Q8xKQbolB25R6TUZDpSSPx9-NIpb&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Maggie Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUha8r0s2xhVlFQMGD5NCiDWNygDtEuzowKzz6fXmDqXgKuQNm4eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience here. Our server was attentive. The Saba lunchbox had good variety and the grilled fish had no bones. Everything tasted fresh and well-balanced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOveHHHJ5E8Q4kzFTU3J68oGyPE7g8Rt0-TfAMB&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Lily Delgado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1-cvZS29jv2kxj6TdPbJlmeQ5aZgppKKxJN5WzvX6mbx2kNrG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the food was delicious and fresh, even the wasabi was delicious! I loved de House Roll stuffed with everything and the miso soup is really good. The waitresses were attentive to everything, even ensuring that we had no shortage of tea. The place is relaxing, very clean and comfortable. We will definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMSgcPI0gJz5WhiasuP6e1C7a41_9yNq6KSyfJ&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Betty Ni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMKTBPOnjIjhQ6teM22cemeOSl8LqF7CE53rXbFC-f57VaHKsN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh sashimi, tasty appetizers, and generous portions! I ordered Kiisu sashimi set and was pleasantly surprised by the amount of uni it came with. I would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQf62PDqKY3HVJZIZGC7HXSieZgwr3n3gS2sca&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Karl Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4wBEifgLNIS4wMJSIoUL5KEO4OsB89W9-vZL-1JGf3O4orG7uBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality quality quality. Kiisu isn't the cheapest of the sushi places along Marine but the quality of ingredients you get is great. They have excellent sushi and a delicious oyako don.

We came here multiple times in the short time we spent in West Van and it's been consistent every time. If you like rolls, sushi and Japanese food, this would be the go to for the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN74GfCRwVQ7foJIlBZFu50hkqX9MC-LU4bL_uo&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2023-6-13"},{"Name":"Johana Pavas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpPB46dvVUM5nRBaK1Xb9AS3vzAJAsKPzXVY5tGKpi0jWzsWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is located on Marine Drive, and has free street parking for 2 hours, or alternatively there is parking available along Ambleside Park. The staff were amazing and showed outstanding customer service - the two ladies that served us were incredibly kind and accommodating. For example, my friend has some dietary restrictions and so asked for a few modifications to her dish, and they created something especially for her. We ordered spicy salmon nuggets, seafood salad, Dx. assorted 18pcs, and sushi, and all of it was wonderful. The quality of the seafood was so high - it was like butter melting in my mouth! Every single bite was fresh and beautifully presented, especially the 18pcs platter which was like a work of art! The crockery was also beautiful. This restaurant wasn‚Äôt necessarily cheap, but I wouldn‚Äôt consider it expensive bearing in mind the quality of the food, service, location etc. More than recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj9ebOtwzh2Y4-Y-Urgmrg9ao5JGbyvsPualYV&fid=0x0:0x66bb5eb0b6a44bc8"],"When":"2022-12-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for a truly exceptional burger experience, look no further than Mani Burger. This hidden gem in North Vamcouver is a must-visit for any burger enthusiast.
The moment you take a bite, you'll understand why Mani Burger has earned its stellar reputation. The burgers are crafted with the utmost care, using high-quality ingredients that burst with flavor. The meat is juicy and tender, the buns are soft and fresh, and the toppings are perfectly balanced.
Beyond the incredible burgers, Mani Burger also offers a friendly and inviting atmosphere. The staff is always welcoming and attentive, ensuring that every customer feels valued.
If you're in North Vancouver, do yourself a favor and try Mani Burger. You won't be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg7X9WQs5TypfzHXVcV6_e88uiasChg7iPO6eL&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**This place put an end to my 14 years of love in Five Guys** The owner refused tips by skipping it on the pay machine (he deserved at least 10% considering the price). When I got the burger, it was way bigger than the Five Guys double (and lower priced). The burger tasted fantastic with fresh ingredients in it, and the garlic and cajun fries were great even without ketchup or any other sauce. At the end I was sad because I was moving out of the province in several days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAUxPw8jgtvYerWwkKngMZV0C-w6_KyqwrEPeQ&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ella MD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHi797pmc-SiPMeAzbfyjOZFsOe5p_JyMRESQgiikX13zy46o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mani Restaurant is one of the best places you can find in West Vancouver. It has a cozy and friendly atmosphere, and the food is amazing and delicious. We ordered the Special Burger, a classic Cheeseburger, and the Mani Burger‚Äîall of them were excellent. We also had fries, which were super tasty. Definitely give them a try! Their burgers are juicy and delicious without any greasy smell, and everything was just perfect. üòãüçîüçü","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFChhyBmKA1eMdym-lg33wBu6aTs7vrT6r6N10&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Farnaz Seyedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsNBQBtCnR6Ah-PgD298APcH0lAlp53UwYR5U9HSijwpj6Dl8u=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As I was passing by a local restaurant today, the irresistible smell of a freshly grilled burger caught my attention. Drawn in by the mouthwatering aroma, I decided to give it a try. I must say, it was one of the best burgers I‚Äôve ever had! Juicy, perfectly seasoned, and served with all the right toppings. If you‚Äôre in the area, this burger is an absolute must-try. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtt1HxxEcjKJyvZ39rW5qBAdVA3qkNr-gSolvO&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Fabienne Chaber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqF3obmFdD44wvWSaYELhi9Z82GGmmPwPa36sOiFUpTx7L2PAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG!! Found this little gem in WestVan!
THE Best Burgers üçî & Fries in town üòã Both very tasty not greasy .. just perfection. Everything is Homemade and you can tell the difference right away. Service his prompt and friendly. Very clean place as well!  We love it and we‚Äôll come back as soon as we are in town. Thank you Mani üôåüèª we need to try the whole menu üíØ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXk1vIm0JO3vjZjdcjX9cQbZ0Pbeo2J-HFlaiQ&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"tara naji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPKRhGIoUusvqBZZR74b-vYXpdT0MEFGkOu2RNgSgkmPKHzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had an amazing meal at Mani burger. The place feels super cozy with its warm lights and comfy seats. The food was top-notch; I loved the special Mani burger, which was delicious and beautifully presented. Plus, it‚Äôs super affordable for the quality you get. Perfect spot for both casual meals and special occasions. Definitely check it out ‚Äì I can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGyu9ugZ7TsDJZEtFJvyxaVIDcAGANRPD-SNFM&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best  burger patties in Northshore! We ordered Cheese burger, mushroom burger, tongue sandwich, mushroom cheese burger and simple burger and of course fries! We loved them all, and my favorites were lamb tongue sandwich and mushroom cheese burger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcerDGYhXK6NBZW4GipgoBrhlKltqdwaZQ2fRM&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUh3fEd3c7Qz7J80daKhFwS0w6Gog9YOVYUtlC7X3GBid9qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the special burger and it was big and delicious.  Got the garlic fries as well, and the portion was good and the seasoning was mild enough to not be overwhelming, but well seasoned enough to balance the flavours of the fries.  The staff are so polite.  I love how thoughtfully they wrapped the food, using very good quality foil so that it stays warm longer and keeps it from getting messy! Its located in a cute alley plaza, and the vibe is very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsJLMwP_PuDafBLD5TTl8KXFIksZZu5PMnBNK-&fid=0x0:0xeb3b8c68526ece73"],"When":"2024-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jonathan Tin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW--tm4xws8wH-RGwfFJsn6JJV78S1w-uWlu-Vb1VMH9K-MLh1f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy, warm and loving restaurant - a true gem hidden in west Vancouver. Went there for a birthday dinner - to my surprise they made a set menu for the birthday girl! Nice touch in my opinion, it‚Äôs the details that counts :) Food was amazing. I recommend trying their Veal and lobster bisque. I have only seen restaurant serving veal downtown, so it was a pleasant find in West Van. It was extremely tender and well prepared, nice companion to a bottle of wine. Lastly, my compliments to the chef for keeping up with nice quality food for a group of 15!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM75VO0UY5pZSkavMAru1wDjFa3cdYhrO5O9ebC&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Foodie Hey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNIK5ZjKNPWyuOD1wi3eAnaSh8QxWJNjuG-lnQ5XgoOSDsJGVH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today is our anniversary, and we selected this 'French' restaurant to celebrate. I was excited for the evening, but unfortunately, both of us experienced stomach problems after returning home.
The food quality fell short of our expectations. I was drawn to the lobster bisque after seeing it on Google Reviews, and it looked quite appealing. Before ordering, I showed the photo to our server and inquired if the soup would include cream. She replied that it would be 'similar' with additional toppings. However, when the soup arrived, there was no resemblance to the photo.

The main course I ordered is BOUILLABAISSE, $42

When the main course arrived it was even more disappointing. The salmon was tough and chewy, and it tasted unpleasant, The broth of the bouillabaisse was very thin and watery.

I was expecting a true taste of France, but this restaurant's food was a far cry from authentic. It was the worst meal I've had in a long time, and I suffered from food poisoning afterwards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqA9u1QukCBwPhtEwujNaeMoTOPPhuAdrC9v4N&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Nahyun Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUm2pnfpuos0a6T5NYNUXjVzWRdw422Un59FlSthHNJI13yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôm so thrilled to have discovered this hidden gem of a French restaurant! From the escargot to the scallop dishes, everything was absolutely delicious, and the desserts were fantastic too! It‚Äôs truly a hidden treasure, and I hope more people come and experience it. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpKNN6G4zHNGjCGhZp8uIvguinObuZUDXM89ST&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"M Ih","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt4n_DKDl7L5Gg8Ln4332KPeeBLi0Wmj0_oZP9nQ0JjIqjpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is one of the most disappointing experiences I‚Äôve had in a while. This older french restaurant we had hoped would be a hidden gem, however it turned out to be a place that I wished I hadn‚Äôt found. The server was nice lady with a warm welcome, but then everything goes downhill from there.

The French onion soup had barely any cheese or onion. It was more a beef broth soup with a soggy bread. When I asked if they forgot the cheese, they replied it had ‚Äúsunk‚Äù into the soup. I dug around for it and maybe found a few strands of cheese, far from what a French onion soup is supposed to be. I also barely saw any onion as well but figured I‚Äôd let it go.

I selected the feature filet mignon with two lamb rack. When I inquired about the price, I was informed it was $55 and comes with a 6oz filet mignon. When it arrived, the piece of meat on one lamb rack looked bigger than the ‚Äò6oz‚Äô steak. I couldn‚Äôt help but inquired about this and ended up being told the ‚Äúcombined protein‚Äù in this dish was 6oz ?! My jaw dropped but again, I let it go. I cut into my ‚Äúmedium rare‚Äù steak and it was fully well done. This was the same with the lamb chops. I didn‚Äôt even bother taking a bite and informed them of this and they offered to cook another. When that one came, it was less cooked but nothing like I would expect of a steak. There‚Äôs no crust to it and the middle was rare, but working with the approximately 3oz steak I can see the difficulty. Then it came to the taste. Aside it from being drenched in a mediocre sauce, there was a taste of lighter fluid/gas in the steak. I let my wife try without telling her what I tasted and she said the exact same thing, so it wasn‚Äôt just me. I told the server this and she just said, maybe you just have a high expectation of your steaks. For the price, I expect a decent quality steak. I couldn‚Äôt continue eating it and send it back. I didn‚Äôt bother getting another dish. I also had a stomachache after leaving the restaurant.

For the icing on top, they also charged me GST during this ‚Äútax holiday‚Äù.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc_z_kjlis7eAxcJ7JYghohOxpYbWAyumgGT8m&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Michael Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Dues4lMouQFf0TD1AVB3rVU486mPjYa_0gGjgPuPqvX-mrEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tldr - the lamb is absolutely excellent, melts in your mouth. Recommend focusing on the main course, apps (at least lobster bisque and escargot) are skippable.

Chez Michel got a chic vibe and doesn't feel pretentious. This resto has a traditional style of French cuisine and it certainly takes you to another setting for this dining experience. Kelly is our waitress and she was considerate in bringing in the right items to complement our dishes (i.e. bringing in bread when we had extra lobster bisque left).

We ordered the √©scargot and lobster bisque for apps, both were good but not amazing.

For mains, we got the poulet de vent and the lamb/beef special. The former dish had a puffy pastry that went extremely well with the chicken, and the lamb melted in our mouths.

Will definitely recommend those looking for traditional French food visit this place if you're here for something else. But if you won't be in the area, don't need to get out of your way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1_RK6nEdVCJ1XVML9IM9VkN-mE8Ke7vbBWrHF&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Mark Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwxAB8awj5EDO8ytlhLsL5S2KfapWcVZU2KlqxgNUYTTLHkhpP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Super friendly server Tanya. She was doing her best in a bad situation. Understaffed. Very long wait times. Food was quite average, small portions and not worth the price sadly. Not like Chez Michel used to be. Some people seem to have very good experiences though, judging by other reviews, so maybe it‚Äôs hit and miss these days. Avoid the bouillabaisse!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"michelle Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtTjOwWBaKjapp01EgBmbd86FV5O0_w3liz-cE_Lzr7lslFQ-mSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place. Lovely hostess/waitress (Tania) and awesome chef (Jose). My boyfriend and I have gone twice, and twice the service and food were spectacular. Our favourites include the steak and the seafood pasta (which was a special that day). We had also had great conversations with Tania and Jose, they are funny, hospitable, and welcoming. My boyfriend and I decided to visit in the future for any type of small celebrations if we are in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUETyENGLtsi-sYmXPyYWP1PVlHKxKQWs8WEqlNeLFzLS-QE7gl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is so over prized! No kids menu available, order this salmon dish for my 6year old is cost $55","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf1KaChIp4xw_l1c9UszeyxubqQTMjsxcEywE2&fid=0x0:0x80cdaee2b2061376"],"When":"2024-7-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chihiro Naka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoXNZrMY0W6rBnHQZqGq1S4l-H-dk5i5rGoH1kWu_xVE3qqIkm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs my best favorite Vietnamese restaurant in Vancouver!
Servers were so friendly and care of us a lot that made us feeling comfortable. I was just only person can‚Äôt eat cilantro in my group, and they served us it on the side kindly. It was grateful for me to enjoy everything!

We really loved their foods, Beef carpaccio, Braised short rib stew, Beef noodle soup and Green papaya salad and so on. Especially beef of stew was quite tender and highly recommended!
I‚Äôll definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1LClASdZXDF6szgcXk9tNoXOPlAWh91JuOEDg&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Erika Rosario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYiML2pjoiI8aDC8J73c18TXldY8BrKcnul_k8qXBOsaoIEBGxuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best Vietnamese food in Vancouver. Everything we tried was so pretty and flavorful‚Äîyou can tell how much care Chef Lin put into each dish.

We started with the crispy spring rolls and chicken wings, which were perfectly done‚Äîthe wings were the perfect balance of saucy and crispy (absolutely addicting). The papaya salad was so refreshing and tied all the flavors together. But the beef carpaccio? That was next level. My mouth is literally watering just thinking about it. Order the beef carpaccio‚Äîtrust, you won‚Äôt regret it.

For mains, we had the shaking beef, braised short rib stew, and Hanoi beef noodle soup. Each one was rich and comforting, and the beef in every dish was so tender it practically fell apart.

Chef Lin‚Äôs cooking is amazing, and I can‚Äôt wait to come back for more. If you‚Äôre looking for Vietnamese food that feels elevated but still comforting, this place is the spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsdoiXujJEGy2RanOxwTrXv3tOc8W66-w_8HYt&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wooden Fish is my go-to Vietnamese restaurant whenever I‚Äôm in West Vancouver. I never change my order because the Mixed Skewer Meal is perfect for me‚Äîit has everything I like. The meal includes three skewers (pork, beef, and chicken), a spring roll, salad, and a choice of rice or rice noodles. The portion size is just right, and it‚Äôs a great value.

I‚Äôve been here so many times, and the experience is consistently good. Today, I was served by Andy, who was friendly and provided excellent service. The restaurant always has a great vibe with nice music, lighting, and interior design which adds to the vibe of the dining experience.

Just a tip: if you‚Äôre visiting on a cold day, try to avoid sitting in front of the entrance door. I did today, and the cold wind from the door opening was a bit annoying as it gets warm and cold. Otherwise, I usually sit outdoors with the heater or indoors along the side, which are both more comfortable.

The place tends to get busy, and there‚Äôs sometimes a line, but it‚Äôs worth the wait. I‚Äôll definitely keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiKlYPwlaMcFsjannLKrsGkxLSiAcMubdg2Q-8&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it when I finally try a place we have driven past so many time and it is excellent.  Fabulous food and great service.  Will be back.  Felt we were well looked after and the food so good.  It gets busy but hey. It‚Äôs good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRLZaufXvqMLklwF9N72xCbS_s1NzZeC0WUA-5&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed the vegetable spring rolls and beef pho at Wooden Fish. The food was great, and the staff and atmosphere were just as impressive. It‚Äôs a more upscale spot than most Vietnamese restaurants in the area, which was a nice touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZHkwb8Lf-I3xROeh4EG9UkqRMtp-Gq0lcJ4he&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Lydia X.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViT0kOTUfe-14sI-XZzuSAMJ11zLMz2yRFRP-Y15rc4maS4qQo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in on a chilly winter night looking for the cozy vibes of pho. Unfortunately, we were seated by the door after a 15 minute wait and the cold air blowing in every time someone entered or exited was pretty uncomfortable. The inside is pretty small.

This is a northern style pho place. The rice noodles were wide and flat and there were no bean sprouts, basil or lime wedges. There were 4 condiment jars they gave us for the pho, and the pickled garlic slices was the group favourite. I like that they have two different portion sizes. The broth was delicious, served steaming hot. Chicken wings were crispy on the outside and well-seasoned.

Servers were quick and efficient. Overall a pleasant experience, especially if you get to sit away from the door.

Limited street parking available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXFBObIOec8gvzuYgcEnwvnYdLqREroIH78w22&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Alycia and Ivan Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNs0iY7FmIsUU61MmiozDCBg9QPnYMSXsMiEssh7EAp88RQdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful service. The staff is so welcoming and kind. They also seem to genuinely like working there and with each other, which makes the atmosphere that much more enjoyable.

The food comes out hot - and i mean hot! - and delicious. We ordered their chicken wings (spicy but its available without spice). They were crunchy as hell and delicious. My husband is a huge wings guy and this has to be one of his top wing places.

For dinner we ordered the duck confit with garlic rice. Again one of the best ducks we‚Äôve had. The garlic rice also was game changing. Packed with flavor and brought the dish together.

I ordered their braised beef stew and i kid you not, the meat falls off that bone! So delicious. I really liked that the stew had a fairly strong cinnamon and star anise flavor to it.

Would definitely back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-RpMYXmPcEM7JDGKDYYYeLvQULNrBQAu4kqKr&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Jenn Yoo (Canada Story)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCjTc1ONChi5j0c2VhTT-pN63xYnSzlyl1BEpgaM9aB9qeZzEd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"More than just a pho, Wooden fish offers a true dining experience. Four special spicy sauces make it the perfect spot for enjoying a steaming bowl of pho. The pho is consistently delicious, with a broth that‚Äôs  clean and rich but not too heavy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvaPGcf10zMKa9b8qZdhMtydGC0oYEz0yFWGot&fid=0x0:0x8881f32c031ed829"],"When":"2024-10-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Kin Sushi - A Delightful Experience!
I recently dined at Kin Sushi in West Vancouver and had an absolutely delightful experience. The restaurant is cozy and welcoming, with a warm ambiance that makes you feel right at home. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that our dining experience was top-notch from start to finish.
The menu offers a wide variety of sushi rolls, sashimi, and other Japanese dishes. I highly recommend trying their signature rolls ‚Äì they are both creative and delicious! The fish was fresh and the presentation was beautiful. We also enjoyed some of their hot dishes, which were equally impressive.
Overall, Kin Sushi is a fantastic spot for anyone looking to enjoy high-quality Japanese cuisine in a relaxed and friendly setting. I will definitely be returning soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyhgZZNZMnVgX6TmPf9LKJRO0bVoBD6cOnq0Vl&fid=0x0:0xed831c4080052a94"],"When":"2023-12-8"},{"Name":"Harry Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-XfQ_1GUTY03K0yC5R9PSoFya2l3Gd1-bY7IxIroOc7egQf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, the food is not bad, and the waiter is very welcoming. But nothing too special compared to other restaurants. The food is a little bit too expensive, but it could be cheap too. Not bad if you happen to come across and want to get something quick wouldn‚Äôt recommend just to come.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXtLX-Vw6sziFSzi0tl6ZbE5SHZZG1qmgcZUjm&fid=0x0:0xed831c4080052a94"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Sue H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv8fMVwoiTdgNQMqHEeej_SpzAtIEi6_D271bwpksyMa2WV5np=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs my first time here. The small and neat restaurant vibe, the elegant presentation of each plate and such a friendly attention, I loved everything. It‚Äôs a perfect spot for lunch or dinner after shopping at the Park Royal. While you‚Äôre here, you must try the croquette and the sashimi don. All ingredients were so fresh and tasted so healthy and delicious. I‚Äôm not a big fan of fried food but the croquette here got the crispy texture out of the world, not oily at all. I will come back to try some rolls too next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOVsJxx_HjT-Q-xg1RK0QCMhUhYM1YQeS55IPq&fid=0x0:0xed831c4080052a94"],"When":"2022-11-30"},{"Name":"Joseph Lai (Ë≥¥ÂÆóÁ¶ß)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWib4h1zapOfa6z_8wqbYjRUD76jVc_l9KLXhjblvCmxwk7teyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tiny shop in a corner of an inconspicuous plaza is easy to miss, but the food should not be ignored. It‚Äôs simply tasty. Importantly, they have quite a few vegetarian options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7kcywBgNe4q3MWz_d5am5tb89djQivcBV41IT&fid=0x0:0xed831c4080052a94"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Mana Ghotbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCCq8-gQVBtOypj2F9bK23mShq_4HPPBzG6tsM9uP2H6_ytRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! The quality of their food is unbeatable! The portions are generous, and the free parking is a great bonus. I love their sushi and, on top of that, the way they treat their customers is exceptional. Believe me, you should go there and experience their warm welcome for yourself. Kin Sushi, you are amazing‚Äîkeep up the great work!ü§û","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brooklyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIRdfymMUUj-9F4sA5q5-TvaLDTsPMM5knEkwOTTfZSfAbb1uB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seriously, the best sushi I‚Äôve ever had. The staff is so nice. The food is made quickly. Everything is super fresh. it‚Äôs quite affordable. I‚Äôm surprised there‚Äôs not a line out the door. This place is amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caio Almeida","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiaRtATlco9d2nuYSiwVUQlftKdLBcXs8PjbjFLeQLOAgLIGCBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favourite sushi place. Everyone there super welcoming. The food always tastes super fresh. I go there at least once a week. I recommend this place for all my friends üòä","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJzlDHsn3iUNq26qcvLgK2_mBC6EXIJXno40mt17ThAFJX3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled into this hidden gem when searching for nearby sushi place when we arrived earlier than expected for a doctors appointment in the area. We weren't disappointed! The restaurant is very small and only has a few tables, but luckily we got a seat 5 minutes after arriving. Food came out fast, fresh and very appealing to the eye. Great menu, tasty food, with great prices! No complaints here! We will be returning!","Images":null,"When":""}]
