user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Azi Jahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoCqSGFWxXVxJxNnyUrYmJjWJKEtREeG-G0RXpmBRv8kbELxEL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Be cautious when booking at Cinplex Parkroyal. We recently paid $22 for ‚ÄúInside Out 2‚Äù assuming it was a VIP screening, only to find out it was a 3D-DBOX in their regular salon labeled as full recliner.
"Make sure to double-check these details beforehand to avoid confusion."

The cleanliness of the theaters is acceptable, but the condition of the chairs, particularly in their non-VIP salons, leaves much to be desired as the leather is worn out.

Comparatively, Brentwood Cinplex scores a 7/10 from me, while Parkroyal only manages a 4/10.

Both locations serve low-quality food even in their VIP sections, and I‚Äôve yet to have a standout dining experience at either since 2019.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tabasom Rahimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW912ynFv5herxShWyMOg0TXzCyKSV2mOW8LYTgmR20fU75720=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got a VIP ticket expecting VIP service, but nobody came to take our order. I had to go twice to place the order myself. Even after 2 hours, when the movie was over, we still hadn't received our order. For the refund, the manager didn't even apologize.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amfiprion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKns3kOR1F1VTLAC2Vg4vEeqAtDOXI-Rah9GyFjAb4pItqrimF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice screen and sound. Comfortable recliner seats. Easy parking.
Some seats are worn out any they need to be replaced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCkeO9SLxgnVtK-QW-Xg_2ItYiV1OymEnbFhMI&fid=0x0:0x87dbce64e76df334"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Julian ‚ÄúMighty Jules‚Äù Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7Pq0rfub5mLVgtDRR5UC_BWjzJylA8_TT1-FdYCBiXLM2xkWO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is the second of now two disappointing visits. As a theater, this is a great place to watch a movie. That's it. Get in, watch your movie, and get out.

The restaurant is just bad. On our first visit, they got our order wrong and then argued it when I brought it up. On the second visit, we arrived a half hour early  for drinks, we sat at the bar and were ignored for 10 min while the bartender worked in front of us. No hello, no menus, nothing. On top of it, we never got our drinks. We just had to leave to catch our movie. And no, it was not slamming busy.

At the concession stand we ordered popcorn and a fountain drink, but they failed to inform us of a Coke strike and that there was no soda available (other than 2 flavours), but sold it to us anyway. It's just not good customer service.

The food is also really poor quality. They would benefit from a rebrand and a retraining of staff.

As is stands, this is a 'movie only' theater.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cam Andrist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb3MbimBepWTBc2mgK1PAWG-pE1GicqpHDQpFg1NydebxpqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Starting with the positives, the atmosphere is really cool and decor feels fancy for a movie theatre restaurant! Food was really underwhelming though. Avocado in quinoa bowl was somehow oxidized and unripe, literally inedible. Chicken sandwich might as well have been from Dairy Queen, fries were probably cooked yesterday. Yolanda the server was nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brett Bjornson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpSPWRH3-ygMEEvL7wltjTtl7ELYP9l3DFhi9M4XDhiooau7_f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the spicy chicken wrap, fries and a drink...it was really good! Good amount of spice and fresh food. Fries were really good and the drink was ice cold. Oh, and it was brought right to my seat in the theatre! Great food and great service. Would highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Baggott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_1NvjNzkydeCfG38kIGWpdMJpFgSVaU1FC27t1iQlXAJDhH4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a quinoa ‚Äòbowl‚Äô - previously good. Waiter didn‚Äôt mention that 2 of the main ingredients were out of stock, so it was just quinoa, salsa, and cucumbers. Offered free popcorn, but shocking they would offer it and not tell you before ordering, and still charge full. Terrible.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chaz Alec","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKShKdOHZEYPogBvbJemPNaqWN8Z53zzI9d_NraO7FMz27zNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm told that I might be able to store my e-scooter inside so I purchased a ticket and than I'm told that I cannot bring it in.  So I get a refund and leave","Images":null,"When":""}]

Highly recommend trying it out if you get the chance!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramin A.Masouleh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXz5YOsaesehd3-34fas6vkLBGZ2IHq9jaqAcD1agp8sZJvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We've been loyal customers since your West Vancouver location opened. Skip gave me a refund but would have rather had chicken in my poutine. As a chef, I'll say, take your time. It happens. üòÖ Gravy was super fire, though. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB2SpJxKRX7x4vdwR5-QkMbjMYQJz95hTJNOmX&fid=0x0:0x251ac941712b688e"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There's a new location of Popeyes at Park Royal Shopping Centre in West Vancouver and we decided to give it a try one night. We ordered:

10pc Chicken Family Meal with Coleslaw, Onion Rings & Biscuits
Butterfly Shrimp with Tartar Sauce
Popcorn Shrimp  with Cajun Cocktail Sauce

We ordered the Chicken Mild but there was a layer of chicken at the bottom that was far from mild. Everyone said it was quite spicy. I brought some leftovers home for my husband to try and he said it was the spiciest Popeyes chicken he'd ever had.

Fried Chicken, Fried Onion Rings, Fried Shrimp...So much fried food on the table and yet, I think the Biscuits were actually my favourite item. They were quite soft and moist inside. Not so impressed with the fried food, especially when we ordered "mild" and received "spicy." Also, when I arrived I had to wait about 15 minutes at least for my order even though I had specified a pickup time on the app. Won't be rushing back there anytime soon.

Service: Could have been better
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: 879 Park Royal N #883, West Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnGL7wBYPugKN_AiFmHHSZQSmbqD8tb4jM-ALA&fid=0x0:0x251ac941712b688e"],"When":"2023-6-6"},{"Name":"Niki Ahmadpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwggyo4TIOZ6_D6Ue0eGM7Bl6RxBX8qkAAJJc_MGqSa1ChffwkcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Busy store but clean. Ingredients were fresh and not greasy. The staff was unfriendly. They said the spicy option would be ready in 8 minutes. After 10 minutes, we asked to change our order to normal. They said it was ready but gave it to us after 20 minutes, making our friend wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeubBD395jrq_uJYwMy-bZB4FYZ4SYcywxn5Ax&fid=0x0:0x251ac941712b688e"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Danny Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7uIYz7vEyRlzc_sXf7AZKfTfm0JEbWhx8kEmQrYQim7HLQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious fried chicken - meat was a bit dried compared to another brand of chicken","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCln_GcwfQeepOVRydohmIT52bcTMOjz6mR1r7&fid=0x0:0x251ac941712b688e"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Joanna Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkmnHoG6VSsC55vHZ0N2PglzxjlldqbAmVIso1OTUFDC0FGmss=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Gravy here makes the star rating lower there were white chunks and when I asked they said it was supposed to be like that it was freshly prepared one. It was off putting that there were chunks. Gravy isn‚Äôt supposed to have chucks of white things or other floating things looks more like oatmeal texture than gravy texture.
I could not even finish it because of that. It as complete and utter disgusting. Never order the gravy again. Other Popeyes locations was not like that. It was disgusting and off putting.
Never again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leonardo Faundez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtqA-nY7FKtEHnJE07MJtFvKYRJfa_gzsg0Hat0j3rFecFxrRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not the first Nando‚Äôs we visited and it lived up to the expectations!

I had the half chicken with mashed potatoes and corn. To drink a glass of red wine.

Service with a smile.

Great location as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO17hoTHBDQCAsY5Eu5khoghD0bvXddTDhecQFM&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went here last night, Peri peri chicken is okay. I ordered Family package and added half chicken on lemon and medium spicy.    for both orders cost me around $70+.  Taste wise, is better than the one in Burnaby, but I think Downtown  location has better taste. Always love peri fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzwldAJpK2zFabdjGSpQpLFqotk72u4gG0SFc5&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Sidharth Jhawar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqfvFdclSSlE0wMMqTd7OAs9935GkZqf04JObQ-XgE8pqCZpgI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went to dine in on my trip to Vancouver. The place is really cool and is located in a very nice neighborhood. Their sauce is really famouse and tastes amazing. Being a vegetarian, I ordered their Vegeterian burger, which was lacking luster, although their Veggie bowl was quite colorful and decent tasting. I'd still go to Nandos when I visit Vancouver again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcpo_NWqIOOBqvcbg1wcp9LVJUwzOa_JE5mBov&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Margot Ware","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXky9lWr2k7zKwtZ6WPRqM0xpTJMY6glgk-NLyMjnALwSRzX5y8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are fortunate to have a Nando‚Äôs so close to our office. We generally grab a lunch special at least once a month as a treat.

Whether it‚Äôs a salad in the summer, a tasty Chicken sandwich, or a plate of wings, their tasty Peri Peri never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoNAonYtKLJs7hb3ADJ12eL45CglbeEZi-QAOo&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my younger son here for his birthday as this was where he wanted to go. He loves chicken!

You order your food at the front counter, give them your table number and they bring the food to your table. Utensils napkins and hot sauces are in an area by the front counter.

We both ordered the Peri Q Pulled Chicken Sandwich. He had his with Peri Fries and Peri Mac while I had Peri Fries with Mashed Potatoes. The chicken  breast was moist, the perinaise sauce great and went very nicely with the pickled red onions and arugula in the sandwich! The fries were very crispy and perfectly seasoned!

After we finished our meal I ordered a takeout meal of 5 Lemon & Herb Whole Wings with Peri Fries with Mashed Potatoes for our older son who couldn‚Äôt come with us. He enjoyed and devoured that when we took it home to him!

For eating in, takeout or delivery they do a great job on how they cook their chicken!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM64JhoG2mcFBhXZAi1aNkVeM6O0-tw5PwnmIxo&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"hania daaboul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQa8NWbYsOBdoHhTx2i-DSDGlyXV65A1FtkVJsxdPzsebGoIfdxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here as a big group and we were so happy with the service. Arman was an amazing host and he made sure everyone had his meal and everyone was happy. The food was very tasty and was served quickly. We enjoyed the experience overall and we had a great time. Thank you for such a lovely experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfGicBpazY6fVdfi3Cu4HJC0Wgm7QMLTYv-R2P&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Jason Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLujlaYQTWB8SzhQ23eZ0Rn8bR33R19qY8gKphqiFf5r6Bhyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went in at 7:50 just to grab a dessert. They close at 8:30. They told us sorry, we couldn't eat inside They were closed on the inside and had already flipped all the chairs 40 minutes early.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMs-Y0Z5I_-s_uyK-dDGxJ-KMTEeXfHknS1hRW&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Mahsan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPTQ0BaCS7ecM6Ba2ordsXLpD8nndRKeplwNPHSMap3oKHQS0C=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sauce and the chicken was sooooo good and delicious, very recommended üëçüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdBPuvBPXTtG2hacAI9ZBdQ88uNjnfi6gqnUuC&fid=0x0:0xa07850eee7780a25"],"When":"2024-12-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here to celebrate a friend‚Äôs birthday that enjoys karaoke. We took the bus over as it was only a 10 minute bus ride and ubered back home since we would be drinking.

This was our second karaoke night here as we had such fun the first time. There is an interesting bunch of regulars that come here to karaoke. We saw a few of the same regulars from the last time.

There is a ground level bar and tables and you walk downstairs to the karaoke section. They have a large binder with songs arranged by artist or song title. You write your song and name on a little piece of paper and hand it to the DJ.

Several women in our group sang Take It Easy (Eagles) and It‚Äôs Too Late (Carole King) and as a group while another guy sang the Brady Bunch theme. 2 other girls in our group did a Taylor Swift song I think.

They have several good beers in tap, wine and other drinks. I had 2 pints of Parallel 49‚Äôs Tricycle. It is a Grapefruit Radler so a good summer beer that is under 5%. I ordered the house red wine but received the house white wine but she was ok with that as she also likes white wine and did not want me to return it. So it worked out. Others had one of the draft beers or wine as well.

It‚Äôs a lot of fun and worth going to! There‚Äôs really good and not so good singers but the audience is very supportive of anyone that gets up to sing. You don‚Äôt have time get up and sing but you can sing along as you‚Äôll likely recognize many of the songs. They also have live music and sports games on too. So stop by if you‚Äôre looking for a good time in a Saturday night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw2gEpwE3JaVyW4V-fV1b6DNdsu9gySVPeDVzx&fid=0x0:0xd55da84add52242a"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Harvey Palmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWzpUyh3dp-kImSk9NgQfxA-xnQy394fl4Mh7ObFQIaMiikDsu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little pub with nice beer selection on tap and reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdj7PgGK-30XivGp8rDpmnPY2Jl7Q9fMiD5yw&fid=0x0:0xd55da84add52242a"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"parvin zandi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJNKR4wl1AWNDZitvwfr8tXxsrDKbyhI9QJoFXL7IVhUtMsaJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs a very lovely and friendly place. Our family really loves it, and we enjoy being there. We didn‚Äôt order food, and we don‚Äôt have any experience with it.üçÅüçÇ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"diedre cropper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6gcMgS2fnZbnplfIQ-2g1m_PafbSvsM0W0CpzSTRjCM5bsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't have any of the food but the staff were the best and the live band was awesome","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNURk848Zv51OzG1PLDg-OPBQuyQB1mu5VWHme9&fid=0x0:0xd55da84add52242a"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"grant I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfszTxm00jNodPtr6Y-XMP8VjxSKeG9FC6HUO2k1dugF3PTuP11A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Didn't get the chance to try the food.  And it's a little tricky to find for us non locals. It is just off Marine drive, in a court yard behind other businesses. Trust google and walk thru the arch on the street. You find this local pub with a dog friendly patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHpOvgDaDSstFUDdAVBus9ppxGTC8R_dy00ZaF&fid=0x0:0xd55da84add52242a"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Amin Anari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlTeDQyOQKEntzFMAhbEMHhIzLJm7eUxVM5HfSrI1RJWHS3Ckg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is your friendly neighborhood pub if you're looking for one. The beer selection is satisfying and they order their food from a nice little quality restaurant upstairs called Mani's. Fresh warm food if you're looking for a bite. The place has ample space to seat for large groups and a friendly bartender. Probably not a place for fancy cocktails but definitely a great upbeat place to hang out and have a good time in a local pub.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHFdgd84TlgHgVxHCKOprt1EX8DJei88hwsoTe&fid=0x0:0xd55da84add52242a"],"When":"2021-3-6"},{"Name":"Mark Emery: ART & MUSIC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_Hzqyf4Rmc0bP7FpZZ912KtDlBXa_Y5SjqNSKb4RK9RHGuMq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a gem of a pub in the Ambleside area. The staff are friendly. The prices are reasonable and the band that was playing was highly entertaining. Their name was THE SINGLES. All the music that the clientele liked dancing to ( Motown / funk / disco). Three thumbs up. Did I mention free parking outside!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dominik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaRAvRr55urp8LIa549n3vLQyvUuQtX4wUqNArkt_92pt2mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the only real British feeling pubs in Vancouver. 10/10","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alison Cherry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrXMAaulP_ZyTE7FgGCjUl__l-mPP_CDzbJd_WCaGq9Sp11A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food wasn't great. Portions were small. Drinks weren't great. Food was tasteless. The gluten free bun I substituted for my burger was one of the worst gluten free buns I've had and I've been gluten free for almost 30 years. Child menu pasta portion was ridiculously small. The service was great. The building and atmosphere are great. The washrooms are a 5 out 5. Overcooked steak, the seasonal vegetables were 5 green beans, two ends still had the stems attached. One carrot, and a sliver of a piece of onion. Kids burger was so dry it was almost inedible. The french fries were great. Lots of parking available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB12U3fRODB3C7V89rvRwFHsZdKksySna_QGzs&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Nazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2aGlD-TZ0FiVGrVu_tf4SQkQQqOxZxh4T-z8wzuYYaFQxKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, well, wellüòç

We started with an indulgent array of appetizers, including the flavorful spinach and artichoke dip, the rich roasted mushroom soup, the delightful coconut calamari, and the savory Tuscan bruschetta.
The generous portion sizes made it a feast for the two of us, prompting us to opt for the shrimp and scallop scampi for our main course. Despite feeling satiated, the exquisite flavors convinced us to savor the scampi as well, leaving only a small portion of the dip untouched.

Despite the current review score of 3.7, I respectfully disagree and would confidently give it a perfect five.
Here's why:
1. The menu offered a diverse selection that you wouldn't find at your typical Canadian restaurants.
2. The taste and freshness exceeded our expectations.
3. The warmth and hospitality of the staff contributed to a delightful dining experience.
4. The spacious layout and friendly ambiance added to the overall enjoyment.
5. Notably, the calamari stood out for its delicate batter, allowing you to really taste the true flavours.
6. Every dish we sampled was simply delightful.

If you're seeking a unique dining experience for lunch or dinner, I highly recommend giving this restaurant a try!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGQTswqXIwoAHpZ1zHFUrSoEM-vOtpoe61iSL9&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I came here for Father‚Äôs Day, so the service was really slow. Other than the slow service, the only other slightly annoying thing is that the restaurant has no spacial barriers, so it‚Äôs quite noisy, even in a booth. The food, however, was really good. The steak, while requested for medium, was more so medium well done but still really tasty. The gnocchi was a great choice for the seniors who need softer foods. We would recommend trying the spicy, pineapple cocktail, which was very tasty. This restaurant is definitely one to try out, especially for big groups, looking for a variety of dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq_VKxzGmEhL4MKfAxIVqehayTu2SGEPr0lMNu&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Milestones at Park Royal was the destination to catch a late-evening meal with a visiting family friend Wednesday last.

Located in the Village at PR near the Ambleside soccer pitch, the restaurant is spacious -- with many indoor seating options/sections, large bar + outdoor patio area -- and has a cool industrial - urban loft feel with lots of brick and metal accents.

Milestones has been a personal fave since they first opened.  Their seasonal Fall - Winter Roast Prime Rib is absolutely juicy,  delicious and perfectly cooked. The  Portobello Mushroom Chicken is also amazingly tasty served over pasta and with  vegetables. For dessert, the famous Key Lime Pie is awesome and not to be passed over.

This particular time, I went for their California Burger with Side-Caesar Salad, Long Island Ice Tea (2x), followed by White Chocolate Cheesecake (Key Lime Pie was sold-out!), and Latte.

Milestones is always great for its upbeat urban feel, later closing time (11pm), very friendly people -- e.g., bartenders who know how to mix and happily research requested drinks  -- and its broad and delicous menu offerings. Always a great choice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPsXWgjektYC1Xfsvvro0ZqfT36JXWXJi7Bb2h&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"sogol zaimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlwDuA8K-FOPk4mhWiitU5oZ11OSxssrUcDgEA_pvSbJ2Z3VaPuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The service and atmosphere was fine.  Everything got ready fast.  Disappointed over the steak/shrimp holiday dish they have.  Asked for MED  steak was served more like raw, had blood, didn't taste good at all.  Told server, they took steak back to cook more, and at this point rest of the food was cold, steak was now charred.  We didn't eat it. Waste of money and 50$ dish. Disappointing that they would even still charge for it and not remove from bill.  Mind you I didn't ask, as server was nice.  Was hoping they would do it without me asking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great location for weekday lunch! Being at the edge of the village, it‚Äôs fairly quiet and private. I like patio seating in summer but indoor was not bad at all.

Tried their dine-out menu this time and it had great value! The meatball appi was size of main and the actual main was 2x my usual lunch in size. Everything tasted good and the presentation was impressive.

The drink menu had great variety but the Bellini lacked flavour and maybe a bit of booze. Our server was perfect‚Ä¶very attentive!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGTFZHWSVhh4o-2kFnnjFnEL2xAOTyVektBin8&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Deepti Singh (Hope S Brown - Dee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1QUPD2Fpus_zSNnoGcNG2apOl2__2gK7AggZOjq8bwUARF_UH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional Service and Delicious Food!

My experience at Milestones Bar and Grill, Park Royal in West Vancouver was elevated thanks to Shelley, the wonderful attendant who went above and beyond to ensure our dining experience was memorable. From attentively taking our orders to ensuring we weren't charged for an appetizer with excessive salt, Shelley's professionalism and care truly stood out.

Moreover, the food surpassed expectations with delicious flavors and impeccable presentation. Each dish was a culinary delight, and the drinks complemented the meal perfectly.

Overall, Shelley's attentive service combined with the delectable cuisine makes Milestones a must-visit establishment. Can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9I5oBgVgH3nzrsUJPAZEFRHXhozifml0QQJhA&fid=0x0:0x7f98e73a3761b6f9"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Lizzy Laurie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIczjCYH0Q8br78qZfpfEGPxzHfZBPCTYs91uJf-_cBAaIEZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a great experience at Milestones with our server Steve! He was amazing and such a great and fun atmosphere. Food was extremely tasty and was delivered quickly. Drinks were great and would highly recommend to anyone in North Vancouver.  Service was extremely attentive and very kind, accommodating and had such a great night there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Clara Salager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS2tz8IkUPgUl2grKanGIcVGVWYtBuHNeRsQLcQV2zX1OCLFc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite Vietnamese restaurants! My boyfriend and I come here frequently to enjoy top quality meals for lunch and dinner. We always get the delicious Spring Rolls and Imperial Prawns (off-menu now and part of Shrimp Sugar Cane Supreme). I‚Äôve been meaning to try their desserts and a Chicken Pho but these two dishes are so good! The server there is lovely and I really like how little people there is, so it‚Äôs quiet and ambient. The seats are good and the cutlery is fancy. My only suggestion is to have one TV rather than three.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORirVChuejzZGTjABkrFdQkAglLFc87KIusN_L&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"Michelle Havvagoodey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOzetGkb5sfvQ2QqVQLz6HIVsUL94CClajRGhGVUfARW0O_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"They do have parking and large space inside. I don‚Äôt usually do negative reviews and I usually try to find something positive to hone on but honestly this is just food court quality. Small portion, flavour for pho was like water with some powder and msg or something. The chicken wings.. we were told 4 full wings for $15‚Ä¶ which is very expensive. After talking, not sure if they decided to change it after we wanted to clarify 4 wings for $15? That they gave us 6‚Ä¶ it tasted like the ones you would get at superstore and bake. The water glasses were not the cleanest and scratched.
I haven‚Äôt been so disappointed with pho in a while. Maybe even if the service was good then I can still say at least the atmosphere created was nice..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNipMt-n7GfHwOadpU0xdKcsdklhUvpeS6gRT6U&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Briany Tai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaDpQzEuNStDRBr5hOYPbjSHf_qOdJOhQC38WblA_bsCmoKHOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were working nearby and thought that Vietnamese food is the budget option in the expensive neighbourhood. With a miner surprise. Everything is more expensive than most of Viet restaurants. Other than beef noodle soup $16.5; everything is around 20$ or up.

Their beef noodle soup use higher quality of beef, which enhances the experience, the soup tastes sweet. The spring is $6 per roll and yes it is larger roll than most, but I found it too blend in the mouth feel as the stuffing lack flavors .

All and all, they are above average in terms of flavours, pricey but can be justified by its location,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwUjUkj7saOoX7HonY85eyavDpTKw8z4G2kVmS&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Paloma Corvalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-TK2UYSjVBdb5aF00zzoNVEY0fPpqHp-5fo7PiMSQMdSJ1ZF1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! The pho is delicious, but my favourite are the steamed rice crepes stuffed with pork and mushrooms. They gave me a hoisin sauce with this, but the fish sauce they have is bomb and a way better match. I want to go back and try the escargot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdpk6BwlZRrJY61M-WdZQCe58LykhSdWWKZ3D-&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2023-2-6"},{"Name":"cindy amimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdhaRRjdt2F95Hg33YJHglY92Y6uThZ_6pLriCJEAXRUwgip8-DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Conveniently located on Marine Dr. and 25th Street, West Vancouver, Vina Vietnamese Restaurant offers gourmet Vietnamese cuisines. Like going home for a simple delicious dinner made by Grandma, we had a bowl of beef noodles in soup after photography in Lower Caulfield not too far away, feeling so good and so satisfied. Service is attentive, atmosphere is homey, and parking is available at rear.

I dined in Vina Vietnamese Restaurant again today, April 8, 2021. Due to the severe 3rd wave of Covid 19, which caused the provincial government to legally forbid restaurant‚Äôs dine-in, I was seated outside on the patio, enjoying the warmth from the shining sun and the lovely street views of Dundarave Village. Service is satisfactory and food is fantastic! A wonderful place to dine outdoors!

Today, January 24th, 2022, I dined in Vina Vietnamese Restaurant for the third time. I would like to recommend their fried seafood cake in particular: seafood wrapped up with crispy egg crust. So aromatic and tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGYw9--F6FPjlIMOQTUTfgEdglza4HMj0Ej7mo&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2021-2-8"},{"Name":"Canazian /Azian Gypsy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRsXnvd7NrRlS4i9g-WC_U-5fSc56dEnbeZK6SHYAzb5Ka4AEl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very attentive staff. Food was delicious.  A little overpriced than what we're used to but service and quality was on point.  Menu is mostly Vietnamese cuisine but do offer Asian dishes.  Their hot sauce is homemade and amazing.  Parking is in the rear and is wheel chair accesible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-pY4r4krKBwa00unpiNJtg0uZ3Z_dIxGx1FMD&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2020-12-24"},{"Name":"Julian Medd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZxUsHwUyqW0oLzB9SCV7Gh3-KfajXxV5yyi8vLy94HVbZ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Possibly my favorite restaurant, an old vancouver institution and a definite hidden gem. You‚Äôll probably notice their name because of their food court locations, but it all started out in restaurants and the quality difference is noticeable.

I‚Äôve been coming here since I could remember, and it hasn‚Äôt changed a bit (except for the price lol) the food is just as good.

The menu features a pretty wide range of Vietnamese food of all different price points, but the best value and what they‚Äôre probably know for are their Combinations. Combo A is my personal favourite! Sooo delicious. The amount of food for the price is definitely worth it. Another dish I enjoy is their escargot, it‚Äôs a little pricey but I find it very tasty in a city where it‚Äôs hard to find.

Come here and try it. Make the trip. I assure you, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Gp3KpwVGhIMMl_12DG6G2cmWz9ZldxjeG4kZ&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2019-9-30"},{"Name":"Dennis Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ9rqmgRBHD7hysf3WcjqE-LZyeOgz5-nupNvcsoU9DSPpDbLT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've passed by this place many a time, but finally got a chance to try it.  The outside/entrance is kind of hidden behind trees.  The interior was surprisingly nice: spacious and modern, and looked recently renovated.  Unfortunately, I wasn't really wow'ed by the food -- the lunch vermicelli bowl is basically the same as what is served at the Vina food courts.  Maybe I just chose a bad dish to start with, but it is what it is.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ1nTOsppOX2SzkMl7rKg_qKi60R6Ax4syA8bS&fid=0x0:0x514eb13d5fbc3816"],"When":"2022-7-3"}]

title: Thai Pudpong Restaurant
address: 1474 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, BC V7T 1B7
descriptions: Warm, family-owned restaurant preparing a variety of traditional Thai specialties, with beer & wine.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Parkview Denatal Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII5kRVL-qzRe2w26zGbFlWZCPHTb5EA8HQoLlXYY6xTrIBsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Thai Pudding, and while the food was fantastic, there‚Äôs definitely room for improvement in the overall ambiance.

The service was friendly and welcoming, and the menu offered a wonderful selection of authentic Thai dishes. The star of the meal, however, was the Thai pudding‚Äîrich, smooth, and perfectly sweet. It was by far one of the best desserts I‚Äôve had in a long time!

That said, the restaurant‚Äôs interior and d√©cor are in need of some serious updating. The space feels a bit dated and could benefit from a refresh to match the quality of the food.
Despite this, the delicious flavors and attentive service more than made up for the less-than-ideal atmosphere.

If you‚Äôre looking for amazing Thai food, Thai Pudding is definitely worth a visit‚Äîjust don‚Äôt expect the most modern setting.
I‚Äôll definitely be back for the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa6J_Fi0mRXzsoO_f7UPz-MRThcAPzvHaHwv3z&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Thai Pudpong is a gem in West Vancouver! From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm, friendly service that makes you feel right at home. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, perfect for a family dinner or a casual meal with friends.
The food is absolutely delicious and authentic. I highly recommend the Pad Thai and the Red Curry ‚Äì both dishes are bursting with flavor and cooked to perfection. The seafood options are also fantastic, especially the prawns and scallops. The spice levels can be adjusted to your preference, which is great for those who like it mild or extra spicy.
The staff are attentive and frequently top up water glasses without being intrusive. It‚Äôs clear that they take pride in their work and genuinely care about providing a great dining experience.
Overall, Thai Pudpong offers a wonderful combination of excellent food, friendly service, and a welcoming atmosphere. It‚Äôs definitely a place I‚Äôll be returning to again and again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuHSxj9-iJjtkw2562RDUOKv8Ga2Tn1fLFI6W6&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wanna know my experience?
Ok...here it goes...

This was a take-out order.

If I had picked up canned Pad Thai from the dollar store I would've had a more pleasant experience.

The shrimp in the Pad Thai is frozen not fresh, the texture is old seafood, and it had a raunchy aftertaste lasting into even the day after. It was not de-tailed or de-veined. So, you have poop-tailed old shrimp....eat up!
There was barely any bean sprouts or tofu (see pic.)
That dish had a terrible aftertaste, and I stopped eating not to risk possible food poisoning.

The Noodle Rama. The noodles were cold and old sticking together like noodles would be found at the end of a left-over barrel reserved especially for cattle. But, even they I think would refuse.
The beef looked and tasted like they had been deep fried, boiled and burnt (see pic.) The sauce tasted like it would if you mixed mayonnaise and ketchup, and there was no seasoning whatsoever.
On top it all....they forgot our chopsticks.

I'm not going to sugarcoat this for you. This was the worst Pad Thai I've had.
Ever. What an insult to the beautiful nation of Thailand.

*for the record 0 stars*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm1y-_GxUhLRb4HWdF04bM4iQt_iAszaZ1VLBn&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Wing Wing Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM-NblQ23wPMIDbEZG4qLeVHUJU9mowQi7hKxpBL0edQSZtY9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dining at this restaurant was a delightful experience. The food was delicious and arrived quickly. Comfortable seating and friendly service added to the enjoyment. With its reasonable prices, this place is definitely worth visiting. For a satisfying meal with great views, be sure to check it out. Don't miss the pad Thi
!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8LuY0M_mBS-qYC5oQ8i8DE93WmYbzD7rHg65S&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Dr. Josef A. Swetz D.C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpIKYIp7nH6sSm-VCqFiY9yqasMHTyqbYbVBdCTIuzDbJLA9a6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such an excellent meal here! Some of the best Thai food I've had since moving to the Vancouver area!! The phad Thai was incredible and the duck curry or Geang Phed Ped-Yang
(Barbecue duck in a red curry sauce with fresh Thai basil, cherry tomatoes and pineapple) was phenomenal üòã There were a couple bones still left on the duck meat so be careful when chewing. HIGHLY recommend this place if you want an extremely good authentic Thai cuisine!!! Will be going here for our Thai food from now on üòÑ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8-vIf1KhTBUMpUG6Da3ROTaR2lkfsYNwu_znL&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Luke Roblesky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzupLRFiv6fqPtX7oc7D9zV9hwuxLZdqIlCelrXIh8Lj8mN_F2IA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friend took me here during my visit to Vancouver and it didn't disappoint. Pudpong has an authentic feel with the servers quickly taking your order and bringing out food. They customized a couple of items for us, providing Thai food that reminded us of eating out in Bangkok. I recommend the Tom Yum soup and Papaya Salad if you can handle spicier foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhrbkBe9zNx_uIzTTm-72VpkF7Y9oX1biOLBsx&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2022-6-13"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really delicious food!  The lunch specials are well priced and very tasty!  You also must try the stuffed chicken wings and the spring rolls..they are both crispy and delightful!  It was my first time back in over a decade‚Ä¶I will not wait so long again to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo6V0RXmRCOpc3XB6Fb1ZGxZtBBlLstTZkby9I&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2023-1-8"},{"Name":"Azi Jahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoCqSGFWxXVxJxNnyUrYmJjWJKEtREeG-G0RXpmBRv8kbELxEL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Atmosphere felt outdated, giving off a vibe of an old establishment.

About prices, I found it to be quite high, reminiscent of downtown establishments.

Food quality is very average

While the staff‚Äôs caring approach is commendable, improvements are necessary to bring the overall dining experience up to par.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeRsK2_rcq6jNtHWvXNeKbyxeoPO2ayIiJxv4T&fid=0x0:0xefc5132cc61b9728"],"When":"2023-7-9"}]

[{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2rqpKjRTzr7m9wyIY_xrm9p_7gNDKEENSwOBylfzkXiKWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has delicious food and their service is amazing,there is also the menu had plenty of options to choose from,would love to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJf4WOfoZFre8Hfs0JW9CSQFc8St17LBgNVVK-&fid=0x0:0x470bc56665cc9261"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Michael Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfhin5YE3WLMjj3PohsoMVGI6st9GFOhHybKTJZUq6-TvM1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at New Ginger & Soy Restaurant! From the moment I walked in, the staff was friendly and attentive, making sure I felt welcomed. The atmosphere was cozy and authentic, setting the perfect backdrop for a delicious meal.

The food was absolutely fantastic! I highly recommend the sweat& sour pork ‚Äîit was packed with flavor and cooked to perfection. Every dish we ordered was fresh and beautifully presented. You can really taste the quality in every bite!

Whether you‚Äôre a fan of classic dishes or looking to try something new, this place has it all. I can‚Äôt wait to come back and try more of the menu. If you‚Äôre craving authentic Chinese cuisine, the New Ginger & Soy Restaurant is a must-visit!

Feel free to add any personal touches or specific details about your experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8GmoslCZNK0JT_nbu_AbI8mRt9J7fi3Jt_s52y6Ays0lWUZxj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had our best meal in Vancouver here. This is a small family owned Hong Kong bistro that has authentic Cantonese style Chinese food. The food is very fresh and flavorful without being overly salty or oily and the family that owns it is very welcoming. The wok hei is here! The atmosphere of the entire place is very warm with modern touches and I am looking forward to coming here again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"May Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXcQn3MnsfRu2wFfbhTH74TZ-K-R-cCSt90-x_cqmXdiPHow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service is very good, the food is very delicious and comforting üòã The environment is gorgeous will recommend to all my friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOzBfnf1zDUrBPJS9m8I45F_57QBxmNxVYxxvM&fid=0x0:0x470bc56665cc9261"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Westvan Mom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1aKVcGCWXBk6JIKilHfoGhMYMStDkOrbDoIiep7rpRVgaTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What a difference from previous management of the original ginger and soy

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"pei wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3Llugr1w467xXrf4_DO68O3S5UaRmzVx8b3F4i6RfnDaMqe1t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family went there last night. We had a very good time. It is a very beautiful restaurant, very delicious food, generous portion and reasonable price . The owner and staff are super nice and friendly. Definitely recommend. We will be back!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJYm1WX8SLlXLHxscxIGNNWAIT7ZlIA4WPpiIn&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Wai Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx7Ut-RpivhELHoCim2S8DaycQi0XbZHGz1HpRIUodLhA7RrJ6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so delicious! Staff are so nice and helpful. Recommend the volcano roll and chicken karaage. The volcano roll is completely deep fried. Love this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUt2OdGOitqyQzKcz2BcS_8XoUWE1Y2swTH0MU&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jasdev Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjef2rU3APTkqNpTeqhl657EVCWPfVPYpPf65pbbfSlyNN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing aesthetic paired with a server who was both funny and personable made for a fantastic dining experience. They also offer aburi oshi sushi, which feels like the next evolution of sushi, combining tradition with a modern twist. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1VsgtCEcESwdVlTR4e2Yc6DzJtUsshkdDLpU&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Sally Koc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWePnH2Y7f3pKQqp_amdeZXzJTIf5jLVfSzhyoNIkkW-gZCH-I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nathan and the team were so welcoming, and the food was incredible. The coconut surprise he recommended was the star of the meal definitely a must try! The cozy atmosphere made it the perfect spot to relax","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZrXcRgNtwDOhhsJA_rnSKuhqCBbQeh_faeT50&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ichiban is a good Japanese restaurant . The interior is a cozy wooden feel, but with japanese characteristics, there are areas where you can sit shoe less in the traditional way.

This is a vegetarian review, and I would say the options are great. There's even a veg section on the menu, but there are opinions almost everywhere else on the menu

I had the mango avocado roll
And the special yammy rol
l I enjoyed both but more so the yammy the creamchesse didn't over power the rest of ingredients.

Also had taiyaki for dessert it's a fried redbean cake in shape of a fish, I've only had red once before so I'm not a redbean expert but I can say the cake was tasty not too rich but not tasteless either a good sweet too end my meal.

The service was efficient. My server i didn't catch his name help explain what certain rolls were.

For the price I would, it's great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpYgEhpnO3mRiAc3XniUSpxbznr_RB5yF8aWc5&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"o maeda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5TxArBdr-wlRgVZ-KA6WQAM1IrrGpBso0HpjLTWXNgbMNZhpU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not authentic Japanese. Food quality was average. Chicken karaage in the picture is more like popcorn chicken.

Menu options are limited, you can find most of the items in other restaurants, you can‚Äôt find anything specials here.

Service was better than the food.

Price was expensive but I guess this is what you get in rich neighborhoods.

4.5 is definitely overrated. 3.5 is more suitable compared to other authentic ones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGAxLUeFs9ffvfytkkGtterYs8qBP0nT3Phlhr&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"abdo kibbeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqTuP2_-wszAbVzBwDgrjEOiHBAblTILn75i_qiZQVE8-Znk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is amazing and better than other sushi restaurants. The staff here are welcoming, always a smile on their face. Love this place, totally recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdEJye2SBjfldbuFPovrAUUoNRo9VNApgXNkR8&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Ronald B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_Mt0SdyzppT58qLdbbzj1sY4Nva9W-LpB9qFPiHaoQT6MHG0H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Best Sushi restaurant we‚Äôve had in the north shore so far! It‚Äôs a perfect location from the beach.

We had the Beef udon for our 3 year old and he loved it, sockeye sashimi, sockeye and avocado rolls, gyozas and the red dragon roll.  The gave my son a miso soup as well because they know kids love the soup. Also a large hot sake for the wife and I. Amazing atmosphere and the food was so tasty and filling!

Price: For what you get the price is on par with a lot of other sushi restaurants of this caliber. ‚≠êÔ∏è

Portion/palate: The sashimi cuts were thick and the portion per item on the menu were nice! The taste was excellent for what we ordered. ‚≠êÔ∏è

Place: It is a bit cramped going up the stairs (The restaurant is on the 2nd floor) but over all it‚Äôs cozy and the feeling is authentic. Location is right on the main road so you get all the road noise (emergency vehicles etc.)
Parking is hit and miss on the main road but the back of the building it looked like there were plenty of parking spaces. We parked by the beach and walked over so it was more convenient for us. 1/2 ‚≠êÔ∏è

People: The staff were friendly and one in particular was very attentive to our needs! Thank you Nathan! ‚≠êÔ∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrWnj7MNuV0fCfraOBHDwwl4PRx9-lV6PkmDUx&fid=0x0:0x5008559fd18efcea"],"When":"2024-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3PxD7u8hAuIIfsHPwY3qF1Vf2akitCmCQsH6To47GSdPMek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I thought this place is amazing, but even simple stuff where bad supermarket lvl food, maybe its just me, but the steak bas tough, kids noodle was salty, lobster roll was super garlicky (in Japanese roll?!) our simple salmon roll tasted stale. The server was very impatient. The decor is 1995, sooo yea, sry though, o btw its super expensive for what it is","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0S4Ri5_S3vwZ5w1dayatkFPxlKvGN2oIRXzE&fid=0x0:0x3a09689b2e682c89"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Robert R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhwuG4Ge1WiCpRm7SjwXkaURW8EAIQldfuq8lI-7CLw-Kjkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife‚Äôs family has been coming here for years. I started to join them a few years ago. It‚Äôs a great room, great service and the food is amazing. They have to be in the top 5 for sushi in all of Vancouver and hands down number 1 on the north shore. We have nothing but amazing things to say about every visit we have ever had.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sub-Zero Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5lT-J7n8oLnHyyedZHVDwBxi7HePHZM5hnjGRjNYWLg8tGfop=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice looking Sushi Restaurant with a lot of good food options.  This is definitely on the pricey side and this does affect how I rate this place.
Pro:
Our server was very knowledgeable and very attentive.  The presentation of the food was very nice. The rainbow role was very good.  All the food was very fresh. My Sashimi plate was very good with about 12 pieces, which also included two marinade Sashimi options in a small bowl
Con:
Neither my soup or my wife's tea appeared with out asking for it again and again for a spoon.  They have a different servers to deliver drinks and food, maybe the source of the missing items.  Portion size is on the smaller side .  The spicy tuna role was a little too spicy to taste the tuna.  The miso soup was a little too much miso paste and hence too salty. The octopus and  clam pieces were very small on the Sashimi plate.

The ocean view through the forest, a lot of people commenting about, is very limited and I would not report that there is ocean view.
Overall a very nice restaurant but in my opinion you can have a equally tasty and satisfying Japanese food experience for much much  less than what you pay here. See my other reviews for some examples.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_wmb1U6HwnlkGx7aQRy3c_9_Ml2nt62VyFInH&fid=0x0:0x3a09689b2e682c89"],"When":"2022-11-6"},{"Name":"Rupert A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLc1z9bLynhgKGkihxX-cpS9pSPodymkNd2IFPssLXm5QGQeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was a hit and miss.
The 7 black tiger prawns tempura were very good.  This restaurant makes GREAT tempura dishes.
The seafood buckwheat soba dish was disappointing.  A bit too spicy to enjoy any flavor other then the heat.  As well, the fish items were not flaky as if they were overcooked ahead of time  They were too dry and hard.
The spicy tuna roll was just OK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcmpMjp5UoHo_QRjYCdWmNERqormAsbSttnOaV&fid=0x0:0x3a09689b2e682c89"],"When":"2021-9-13"},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best value from the special rolls - jalape√±o scallop roll (except we subbed scallop for salmon) was my personal fav.

Tempura got great reviews, and the tuna rolls were very high quality fish.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chris chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVZVq54xVb-qHtJL3sWEA0jhVFGeCnG1VBnRMY9--Atcp0OdL2mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible sushi. Very high quality. You can get some very creative and yummy rolls (jalapeno one is a stand out). Or if you're into traditional sushi and sashimi, that's also excellent.

I would come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrT1shalL0SD84Y7KdryRZ5etMg-T0nHjLs4Yw&fid=0x0:0x3a09689b2e682c89"],"When":"2019-8-6"},{"Name":"Amber Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbWjK5kGLigpm8UJEs2OOXvDtYJLhxqiB8qA4CToocDn2UEYju=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Korean pork Don is really good, yet, you probably need more rice for this because the sauce was too much. However, not preferred the chicken karage don because my friend said the sauce is to strong for this dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCxojWZWDcuTOh1We2TIA1fO8ppfsUtUF9FZ6J&fid=0x0:0x3a09689b2e682c89"],"When":"2018-3-1"},{"Name":"Jo-Anne Lodermeier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtPOeJ4LCMgl6Pb7aa1JrjQcuslbDpk7fgJTybJImHlEhldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food:
The food is really good the only thing is the sushi is not the best the rice is quite warm.
Service:
Really good service and nice waiters.
Atmosphere:
Nice view of the ocean.

Update: I have given this place a couple chances and I can say they have improved the temperature of the sushi rice this has became a regular spot for me!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sumomo momomo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw7Gwi4kzW1XMEhCdsoZxIsrJGiwK2GB9UOzMBQX844YMtsDhy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We got take out dinner today and were disappointed at the portion and the quality. Prime rib was ok but the mushroom portion was pretty small. And $16 Caesar salad was such a waste of money. Lettuce was old and not much Parmesan cheese, very unprofessional presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYnSdsR9q2mTHt849RK8nMIMM2RpHvRndndbU9&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Warren Sepass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJE7T3lhPxe7yxNN_i28tWSTxTWNegvO9OS0PjJWwauWZhUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoyed the Peppercorn New York steak with a twice baked potato and it was amazing. Our server Sogol was very attentive and super polite. I highly recommend this location but he warned it was super busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5s5acefudPI6jepxjPmRsIkE6ZH9To3XvsWoH&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Abimbola Bamgbelu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWziRk8qk2ylySnkblP4-ZgJXLkGVU7G9yx8Pc2sslaEczgjXBN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have been to the keg in halifax, montreal and calgary but this one in vancouver was a let down. The rice was wayy too salty. The service was lovely and the ambience was nice. The food was underwhelming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFFfEmzZcUCM52kqQyDTOFhodFXj074qgGD403&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Sandra Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy1lUFtw_zuiqbUdz24zqemK2qXm7x8ZGgzNdi3qENuU0BjgqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hadn‚Äôt been to The Keg in years, but we had a gift card sitting around since early pandemic days. It was my husband‚Äôs birthday, so we thought, ‚Äúlet‚Äôs try happy hour‚Äù.  Even happy hour comes with complimentary bread (fresh baked sour bread) and butter.  The prime rib sandwich and the sliders were fantastic!  They even came with fresh horseradish.  When we asked for the bill, our server asked which dessert did we want. We were a tad confused, and then he asked, ‚Äúisn‚Äôt it his birthday?‚Äù And went on to explain that this too was complimentary on your birthday. Wow! Just Wow!  We left thoroughly impressed, and will go back again. Maybe for my birthday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant boasts a fantastic ambiance with beautifully done decor, and the service is top-notch and highly professional. We opted for the hidden menu prime ribs, a generous 24oz portion priced at $65, which we found to be an outstanding value proposition given the quality and quantity offered. Increasing the sharpness of the beef knife would be preferable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8SiVo39bARXuOtrn9o8BCaLf1hjjWD4VekQXA&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid steak and the appetizers were not bad, this is the first time I‚Äôve had escargot from a western restaurant where they add more flavour than just butter and snail. I was impressed, although not something that I would order again. The steak was cooked nicely and I absolutely loved the double baked potatoes, amazing flavour. However, the seasoning for the Brussels sprouts were definitely over seasoned and I found the creme brulee to be a bit much as well. I enjoyed the ambience of the place and wouldn‚Äôt mind going back here for steak.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhjzIObdhjiabUs8Y-a-g7hd5yvmVRlZnFOXrr&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Mike Towner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeofYR0hWksyecHErsW0nwDmqTRGfkC6SvQf937zNXkENV9eZvWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place to share a romantic dinner with your special lady. Steak and Lobster crab Oscar was amazing! See you there!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfB-SS8uEHUjjQyc24vzWj_YhGooRwdzUThbAm&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs the Keg.  If you aren‚Äôt familiar with the Keg then allow me to explain.  It‚Äôs a steakhouse and they have been doing steakhouse for a long time.  It has modernized over the years but it‚Äôs still a great place to go for a great meal with great service.

Tonight was my wife‚Äôs birthday and she wanted the keg.  Interesting enough,  we had not been to this Keg.  I have been to many.  Oddly North one close to my house.

Tonight was lovely.  The service, the birthday perk of dessert.  All good stuff.  Everything great as usual.  You know what to expect and they never disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBTv11JXeIDQ4snbwXM2OK51x9VP2VT-IW2SuY&fid=0x0:0xb9cf415daa59b874"],"When":"2024-3-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christian C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3FTW2MEPnd45QBDUywUePcZmLbKOrqoUaPROB9P-0r7DHHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sorrento Pizza is the undisputed best pizza on the north shore! The uninformed people giving 1 out of 5 stars don‚Äôt know what a real Italian pizza is all about. This place is worth the visit. Best pizza around!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Saunders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYivrBTf7kQy0IUzS5VNQjq-WA4H3KoWqeU-czJiTLc47J7RXe7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered lasagna and a small pizza. Spent way more than the quality deserves, and the pizza wins for worst pizza I've ever had.
I'd rather have a frozen store bought pizza. Crust looked and tasted like cardboard or came pre-made. Bland flavour.
Lasagne was edible, but quality of ingredients go a long way.
I was excited to try a small family run shop, usually you get a hidden gem. Not the case here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDXXTB6VtpeVC-DBXZs9f-YL25eVVbk0ZEOnm5&fid=0x0:0xdfc69a027aab8194"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Louie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGlJ5_hO52c49AdO7oeJR5HoBjG8-gXKhYD9zHBumjtgZzWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What are all the negative reviews about? Vancouver sucks for pizza and this one of my favourites, along with Viva Sue. It‚Äôs AWESOME!!!

Best Pizza on the north shore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPGHqtEQX2AyLJ-Qm3DEazjHSMnLyl9vWKMPuHPsmIljTGeVlSHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Cardboard crust. Ordered extra cheese and the quantity did not reflect that, in fact there was very little at all. Other toppings marginal as well.
An equivalent to a frozen pizza from the grocery store. Phone manners need improvement, very abrupt.
Disappointing at best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFm5s-t8Qz2DhEPf0oN6c2pG29sErHHhLpjCq0qQsTkwLHd3FL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place used to be amazing, now it‚Äôs over priced and half the quality it use to be. Such a shame.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"wvrealtor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoFXj1AYGyKX2noxwizmgnoCKVCX7aOGjbgBh19AMJyFavqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently ordered from this take-out pizza place for a family gathering, and unfortunately, the experience was far from satisfactory.
First, there seems to be some confusion among reviewers. This establishment is not to be mistaken for 'Casa Mia,' a lovely family-run restaurant known for its dine-in service and wine offerings. In contrast, this is a take-out only venue, you would never eat in.
During the ordering process, I encountered rudeness and unprofessionalism from the owner. When I needed to change the size of a pizza, the response was belittling and condescending, which was more than distressing, especially since it was my birthday. Despite this, I proceeded with the order, prioritizing the needs of my family.
Upon arrival to pick up our order, my husband was initially ignored by the staff, adding to the negative experience.
As for the food, the pizzas were horrible. They lacked flavor and had a cardboard-like texture, making them terrible value for the price of $108.00. Frankly, even frozen pizzas would have been a better option.
Based on this experience, I cannot recommend this establishment. The service was unwelcoming, and the quality of the pizza was subpar. It's unfortunate, as I had hoped to support a local business, but this experience was disheartening." I would not categorize this as a family business. It is just one rude guy who runs a bad takeout pizza joint.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shadi GM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKa5kO--OC242OfLJaNHa2gArrxMUU0DUJhWuJueBLdffSf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza ever, high quality, fresh and delicious üòã highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"vadim zaharoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX37yPJ1RAD9CvKzEe2wzkoeEpAfV_RzJW3WSyVFl4Bdl5OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The owner is very, very rude! If you ask him any questions, his reply is "it's my pizza shop and that's how I do it" or "I'm making the pizza" as they say it's his way or the highway lol no idea how this guy is still in buisness. Oh well, good luck to him! Would not recommend. Pizza quality is poor 2/10. Your better off buying a Safeway pizza and putting in the oven yourself.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wildcat Norm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjHvRttDB-qla4ZKZpL_QE0A4zvLqeg4I1Z22SUgL_d1Rsng0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I understand that many restaurant people criticize me for not giving out higher ratings. However, I believe that a 3-star rating is an excellent one. For me, it‚Äôs all about the product as described. The food was delicious, considering we only ordered two dishes. The price was very reasonable. The restaurant was also clean. However, I must mention that finding parking spaces can be a challenge. If you are in west Vancouver and looking for a quick bite, I recommend the spicy cumin noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMQu0M5kE4Bq0-ejQ_AXjnGVOLXwrOc1RZWmoC&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Fernanda Oliveira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyvBIhtZmW9ac0gT3td2iciWTXFgGFr_ccFHigwga3oSyGco-Ziw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lao Cai Chinese Cuisine is an exceptional choice for those seeking a truly authentic Chinese dining experience. Their hand-made dumplings and noodles are a real highlight, crafted with such care that you can immediately taste the difference. The freshness and texture of the pasta and dumplings are second to none.

Also, I learned from the staff that they source their spices directly from China to ensure the food preserves its traditional flavors. So, if you're looking for authentic Chinese cuisine, particularly hand-made dumplings and noodles with genuine flavors, Lao Cai is a must-visit. Highly recommended! :D","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpNWNOXMPWdObTDVPE2iF2IzqNwyMKd-1EuDxc&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Natalia Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz3ALcK1qXNk7kQdkJuUfDPQnF7URfGwKYuenHJIz3_kf_9WwwOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Chinese restaurants in Vancouver! We had a variety of dishes and the quality of the food was very high. My favorite dish was the dumplings which they make everyday from scratch and the hot-oil noodles! The cucumber salad and the sweet and sour pork ribs also delish. Truly one of the best dinning experiences, hard to pick just one dish :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOin0wqtyco6zwCVnhczodc8-Y11hQTefo8l_Py&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Vanfoodiepharmily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9aazSJPHP80D-tLZSk-Df0Z1flschyoYnMote5wNghG4jX8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard great reviews about this place so checked it out. The place was nice and clean and the service was so so friendly and they truly cared about their customers. Highly recommend their dumplings and if you love them as much as we did, you can buy some frozen ones as well (what we ended up doing). Their noodles were nice and chewy. Will definitely go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3OzqR-N_f09HG7eu6KNakdBn-JelMlcPgS5pK&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Pedro Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyexk44UqCkq2TvK0-ZXmNM_PjNKZjoVzPIjQ4wQRsh8xqEo3rqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vancouver offers plenty of East Asian dining options, but this restaurant is truly something special. With parking available, it's easily accessible for those living in West Vancouver, North Vancouver, and downtown. The moment I walked in, the decor and cozy atmosphere made me feel as if I had been transported straight to China.

The food is authentically prepared, a refreshing change from the typical "NYC Chinese food" you might be used to. Our server was polite and took the time to explain each dish, the menu options, and even shared stories about the regions near Tibet where they source their unique spices. The handmade pasta was thick and flavorful‚Äînothing like the ones you'd find in a supermarket.

One of my favorite dishes was the "bread with shredded pork" (see the pic). Sorry for not remembering the exact name, but it was absolutely delicious! Even the washrooms were clean, which is always a plus in my book.

My only complaint is that it's a bit far from Richmond (the Asian hub in vancouver metropolitan region). However, I heard they're planning to open a new location there soon, which is great news.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX2H8Zk34VG8V79WvAOrmHR7YfiOTaQa8KzAON&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Joel McVeagh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTOxu6KPUxU7Go381qSMFZI9O_WF59jTEdoG6X8YWIkXkr68WY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I LOVE coming here, any time we are visiting or driving through West Vancouver we make sure to stop.

The noodles and dumplings are housemade and taste so fresh and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhgS2k3fHw4uPdYTqCYpgQG1j5-tnGKk0f_oRH&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Carson Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWibIGHh7y57v-LA0c2oUrzlyRniFoRFe7-sgWgaFC70WqnoLCO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place blew my mind. It is insanely good! I'm pescatarian so my options were very limited but their veggie options were solid. I tried the veggie dumplings and the spicy and oily hand cut noodles....everything was an ace! Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1fA4nRZ9jEGsHW1xatMmJLD158Z6liSEWgNy4&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Miyan Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaSyahAJv2RCq9IMjvh5fJCw1y3bYfDRlkOGV462A1fBs8ehNV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very authentic Chinese cousins from northern China. We loved the noodles and dumplings. People are nice and welcoming. For sure will come back again with friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqKZXAw-R3SvoHztAP9XPeqSoQLYcB4sXKpBHD&fid=0x0:0x9e9fc594e3a8ccfc"],"When":"2024-7-10"}]
