user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot quickly earned its place as our weekly coffee break stop whenever we are driving through West Van. With its great atmosphere, stunning design both inside and out, and consistently excellent coffee, it‚Äôs hard to ask for more. We have yet to sit down for a proper meal, but the dishes coming out of their kitchen look absolutely phenomenal. Needless to say, it‚Äôs a must-visit and definitely recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGviRkMZeE9-_T3baMxfNAiap6ye_ptEx6uEgZ&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Milad Firouzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzrgrIGNGbel6o9MR69Ok-V4had6hrv3OGfRkMbkDP6QkTT80y2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Isetta Cafe and Bistro offers a charming atmosphere and serves one of the best lattes I've ever had‚Äîrich, creamy, and absolutely delicious. However, the food left much to be desired. We ordered two egg bennies, which, while tasty, were underwhelming for the price. The dish consisted of just an English muffin, egg, tomato, and avocado‚Äîsimple ingredients that didn‚Äôt justify the cost. Adding something like bacon or other extras would elevate the dish. The side potatoes were a disappointment; they tasted like they were fried in overused, burnt oil. Overall, it‚Äôs a mixed experience: fantastic coffee but average food quality. I‚Äôd give it 3.5 out of 5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu1yf9dlYYhQR0kDpLV2kv2vz36S3XOSUpUZsG&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"VancouverSocialButterfly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBCVP-U-AXB-dgYbT8glgtZ0z1kJ6f8L9MML9S8eqHKz9L4e4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of enjoying a breakfast sandwich at Isetta Cafe Bistro, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations. The sandwich was perfectly balanced, with incredibly fresh ingredients. The bacon was crispy, adding just the right amount of savory crunch to every bite. The greens were vibrant and fresh, complementing the rich flavors beautifully.

The ambience of the cafe is warm and inviting, with a calm, relaxed atmosphere that makes it a perfect spot for a morning meal. To top it off, the staff was professional, friendly, and attentive, making the experience even more enjoyable. Overall, Isetta Cafe Bistro is a fantastic place to start your day with great food and a welcoming environment. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-VSQZjntcCy8ILJWvgRTKU-qz3iyVUU_3h7_u&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcWvY2Pd19Eeci2K4O3hkkV0s9bHnGUU-wE3SepzT8O_esP-Xj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great hidden spot in West Vancouver.
The Cafe has such a nice vibe, it‚Äôs always lively, the food is always great and service is friendly and consistent.
The interior is well designed with its mid century charm and outdoor/indoor seating.
You can tell they get a lot of regulars because it‚Äôs situated right on marine drive and it‚Äôs a great spot for cyclists to stop in for a quick drink/bite.

The breakfast sandwich might one of the best out there. We absolutely LOVE it and highly recommend it.
We‚Äôve tried a few other items on the menu and it never disappoints.
Another delicious one is their grilled cheese and tomato soup (come hungry because the grilled cheese is huge).

Overall we highly recommend this spot!
It‚Äôs a must!! ‚òïÔ∏è

And if you‚Äôre into collector cars there‚Äôs a garage next door with some pretty fun vehicles! It‚Äôs rarely open but it‚Äôs nice to just look in the window.

Oh! And another bonus is for the summer months they have a gelato stand outside now and it‚Äôs amazing!! A treat for sure!

5/5
‚òïÔ∏è‚òïÔ∏è‚òïÔ∏è‚òïÔ∏è‚òïÔ∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVd_pB63E1j4jHAB51bt6R0fkIFGkoJ3OegZMU&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"A C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeCAQevJx-s6lSWzQxLUWMO0TVoaPPt5f0MqXZfCKbsgVeeIk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place is nice, a decent amount of indoor and outdoor seating. There's two separate buildings, one that serves as the cafe and the other as a museum with guided tours.

The latte I had was not good. I ordered a caramel latte, which didn't have a hint of caramel in it, smell or taste, and the whole drink was sour. I don't know if the espresso was overextracted or if the milk had gone bad. Probably the espresso.

My friend ordered a flat white and had the same experience as me, but stronger.

The food was fine for its price, but the portions seem a bit small. Overall it was adequate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMknGAJf74hIkuhgDHhVa9fsOHmdDgZceW6MvI&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"V D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXTyl-R6NJcyrgjR7_vBed8eYvsa2XbmRpBt6p_Rp4nZHddA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Isetta Cafe Bistro offers an average dining experience. The food standard is okay, but the service is notably slow‚ÄîI waited 25 minutes for the Isetta burger. Additionally, it's on the pricey side, which might not justify the overall experience. While the ambiance is pleasant, the highlight for me was seeing the Isetta model, which added a unique touch to the visit. I‚Äôm a big fan of Isetta model and was very excited to be there. However, improvements in service speed and food quality are needed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTx2hn6gupCTQQnss4VPgViTfZIISrij4uVV2R&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Heather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXitvChWSSECIfO0UbURQSNPEkc0IUeBVTGNO4Pgc4E27sDfkk6ow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been a few times now and safe to say this will be a spot I‚Äôll bring for friends who visit from out of town. They really nailed the look in there. I love that it‚Äôs a little out of the way .. although despite it being out of the way it can get super busy.
They have some gluten free options - I love when they have the gluten free cookie! I was able to have the Benedict gluten free with a GF burger bun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4vMWtVfQocj8CCNqTJDkFTYsu9xHPUTHjYVHk&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Isetta Cafe in West Van and had a delightful experience. The ambiance of the cafe is cozy and inviting, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal. The highlight of my visit was definitely the grilled cheese sandwich, which was wonderfully cheesy and satisfying. The combination of perfectly melted cheese and toasted bread was simply delightful.

However, I must mention that the linguini vongole I ordered had a bit too much garlic for my taste. While I appreciate bold flavors, the garlic slightly overwhelmed the dish. Nonetheless, I must commend the cafe for using fresh ingredients and putting effort into their pasta dishes.

The service at Isetta Cafe was prompt and friendly, enhancing the overall dining experience. The staff was attentive and accommodating, making sure I had a pleasant time.

In terms of ambiance, Isetta Cafe has created a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere. The interior is tastefully decorated, providing a relaxed and cozy environment to enjoy your meal. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a leisurely lunch, this cafe is a nice spot to unwind.

Overall, I would recommend Isetta Cafe for its delicious grilled cheese sandwich and friendly service. Just be mindful of the garlic intensity in certain dishes. I will definitely be returning to try more items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW1eBm3ixW5QPo_g26QJLr3_AjK6z8igELOEny&fid=0x0:0x11b20807b29ee36f"],"When":"2024-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jess cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW61jux6VeXb22wP_Q69cy-q8ajx-92HgzF2pNEmhrQlrDyUy7N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My best pick was the free peanuts. I didn‚Äôt like the fries that soaked in peanut oil and hamburger had not much good beef flavour. I am not sure if I want to come back for burgers here. However, I was impressed the servers were quick and keep the store clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNARyKU-Emzs2VdBRrjFSWf9ukBeulw0ZlOXmK1&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Vince C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7rdvicqg2cC0r2JZ88o-9VEbfffVsLfbQQoXym02s6iusLNT2DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was craving a good beefy burger after a hike and figured 5 Guys would hit the spot. I ordered the bacon cheeseburger. I get that price of supplies and labour have gone up but I feel like the quality of the burger and flavours this time weren't worth the price tag of almost $15. (And this is without fries!)

It wasn't bad per se but it wasn't fantastic either. It was just okay. It seemed to lack fresh flavours and you can see from the photo there's no lettuce. The flavours of their mayo sauce and fried onions with the bacon and cheese all kind of blended together and lacked any contrast. The buns weren't anything special either. Even if they didn't add any fresh ingredients like shredded cabbage or carrot, what would've helped is if they charred the beef patties a bit and properly caramelize the onions to give the burger a more diverse flavour profile.

Previous visits, I don't think I was this disappointed. I think I'll go elsewhere the next time I crave a burger, you don't get a whole lot of value here for your money anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPshOMb0vR0Y8UWWcns6OSPNfrPWGO2f8E4oe5g&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Scott Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqszz3Ljse-x4B5fzMk5AEAHCU8CBTkRxMEZLJtD02fVmXsiwidA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fries are as good as the burgers! Simple, fresh, delious. Definitely hits the spot if you are craving for burgers. Nothing fancy, just plain goodness. Peanuts are always free, and remember the regular comes in 2 beef stack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn-7YaSok4J7zuARN5xocYyICjTw3rRQO4oyfr&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I haven't had here in a while, and this time I found the beef was slightly overcooked compared to my previous visits. However, the vegetables and sauces were fresh and tasty as usual. I hope the beef can go back to its usual juicy quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4nkH-7ZLb7xzKt4c9upm1PsEX8eaW60XeNG-E&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"With not being familiar with the mall, it was difficult to locate Five Guys as it was outside the mall by the parking lot. Burger was delicious was usual - all the way with jalape√±o. Loved that they still had plastic straws instead of the paper straws used by other fast food establishments. Large fries was able to fill all three adults up. Loved that they had refillable ketchup. Washroom was only single stall so it took a while to wash hands.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP08rhJrfoIYluJ1DFh3peQOEBlpyXQa0-0CRTL&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Wun Tun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRX8y0CFiE6nMEK8WbNNliTbzoWixhnMbLndMuv6xykpVccF8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying this place.  I wasn't expecting double patties on my bacon burger.   It was a mouthful of juicy goodness. The cajun fries were just the right amount of zesty heat.  Wished there was more seating for larger groups.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Typical fast food burgers and fries are variable in quality, depending on how much time has passed since cooking and assembly. Five guys solves that issue by cooking to order, a process that takes seven or eight minutes. Because their burgers and hot dogs are not prepared before a customer orders, you can add anything from a long list of toppings and condiments. Suit yourself. That's a key. My burger had two thin meat patties lightly crusted on the exterior but still juicy. One "small" order of fries was hot, crisp and well seasoned. My only complaint was the serving size. It went beyond generous to excessive. Of course, we wouldn't want to eat in a restaurant that is not well maintained and staffed by people who seem happy to be there. On my May 2022 visit to the Park Royal store, housekeeping was in perfect order and the staff was friendly and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMXR6QLFj4X3VZv51FJM_zSw6fzzwoMbUcb6gg&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2022-5-6"},{"Name":"Justin P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHylp2ZUwAe8GQzpXv3X57qq7fheRuk9vvTbhwgQPiEDR2zu0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's a lot going right here. It could be a lot worse. The lettuce was crisp. The burger was yummy. We got two patties which was cool. The Cajun frys really had a good deep fried crunch to them. I felt like I was in rural America. You walk in and you think what type of food could this place possibly provide? Well it's exactly what you thought. Nice and greasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlLCZ5nFxXs1vlYfbxo3G8UfOu87ZZj4iyfIVQ&fid=0x0:0xb4d0b76dd25af09"],"When":"2024-3-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Refreshing and quick.  Can fast food be nutritious?  Well Tractor does just that.  Great salads with fresh ingredients like beats or super grains like farro make for some delicious eats.  Want something more traditional what about soup and a sandwich. Make that an avocado and grilled chicken sandwich. Yum Yum","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6rhjbHTO_Xa00MOPrJtD0trhdf-zZBE6neUtH&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stumbled upon this spot for a light lunch. It was also dark from the exterior, so we were not sure it was open. Once inside, we were greeted by the server behind the counter. He explained the soup choices, and we picked our lunch. I had the avo and chicken sandwich and my lunch companion the 1/2 avo and chicken sandwich and the cup of lentil soup. I did find the sandwich a little strong on the lemon, but otherwise, it was a good choice. My only suggestion is the staff shouldn't be shouting expletives in the kitchen. All in all, though, I would go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaYt9fXj2QU6paaT1eH7PEphh1cLu4xFblirp_&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a tiresome shopping experience at Park Royal I wanted a good, light, healthy and filling lunch, and that's exactly what this place delivered.

The space is large, bright, clean and airy with great customer service and plenty of lovely healthy options right in front of you served with all health precautions taken on counters that were literally sparkling...Yes, I pay attention to that kind stuff....kind of a neat freak.

The Nourish Bowl with the Salmon was super satisfying with each ingredient not only plenty but fresh and delicious. Post Pandemic you have to be careful to get what you pay for.....you'd be surprised how many businesses cut corners to make an extra buck at the customer's expense (literally)...this place was not like that. You get what you pay for. ( see pic.)

The Everyday Bowl with chicken was awesome. I was pleasantly surprised that the chicken was hot and it contrasted perfectly with the cold ingredients of the salad. The only food I don't like to eat cold is chicken. Loved this one too. They also gave us a side of hot sauce which I loved, not sure what it was but it was very tasty (see pic.)

Oh, I'll return when I'm in Park Royal again. For sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCURq2eG83YdfAMzGSuY6gXO8yudPC9lUo40Ou&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2023-7-18"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I honestly loved the salad here, even if the avocado was a little bit over ripe. The price was very fair, and the employees were friendly. The restaurant is spacious and well-designed. I would recommend trying this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdRsm3IjglLECLwip_XEPsX87FfwYPIW-zCvMX&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time eating in tractor and everything was so delicious!, the place is clean and has great vibe, clean washrooms and the staff is patient and friendly, all the salads and soups look amazing, we ordered 2 soups+half sandwich combo and one small/side salad, we really enjoyed it, the salad was supremeee!!!, we also ordered 2 drinks also soo fresh!.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG7P-Qv1npRBUjIf2rgIrNOe6FSsyO-P_PKZJn&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Elese Duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnhcWZsZ7pJ5o6Gn7jS4n-cosYN6X3tgIpdNmHEVMLqZttivw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the southwest wrap on Uber eats - I couldn‚Äôt see the wrap beforehand but based off of the photo it looked to be a nice, hearty, filling breakfast. Boy was I wrong. Definition of false advertising. The size of this wrap was criminal. I think a McDonald‚Äôs kids wrap is double the size. It was missing half of the ingredients due to the transparent amount of filling it had. Grill a tortilla in the shape of a wrap and there you go. No need to order from here, make it yourself at home! It was essentially just a tortilla with a seasoning of egg and the tortilla didn‚Äôt even taste good. This should be a crime.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvM_Oo4Vb-vNqrp5JU3SymEPA2OGOvcwGcZjZFNIW4RbbZlouC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is terrible. Got the original chicken sandwich and a soup. Ten minutes later, soup arrived luke warm at best. Sandwich had little bits of chicken in it and was missing the pear, pickled red onion and greens. When I talked to the staff, he said everything was in the sandwich and I pointed out it clearly was missing the other four crucial ingredients. He took it back and added a few pieces of greens and some sauce. Barely mumbled any apology. I didn‚Äôt bother to take it back again even though it was still missing pear and picked red onion. Staff don‚Äôt even know their own menu. Definitely not worth $18.

UPDATE: I did reach out to the general manager afterwards and they were apologetic / kind so I do have to give them kudos for the great customer service at a management level!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwfuf0Rehp4PGGV4KHYrI-6SStkkoV8eNL9OOU&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Nastaran Kholasehzade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7L7U_vFAY8ttoA8cxyHheYI9klyyhIxYEK-OuTUxqH_awIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I build my own bowl with one of their employees. She was soo nice and helpful and made this amazing tasting bowl. I love, definitely going back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEB1ggnnOxGTp6T5E4zXxBYpdqn1lJbFW0HGkr&fid=0x0:0xd78e9689f657c84"],"When":"2024-1-29"}]

üç≤ üçú üçµ üç≤ üçú üçµ üç≤ üçú üçµ üç≤ üçú üçµ üç≤ üçú","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6kBUVvUUfUVA1Qw3O0FUv2aNNymwJQALVqAy0&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi Katsu in West Vancouver is an absolute gem! The dynamite roll is hands down the best I've had in years - the quality is excellent, and the presentation is fantastic. The service is also very attentive, making for a delightful dining experience.

I did notice a difference in the sashimi presentation during my visits; on my first visit, it was beautifully arranged in a floral design, which I absolutely loved. On my next visit, it was served in plain pieces, which was a bit of a letdown since the floral presentation really stood out.

One area that could use a bit more TLC is the washrooms, as I noticed they were storing cleaning products and had some dust on the surfaces. Despite this, the overall experience was wonderful, and I highly recommend Sushi Katsu for anyone craving delicious sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSFlZeTuue88qqMT17IQn3KCg_WMwKNbPbPt6z&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Katie Row","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVakRD7-YTX9v4nLa190IIXUqo3QKzcxnppm1cmR0gG-6oira3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was 5/5, 10/10. My server was very friendly but not overly so, clearly knows her job well and the service was lovely. Very professional and sweet. Food was exceptional too - very fresh tasting and delicious :) will definitely tell friends about this one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP52wYYJmYa87M5phHbL_01RRmQH78xutSkaQCb&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"David Kuo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAruHP1-703l6qTA3mupubqXpfjiV5Yr4CWbmBLJnKtZoCjfWF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this charming Japanese restaurant located near Ambleside Beach, and it was an outstanding experience. The combination of exquisite cuisine and a picturesque setting made for an unforgettable meal.

From the moment we walked in, the staffs were warm and welcoming, creating an inviting atmosphere and vibe that had given a heartwarming start to our dining experience.

The menu was diverse and offered a wide array of authentic Japanese dishes. Each dish was expertly prepared and beautifully presented. The sushi was incredibly fresh, with melt-in-your-mouth quality, and the Katsu Don was rich and flavorful, a perfect comfort dish for people that are craving for Japanese Donburi.

What truly set Sushi Katsu apart was the impeccable service. The staffs were very attentive, knowledgeable, and eager to offer recommendations. They made sure every aspect of our dining experience was perfect, from start to finish.

Dining at this restaurant as a delightful experience that I would highly recommend to anyone visiting the Ambleside Beach area. Whether you're looking for a casual meal or a special dining experience, this restaurant offers the best of Japanese cuisine in a stunning location. I can't wait to return to this restaurant the next time we visit Ambleside again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb4glF-t6ovRITBTdYBC9mV36Dc_XA_SwTF_qt&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Zaria Farik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwGJKvpIVthVTc_YuK-dry0HelVB7PESDwFeMbCro8LZGFJmRj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love the food here, they moved from lonsdale to west Vancouver! Highly recommend Katsu sushi. They are friendly and always serve the most delicious meals","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa-Q1fGGnw8oo_aimie-0NGjGjwZ3aRXqdcaK7&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Hs7qiSK38VKFLzB4oxFZADelOZgMTmNWBMSzC5-uoUAQr4VL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good place to have sushi at ambleside! Great location, short walk from the beach. Great food, we had Assorted sashimi , four different kinds of aburi sushi, tempura and seafood salad. Food is fresh with great presentation. Great service, and free parking around. Hot Sake is probably the best priced with not much mark up. We will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvr8bCfdfb5RIm76Teq77uu6iQvg-ExIJssC0c&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Patrik Lindr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC365CJCztcaNO1us-2F5kpHyABm2Yj6bRHtY6kP6kKuMMgYiN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some serious competition in Ambleside for Sushi Katsu. For some reason the reviews were a little bit lower than other places, and maybe that's why it took me a couple of years to try. I wish I did earlier. Really good quality, nice service. I had a basic maki combo, it was fresh and delicious. Great value as well. Reusable stainless chopsticks - I thought that was a nice point. Will definitely come again, thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyBb_ARB3wsmMLGAX2cPXtjQLpavhhFg3n0J50&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered some take out since you can‚Äôt eat indoors at the moment. Haven‚Äôt been here before but was very happy with what we ordered. The value for portion size was great. The rolls were on the touch smaller side but for the price I think it was worth it. I might have gone 4.5 stars if allowed since there was a touch too much batter on the tempura but not worth going to 4 stars. Everything tasted delicious and was quite fast for the amount we ordered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcb9uv_npDqYJ6ANiS67LSPvl-j7qPxL1B9zxO&fid=0x0:0x5e3851937dca6b90"],"When":"2021-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gil Yaron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXypMqPMOIpcIgFyvrRQTjS4-2LVaq3pXL5J_q63oJegf3Oc83D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Earlier this evening, I went to get a Burrito at the Park Royal location. What I experienced was disturbing and probably in violation of health and safety standards.

The entire seating area was filthy. There wasn't one seating area that wasn't dirty with the food from previous customers or an area of the floor that wasn't covered with litter or liquid. I've attached some pics to show what I mean, but it doesn't convey the state of your restaurant. Incidentally, the same was the case for the prep area.

When I asked the staff to clean a table, they seemed confused at first. Then one of the women finally went to the side and took a dirty cloth out of a bucket and came over and wiped one table for me without using any cleaning agent. She left every other table dirty.

Then one of your male staff (he is in one of the pictures) came back in with another male colleague and they went to wash their hands. The guy literally took a few drops of water on his fingers, shook his hand and then proceeded to go to work touching food. Later, he was standing by the cash picking his teeth with his fingers.

It wasn't so long ago that restaurants were bending over backwards to keep their locations sparkling clean because of COVID. Please take steps to implement frequent cleaning protocols in your restaurant. It isn't like staff don't have time. There were 5 staff standing around that could have easily taken a few minutes to wipe down the tables and chairs with a cleaning agent, pick up garbage and sweep the floors.

Incidentally, the burrito was cold, so not much to say for the food either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvU8C-wwP0ZvyIE5V5jfqN2ULUB3P1FVFDD6VF&fid=0x0:0xc5b0abb112d4e477"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Gagandeep Uppal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW-KFilY4MzRYsjqlFmsRdCYxENNjInGnFlFIZDtV91hxduzc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered catering for 35 people and had the worst experience. They were 15 minutes late for the scheduled pickup time. Started making it when I got there. Did not give us any bowls or utensils. They packed everything in little bowls so we still had to use our large dishes at home. All the sauces were packed in paper boxes and the paper was disintegrating into them. All in all it was awful and ruined my mom‚Äôs 50th birthday party.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXWAE5l_DLOGvRZ1dWSTOzm_-nIgm0nSXD5QcI&fid=0x0:0xc5b0abb112d4e477"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Kamyar Filsoofi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvpxZhv0Qty0gCQ_OFHEGVxQpyrwLP88hIAba3wCzSvvYQyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had no idea what I was eating and completely lost my appetite , sadly all 3 tacos I ordered ended up in Garbage, $20 of un appetizing

and tasteless food gone to waste,
food price are  the same as Cantina Norte or Las Margaritas which are the best rated Mexican restaurants in Vancouver,

This is Total disgrace to Mexican food and culture. I can‚Äôt even rate  quality of food or service because it was beyond disgusting.

Your employee packed my three tacos so  tightly together in a aluminum foil so  when I opened the package, all the tacos were so  stuck and smashed together that I couldn‚Äôt separate them or even tell which taco is which?

I recommend to hire real Mexican staff who would care and have respect for  their own food and culture  or at least train your staff and    teach them how to pack  food properly  in a ‚Äúbox ‚Äú not in aluminum foil,
so it doesn‚Äôt end up in garbage,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7oE8cWPZ3FBodycU5pebL03ZIjwsGILtAt-A-&fid=0x0:0xc5b0abb112d4e477"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Alex Maciel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVutO2jLBYvkVY8Jja-EfZLUDSL7WwXCzuk-8oxktJqaFSUD3lEfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, great attention, portions as they should, great flavour, (the green sauce is out of this world) veggie burrito is outstanding! great place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs9rUbNl_vg9k7HbU76II214_DZcJEKoVCFEo-&fid=0x0:0xc5b0abb112d4e477"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Simrat kaur Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPjyK3sF1wiQeu_8WRdX9yZXxmu_NthV-Rc0amAOQDCgwPvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was our first time visiting the restaurant, and unfortunately, it was a very disappointing experience. Instead of focusing on customers, the staff seemed more involved in discussions about their shifts. There was an argument‚Äîpossibly between the manager and staff‚Äîthat made the employees visibly frustrated, hyper, and anxious.

Apart from that, I want to acknowledge the turban gentleman and the girl who served us. They were extremely polite, guided us well, and tried to make our experience better. We truly appreciate their efforts.

However, the cashier was a completely different story. She was rude and even sarcastic when we asked for help with the menu. To make things worse, she charged us for sauces and drinks we never ordered. When we brought this up, instead of resolving the issue calmly, she became aggressive and accused us instead. Her attitude was unacceptable, and it left us with a bad impression.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"bryan roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9mk22VKHMji_o0-UcDoDloJrlhBJAOqyUMUlCRXkFCWvI2VPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My daughter and I had a steak burrito . The steak didn‚Äôt look nearly as good at the first time I ate there . So that quality has gone down.
Everyone was good until we got to pay them there was confusion over the 2 burritos . One had hot sauce and one had Guacamole. The cashier wrote something on one . I couldn‚Äôt understand her and she was visibly annoyed . So I took the pen and asked her what one was the hot one and wrote hot one it .
She should chose another career .
The food was average and as good as any other taco chain restaurants. There is nothing special about chipotle. Mediocre.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nik M (Denudation)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4_bQIrR1Ib_rcRvMgcDgFhFq9ZQP5fnhkbQFSYsJEg4sXcoY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Feels wonderful paying 100% ($17) for a chicken bowl when you receive 70% of the meal. Happens quite often at this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGUsckww8rOpzPQGGh8FX25wUHHnkK6-Xzl7W_&fid=0x0:0xc5b0abb112d4e477"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Kajal Suthar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZzH4Ys__CRfDLaQN4ZdiUU85Jnj-pGuB5yQ3AAi83-4Dh_r_ieA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited chipotle with my friends and I would say it's worthy!! We had sophritas bowl and it was so delicious. I loved it and the crunchy chips wow!! Although there were so many people standing in the line, they were serving food, with a smile, politely and honestly when I asked them for extra salsa and sour cream they did! Gave me extra... It was feeling like homemade food... Clean area and soft music. I would love to go there again..","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqDNkZjTelTdDBNtJIMRW98yeapyjleZ4lZehyDBy9owkIfTE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited for a birthday party. We were sat a little late but they kept us updated and checked on us while we waited for our seats.

Staff are really nice. The food was delicious, and the drinks were very well made.

This is a place I can easily recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH70tAw_O9qRm7IH7N8lcD5ghi9Mh6GrFECF0s&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Connie Mera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5Z1YNNhQOHeE0sr9LRXXPkpTmbjDLI_8kK723H_THXKuNXqR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Make a reservation! Friday evening was easy going at our 5pm reservation but it got really busy by the time we left at 7pm.
The cookery was excellent. We especially loved the the lamb ragu rigatoni and the mushroom pizza. I think the price reflects the value, quality, and the beautiful view of Ambleside.
Excellent service. Food took some time to come out the kitchen but for a Friday evening, the kitchen crew delivered splendidly. We will be back to try the hanger steak next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeDYAekwv4i-Qy8JlYZWf0zNKc-nZXjBkUjzPe&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is incredibly friendly and cool, with speakeasy sort of vibes. The signature drinks are well done with a great bartender at the helm.

The service was great overall, and very accommodating, from hostess to waitress and everyone in between.

Loved the vibes overall and the freshly made pasta was al dente and flame grilled pizza was tasty with great ingredients!

Thoroughly recommend to anyone venturing their way through the Ambelside/Park Royal area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwzPT5bG7E41x3_f2TmN21qRzcXWDUJ2HomqD-&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Tom√°≈° Majzel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0c1meaP8znCBxg92-DIMp7hYgBF_f6vvxn6HkYi1YKTXoGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celebrated my Dad‚Äôs big birthday there. I must say that food was very delicious and they were nice to accommodate company of 6 incl newborn in stroller. Highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOstsDieUaH3z-p7NqzeEy8E-Qsrd0O68pWJ7Tw&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update July 2024: Great service, good selection of drinks. Focaccia was fabulous - the best ever (and I've had a LOT). Tortelli was delish and so was tagliatelle. Excellent evening.
July 2023: Nice new addition to West Van. The interior is small but they've done a great job of creating more intimate dining spaces. Cacio e pepe was nicely done, but the sausage pizza was the star - amazing flavours! Bit frustrated that their taps hadn't worked for days yet they just had 1 canned beer on offer. Our server could have used some more training. Surprised that there were no meat pastas? Will give it another go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHZGPrR8LVMio_aCjKJADYGVw5Xy7_sqbECBMa&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Riaz Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_QmXTgTB8up2msHFcCZ5zb634UpyF_8pKiLAJlZANC3nUr_DS2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall decent experience but for the price point you are not getting a 5/5 unless you keep it simple and get pizzas.

The featured pasta was described as a saucey halibut in rigatoni and it was halibut chars with mustard on rigatoni. I did mention this to the service team that they should be more precise with the feature description and instead I was told it was a southern Italian dish and it‚Äôs given history. Feature sheets are great for restaurants to be creative to try new things so it is a great tool but say what what it is exactly. Tell people there is mustard. That‚Äôs a lot of mustard and it was the most expensive item on our bill.

Tried it once, might be back for the pizzas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_-fopMcPY0D5bwd3qju4AtL52NESUiVm2dzUi&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Peter Nieforth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFYmOXJ8rGzzp0jmovSkI_rGcSmBvoAf5ws5UTBWNMEQBysRSf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow finally got into Fred's...finally summer hours have kicked in and the kitchen closes at 10 pm! Thank you on behalf of all the late dinner eaters. Cocktails, top shelf, Food, again, top shelf, Service, also friendly and top notch. No wonder this new edition to West Vancouver is already 5 stars here on Google. Super impressed and can't wait to try everything on the menu. Apologies for not taking photos when the dishes first arrived. The Charred Cabbage is a 5 star winner. Thanks to the staff and crew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl7d3cSoRauqCGbkBvZ6QEwHEy69f625tuqt3t&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"Jinho Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyv1LleGxQXEON6BEuMXv5SO6EPFJoVr3x-7dnj-5FjsjakjNEQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"According to their menu, my Sausage pizza has "Fresh" basil, housemade sausage but in clumps so that you can only get 2 bites of the pizza actually with the sausage. Grana padano no where to be tasted . Had 5 olives buried deep and loads of bell peppers so I would call it more a Bell Pepper pizza than anything. And i am not even going to comment on their Mushroom pizza I ordered together.

I have been going to Fred's and getting pizzas since they opened amidst the pandemic and it was probably the best pizza place in Wvan. But now the quality and the taste has gone down as their service and ambience was the focus.

Don't think I'll ever reorder from here after failing me and my family for 3 times in a row.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX-Dj9AeaetXOCbgpuH--NKA4btYOpo4Rd9rWE&fid=0x0:0xfbeed74e969f0fa8"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Zubu at Park Royal and had a pleasant experience. The ramen was fantastic, with rich and flavorful broth options that catered to different tastes. I particularly enjoyed the Tonkotsu Shiro and the Spicy Vegan Ramen. The noodles were cooked to perfection, and the toppings were fresh and generous.
The atmosphere of the restaurant was inviting and modern, making it a great spot for a casual meal. However, the service was just okay. While the staff were friendly, they seemed a bit overwhelmed, which led to some delays in taking orders and bringing out the food.
Overall, Zubu at Park Royal is a solid choice for ramen lovers. The food quality is excellent, and with a bit of improvement in service efficiency, it could easily become a top dining destination in West Vancouver. I‚Äôll definitely be back to try more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo7WcnYdGQEfSZKaACmQRLZYLPA7Iwf2wzuRL7&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Rebecca Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXINu9_Z4eprUtdsP5cG8WffhMHEVpRJHo4TgiA5TXNfFUvuBY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ramen was decent. There were more choices for appetizers than ramen. Service was ok, felt rushed. The sign up bonus temaki was delicious though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6ILmeEWcjSdNi0C8Hf4xPrQMifUFZqRt3Tcvm&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Amir Safarkhah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD5LVG68j65aOfawHnN2abdd4A8PbpFpbHqeepwzmw8hoQ_uKe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My kids loves this restaurant, especially creamy chicken Ramen. However beside great foods, the best part is the fast and excellent service you receive here. It only takes less than 5 minutes to sit you in and 5-10 more minutes to prepare and bring your food.
Tonight there was a lineup and at least 3-4 parties waiting outside.
So go, highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM69ioelimqbvQ6vx70e_h4ZSREjadS39-nNMRE&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Ruby Esmundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9WnUbdR0sy9PRxptKaUyLmTPRH3OvB996GbWqawCIVyva1Vt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff are nice. The ambiance and place is family friendly. Foods are on a higher price range. The food is really great! Ramen tastes delicious! We loved it! The kids meal also has the mochi for dessert. There is a lot of parking spaces as it is located in Park Royal Mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmKjqz3rkjQW-zoyPFJ8myuNDtI5h7Ht__h6p_&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Roksolana Prudyus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXffb6czBrN9CaBY1c9PWaw4vOAuThKRuhI_x-7hqJxi4nz-5Jy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zubu Ramen is my go-to spot when I‚Äôm craving comfort in a bowl. Their creamy chicken ramen is absolutely fantastic‚Äîrich, flavorful, and so tender. It‚Äôs that perfect blend of savory and creamy that hits the spot every time. I also love that they offer two sizes for their ramen, which is so convenient. Sometimes, a small bowl is all you need!

Plus, their kids‚Äô meal is a lifesaver‚Äîconvenient, fun, and perfect for little ones. Zubu truly understands how to make a meal enjoyable for everyone. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOae7Ywe8NWKzyqb_dUz6VhKabcELLuT24TH74O&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Gregoz Gawronski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoJS2_7IvhBePjiBKVqiCMLqu4rz7CkeR7sq8PP3XwGtIcGpaQjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Let me tell you, this is the best ramen shop on the North Shore in Vancouver. The food was fantastic‚Äîtasty, abundant, and more choices on the menu if ramen isn‚Äôt your thing. We went specifically for ramen because, surprise, it got cold outside on Father‚Äôs Day. Now, here's the kicker: it was 12¬∞C outside, and inside, the air conditioning was blasting like we were in a meat locker. We moved tables, but those vents followed us like bad karma. I was sitting with my coat on!

The food? Amazing. The place wasn't too busy, so service was prompt. But seriously, the server's perfume could have knocked out a horse. When will they learn? Parking was easy, so overall, it was a positive experience with a few kinks that could be fixed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTh_I_V480RnX5h_hfQBPiW23wlpFNbqMlo86B&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the chicken curry and my partner got the creamy chicken ramen. We also got the spicy wontons to share. All of it was very delicious and good quality. The service was great and the food came quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfyItT6blulGcIgLykV7qTugVVFF4mL4HUKmE_&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really worthy to try Japanese restaurant. After skiing. We chose this location for fast dinner. Kids order noodles, they love it. I order salad which tastes fresh. We also order dessert . Will recommend to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcXAbImD3-fr17bqsZ9TbClJURFjtqI63qj4RU&fid=0x0:0xdc48c60a8271095f"],"When":"2024-4-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty good pizza, but not the greatest, they could use more tasty toppings and make a better pizza, the dough was great tho.
The view and atmosphere was amazing however! So worth checking out for sure!
Plenty of parking but it was getting busy so it can fill up fast.
It's a popular spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhRWtSlN0hsmy6gaY1bqJ3pdJj9ygsoOV2j-pb&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Harshal Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiN57fk4KgqPiBdHOry-0lYuHSsf0LGxdgak2hZathqPSZUvB_og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place with stunning views! We got lucky as the weather opened up during sunset and it looked absolutely beautiful! The place itself is nice with decent coffee and pizza. Tried the mocha & then the truffle mushroom pizza with cauliflower crust as I‚Äôm gluten intolerant. The crust was sub par and for some reason very greasy, but the topping was delicious. Enough mushrooms and truffle oil with heaps of arugula. The music is fantastic too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF_4_T7JU307r73Xj1pXd63VkFN28MEwrMc6rS&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Rahul Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh6de9c5krsyJ_mb57qMO72iLvs-oKOPq6EMT8NHgITXxm3OhT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Shed Coffee Bar Pizza is an absolute gem on the way to Cypress Mountain! We stopped by for some pizza, and it was fantastic. The view from the place is breathtaking, and the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming. The picnic spot in the front is perfect for enjoying a meal with family. It was a delightful experience on our way back from Cypress Mountain. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEEY6URbj9I1flh5SzwYAmn_JdQ9BFCKUDN4fl&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Shed offers a cozy location with a lovely view, perfect for relaxing with tasty drinks. It‚Äôs a great place to chill after a hike or ride in Cypress Mountain. If you‚Äôre a pizza lover, you definitely need to try their pizza! I also highly recommend the chai for a delightful finish to your meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxeFLdjCdBMZkSGooVwAUOf2y3IZUhJitwU89S&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"pbandj37","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqvENmdrQJLseLCMPfqHe34i3YippSi1oh78IYZf_kL6YO_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool little coffee bar that sells pretzels, pizzas, croissants, hot chocolate, adult beverages,  and more. Area is covered and has heat lamps. Great views of the inlet. Prices are fair. Recommend stopping in on a cold/rainy/snowy day here for a hot drink and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNym_N7SfhGydgbWLXgQR5RGpivH1ebQXqXDZtB&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Dr.Hadi Najafi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBM9NYEZFIeHoba9emgE-Tv48BhK_6O5OW-1M4xgZ6CtkAvZpt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza I've ever had!
The staff were very friendly, and the atmosphere was delightful. From the taste of the food to the pleasant ambiance, everything was excellent. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnb19nhHSwa1meXZMFueGZi0meJPsIRkUQalUL&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Agnieszka Metto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJufSVX0Yhxp5A2uKl4U0OroD6sb8EFSAv82qXlkrAvCGsLrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visited  Shed Pizza and was quite disappointed. The wait time was excessive; it took over an hour for our food to arrive. Maybe beacuse of fridayü§îWhile the pizza was fresh, the quality of the ingredients was lacking, which made the overall experience not worth the wait.
Greek salad was also disappointing, with 3 pieces of feta lots of onions, one tomato,no sauce and salt.
The view and beer was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXoMu-caupGxmJf4-6l9EfX-eChc_hL8m3nocs&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"AJ Bangal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnyMl1SKLvOEg1ppBRve3jfObB4m65FZkxMtq5mf7ma3hggter=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Shed Coffee Bar on Cypress Mountain is a gem! It‚Äôs an amazing spot for a picnic with absolutely breathtaking views of the Vancouver skyline. The serene ambiance combined with the mountain air makes it a perfect escape from the city. And the pizza? Simply fantastic‚Äîcrispy, flavorful, and just what you need after a hike or bike ride. Whether you‚Äôre there for the coffee, the food, or the stunning scenery, this place is a must-visit. Add it to the things to do when visiting Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0Gar72p0R8o8VrJaWKqusycnM1tSCd_xShB5U&fid=0x0:0x5db31dca73cbbc2d"],"When":"2024-9-3"}]

title: Dundarave Sushi
address: 2459 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, BC V7V 1L3

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bruna O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGClQjbCkv6aweVcurxwTg0fZw4qUkelzgnyuYpNLbOZB6QZYk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the worst sushi place I've ever been to.
Dirty place (you can see it everywhere), rude service and TERRIBLE food. Ordered a Tuna Tataki and side salad for lunch.

The Albacore tuna was frozen in the middle which is a health hazard as they receive the fish frozen, sear it, then freeze it again - this goes against very basic food safety practices. The dressing flavor was horrible for both dishes.

They saw I left half of the dish on my plate (I only ate part of it because I was really hungry) and didn't say anything. I told them it is not correct to serve a dish frozen and chef lied saying "he made it that morning".
I was very bitter to pay $20 for a small portion of frozen, low quality albacore and some lettuce with bad dressing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH9Vo-cRc312LTIZ8-IFBJXLDm8AX01C5xom_5&fid=0x0:0x496bb1f1d97c4b0f"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Melanie P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQLWY9FLxPPXXpS-1CzyaIvkcRPQZH4U--8cS9jGmpVoa1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Consistently great sushi.  Family owned & operated - service is excellent, always accurate orders.  The restaurant is plain but always clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lunch Vlogs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Y9QETN3ZvCf6nTuIWwY8yyIg2r0SE4_QfsDgUYPXwSH1nw4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi and friendly staff. I come here at least once a week for lunch and it‚Äôs great every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Therein B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZ5oGLzMmIBqw9sgz31K3apefEiDeMWVjgfZjSFCPZNUkuQfM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This service at this place used to be so good but the service is really curt and rude now... food is still decent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seana Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGAymhjJcwka56rvOw7PoioKBAmnKeJCbtXxgRclgK7U06IA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been coming here for 10+ years. Great sushi given the extremely reasonable price point.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Yamaoka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAJRAIoEJmjtbIv4AEDqEmKiSA3lg1_-k7lR0XmZTd1Q4MSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, lovely people, ready super fast, amazing value for money","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DineSnob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoY3sySO_dhSK0zNsb1yoY-Df8CN5ae7WqJWxosoBpb4mluUy7ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to live in Japan so I am particular about my local Japanese food. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harry Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-XfQ_1GUTY03K0yC5R9PSoFya2l3Gd1-bY7IxIroOc7egQf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food one of the best FAST FOOD PIAZZ around the area. There NOT PLACE TO DINE IN however. The truffle and New York there the best.
The staff, however dose not like the job from what I can tell. I ordered a medium size pizza but the same large size pizza was on discount for a cheaper price, and the staff decide to ignore telling me that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjnJS8573QexRshTYqWvCFNBlW_7C_aAkW9rAA&fid=0x0:0x2115877db361cf60"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Jemma Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCHgsvEOda8Euj2F1UAraubpKMT6WV7yVIZRrlelmuyGL9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven‚Äôt tried Panago‚Äôs salads yet.. you must! They are packed with a variety of veggies, cheese etc and fairly priced! I always add extra chicken, and I‚Äôm obsessed with the chipotle cilantro dip, I hope they never get rid of this dip! I often pick up the southwest salad on my lunch break. This location is consistent with the quality of their food and service. If you have an issue with anything you can contact them and they make it right. I love their pizza but I highly recommend their delicious salads as a healthy alternative!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8cv_nhy_62ejh8-1vy8Ab1JYuUUrjOb7lBXPi&fid=0x0:0x2115877db361cf60"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Panago customer service was amazing and prompt at addressing my issue with having a bad experience.

Not all the links in the chain are as caring about the company image .

I think just deliver the pizzas in the order they come out the oven and it won't happen again.

This Pizza was amazing always loved Panago and worked there when it was Panagopolous Pizza.
I ordered Pizza for my construction crew as a treat for Friday..
I was disappointed even before getting off the phone to order...

Dispatcher was delay after delay,,  error in system, delay trying to group the combos for a deal, training a new person while taking my order.
Then says it will be there in 50mins. OK,  worst case scenario I get it. ..but this panago is only 14 min away!!

Then they call and lie to me, saying the driver is stuck in traffic. There is no traffic between Ambleside  GlenEagles just cyclists!
I used to deliver and I know for a FACT delivery drivers take the close orders so they have more chances of getting a tip.
If you're over 4 blocks away you get cold Pizza.
So it finally arrives 95 minutes later!!

Then the driver is handing me 1 bottled beverage at a time from a bag instead of giving me the bag cause he wants to keep the bag!!.
Then after I pay, he watches the receipt as it prints out to judge his tip!!
I put $0.01 cause I didn't know how to skip the tip prompt.
You should pay me for my time! Half my crew left cause they had to take ferries and get home..
Then the driver (old Persian or Indian man with moustache) starts making comments to me about the tip. "It doesn't even make a difference why tip $0.01?"

Next time deliver the pizzas to the customers IN THE ORDER THEY COME OUT OF THE OVEN.

Its not fair to be treated as less of a priority cause YOUR HOUSE IS FURTHER FROM THE REATAURANT!!.

I know the game.
Discipline your drivers and you should fire that one!

Omg they did it again after the customer service gave me a credit. They were 90 mons on 1 medium Pizza.

The driver called and I told him thwy need to  deliver the pizzas in the order they came out of the oven and I was NOT friendly about it.

Takes the pizzas back and remakes them. Cones with a smirk and says "customer comes 1st"  I wake up the next morning and I have a throat and sinus infection.  What did they do to my Pizza?! I never get sick , I pre load supplements to prevent colds. They totally dosed my Pizza or put floor sweeping in it...

This is dead obvious..

They should be in jail!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kourosh R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfxqkIlKJlryJi1EMIdPjiURRFLxFTqIzYTl2_-Oa4Rs5D-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had a disappointing experience at PANAGO WEST VANCOUVER , resulting in a one-star rating. Unfortunately, my pizza was severely overcooked and burnt. It was evident that the cooking process was mishandled, leading to a dry and unappetizing meal. This experience left me disappointed and dissatisfied, as the quality of the food did not meet my expectations. I hope PANAGO takes steps to ensure better quality control in the future to avoid similar incidents.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqqZolT2urO9Z6DW7aCDKxveWAbzyUMmZxqGzQ&fid=0x0:0x2115877db361cf60"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Nolan Nordwall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4_kzCsv3pmq0cB6zGM_G9trQtoKYtXDnhRYpInbV_eY7b2Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at this Panago pizza really blew me away today. The staff was warm and friendly, the Head Chef, Sam, made jokes that were tasteful, appropriate for my family, and completely hilarious. He made us feel completely at home while we waited pateintly for our hand tossed pizza. The pizza itself was a real treat to the senses, and fun to watch be made, too! The quality of the crust was far beyond anything I have experienced anywhere in North America. (And rivalling Italy, who would have thought?!) And Sam who runs the front has the customer service skills of a hotel manager at the four seasons. Five stars just isn't enough. To top it all off, after our lovely interaction, he insisted that I don't tip, because serving me was a treat in itself (What a charmer!) And served me my fresh wings with a beautiful flower in it.

My breath has been taken. I don't usually leave reviews, but this was a truly unique experience. It's so nice to see people spreading some wonderful positivity in such a troubling time in the world. Thank you Cramer and Sam, and thank you Panago!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs136PVn0E_sXTkifTYy3ohHgysCAgeVr7d79d&fid=0x0:0x2115877db361cf60"],"When":"2020-4-6"},{"Name":"Meet Brara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOMobSCLUF6-4v9lYI1Nl8JLdnZSJOIsJMm4D7rUg9UDsxH9I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Server Vishu Serve Well offers outstanding pizza with friendly service. The crust is crispy yet chewy, and the toppings are fresh and flavorful. reasonable prices make it a go-to choice. Highly recommended for a delicious pizza experience! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5IB6JiygAEiJJ0EC6uH9lfnQy6r-Xd5OEj1K4gu24mA9jDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of ordering pizza from pango pizza Server Vishu Serve Well, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. If I could give more than five stars, I definitely would!

First off, the customer service was top-notch. From the moment I placed my order over the phone to the time the pizza was delivered to my doorstep, the staff at Server Vishu Serve Well were friendly, attentive, and efficient. They took note of my preferences and ensured my order was prepared exactly how I wanted it.

Moreover, the delivery was prompt, and the pizza arrived hot and well-packaged. It's evident that Server Vishu Serve Well takes great care in ensuring their customers receive their food in the best possible condition.

Lastly, I found their prices to be quite reasonable for the excellent quality they deliver. It's evident that they take pride in their ingredients and the final product they present to their customers.

my experience with Server Vishu Serve Well was outstanding, and I highly recommend their pizza to anyone in search of a truly delightful and satisfying pizza

Thank you, Server Vishu Serve Well, for providing me with the best pizza experience I've had in a long time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christa Caruk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgZyT9EFraEm2LDhR-g-mgMUxskpWadkUfyvissETxpr8b=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The gluten free pizza crust is awful. We only ordered from you because Domino's was sold out of their delicious GF crust. I'd rather wait to have GF pizza another day at Domino's, your crust is inedible.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their food quality is just average. We tried Fiocchiona Pizza that was not good, a plain mixture of bread with sauce and pizza cheese. The sausage that was added to it was not good at all. You can get much better pizzas from thrifty foods just next to them with half their price !! We also tried truffle fries. This one was good. The only thing that I can recommend is truffle fries. We had a seat in the corner. That was not a good location. There were lots of propane tanks next to us that is both hazard and nothing standard in any restaurant. They charge us $10 more for bringing our own salad to our table, so instead, I had to skip paying tip. Overall not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttq74t-FnMB7O13sfhqv8KgrJZs5hjp0pLZ8&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really good neighborhood Italian restaurant. Pricey but with healthy portions and friendly service. Very good wine choices. We didn't follow the traditional Italian primeri  piatti and secondi piatti and instead shared appetizers, pastas and pizzas in the middle family style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoyOFv9btzBzZkZQA1DRrBvIMOuxJsag4Ew05g&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Kristin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuO_421d89rSC-x3YKAZ93D_1k4fCeqZBvDbw1BmEcZ2dlmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"While service was timely and wonderful, we found the food to be underwhelming and overpriced. When we ordered the Burrata at $23 we were expecting a nice full gooey ball but were presented with a piece smaller than the palm of my hand, and firm, almost like a solid piece of mozzarella.

The ricotta and basil pizza was very bland and when I ordered balsamic for it I was charged $2.
I found this very surprising as most Italian restaurants offer complimentary bread, balsamic and oil for dipping or at least balsamic as a table condiment.

The pizza oils were also not enjoyed and were extremely bland, though my partner did enjoy his pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1ie19uXYM9I7pRnejXciKl5uqTwQMaoCjGPE&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Elson K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ4aX-YHOP73VzQpZrNKTgmqafj2rfORjtiK24wdAkeFQEgEv8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent. We ordered olives, pizzas, dip, and garlic prawns. All but the prawns were from the Happy Hour menu which had a very decent selection.

Service and ambience were good. The restaurant is spacious and modern. We sat in the patio which was lovely with plants and herbs. Live music may have made it even more pleasant than it already was but it was early. I liked that we could hear our own conversation even though the patio filled up quickly after 6pm.

Edgemont Village gets busy so come early to find limited free street parking. We were lucky to find a spot. I think we noticed free underground parking when we left, below the Thrifty's.

Overall, my whole family was happy with the birthday experience. We stuck with water and our bill averaged well under $30 per person after tax and gratuity. Definitely returning, as it now ranks up there amongst my favourite Italian restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2C28rYEljvtHRBmZNpExTWtXXppR13shHuWhl&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Marcus Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcDwWLtWbK6Uj0vd6jum5iY90wYzBtFNIIgaKELob3f_Mt3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took my grandmother to early evening dinner; we had pasta and pizza that each was delicious. The Christmas decor is so cute and our server - we think the manager? Was very sweet and  informative about the menu and the happy hour wines. We will be backm","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A neighborhood Italian restaurant in Edgemont Village - great service and delicious meatballs, pizza and pasta. Reasonably priced, decent portions and delicious food. We enjoyed everything we had.

Great for groups, dates and happy hour. We recommend this local spot for a nice dinner with friends and family.

To the owners:  You nailed the Dine Out experience compared to 90% of the restaurants. Great options, great value on the menu, incredible experience with no pressure to choose dine out or the regular menu üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORMwO74oBJCOAXu6UGD4B8yYq29r2hySloHtrz&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"saleh amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMPMf_O7GAz4ToB7Fdrcx6A1uxNlfODqzt-jsLEa8UEksYthOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kind waiters, great taste, fast service.
We enjoyed good white wine at their happy hours with reasonable price üòâ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3j1g8Jy7BQGlDeInmET4jEks7V0UZwhFLVnrT&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"David Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ0SE1MsZYkv5BeLIemQE_kGUzHTaqIDn_fZc66s0iEf0TwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My wife and I like to include Edgemont in our Sunday walk and Bufala has a perfect brunch menu for our tastes. Unfortunately the service is mediocre and they just can‚Äôt get the coffee right. We were there two weekends in a row and the second time, we decided just to skip the coffee, it wasn‚Äôt worth the frustration, but sure enough the couple in front of us were complaining about their coffee being luke warm. Our eggs were cooked perfectly, but the overall meal is just not hot enough. It just seems that there is a lag time from kitchen to table.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Gold Water","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyCVf1SbVOeHGX1KZMR239oqBS_XvV4P9uvlUHTIOPvhvrWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It‚Äôs Friday and kids want to eat Domino Pizza. I ordered large pizza and chicken wings at west Vancouver location. When I open the box, OMG! I‚Äôve never seen the wings that burn so much into black. I want to ask the employee who packed it:‚Äù would you let your family eat this? Have you thought about your company‚Äôs reputation and other people‚Äôs health when you do that? I would rather throw it away than risking my health for that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO11kfnyPPTJC1MlpxB4SGpeBrYrJqmd5LBy_w6\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ba38a655195977d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Ali BV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7HAxpRrd2bwvlaL3M0uX7puxr1NGaVO2Eg52EiWEHKZUFZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"There is almost no steak on this Philly steak pizza... Some slices actually had none, just the onion mushroom or burnt bits might look like steak?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxm1qWiCFAPE2do3drvEH4hRzVgsaVMyCx_8mU\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ba38a655195977d"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Doria Fochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWk7ehwBIwQKKghaeM0X76XHp-tnSH9jwito7ThricWWh-SYqKsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I order from this dominos on a regular basis‚Ä¶ I live a few blks away‚Ä¶ often then not, even though  the proximity of the outlet is within a few blks it‚Äôs not hot in temps.. a few x in the past, also, lately I‚Äôve ordered my regular thin crispy spinach / feta cheese pizza and tonight it came back to us quickly , but almost burned‚Ä¶.so dry so disappointing. They were caring enough and listened with a manager at hand, and offered a resolution but, it seems they have no quality control in this location as of late I find.  I would like to send a pic of my overdone pizza but I don‚Äôt see a venue here to do so‚Ä¶ it seems quite inconsistent in quality as of late.. the delivery folks are always pleasant to deal with on a positive note","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mahyar Amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzpixdH2E_Z2Z0K82edw5KxhKlR43U4g7W54EG4Im4BjGBqsba=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I don't know why the employees don't use gloves. They handle money and then make pizzas. They tasted delicious, but I don't know if it's due to dirtiness or the ingredients. Also, the space is small, and it's not a suitable place to eat inside the store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHnhpD78JLNWNPBrtCi3JyNuXaLVjtQZUjwjf9\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ba38a655195977d"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Mahsoo Naderi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlMoke0JCqT8P0Sn3G7LxmNt9shKQNKnZZn122ipxf8HFR2YZs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like the Domino‚Äôs Pizza this is a great location. Clean space and great staff. We always order online, get a quick reminder as your pizza is ready within minutes. The food quality is always consistent and fresh.\n\nMy kids quite like the pizza! If you visit the store you can find a map on the wall that show the story of the brand and the locations and the years they have been established.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW0oE5kznHT3otD65C9FNXwpneWmQwNxeewryR\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ba38a655195977d"],"When":"2023-1-8"},{"Name":"Parnaz Asadbakkhoee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYn9IqlcBoOYciwGQ13KMMmo_vr9M3-XAEIKsP5pAcEE0QOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had guest tonight and our order was two fillet steak pizzas, both of which did not have fillet steak at all, and after calling rudely and rudely, they told me to return them so they could prepare two more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mad crany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKikblMjGUSmKe-fZFgEn6enT_YeahdhjiFkMDHDgtjEN9Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently ordered a medium pizza with a pasta and dip. When I went in to pick it up I assumed my dip was in the box or something. When I asked he turns around and speaks to the manager and then gives me my dip and fork for my pasta. After eating it I felt sick the next day and was having stomach issues for the next 3 days or so. Today I ordered a medium pizza and dip. When I go to pick it up I ask is my dip in the box? The woman at the counter just stares at me angrily and reaches under the counter and gives me my dip. So I have to ask for my dip that I paid for otherwise they don't give it to you and have an attitude about it? I also ordered a square cut pizza which they did not do. If you don't want to work in customer service find another job. Never going to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkyNzt52l1Xn2-dNqA3mfaOyw4BbDGihAh4mxPeBlwXXOMdJm5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Received a lava cake with a long human hair BAKED into the lava cake. The employee we spoke to seemed apathetic. We did not receive an apology. I am incredibly upset, disgusted, and frustrated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbHT415PmW6Sqp5amcsKdbSkTllZl0b50ZbX4\u0026fid=0x0:0x3ba38a655195977d"],"When":"2021-8-10"}]
