Horrible experience with a moody female staff member.

1) I asked kindly for California rolls with NO avocado, later found she didn't hear my request. Insted of making me a fresh batch, she got all upset raising her voice in frustration and grabed a pre-made, non-avocado set somehow blaming me..... the customer for her mistake.

2) I also asked for a cup of water. She gives me this small stiraphom cup with a little bit of H2O, finishing it in seconds. I ask kindly if she could get me a refill. She yells at me looking angry and bothered  that I asked. One of her kind male staff member directed me to the sink by Booster Juice.

Its disappointing to be treated like the way I was, especially durring the Christmas Holiday. The insadent really ruined my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqE_EVi3TkKto4DxhKV5EiEZYdt8bQAKKj7Kjb&fid=0x0:0x5338a4adc6b03957"],"When":"2021-12-2"},{"Name":"ramanpreet kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCFTy5l3IIzQi8G7hjyHCZrUX4nwAJRwt8DkkESuKc75kAcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very delicious food‚Ä¶ everybody should try hiro‚Äô s food for best experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aghdas akbarifazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5zWNHckBK_TzkciwIX17rfn3QsU9E6vFMscguKm6MqtcKpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just got shocked how they are cleaning the outdoor and with same dirty hand no gloves pickung up foods üò£, over priced , low quality","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Elsa ‚ÄúNutritonByElsa‚Äù Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx_WnHyEW24hYmcXgZvVSTrgdfXnm3HYkPwe7apuy73mthda6k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I adore the atmosphere - always always alwayssss feels like I am in a cute little Italian place. I can come here with my granny, have excellent, welcoming service and enjoy the music and art pieces around the restaurant... I can also come here with my best friends and have great dinner, fun cocktails + split a dessert :)

Also!!!! the food is literally so so amazing, the pasta dishes are rich in flavour, fresh and just such a treat - I also love the Caprese salad with Heirloom tomato & Buffalo mozarella - the honey vinegrette is fantastic and super light + fresh

I literally just love Barolo so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO14Va0rVHfU91mXuX3nTagQiYcR6xsJbXNRz4n&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Ally Bally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWogb2YoVSDRwyKzerYO3XRy6Wo1CxgprQIntf5ujMPJIECFNlp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Italian food ever!! I travelled from Richmond to check this place out and it‚Äôs well worth the trip! We had the clams and carpaccio for starters and they were unreal. We already started digging in when I realized I hadn‚Äôt taken a picture. It was so delicious the flavours of both were amazing. I had the Fennel sausage pasta and it was absolutely delicious. So rich and creamy I think this might be the best pasta I‚Äôve ever had in my life. The chef truly outdone himself. The drinks were so good too!! I don‚Äôt usually stray from my classic ceaser, but I tried a sip of the negroni and it was amazing. Our server was so friendly and so well attentive too! Will definitely be back to try out more items. Overall the food was outstanding, service amazing and the vibe was perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjtHa_lbrXnUzMPZYGzOnRPjtsh79MyAJ7yFEm&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Esther Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJufcUX8lp6eTTuT6R2ltkEgGdrok0MZKmdX0o-I6BbyTs1hA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location with a patio, fantastic wine list, and the food was superb! Service was all around excellent too. My favourite was the clams appetizer, beef carpaccio and their salad. The pastas were great too! Don‚Äôt let some of the negative reviews fool you, try out this gem of a restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODifmY8URVaSy8MmK6c16B5qGldjB0rxuh8TtM&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Robyn Wynberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7jD5RPYIZei2gZakzKVbuar0EHkE5Bp13qLRy6HsDmojG-Doa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and came across Bar Olo quite by chance last night when we were looking for an open restaurant on our way back from Wycliffe Park. And what a lovely  find it was.
The waiters were genuinely attentive and immediately got us a table for 4 on the patio. The crisp white napery and single flower on the table are a rare luxury and added an elegance which we very much appreciated. I am strictly vegan for medical reasons with the added complication of not using any oils. The manager came out specially to discuss my dietary needs and between himself and the chef they put together a delicious pasta for me.
We enjoyed two bottles of Italian red when my daughter and her boyfriend joined us and each one of our meals was superb.
The atmosphere was upbeat and the restaurant was busy until at least 11pm when we took our leave.
I would highly recommend Bar Olo for a night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbpWPkEX_foAdcuNEnN25jxBxwoAvIjFQ1Go4w&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Christine Yoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9asSL1PLT42mamAsAYYvtxDzl7YBgfoxmp66SUBnHKE1VvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience at Bar Olo! Excellent food, stellar wine selection with attentive service. Everything on point!
My favorites were manila clams with torn bread and beef carpacio! Love that they have a good balance between land and sea. Highly recommend if you are in the area. It is worth a visit if you are not in the area too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVfc48s7w8uyJa8DcKkfaa-D_xrzbYgrVZW469&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Daniela Butcura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpJ_HHtrOe9i4p6-h6zy-l7tlXWHicjGRXneek71t78p134Crqsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most beautiful restaurants in the West Vancouver region. We asked the chef Liam to feed us what he thought we'd enjoy and we were not disappointed. Crazy talented chef. Amazing place. I will be coming back here every time I visit the area. I only took one photo when the first appetizer arrived because I was too busy to drink my food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlPKWL_3n2g826dWCaDL2lJntMluCAJmYdRy7A&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"Dusty Martell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUshEwtFshQNdDHT8koloDcbg7aX58fP4F24oZIUzyX7mWqHKb2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bar Olo it‚Äôs alive it‚Äôs big and it‚Äôs happening on the main drag in Dundarave  on the northside .  Fabulous outside patio, a massive bar for schmoozing and dining, and the best selection of everything to drink in this Italian style establishment. Our bartender Jamieson, pampered us & then some ! Also big compliments to the chef on our lunch ,d'lish . Bar Olo is definitely a place to see and be seen , or feel like home with friends ,
which is a much-needed new gathering place for West Van , bringing great vibes to the neighbourhood and delicious cuisine. I felt instantly comfortable and staff were happy to put on the Pamper . Go there for sure !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS6jVJSewIe9s1QG4Z52IV3qq1FuH1O0J_gW4q&fid=0x0:0x7d8db78023fbfd73"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Celine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-kZof01RJm5by6cPBu1gNbcmEBdhfuKdJIY2-KVufDhWBeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly, casual and timely service from reception to the barman, chef and waiting staff. We tasted 4 of their appetizers and three main dishes. The food was not your run-of-the-mill but more researched and very tasty and the  portions were generous. True we had a beautiful evening to eat al fresco which added to our enjoyment. We are definitely coming back! Great addition to our Dundarave neighborhood!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recently checked-out NYF in Food Court at PR for 1st time.  Was not disappointed....  They're way beyond plain-old rando fries!  Picture fries:   freshly-cut and crispy brown on the  outside and ohh so tender on the inside. Really really good fr. No exaggeration!

Went for the basic "Perfect Combo" for this time. Pretty safe + tasty choice tbh, including NYF famous fries, their generous NYF Hot Dog (no wimpy lil dogs here) and large Coke.  Large generous portions all, plus totally made-to-order fresh.

All NYF fries are pretty meal-sized imo. They come plain, but also in varieties -- topped + seriously loaded with nachos, beef chili, pulled pork, butter chicken, etc., and also in multiple combinations with Poutine. Likewise for their Hot Dogs -- plain or loaded.

NYF is apparently pretty low-key famous - popular for its Franco-Canadien delicacy on fries, and just take a look around the Food Court, any day.  Gotta admit it does look interesting and I'm definitely a fan of cheese.

Will definitely check-out a chili or nacho-loaded NYF fries combo next time... and who knows maybe NYF will make me a future Poutine-fan of me, as well!?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzxNL2Rjb6nRdBD92ZAD3D81070PjQily6hcNU&fid=0x0:0x8f592974f7b8ab5c"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Michael Leano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4MK4I3JvIiwDTMhWwrqD33H5BNSNb4hCL8pbZW0SyCguU7D2m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best new york fries.. yummy and fresh, cashier is kind and not even accept tip. They are grateful to serve the customerüëç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHkqH6yD1xbfe3ZDKt79da4EDzSCoeu1konTZK&fid=0x0:0x8f592974f7b8ab5c"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"K W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVfCrsByaYABiOpGnl4asAYa_VUS0H_CGPNZr03ob2DC7m5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had 2 regular classic poutine and 2 loaded dogs and they tasted great. Poutine is basically cheesy chips and gravy, saying that though it was really good, enjoyed it all. The dog had a good taste and the toppings were generous. Recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kamal J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCM-sp4pTq36LDZIR4MXzVbhorEUsxKfKQKRNSk1q5065GTwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was given cold, didn't really make an effort to check the ingredients for the hot dog buns, inpatient and rude service. I wouldn't come back to this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luca Le May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3BGH48YipprbpLeCcTYbXw77Ie-_UPiBlELST5UHdfnaCeMnS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food is perfectly fine
There almost never is a line
However the service is terrible
Nobody speaks English
Staff make you feel like a nuisance
Somehow it keeps getting worse

It has now happened to me three times that I have received the incorrect order, despite the correct order being printed clear as day on the receipt. (i.e. wrong size of poutine, MULTIPLE missing items in the same order)

I also order extra cheese every time I come and more often than not I have to ask for it because they forget.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB77wAUIkLWZj1dziIjr5fjpztg3FPbP-TQEzu&fid=0x0:0x8f592974f7b8ab5c"],"When":"2023-6-16"},{"Name":"Lavender Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC9MlOSLPOzXhhU5vyo-vmlMDmSL1XHEbrXKVbf_bDcVmjxnK7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My mom visited the Park Royal store on Saturday afternoon, and ordered a regular fries. My mom is a frequent customer of NYF at Park Royal, however this time she found the fries were extremely soggy like cotton, tasted like the staff just warmed up the left overs. My mom returned to the counter and kindly ask the staff to change a new one or do a remake, however the staff had a very bad attitude at my mom and directly refused her simple request. They said it was only $6.49 and that the fries is supposed to taste like that. We have visited this restaurant a lot of times and never tasted anything like that before. Not only the fries tasted soggy, but also the staff‚Äôs attitude was extremely disrespectful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friendly fast efficient service.  Fries were fresh and gravy was nice and warm.  A tasty treat during a days shopping!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtAMMYKeJSd9QP53kK86zyTM4uGtHmBji5MxfR&fid=0x0:0x8f592974f7b8ab5c"],"When":"2021-8-15"},{"Name":"Kyle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1v7D8nRl-G29vT9YRHJQd96BXXSxURGgRS4B8w788fkeFhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The staff here rush you, before you can present your rewards card or BCAA card they‚Äôre ringing you up and rushing you. Upon presenting your rewards card or BCAA card they give an exasperated sigh.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lily Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbGHCuTbByE6xw-vbQWSx-OecU1x2_XNW-hcAo1mdLC8odJCb0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and cozy. Every time we come here we‚Äôre greeted by the lovely staff and have a delicious cozy meal. The eggs Benedict id delicious and every time I visit I can‚Äôt resist a pecan turtle bar and their herb sourdough is unmatched!! Though I wished they offered slicing for take-home loaves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNezx1JLxAUw174oGOQj8sD2foILJflOX26VYC&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Paris Sol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVo_cYGp2aG6vQ-wk0WRyzZ3_MAPgDiRRJmtw9In6KEQUnVnnT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had breakfast at The Bake House in West Vancouver, and I was eager to try it based on its high review ratings. Unfortunately, our experience didn‚Äôt quite meet our expectations.

We ordered a scrambled egg with turkey sausage, an eggs benedict, a muffin, and two lattes. While the cafe was bustling with customers, mostly older patrons, we found that the food didn‚Äôt quite hit the mark for us. The flavors were rather bland, and we struggled to finish our meals. The coffee also fell short of our hopes, lacking the rich taste we were looking for, and the muffin was just average.

While we appreciate the popularity of this local spot, we left feeling disappointed. However, we recognize that taste can be subjective, and others might enjoy it more. We‚Äôre glad we gave it a try and hope our feedback can contribute to future improvements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8pd055pzzsDjKOe8tlJ-Os5_w9EwmmJvhFai9&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Moyez B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6Eamn5ca8yTbck8IWNLNrD9ZeZUGnCTcQ08dD3UxDg2X-UdoJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located at the heart of Dundarave Village in West Vancouver, The Bake House is a hidden gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience. Whether you're craving a hearty brunch, delicious baked goods, or simply a cozy spot to unwind, this place has it all.

The brunch at The Bake House is simply outstanding. From fluffy pancakes to perfectly poached eggs, every dish is crafted with care and bursting with flavor. Their commitment to using fresh, quality ingredients shines through in every bite. Whether you're a sweet or savory brunch lover, you'll find something to tantalize your taste buds.

Service at The Bake House is impeccable. The staff are not only efficient but also incredibly friendly and accommodating. You'll feel welcomed from the moment you step through the door. Their warm smiles and attentive nature enhance the overall dining experience, making you feel right at home.

One of the best things about The Bake House is its affordability. Despite its prime location and top-notch quality, the pricing is very reasonable, making it accessible to all budgets. It's a place where you can treat yourself without breaking the bank.

Parking is a breeze with street parking available nearby, adding to the convenience of visiting this charming bakery. Whether you're popping in for a quick bite or planning a leisurely brunch with friends, you won't have to worry about finding a spot.

The atmosphere at The Bake House is inviting and cozy, perfect for relaxing and enjoying some homemade treats. The bright and cheerful ambience, coupled with the aroma of freshly baked breads and pies, creates a delightful sensory experience.

Overall, The Bake House in Dundarave has quickly become my new favourite spot . From the delicious food to the exceptional service and inviting atmosphere, it ticks all the boxes for a memorable dining experience. Whether you're a local or just visiting, don't miss out on the opportunity to indulge in the delights this bakery has to offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPMobYCF1vcO71NHlKb9YO9rSaSfDRt9dFt-LL&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"connie leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI_fB6SeIS1ikGv2RhsDMCQCtWDrdYAq-3-mCPCW07YzB6KIPIbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The chicken pot pie was.pretty good, and the salad that came with it was fresh. But the bake brie sandwich was a little expensive, the sandwich was small and so was the pc.of brie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzI7ltvoHcMYOHpn6Mi4cop-v1GyjvSo0VDWio&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As always, this place is great. The dip coffee is also really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo8fARt1RePEgNr2VXRtPLrT5u2VeqhIa5YKQj&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is breakfast at Grandma's.
Nothing more. Nothing less.

Cozy Dundarave, West Vancouver covered in freshly fallen golden Maple leaves, as the trees sway the wind and you, toward the rustic door of The Bakehouse.

Everything from in-house made eggs and toast, sandwiches, coffee and muffins paralleled with the staff's warm, welcoming and happy-to-see you smiles. Frankly, I haven't had that experience since...well...the last time I was at my Grandma's....which was...well...let's leave it there.

"The Works" breakfast was two eggs, turkey sausage, potatoes and rosemary-sourdough toast. Everything on my plate tasted and smelled like it was made for a special guest visiting....like you would at home for a visitor. The flavour and simplicity was not only tasty, but so refreshingly surprising and in contrast to an increasingly commercialized, franchised and everything-bulk world we live in.

The "Apple Spice" muffin was oozing pumpkin spice, apples and cinnamon straight out of their own oven freshly baked, and what could top that on a beautiful Autumn morning?

The service?
How can you not go back to an energy resembling Grandma plating you freshly baked cookies with a smile only she can serve up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIXDF7-glwjg_wCi5RljMHGLt_lgIDsi2hnjkP&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"P. Tremblay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPihLht1u4CeT-4iHJJGSCB63IYBoSaSD3Amqv_E9ebWLUcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mmm! Delicious warm buttery cheese scone  from The Bakehouse in Dundarave, West Vancouver. I love mine with their yummy raspberry jam!! They‚Äôve got beautiful breads, pies, cookies, slices and more. Everything is absolutely amazing and it‚Äôs all baked in house!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGzAFbC4sl-sKgt7wPOUBqjLZk2eEDxbeCdpue&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nestled amongst a strip of shops and restaurants in Dundarave Village, The Bakehouse in Dundarave serves up some fantastic eats and fresh baked goods as well.

Featured here:

Shrimp Melt
Grilled Cheese on Rainbow Bread
Adult Grilled Cheese

Shrimp Melt: They sure do have some interesting breads at this shop. On the menu, the Shrimp Melt sandwich is said to be served on Curry bread, and indeed the bread did have a bright yellow colour to it, reminiscent of a yellow curry sauce. Grandma really enjoyed this sandwich

Grilled Cheese on Rainbow Bread: This was exactly what it sounds like it is. It was a grilled cheese sandwich in which the bread was rainbow coloured! Quite a sight to behold, and yes...it still tasted good!

Adult Grilled Cheese: This sandwich didn't come on any kind of colourful bread like the other two sandwiches. Some kind of Herb sourdough bread was used for this. While Rainbow Bread didn't take away from the sandwich's tastiness, I much preferred this Adult version of Grilled Cheese. The Herb sourdough was more flavorful than the Rainbow Bread and this sandwich also had more ingredients other than cheese in it.

Overall a very enjoyable meal, and we hope it won't be long before we're back at the Bakehouse again!

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 2453 Marine Dr., West Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiWRKmJlpJL8JJuaV3n4z_6THCym2N_oGOh0pi&fid=0x0:0x730ad3c89ffadcea"],"When":"2023-9-2"}]

Bourbon St. Grill is def your go-to place for tasty freshly made food fr fr. Right in middle of PR Food Court, go for Big Combo Meal with 2 meats + 1 veg.  Combo meals also come with seasoned fried rice or noodles.

Seeeriously heaping portions totally fill your plate. Personal faves include bourbon pork + bourbon chicken (grilled w/ sweet BBQ sauce), and blackened chicken (cajun BBQ style). Honey mustard chicken is also pretty tasty ngl.

Generous fresh + tasty choices. Check it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw2hjaLssm3oYF6NFKEQ4DsXDufAjqKKbN_0fM&fid=0x0:0xead179fe530caba0"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Pedro Henrique Munhoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDgrUCRxsDI0QiyVrXSpD7YMiIjCu4Myp-mN5MwWyO4s-k5hcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely loved the food! Customers not always so but these young people are always so nice and the mango chicken is great üëç","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Espresso Shots","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDpdDtiCGc5Tt_Rv00jMm8gqoWirJLIinPXr_cx7uJWSgY7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Years ago, I enjoyed coming to Bourbon St. Grill. [{"Name":"Raif Weston - Real Estate Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgo3Awp_AeJN_a9cowvplRMkyhJUWl-z6wC4NgW9IYMfv2A1HHtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time here and it didn't disappoint! I stumbled across it as I had to go to Formula Fig nextdoor for a Christmas present for my wife. I was there attested Saturday morning and it was already buzzing with activity. I had a coffee and a ham and cheese croissant, which was packed with hood quality ham and cheese. It could have been slightly better if they offered to warm it up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNshQIEK9NFMmf8IMNS7oAE5ynp4Dphjc5_XhLt&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Thierry Ambleside
1343 Bellevue Ave, West Vancouver, BC V7T 0B9

Thierry Ambleside is an elegant caf√© and patisserie that blends the art of French baking with a modern West Coast aesthetic. Known for its handcrafted pastries, decadent desserts, and artisanal beverages, it has become a go-to spot for those seeking a refined caf√© experience. My visit lived up to the high expectations, delivering a memorable indulgence.

Drinks

Caf√© Mocha
The caf√© mocha struck a pleasant balance between its rich chocolate base and smooth coffee undertones. While the flavors were well-blended, the drink lacked the robust intensity that might have made it truly exceptional.

Cappuccino
Similarly, the cappuccino was well-executed, with a creamy froth and a balanced coffee profile. Though enjoyable, it didn‚Äôt possess the boldness of flavor that would elevate it to greatness.

Rating: 8/10

Pastries and Desserts

Hazelnut Chocolate Danish
This pastry was a testament to Thierry‚Äôs mastery of texture and flavor. The buttery, golden-brown layers were perfectly crisp, providing a delightful contrast to the creamy hazelnut filling. The addition of hazelnut chocolate ganache and candied hazelnuts added richness and depth, making each bite a harmonious blend of crunch and sweetness.

Rating: 9/10

Chocolate Marquise
The chocolate marquise was the epitome of indulgence. Layers of hazelnut dacquoise, salted caramel, crisp praline, and silky chocolate mousse created a symphony of textures and flavors. This dessert was impeccably balanced, with the salted caramel cutting through the richness of the chocolate to leave a lasting impression.

Rating: 9/10

Service

The service at Thierry Ambleside was impeccable. The staff were warm, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. From the initial greeting to the prompt delivery of drinks and pastries, their professionalism added to the overall experience.

Rating: 9/10

Ambiance

Thierry‚Äôs interior is a perfect blend of modern sophistication and comfort. The clean, well-maintained space offers a serene environment complemented by scenic views, making it an ideal spot for a leisurely treat. The seating is thoughtfully arranged, and the overall atmosphere is inviting and relaxed.

Rating: 9/10

Price

Given the exceptional quality of the pastries, desserts, and beverages, the pricing feels entirely justified. Thierry offers an experience that goes beyond mere sustenance, delivering artistry and flavor that are worth every penny.

Verdict

Thierry Ambleside stands as a shining example of excellence in the patisserie world. From its expertly crafted pastries to its refined ambiance, the caf√© delivers on all fronts. It‚Äôs a must-visit destination for dessert enthusiasts and anyone seeking a sophisticated caf√© experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyO1FSPGoK54hbKcNhGYx--04EHRdQ4kJBgKWV&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a mid-afternoon meal with a visiting overseas family friend at nearby Earls at Ambleside, Thierry was the destination for some delicious dessert offerings while enjoying its views of the nearby park, pier and harbour.

Puff pastry with rich chocolate hazelnut centre and a glazed + flakey custard-layered Millefeuille went incredibly well with an Americano and Caff√® Latte.

Behind the eye-catching heavy wooden doors, lofty and spacious the Cafe is dominated by a dramatic curving black marble wall behind the glass and gray marble display cases. These overall dark/wood + neutral tones are offset by red leather sofas and a focal floral arrangement on a curving wood + marble table.

The interior radiates a bright welcoming  sophistication. The staff are friendly and courteous, and the Cafe ambiance is polite and conversational. Exterior seating under heat lamps and behind wrought-iron railings is also available along the Bellevue Avenue front.

Thierry offers a wide array of rich French pastries, cakes and biscuits -- in addition to hand-made confections + chocolates. Breakfast and Lunch menus are available at Thierry which is also licensed, serving select wines, beers and liqueurs.

Thierry at Grosvenor Ambleside is definitely a scenic + sophisticated destination for a satisfyingly delectable collation at any time of day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6C4f0EOi5V43e0nylmP4Id93O2oztZhz7TTQX&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best location of Alberni and Mount Pleasant, room-Wise as it seems to be the largest location.

Desserts were plentiful but not much pastry selection this afternoon.

Prices are the usual expensive Thierry but are not most popular coffee places these days?

Note: all Americano sizes are 2 shots only. You are just paying for water and a larger cup for larger sizes.

Parking is street parking only but being near the beech and Rutgers field means access to free beach/park parking within a few blocks walk.

This will be the coffee place to show to out of town guests.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwGDgNgxcYn_zW0AjHLCx6Zun98TPP1gG2-YKu&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Leya E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPMEjpXUs-_xzos_qGHvk4l7M7xlbdXo1Tjq0QyJ9PdNqfi1Lr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places in town for delicate pastries, croissants, chocolates and desserts. Beautiful space by the ocean, great place to enjoy a pastry and warm beverage. Free parking downstairs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuc1jcAtcH-s74WbtUGRIM9Msg__RrZItomTfJ&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Elsa ‚ÄúNutritonByElsa‚Äù Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx_WnHyEW24hYmcXgZvVSTrgdfXnm3HYkPwe7apuy73mthda6k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"such a premium cafe, so high end, beautiful simple and elegant decor - I absolutely adore it hereüíñ I always get an americano with skim milk and it‚Äôs so smooth, such great coffee. The little chocolates are also such a nice treat :) excellent staff, especially Nora who was so fun to chat with and helped me choose the yummiest chocolate by answering all my questions!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4Pu4xMwhlOo4EjBWLvpImckL9R3CwKBzocYkA&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Farzona Karsan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGMghe_apg107uRDPlEqkmua_D-qBgsKLROntp--wbS3lPYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Thierry! The place is lively and beautiful. The pastries are so delicious, and the coffee is always good. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRM89LHe_JM2LxLlqVaLSEEPKEj_hYMKFbuig6&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPIWsJnYGYPEvxwuuYc7UL67ezMi3_JwmkV7EL1x4ZRgMyjM1J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful place for an afternoon after a beautiful walk along Ambleside, an absolute treat!

The Pistachio Macaroon was excellent. Tiramisu lacked a bit of flavour, maybe just personal taste. Would love to try other desserts, they all looked amazing!

It was pretty full on a Saturday afternoon, recommend allowing a bit of time until you can get a seat inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhmEphGssPegCzQaxYA5DDuk4k_jKWby5FZMk0&fid=0x0:0x70a7d0a2b9d10ac4"],"When":"2024-3-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessica Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbKN7JTB8-geSMCvSN4JUMFRJdzyUw9Zem00rFXxig6jms97b4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall, great service, but won‚Äôt be my first pick.

Service: Great service! The cashier was very polite and kind.

Atmosphere: this place is situated in a food court, so I can‚Äôt say much about the atmosphere. I will say that the food court is very clean!

Food: my friends and I ordered the beef pho. In my opinion, it wasn‚Äôt my cup of tea üòÖ. The beef was tender and the noodles were soft, but I didn‚Äôt enjoy the broth. Maybe I just prefer another type of flavor over another, but I just didn‚Äôt like the broth that accompanied the pho. It was sort of‚Ä¶ herby? (As quoted by my friend). However, the pho is served very generously! (We were all unable to finish!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLTONCWwh-vr2x-ys-Fg_zVZerzIDIZ6cTB66J&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The lemongrass chicken in the pho was weird, in terms of flavor meh‚Ä¶ definitely there are better places, the salad roll is just full of noodles, poor portion of shrimp( slices so thin) and lettuce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX-aDGrMOmTVm-QDl6Qu9KBlU3ANrHcNb_7wAP&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"AJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbs1tbLfZU9LNdk9zoz5PCuvGYG-PeJ__TRlrYEfCYUKyOC8M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered the lemongrass chicken and spring roll.  The chicken was old, tough and dry.  The spring roll was even worse.  Lots of rice was a good point.  Wouldn‚Äôt come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Si Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7gLWIj8IqjPvI73xDmz2DmSJqju6RFiW9wQSZ86hR0FOK_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered #11 lemongrass chicken and the pho beef. The chicken is ok just a bit dry. Food was not bad and not super good so I would say average just like food court standard. Portion is not very big. Overall not disappointing. Food court is nice. We came in the morning so it wasn‚Äôt many ppl. Service is ok, nothing to complain","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjhIGHXw3pVhzV6PpqFQ-sxKx4Oieh7pIm-Pdd&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2020-1-1"},{"Name":"Alexandra Tseng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSGpzsrqSs8pOvlC0kZJhFmkib_cLoLqt1S4unO63p5H99pA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friday Lunchtime, ordered Pho beef noodle soup: good amount of beef and sliced beef meatball,.good amount of bean sprouts, sliced green onions is a nice touch, broth wasn't the best, soup has a lemon wedge in it which could be placed on the side instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-VrJ33IhBRSGunqtOY-Bm3uZ1hbloE4IHgJD&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2018-7-27"},{"Name":"Ember N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOVVSRZSBJ6e5O5jUUtiBAq23q-FcEx-8tVq1hmthlfDRNYcfgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Vina is my go to Vietnamese food at the North Van food court. The plate looks smaller than the one in Metrotown, Burnaby but they pile it all up and im happy. i still get too full from eating and i get food baby or at the least get migraine cz i ate too fast LOL!

ordered my spicey basil chicken but they didn't have rice so vermicelli was ok. vermicelli was a bit dry since it needs to be heated up and bland cz they can't mix it with anything else. so for this just ask for more sauce. i was given 2 just by asking for 1 hehe!

Service is awesome! the boy is very respectful and hopefully he will keep being that way. I'm pregnant so i can't eat anything raw. So I asked if the veggies that came with it could be cooled. We had to go back and forth bec of accent, meaning, masks etc but he was very patient with me and let me repeat my words and explain it in a different way so he could understand. NOW THAT'S CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!! He asked the old lady on the back and she said yes. YEEEEESSSS! 2 Vina places already do this for me!! Now im happy to just go to any Vina places to ask for that specific request. some places just give me a snobby face and say  no cz it's like that already :///

ALSO!!! the guy washes his hand before doing anything. YAAAS!!! i will definitely come back here again cz i can relax so much here! if you do see them not washing their hands after handling money/food just tell them :)

and Yes im not from North Vancouver, I usually go to Metro and NewWest. so i can say Vina is a good fast food place, sad that it's just getting expensive but portions are still AWESOME! BTW A LITTLE TIP GET THE PLATE NOT THE TAKE OUT! square vs circle, logic is that the square fits in the circle ;D you are welcome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlVt22TTCbDe1BzthRPpD0XwLDypnp8KoPuaum&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2022-8-19"},{"Name":"K Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl-gOdqBZjsY7ydaeNok1u9sAbHcmSM26Y90aybgRZSY06nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I don‚Äôt know why review record is so low here, but this is my favorite store in the food court of park royal. I order lemon grass pork or chicken most, the set comes with roll dip, which is really tasty. Taste and price both are good here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvfUg1GzIJlXamtyR8NlodJW4k6xrFURfqlsKc&fid=0x0:0x279bb89bf064a193"],"When":"2021-6-18"},{"Name":"Joanne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIcOc7QYtXac8fbZE9HQn-L1W6wCc27RHKR1QQB5p2Sn2TshwI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered beef pho.
I can taste the natural bone broth they make and no msg.

Good portion if meat to noodle ratio.

Healthy bowl of soup noodle!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They seemed to be having trouble getting food out of the kitchen during our visit. Ordering was the easy part. It took an unusual length of time to serve two items. But, the wraps were delicious  when they arrived.

The room is quite nice. It offers indoor and outdoor seating and appears to be very clean.

This is worth a return visit. I expect the kitchen will be faster and the food will still be tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW3uWf_QAtD6luZ2xKG2dYyyj0Er01DJezjTaj&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"princess A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcoTejj1iyndSl2mtmJHLxA9pLZAAp8y_EieExMH9RZifl6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Stars!

I 100% recommend Zaatar W Zeit to everyone! It‚Äôs one of my absolute favorite spots to enjoy healthy, flavorful, and authentic Lebanese cuisine.

Zaatar W Zeit consistently impresses me with its high-quality food, exceptional customer service, spotless cleanliness, and beautifully inviting d√©cor. Every visit feels special, and the food is always fresh and delicious.

Here are some of my must-try favorites:
‚Ä¢	Laham bi Ajain Manoosha
‚Ä¢	Akawi Cheese Manoosha
‚Ä¢	Chicken Light Wrap
‚Ä¢	Chicken Tawook
‚Ä¢	Cheesy Kafta
‚Ä¢	Tabbouleh and Fattoush Salads
‚Ä¢	Their new burger wrap is simply unbelievable‚Äîit‚Äôs a must-try!

As a regular customer, I can confidently say that Zaatar W Zeit is a gem for anyone craving high-quality wraps, manoosha, and authentic Lebanese flavors. Whether you‚Äôre dining in or grabbing a quick bite, Zaatar W Zeit never disappoints.

Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuhy-GywAxIpvAoTIBAkX2cFLjjPIKpt1cfQMm&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Francisca Andrea Estay Villalon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrl2Mhf2qiNI5lgNgrbPz6dtIsj_SV3KJHiVs-hwExMBh-cA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enter this place just bc of the tasty smell that came from its doors ü§≠ super friendly staff and delicious food. I got a zaatar & cheese manousheh. I‚Äôll definitely come back for more !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVZplBYVE0KyRNkTHX_1bHZbP5m8DSr6kcwASe&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"anees shaikh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgkvaEIrCUTOHbWy6g17rXsC-r21c46A89V6wd7P1xaCsIuACKdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is beautiful! The vibes are amazing and you have this wonderful backdrop of mountains and being in a cozy environment. The lahm bi ajeen was delicious and their zaatar is to die for, definitely buy some and put it on just about everything! The owner, Hussain, was super polite and welcoming. Big big plus for it being halal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPju1Uu4_723yWeglmYvEPm82fvGfMtxFD5f-T&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"shayan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYloSOdMCPNqPNTpdOmzHPzyoEuVG40079GC3stDyfpM_MaJE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to love this place‚Äîthe wraps were fresh, tasty, and looked so healthy the first time we dined here. Sadly, the quality has gone downhill. This time, the wraps were disappointing, with old, blackened avocado, and the bugs and flies ruined the entire experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP61AqqfJ7Ufic5XF7DS7mawDfARdvPhB2pz8Rd&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"mariana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnrloFy6n-khO_aLDienx42SCgL70wGkEO7rV_TKDDrAmBb3v9Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zaatar is amazing! The food is fresh and full of flavors that make me feel so warm and happy every time I visit!! The service is the best! The team leader Julia is always so friendly and attentive, making sure everything‚Äôs perfect.
I highly recommend Zaatar to anyone in Vancouver looking for delicious Lebanese food and a welcoming place!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2eoimJO1DDchG8kwO-L4Ary_RbXkBStM9WVXH&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"jim bo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIL2RbOrI_OImb2__t3UwRa6VPcX7qXxrS0UayuSRMe_kJ6PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice spot for a quick meal.
For only one staff member working, the food was fast and very well presented
The ingredients were fresh and a large portion.
The whole restaurant was very clean.
I'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwqsmxP2FpFnIZxpxfWchlw4vydtdH5AiPHxre&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Kristin Ohm-Pedersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmoBNKWuDh3-GZSS7eF7-9rDUpJ0lPSMA8Q0Kl6c1Yk_vx_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was really looking forward to trying Zaatar & Zeit as I love Lebanese food. I ordered a Quinoa Tabbouleh salad with halloumi to eat in. I was told my food would be brought out to me. About twenty minutes later I was served in takeaway containers a very small portion of quinoa tabbouleh with about 8 small cubes of halloumi. They charged $3.49 for the halloumi. When I expressed shock at the cost for the small portion size and the barely-there halloumi, the server went to speak with various people and then said that was the add-on price. I didn‚Äôt even bother trying the food but simply requested a refund. I guess I would have been better to order a salad with halloumi already on, but the portion sizes are still too small to be considered lunch or a meal. The first photo is what I was served and cost $16.25. Of course they also wanted a tip on top of that. Not worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA2DJoquxDJKJOr_y2ONYiSpTxqfJzBMJnbmxw&fid=0x0:0xd01f2765c1625030"],"When":"2024-8-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a good experience at Bowltiful
The food was tasty, with fresh ingredients and great flavors. I asked the chef to swap the pork for chicken, and they were happy to accommodate, which was nice.
The staff was friendly and made sure we were comfortable, without being overbearing.
Overall, a solid spot for good Chinese food. Definitely worth checking out if you‚Äôre craving something tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBWX2oKOysoCVLqWk1v8ly8cUSg7TFWv0rWr8s&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Alan Cui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLb32s-lLbaiELopYIdGR4tKjDGS89K2u916A7jxT251N32SA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing dining experience! Overall, it was a wonderful meal in every way. I highly suggest the glutinous rice sticks, for either apps or desserts. For mains we ordered the spicy beef noodle soup and the cabbage pork noodle soup, highly suggest the first one. They do noodle refills too, great on a cold day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzD_LKAJf8m7DPC0UwdnDR4lRFR1_i6kPC_sOu&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a clean Shanghai style Chinese restaurant. We will definitely be visiting here more often!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw5_6ZappHVHIeSJ3ciHuUPIdBztwFxfsPrj6h&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Sun Selynna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXql5JlRZhEj4_jnsudk-PTaPCFRzd66Xagd9ddJyqxyxxXgQx2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently took my youngest to visit Bowltiful, a local Chinese restaurant. It‚Äôs a cozy spot that‚Äôs full of delightful surprises. From the moment we walked in, the simple yet elegant decor caught my eye. The clean and bright environment left a strong impression on me. The staff‚Äôs warm and enthusiastic service added a touch of friendliness and comfort to our overall dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWHhLG9HWLGIGyLiNXGb3YEJieVcXTCBwJqL1l&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Junhui Ye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOCJrijWejalwstHD5CZjcY5EUIK7GmqUkrrXi9andd-j_aKGh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It offers exceptional noodle dishes with rich broth and perfectly cooked noodles. The toppings are fresh and flavorful, and the service is friendly. A top choice for a satisfying and delicious meal. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbrQg3Lhxilf7xiZyUKmJm9C41MN1JuC6HRFVn&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Frank Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbL7EWNpNWTZ9qsPCzVpYE24Iy1TpQbT56ffSGk6aEUFw6_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We‚Äôve been frequent diners here since the restaurant opened, and each visit has been a delightful surprise. However, today‚Äôs Sichuan Peppercorn Spicy Fish truly amazed us. The dish captured the authentic Sichuan flavors perfectly. Everything‚Äîfrom the taste, the freshness of the fish, to the texture‚Äîwas absolutely top-notch. I highly recommend it. If there were a 6-star option, even 5 stars wouldn‚Äôt do it justice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzDMXI6pc5dNOrZo_CPjqbz2l7rJHqoAgHJC3k&fid=0x0:0x2d0c74770f5c7fa1"],"When":"2024-8-16"}]

descriptions: Historic setting for comfort classics, rustic wooden picnic tables & scenic views.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aurora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAE7Q3YKdAB0a1ncvRPhh9ctNfKcipnBi86PwCr0uwHxBVB20iaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"After the trails of snowshoe it was really comforting to drink a hot cider or  wine, but I think they can improve the taste and size of beverages. The sweet potatoes are really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp2vJyZ-BXSQ7RPi3Nu7uFzlHQ7B26a9CLEC5Z&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2024-1-24"},{"Name":"Elaine Joe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNBZc87x2xZXpby-tKnDM_2dOZslfB2rAmEJ-XZtWdhTjFbu2u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to relax and rest between skiing or snowshoeing. Food is tasty but a bit pricey as food needs to be taken up by snowmobile.

Outdoor seating is available under a large tent at the back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGukXI_KloGX7BvGH52r-Vq5h12Q9fE8Nus2Pe&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2023-3-29"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A placed for mulled wine, spiced apple cider, hot chocolate, and fries, complete with an outdoor stone fire and couches as a pit stop for the halfway point of the basic snowshoe trail. They also offer burgers, hot dogs, soups, desserts, etc.

The food is like canteen food but the place is cozy and nice and the drinks are quite warming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUoXDYpOZsorDZI-8WhXmsOMFYZYknXzHotNoC&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2023-1-22"},{"Name":"Voyager [*]","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxyrru_rgoUMojDzKD_gGADQ8Mavlr7MZtSONc9lqxxHKo4pEfUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, great food (French fries are awesome), prices are reasonable given the location of the Lodge.
Lots of tables with plenty of space for larger groups. Tables available inside or out (under the heated tent).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9Q5PsVyN_ScCgTknFGqTe6nTWuXR8bO-eDCYE&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2022-1-2"},{"Name":"Elsy Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAWpSfgmyr647IDiFuGkvD8tyFsW7ggjj5moxYJcWEzmImTL4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot to chill.. or warm up after a day enjoying winter festivities. Covid protocols in place. They also have a large covered seating area outside.

I was surprised by how much they had to offer. Burgers some fast food. Hot chocolate and lots of different beverage selections. They even have alcohol. Free water and Bathrooms available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn0W3GQKxoZ1BgK94ndP5uBbHTj_iX2_5b8qyG&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2021-2-9"},{"Name":"Mina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMUQOWy6JQtFoAkI3UpOnkbp_ZwSLaymyR5f4QckQ1gaFV1k8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place was absolutely gorgeous with all those old ski stuff and photos. The food is just basic, nothing fancy. The staff were super friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPF_fhzEr5JZLVZfPPJi1G2Qiq8UeFuBiAIlIZv&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2022-2-20"},{"Name":"Kirk R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2p8qjF74eL7bMTMDXCMQFAFIPsHABOqtQmhWswqa0hxC_Hiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool spot nestled in the woods... A great place to stop for a snack and a drink while warming up from a snowshoe or nordic ski on adjacent trails.

Food service is good, friendly, and there's washrooms.  It's pretty basic inside, but we're roughing it, right? :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZbDbxDR5H-jE6T8n5ruCs23VTt3NmsjIlMlab&fid=0x0:0x322df913c82bcfb2"],"When":"2021-1-16"},{"Name":"Sergey Meshkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXjVGgnUtaOZKG8GPwQlIfxzF2rcJ3qKYuRIPNnJFqdvJ2uqcW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family spent many, many happy hours here enjoying hot chocolate or catching quick snacks while snowshoeing. We especially appreciate how Hollyburn Lodge upscaled their kitchen this winter, with everything now served in real plates with metal forks/spoons (opposed to disposable ones in past years). The menu was also re-worked, so they now serve bistro-level dishes (again, compared to fast-food style in the past). The service is always quick and friendly. My kids love learning about the Lodge history through reading their articles hung on walls and checking out original artifacts.
I would recommend Hollyburn Lodge as a perfect dating destination for young couples who want to spend their date outdoors, say snowshoeing Lights to the Lodge trail. No matter the weather, atmosphere in the Lodge and on the trails is always romantic and magical.
Keep up the good work, Hollyburn! And see you again soon!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Yaki udon was super tasty with a broth full of flavours.
The chirashi don came with a large variety of fish.
Highly recommend if you‚Äôre around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH6i1K2kH-d2gPfqJZIZvS0JIf6lAAoEExPJnN&fid=0x0:0x7e5f9b3c2b2e190e"],"When":"2023-7-3"},{"Name":"Mahsoo Naderi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlMoke0JCqT8P0Sn3G7LxmNt9shKQNKnZZn122ipxf8HFR2YZs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best sushi spots in WestVancouver with fresh and delicious Japanese menu. The service is always wonderful and the place is clean and always well maintained. The Oshi is our favourite here. The chef goes out of his way to make me a Gluten-free item, and  I very much appreciate it. The host is very kind and caring.

The restaurant is located in beautiful Caulfield Plaza. Very much recommend dinning or take out here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl2lc7vEBoIrebeK23mIWzGR7y2Fsu9d_CKqeY&fid=0x0:0x7e5f9b3c2b2e190e"],"When":"2022-5-23"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had Dragon Roll with spic Saudi, takoyaki for thw first time , miso soup and my usual Tobiko Nigiri

Last time had similar but we also ordered the Spicy Seafood udon

The servers were really nice and helpful here and the food was so delicious.

I gotta go we are going there again right now.

Their take out is really busy.
No wonder cause thw food is amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_43gil8jLjtEqvE_RVmZWH8i4pR65tuNoR5Dd&fid=0x0:0x7e5f9b3c2b2e190e"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Thomas Okamura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj6yLQk857bCZoC4__3N1H6bjVvAUlUdTBx-FuZTV3E5fXAh2J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the chicken katsudon, it was a good sized portion but was mostly overcooked chunks of batter, with small bits of chicken in the mix. I‚Äôd tried the sushi from here a year ago and didn‚Äôt care for it, was hoping a different dish would be better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ksenia Zaiets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVpPxd0HwA5BWXjQhXaKeZqKQ1m5thOiiSH_ad6GXM48oq-bTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to express my gratitude for this gastronomic orgasm üî•We ordered 4 rolls, where Philadelphia + BC + Scallop rolls are among them.  On top of that, these were THE MOST DELICIOUS Philadelphia roll in my life (so juicy, huge and every piece seemed to melt in my mouth). I've tried a lot of Philadelphia (my favorite) so I was blown away by how delicious a classic can be. We highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTEF7lvibRZAtSaah4pLp751J_tLN36BHRNYmC&fid=0x0:0x7e5f9b3c2b2e190e"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Daniel Teoh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjZ0MXofAOuxsxxyWWDz1UgR-U5TYC8eqdV9KAZVhN3ILDcUo3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great everyday sushi experience. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grateful Noumena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyOFRNGw07n382h83fO3a2tfWAc67brL3obm9kmOK7fMAX0K4mQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food quality is top tier for Indian food in Greater Vancouver. It's been definitely my favorite place on the North shore for a few  years now. Service is affable & great. Ambiance and decor is classy modern intimate. Prices are very reasonable. Try the swad e lamb and the grilled chicken Tikka","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8E68nEJgY8E9gi0uF66JSKnAkmMP9GdTBmj3S&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Harry Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-XfQ_1GUTY03K0yC5R9PSoFya2l3Gd1-bY7IxIroOc7egQf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is will be you go to place if your an Indian cuisine lover in west van. There not that much Indian food in west van, and this is one of the best, good for both authentic foods lovers and new to the taste. Their beard(pic 5) is free and may perhaps be the best thing in the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeI7AE7JLY9GH8qeikoeEjqPfkxaq_6u0uhya1&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Moj Noroozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugascUb1Fko0SBjm9NLiM6IJLmrr73V93pNQAUcsSq60KoCcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pleasant experience at this Indian restaurant! The cleanliness and inviting ambience set the stage for an enjoyable dining experience. The staff was friendly and caring, ensuring a positive atmosphere.
spacious seating area, both inside and outside.
As someone not particularly keen on Indian cuisine, I liked the flavours. The taste was enjoyable, though I found the meat slightly undercooked for my liking. the overall dining experience was positive, and I appreciate the effort put into creating a welcoming environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTwwN3iicqlObPeq4u3kwi1Evir3KuKLQUM7OB&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Paloma Corvalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-TK2UYSjVBdb5aF00zzoNVEY0fPpqHp-5fo7PiMSQMdSJ1ZF1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best indian restaurant I have been to on the north shore. The food was delicious and the service was friendly and accommodating.

We got the lamb saag, chicken kuku paka, dal turka, and aloo baingan. The meat was delicious and tender and the sauces were so flavourful. Dal turka is my standard go-to, and I was pleased that they made it really well. The potatoes in the aloo baingan were so good - highly recommended! The garlic naan was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside - best I‚Äôve had in a long time.

The extra touches in the restaurant really elevate the dine-in experience. They bring warm dinner plates to you before your curries arrive, the curries are on plates with a candle underneath to keep them warm, and the decor is nice. It‚Äôs good to know they have a private dining room in the back for future family gatherings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJks37tI8p2u_ZS_AEgQ4XECF8gEQAcTCe8you&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Sid Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI2bIXmjxisLX5k-tksyfAVrfiduLeS2Y0yeu3bZezto2_sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried Swad Indian Kitchen located in West Vancouver for lunch with my family. The restaurant experience was great and the ambience was nice and very elegant with lightbulbs hanging from the ceiling.

The restaurant staff welcomed us and offered us a table. All tables had cutlery on them along with Wine & Water glasses which looked good.

One of the restaurant staff was a gentleman who was nicely dressed and asked us for any drinks and then the other staff took our order that included Dal Tadka, Aloo Gobhi & Bhindi Masala along with some tandoori rotis.

The food was beyond my expectations and was very delicious. All the dishes had just the right amount of spices and were very comforting. The taste was very authentic. The tandoori rotis were also well made and soft.

I felt that the portion of the dishes was a bit less but otherwise everyone in my family loved the food.

The other thing not okay about the restaurant was the seat cushion being saggy which wasn‚Äôt comfortable. The restaurant staff should check this out to avoid the same feedback from other customers.

We enjoyed the food very much and I definitely recommend trying this Indian restaurant if you‚Äôre visiting Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2DW7ThnNZhxhLh5XiMypIoVUk_Z541fRigTfw&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Soniya Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-V_aiIV1SA1x3F8Ypdiy-hBKnvQEDsCEU568LSYGiWal6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After a long day we decided to have a dinner on our way home worst experience ever the restaurant look like modern but very unprofessional service with the server maybe she is the owner and not very unpleasant, our butter lamb curry was undercooked and was so chewy kids didn‚Äôt even liked it butter chicken tastes  more like tomato canned soup my kids were like what is saucy thing!?  Chicken in chicken Biryani  was so sour and it taste so  odd when I asked the server lady instead of saying something she stared arguing it‚Äôs is our recipe blah blah‚Ä¶. I mean it‚Äôs enough you are running a business so have some respect  posted it that she thinks I am going to eat, No way! I am going to eat your disgusting chicken Biryani.
And the quantity of the food is so little that price it‚Äôs crazy  quality,  quality and taste  of the food is not what food  Indian restaurant offers.
I was upset she was not easy going lady telling me about their policy etc etc.. I don‚Äôt  care about your policy, customers don‚Äôt sign ur policy before dine in no word of sorry or apologies..
I mean come on if the customer doesn‚Äôt like your food you don‚Äôt start arguing and expect them to eat that food and CHARGE them for that food they didn‚Äôt even EAT!
Please think twice before you go it‚Äôs is just a waste of money for that little  amount of food in tiny sizes serving flat plates (Fancy) like containers.
It‚Äôs ruined our entire evening.
I mean we have dined in so many expensive and famous Indian Restaurant this is worst ever experience for our family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPTJyGbBEk7QFyixP5b-1STCK2PPD3s7poKwA&fid=0x0:0xca4447d21b4fb491"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"The Lighthouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9bKqvGPur5qEmrc-xiuwBNPHRhRbHrLUkMcBLZU9cD8S6X6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am so disappointed. I ordered the fish masala last time on DD and it was medium spicy and it was burning my mouth and my stomach after. I am south indian and my spicy tolerance is high. I order it again with medium spicy with instructions to NOT make it spicy and I had one spoon and it is burning. It is even spicier than before. It feels like a cruel joke. I am disappointed and disgusted. Wasted 24$ and have nothing to eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roger Dupuis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1lG9lB_sR-X6dXWWvkGOt3sEV835dnIode9JAmiiW1Bx-rVgK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time here and the food is fantastic. Not to mention that the beer is also good too, lol.   The food is always fresh.  Today we ate a variety of foods and everything was absolutely delicious.  Thank you so much. I will be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Rukmini Vedantham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrT6W5FYMib-PMrcRcIlZpbNyKtsI0JZ0KrlAzMAfZ2tQra3zloQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst Thai food I ever had!
The Tom yum soup was just hot water with oil floating and noodles with zero flavour.
The spring rolls were fried in re-used stale oil and were smelling and tasting bad.
The fried rice was just hot sauce and rice diced together with no flavour again.
The fried chicken was ok with the sauce.
All this for $60 is an absolute ripoff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came to have this Public food court meal with the family earlier on in the year. We ordered fried rice(s) and chow fen. You expect this quality from a public food court meal. Although the staff was friendly and was family-owned, the dishes were very salty and drenched in soy sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu_PngHTat5stnf1tIj-xdJfTYyWWD0c1Ulhcp&fid=0x0:0xf36c90eb2b4d5a01"],"When":"2022-9-3"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The chef special of coconut shrimp curry is a must try it is very tasty and delicious. The serving was smaller than I expected and it comes with your choice of free fruit drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVC8BhHyrbg4-CRYOMQJr7qB3qFgxtlJPDMao_&fid=0x0:0xf36c90eb2b4d5a01"],"When":"2022-8-14"},{"Name":"Manouane Deschenes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKmVNX5ypaQTOY-45WGyo9Vwui9EALOBAnxMqKyt3eBnrID_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a Tom Yum soup for a quick lunch. I have been to this restaurant a while ago and had a green curry and I had a good memory of it. However the quality and effort to have authentic taste is gone. The soup seemed made from a powder. It had ZERO aromatics no ginger, lemon grass no thai basil, no cilantro no kerif lime leaves. No curry paste. No flavor. There was brocoli, carrots and bokchoi in the soup. Basically it was vegetable soup with a lot of noodles and some very processed chicken meat. It cost 13$ for that bowl of hot water and tastless vegetables. I told the staff that the soup tasted terrible. I showed them a screen shot of what a typical list of ingredients for Tom Yum soup is but they had no reply. When I insisted, one person said it was their version of Tom Yum soup... wow. !!!! I would not recommend this franchise. It is tasteless and overpriced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lily Hamayun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOR9vKzlTGc3nxhN7SvFQSXBNWDnVZo2_a6fbl1P8UBInZ3vyRNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious pad Thai, one of the best in all my travel time. Very pleased with service too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUJwzCLoCoDoXDSYVA4xwI8TEv88zJxoZRnoHv&fid=0x0:0xf36c90eb2b4d5a01"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"M J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIh6dC1lMBbnWmbSh_8rt4potkjmSSUYjMoC5LMgZvcqw9faA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve been twice recently and one time they forgot to give me my drink. Second time they used a prepaid card to pay and when the whole price didn‚Äôt go through they looked at me furiously as they entered a $4 tip and I paid for it. Worst customer service do ever go there. The food isn‚Äôt that good either","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricarda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpjiPVTfHG2utQTMSiAa2WrVGZYp4Sgx8lbH5IjtOM7GnT33A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible.

Probably the worst food I‚Äôve ever had. Wish I had read the reviews first. Chicken is indeed rubbery. No taste at all. Don‚Äôt go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kiran kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV00gDyLKu8uneDyuHbbsmzBg3w6GSoedflPNjEB-rv2Tb93fbj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Giving 1 star is too high for this food court, I had tom yum soup in this food court which is very worst I never had before.. they gave 2 shrimps and very less veg stuff which can‚Äôt find in that and remaining boiled noodles!! Soup is like a boiled water!!!ü§Æü§Æü§Æ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPay9nyH9X9zWNiIGciOVnA539pDFvo7cNt7zUj&fid=0x0:0xf36c90eb2b4d5a01"],"When":"2023-3-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-IiuIOKHd2Cflw1R1HPSCKpGgrStEZQ19f-CAMZYUjToFdrx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The condiment station is very dirty and makes people uncomfortable. There are very few types of condiments available. The all-you-can-eat for two people costs nearly 100 CAD after tips, but the taste is mediocre. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeQBiVoHRhozglhPVhjzAs1LNWoi6VsDxHgFef&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"M O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvF4BcqkvulDJcIWWoBXnNbnFEbA2gP6NmtYhK5MYsPQeMaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their ayce hot pot deal is pretty good, priced at $39.99 per person, which includes access to the hot food bar, sauce bar, and a selection of soup bases.

Their menu is extensive, offering a wide range of options including seafood, chicken, pork, beef, and lamb. I was happy to spot raw eggs‚ÄîI thoroughly enjoyed finishing my hot pot with a delicious egg drop soup. The other finds that made me happy was the popping boba at their jelly station.

Overall, I highly recommend this spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCd9m6wmVts0UiR-E-sZLkxJFV4r-BQBxG4XmT&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I like how their broth is made from scratch, so the ingredients are natural, and light. Each round of order is limited to 2 orders to minimize food waste which I appreciate. There are some food that you can go out and grab, but selection is limited. Lots of parking in mall. The servers have good intentions and try to be attentive, but I feel like I was being monitored. Also, the fatty beef was very rough and low quality sadly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkXB26XLTxxvh6AE8FxB6_BzU28PeyxF_AMooQ&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been meaning to try this spot for a while. Had a great time with my lady and enjoyed the experience. Food was tasty and well presented. Service was challenging with speaking English, but understandable. We enjoyed our time and food. But be careful as it sure adds up as you add various items each costing a price for the meal. So it gets expensive. We dropped $100 for 2 of us having a light dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd1GbT8mx44ZAzXZTLxix4trktU4hhGJ4JllHj&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Audrey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMHcd9D-kbhyK_TXxzOa1TM209Iw2TJCfQTUM0fLbWC9ZDA7q_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and environment are nice and clean. The service is great. The owner is a couple, they are so friendly and polite. I enjoy the dinner so much. The taste of sesame balls is impressive. You must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI7O9sJN4fCNc7_mjcwJjyNnNjL7Q8NCv1As8Y&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Max","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKR3wohiEFzrkuK74idVz7JituyxsQtPU4g3TPmoyDwkA39Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Legendary Hot Pot's continued existence over the years is a testament to the remarkable tolerance of Canadian diners. The quality of food, service, and atmosphere it offers is nothing short of a disservice to authentic Chinese hot pot cuisine. Whoever oversees this establishment ought to reflect deeply on the damage it has caused to the reputation of Chinese culinary traditions.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Claudia Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuGIC6pOQerwJ8NBTtlp_CFmLPDpEbErvCwAv3R4gJnaTK_qs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this place has brilliant decor and the atmosphere is great with the music. their new all you can eat menu is amazing, it gives you plenty of time to try tons of things and lots of food options. we got the individual pots but there‚Äôs shared ones too, personally i love the tomato broth and the beef they have is amazing. definitely recommend, 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXraqtmKVaN0cL9M7SeNk6GWnxuY_XWiXOciB1&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-3-5"},{"Name":"C Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrO8Z7iCHgg5Y_s_X-RqWkHdDeEue82GQfCA2d2A4pThwTznI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my meal and dining experience.  Food was authentic and delicious . Atmosphere is cozy and comfortable , I would recommend this location and dine there again fo'sho !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOazQiAl563oO0LHLBqZvNJb5o1AtAhFizHfAnQ&fid=0x0:0x3f98567e59c5d9b9"],"When":"2024-9-6"}]
