[{"Name":"Sam Valiahdi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzXLz4XQIC4j782rrobkdsAyr7jPm6jqoHMWwsH_I0NiZMDd6b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Real Napolitano pizza in West Vancouver, Great taste and good services with friendly staff! I really enjoyed and suggest to try.üçïüçïüòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCs7CECYCN3fAokSGTo4DXwU9U5FAiCOEt_uYY&fid=0x0:0xc9effca9bb7b171b"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Jordan P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXINVfr7Oy8fhWwR8X7m2B2nxzFryqmn0uhGqGS_melN56kuVTZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I came to this location to pick up some slices for me and my wife. They only had plain cheese and pepperoni available.

I‚Äôve always loved Pizza Garden pizza but I haven‚Äôt had it in a while and never from this location. I have to say that it was pretty disgusting. I don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôre using a new cheese supplier or what, but it did not taste good. The texture was rubbery, and dry. The pizza was fresh out of the oven too so I was surprised how actually terrible it was. I couldn‚Äôt even finish my slices which is saying something because I hate wasting food.

$30+ for a single pop and 6 slices - you need to be tasting better than that!

The restaurant itself was nice and clean and the service was very friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"zafar turang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNEN-2OP3rtlpaiZN3MC7GFQy4C48buNGnVYXfkCtWL-ck1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an unexpectedly delightful experience at Pizza Garden. The service was incredibly fast, and the staff were friendly and attentive. The food was fresh, well-prepared, and hit all the right notes for a quick, satisfying meal. The Pollo Pesto was a standout, bursting with flavor and perfectly cooked. Whether you're in a rush or looking for a casual bite, this place is a great choice. The portions are generous, and the prices are fair. I'll definitely be coming back!ü§©ü§©üçïüçï","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emma Saviƒá Kalles√∏e","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzUyEh89-rlCs2K3Y73kCor18WU-MMt4yxIWwn09-uJ8UBhkOz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fresh, new location for my favourite pizza chain! I highly reccomend the gorgonzola and eating in. Thank you for making our lunch delicous! And for the free drink üòÅ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs9g3Xy3HXZbfUTa8Ha6ootsnCul7E2swIyruX&fid=0x0:0xc9effca9bb7b171b"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Andy Longhurst","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI88ZNfPAdK8UA-w5Apr7XlHntj2lZoh87X8E1KJUkf0mczgY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This pizza garden appears to be unlike any other I‚Äôve been to. They didn‚Äôt have slices made and ready to go. They made me up a pizza for slices which was nice. But they wouldn‚Äôt make any of their menu pizzas for slices as you had to order a pizza. So I was left with pretty basic veggie and pepperoni. Staff were friendly but the whole point of a pizza garden is getting the menu pizzas as slices if you like. Not the kind of pizza garden experience I was looking for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Mak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf1NflJVSzfxMAGB3LjurwPY0RU8eH01IAy3dGERmMjgUv0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Garden West Vancouver is finally opened at Parq Royal mall! This has to be one of the best Pizza Garden's in the city. They make the best Neapolitan-style pizzas like the oven pizzas in Italy! I always order more than I can finish because they have such a huge flavour selection. This location is also very clean and cozy enough to get your work done inside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Magdalena Fairfoul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMiNzd8YVGG0tlw7JDIWjEcdIvnhOmBbQ6tqoGEhoRc0GvkNE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at Pizza Garden! The pizza was delicious, with top-notch quality ingredients. What really stood out was the customer service‚Äîeveryone was incredibly kind and welcoming, making the whole visit even better.

Definitely recommend this place if you're looking for great pizza and a friendly atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nazanin Baba Esfahani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKapT14HbVRZ477FDIEHkkW7iMuSrrWFwWrF1HfQb6HLpjiMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1000000 stars for this delicious pizza , it is a fantastic taste. I would grade it as the best pizza not only in West Vancouver but also in Vancouver. Small take out pizzeria but it is what we need as Neapolitan pizza.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I keep going back here I don't know if its the yummy food or gorgeous Japanese Waitresses! ü§≠ü§≠ü§≠","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg-hUfwtxx2hm_0WX0eNcPlG4YtquWDcDXceam&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When we're on the North Shore and have a craving for high quality Japanese eats, the first place we usually turn to is Bene Sushi.

Featured here:
Red Tuna & Avocado Salad
Seafood Yakisoba
Popeye Roll
Avocado Roll

The ingredients here are always very fresh and top notch. The Popeye Roll is a Vegetarian roll and this was our first time trying it. I loved this roll and would happily eat it again! The Inari in this roll gave it a subtle sweetness without being excessively sweet. One of the most delightful Vegetarian sushi rolls I've ever had!

Bene Sushi never ceases to impress me with their Avocado Roll. It's one of the simplest rolls you could order from a Japanese restaurant, but they do it sooo well at this restaurant. The avocado is always a lovely green colour, without a hint of brown in it. Plus the roll is always packed with huge chunks of the avocado and not too much rice surrounding the avocado.

Psst...not featured here, but we tried the Unagi Flame Roll on a previous visit and it was spectacular! I do recommend giving it a try!

Service: Good
Parking: Free covered parking at the back of the restaurant
Location: 1574 Marine Dr., West Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCpO6yP6eBVAucPFWGF9UzdtEgeRdnK0SshjEn&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice location with good atmosphere
Sushi was good, in good portionsand reasonable price
Service was just okay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdS2bOBK6wh8zOAdvrt4bk87fMxUHjLKnO4db6&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Ferial Fahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgwqxNvBQbJPV5Tl-uzRHmdKej1Bp0eSdLVDKXycTsty1bBtRl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The menu boasted an impressive variety of sushi rolls, sashimi, and nigiri options. Each dish was beautifully presented, showcasing the chef‚Äôs attention to detail. The freshness of the ingredients was evident in every bite, and the flavors danced on my palate. The combination of textures, from the buttery smoothness of the sashimi to the satisfying crunch of tempura, was a true testament to the artistry of sushi-making.

The service was impeccable, with the staff being knowledgeable about the menu and offering helpful suggestions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuvuTltbHKnh1s_K88cgQT3OQPu8GNu6Qxm9In&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been coming here for years, and I always enjoy my time here. The ambience is always nice, and the food is served pretty quickly. Good quantity and quality for the price. Once, they got my entire order wrong despite repeating it countless times lol but it‚Äôs whatever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVm1rN7tEIrPOZeIE2PmYuDHigbqgqZLQ3bP5M&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Sabina Madadova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3bjk3hf3FfljWGAaAGpYJfjdTPYd9kkK2p40OJFj5qpv4DGP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super delicious food ü§© You should try Ambleside role on your next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUKy0qaSYyFg5kuigtFLhOuxCmt08H6cuhGfmA&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Raad Saadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlQnT-rCTufI0eWe2KZSlXk8eUcfDOi6mWMjYZfgRE2L7IdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got a table pretty quickly over the phone.
Got there and the table was ready and our server was super friendly and pleasant.

The appetizers and food came quickly and in the right order. The food was delicious and the prices were very reasonable!

We also got a free appetizer (that we had ordered) on the house because we order over a certain value!

Overall great experience, highly recommended and definitely coming back when I'm in West Van.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTFCnNu0VLhRx5HGP7gtZh0Rguo1vPNC20zsqC&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2022-2-21"},{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you really want to try this place....go and dine in....maybe then they'll practice some standard in serving you and their presentation.

So, regretfully we decided to pick up some Sushi on our way to a potluck dinner party. I ordered the Deluxe Sashimi Platter and the Dynamite Sushi Combo over the phone, and they made sure to let me know that they would be charging me extra for extra ginger on an order that was already overpriced and under-delivered. Ok...here's the deal:

In any part of the world where living beings have two ears, one mouth, two eyeballs, five fingers, walk upright and tend not eat their first born if it's a cold winter....tend to think of a party platter as....well....a platter for a party...you with me so far?....ok. Well, it was to my surprise that this party platter that we ordered was so tastefully put together in a styrofoam box....YES....Styrofoam. I was relieved that I picked something from the "Chef's choice" section...I mean if it had been let's say from the "Janitor's section"....I probably would've been handed each sashimi in the palm of my hand....(no offence to janitors....they make the world a much cleaner place!).

So yeah.....the octopus in the sushi combo was very chewy and the Dynamite roll....I've had better Dynamite Rolls at airport lunch counters.....
Don't ask me what I was doing at the lunch counter at the airport.

The whole experience at this place was just so underwhelming, blahhh and simply a massive.....Really?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGXv731CBt8SpBKjG7cRHy7wWTfftBJAV0WqaK&fid=0x0:0xf80bdb50daa294bc"],"When":"2022-11-17"}]

[{"Name":"Virginia Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWHr1jcEnRS8xQOysheuqBFaGaVNgYuc0bDF7KpmJMqaLLyPgv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious coffee and awesome staff! I always enjoy my visits. I sometimes wish there were more interesting gluten free options but the half sweet mocha does the trick!
Also for the gluten tolerant folks they have Cream Pony donuts now! Nice seating options indoors and out, rain or shine üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-u3YSjx8b2YoVZbtM9dtmMRJH5_zrFLKaZDk&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick 10min caffeine-snack stop at Delany's Dundarave early Tuesday afternoon.  Bright new mod interior vibe and uber-friendly people.

The walls of its spacious location display paintings by local artists (land/seascape pieces shown in my photos by Danyne Johnston), while many outside tables fronting Marine Drive and winding along central covered breezeway lead to a back landscaped view terrace.

Delany's has broad array of generously-sized fresh paninis, sandwiches, croissants, many delicious baked goods, beverages, and of course, specialty coffees. My latte was creamy superb and Smartie cookie rather tasty.

Delany's offers deliciously rich coffees, delectable sweet and savory foods, and undeniably amazing atmosphere in Dundarave Village.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzSKpLOxKhj4_YzcBHFkdd9fJFKLSpXCW2L9xR&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was waiting for a nearby meeting so I popped in the Delany‚Äôs and grabbed a cookie, croissant and a coffee. Good service, good flavours. Would repeat if I‚Äôm in the area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfI1sZSZuEOHbucOkaY6TOpL2w1BBeM3zl2CgF&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Oscar Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB3_Fw9rNwYym37txYKrOT_uoZwbfNcOPzJ-YoMMFv9jRagenEUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really liked the almond croissant. We also got an oat milk latte but liked the croissant a lot more than the coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsGUY8LA4hqTw_eInfv-MM_t1TcAfoKo7W9VsX&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Subarmani Krishna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvt0x3UrAFSiQOTbN8vPebw6TdthabthUPlyMEdkQ3rmx0Lnzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every morning, I walk into this place the Atmosphere, food people waiters servers absolutely amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMadSByg4e_kDRRAuEM4udTfWfNTHKDSNxEEOD1&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly service, good tasting pastries and croissants and nicely prepared drinks. The staff are responsive and noticed them cleaning the tables etc...when asked.
Did notice a fly in the baked goods cabinet, but it is open from the back so not much they can do other than modify the cabinet I guess. A bit off-putting, but otherwise a nice coffee shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf1LeuB9FmuBxvrbLN9aJ5mrd6vYvrfaMvqlJG&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"C Rodricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPkNEh2DGWa4fhzjHXHZljmS5tH2iVOwKZZTVTpKsMt7UUlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Maybe we caught them on a bad day after reading some other reviews. It started with I asked when the coffee was brewed and the lady replied with,‚Äù we brew it a few times a day, it looks fairly full so it couldn‚Äôt have been that long ago ‚Äú. This was 430ish in the afternoon. I also ordered an Apple macchiato. We waited for a long time. They called out an order for delondra for a caramel macchiato but that‚Äôs not my name or what I ordered.  By now one woman was leaving the bar and a gentleman was making drinks. When I asked about my drink he pointed to the one that was now not very full and had been sitting for at least 10 minutes and said maybe that‚Äôs it.  Long story short he was very rude, said well I didn‚Äôt make it so how am I supposed to know what it is or who it‚Äôs for. My husband tasted the warm beverage and it was apple. All around very disappointing experience. All three employees seemed like they would rather be anywhere but there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty delicious coffee to be honest, I just noticed it seemed pretty expensive (which was also my other thought when visiting their other coffee joint close to English Bay) as I got two lattes (large and medium) with tax and 15% tip was close to 13-15 bucks. But, I guess this could be inflation due to it being a hot location.
Other than that, great spot to grab a coffee when having a nice walk down the coast.
They also have a bunch of yummy looking treats.
Coffee house is very clean, comforting and taken care of in an awesome setting.
Staff are super cool and operate a very COVID friendly approach.
One of my favorite things about this joint is that they use fully recyclable take out cups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3nIdaiCjzvVzvgaAiWxZuG8QtY9fKaugDec4J&fid=0x0:0xec7b9da316f85451"],"When":"2021-3-14"}]

[{"Name":"The Lighthouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9bKqvGPur5qEmrc-xiuwBNPHRhRbHrLUkMcBLZU9cD8S6X6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have only Doordashed from this place. I am pretty certain there has been a management change. Due to very few breakfast options close by. I put up with the very dry hard bread and stale cookies. However, the last two times I got my meals. Fresh bread, food done well and packed well. The cookies are fresh. What a difference Management makes on the exact same store. Wanted to take a min to show my acknowledgement. Good job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ALEX KING","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsHZThBYt8gWivzR29TnHIJiGFJMNSS76l3q0Nsm7Z3senE8iz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality food and service, great everyday priceü§§Yummy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2B4RATWrI1IaMQh7lpykEeliq1_Vhj7sHzoIX&fid=0x0:0xa0b8714968479dd5"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Deep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLp4EHPVyK1CCXfQ3-uKbNXvBikVwLelFpm_X_NPLQHelPdUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"really poor staff.. middle aged lady very very rude.. 25 August 2024  approximately 05:30pm i visited subway then i mistakenly used a water cup for Coke, the employee should kindly inform me of the mistake rather than taking the cup away front of me.. i felt very uncomfortable at this moment... its my humble request to subway management that give her training about good customer service..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N. Books","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpc6vzODSjdwChFVJLX53V6WaPqx7S2_AcVJiMllSp38MqO8am=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overall lack of hygiene.
I went to pick up a sandwich yesterday. I ordered and egg sandwich with some veggies. I wanted to use the restroom and was told I was going to need a key. But after I saw that the person behind the counter did not change the gloves to prepare my sandwich, I sure didn't want her to hand me the key with the same gloves and continue making the sandwich. The counter was not clean there was old food on it that she did not clean to make my sandwich. I sneaked a picture. After that was done she announced that my sandwich was "custom order" and charged me over 12 bucks instead of 9-something. Never again at this location.

Manager needs to address this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvaHp9lVBFp8gEP7Xzv4L46wNQY6epNCi129qo&fid=0x0:0xa0b8714968479dd5"],"When":"2021-6-21"},{"Name":"B Farzady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyHfR_5RZB4l7JmSTyH8olYJPFcaZ7zrcodY75iXSmu50rUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good staff, fresh ingredients. I'm usually picky. Some set their chest fridge too cold and cucumbers are frosty. This one seems to have it set correctly. Not stingy with meat, etc. Asks all the correct questions. Friendly, good hours, good location witk parking all around.

Lots of seating and typically not busy when I have gone, mornings and early afternoons.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rohan Mishra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUGN11W62q7daTnoDjcGSLIBPRTkOcZUjsdX2RAtgBMjU_Wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for extra grilled and was given this !

Jafari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Lkphk90bk7ymP1POxyYMhp9jj3Fm3VntLnLZdKx__wFHgqLp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rude staffing!!
Not changing gloves properly! Had to ask him to change!

[{"Name":"Ina inVanCity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBTrvPZ11ESQZjgRnh5gZU_AwLsYLsYWr-4cIWraMnDtzDq81o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of hidden gem in West Vancouver ‚òÄÔ∏è
Our (me and my bestie) go to place for smoothies, juices, acai or smoothie bowls, sandwiches and wraps. No sugar or ice added to my smoothie. You also can modify with choices that you like.
The staff are amazing and so friendly.
Small tips for me : call ahead to avoid lunch rushes and big line up(thank me later).
A lot of amazing choices for gluten free stuff also (oatmeal cookie, hanuman, and avocado toast are my top 3 fav!!üî•)
Will always come back ‚ô•Ô∏èü´∂üèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCjUFJselhFpYwLbFZCAQjws-RtWiCIsJ9nvTC&fid=0x0:0x6526e75f52249f11"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Sammy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1dcVowa6FhZlvlu9Xu4LFj3BYBZuARsZi-X581fKjYGEAZw4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty a√ßai bowls. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre in ambleside area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7XfqZhzW_YGOSNar2N-iQ4bpgGQKJInrLlyWw&fid=0x0:0x6526e75f52249f11"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Channah Dalisay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvfIkQBo1VK71KUY8TzbNOfXX3WGJnPusqKdcfLvxFAda3limf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibes and amazing staff, very welcoming. Love the super smoothies and best green smoothie i‚Äôve tasted. Highly recommend!
Also avocado toast is so goodü•ëüòã
Overall, great place, feels like home!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGNzSqoF5F3rR0mLtiRseFMmv_Wxat2DPrAXqa&fid=0x0:0x6526e75f52249f11"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Fereshteh Sh.T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHtCgYuE61OswmFQsxXy9RwzrBTg9kTZfaaJjhQ0PpTcBJvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish zero star was an option. I just paid $28 dollars for the worst smoothie I‚Äôve ever tasted that‚Äôs very watery! It‚Äôs called a smoothie not a juice!
And a salad that‚Äôs literally nothing but kale! I recall the name on the menu was 4 words yet there isn‚Äôt even four ingredients in this so called salad. Absolutely a waste of my money. First and last time I‚Äôm visiting this place
And of have your staff wear gloves while handling the fruits to make a smoothie. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenn Horning","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyyV9vG94MxAW7rv_cFX-raOPHcbwlSQ9QkjgqP0NkaaurUgmZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Your online menu doesn‚Äôt match your store menu so when you order you think you are getting one thing and the. Get something totally different. I ordered the Humana which online has no coco anything and in store they add coco to the a√ßai and then coco nibs to the top. For someone who has serious health issues this is unacceptable and beyond frustrating. You are wasting my time and could have caused me to be very sick. Update your online menu or do not have one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lukereck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyl4SaMXMu2x5Tug7ivu99cm37G8YhWu_UizcFSCg4Mqb7rdFP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The person working at the front was very nice and helpful. My qualm is that The owner has decided to not give customers straws for smoothies. Not sure why this decision was made. Drinking a to go smoothie without a straw is not ideal. Step your game up!

Part 2 to reply to owner response:

Using a plastic sippy lid is worse for the environment than offering a compostable straw. It is a bad experience trying to drink a thick smoothie through a tiny sippy lid and not realistic. If you want to cut down on single use plastic then you should offer a compostable CPLA lid and a compostable straw. Every other smoothie shop has compostable straws, why can‚Äôt you?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamie Learning","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfEne7-FPNoVEL8D43jrXLJKXOjTPl9ks-IG_MGdZx2_SXZzNtXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious healthy and good for your tastebuds!! The Anchor takes plant based eating to a whole other level.

The Toast Bar is where it's at, Smoochies on a hot day is refreshing and lite, and the brownie cubs are real brownies!

Will be back, I bring everyone here for a snack to take to the beach üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgQzDK4p1O1-HpbM08uiKp4JnoCLERS8nAK1mn&fid=0x0:0x6526e75f52249f11"],"When":"2022-1-22"},{"Name":"Helen Rivero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7YnZLMHJyHXJLMyKfCY5FubG_akxxfOaP1I7lUTIeXlC0oA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best and healthiest causal lunch in West Van! If you go here make sure to try the a√ßai bowls, smoothies and mexi wraps. I also love that you can customize any drink üëèüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR3XzUGF2HNq-PxDcujm7nrr2LhkoNvvnxTZP3&fid=0x0:0x6526e75f52249f11"],"When":"2023-12-16"}]

Also fries and wraps they make are one of the best. Besides this, people working here are kind and respectful. I would definitely recommend this place for food and services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cathy Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeLtZ3zufw2sDLGEZqmACuYr4hATASFicxeSkyefs5Dsx8uA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently ordered a catered meal for 60 people and were extremely pleased.  The food was excellent.  The entire ordering and delivery process were seamless.  Anish was friendly and helpful. Everyone at the event asked where the delicious food came from. We have already recommended them to several people. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsJyH3sC9wY0iML99xfr2wCMCyu1nlDrJuJ--uDgAXYzR9YI8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I work at the mall, so from time to time I come here on my break for lunch. Opa is one of the more expensive options at the mall, so when I go, I‚Äôm treating myself.
As another disappointed customer has already said in these reviews, this location CONSISTENTLY, left me unhappy with my experience or food. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever come to this location and was happy with the outcome.
I usually order the opa platter, with chicken and Caesar and I ask to pay for 3 extra tzatziki dips. They usually don‚Äôt give me all the dips, after I pay for them (sometimes they charge me, sometimes they don‚Äôt) and then when I ask them, they act like I‚Äôm stealing from them or as if it wasn‚Äôt something I literally paid for. Another time they gave me Greek salad, and I let them know, and then they just chucked everything in the container and put it on the counter without giving me utensils, and again, acted like I was inconveniencing them.

The picture shown here, shows an Olympus bowl that I paid 9 dollars for‚Ä¶ I got two scoops of rice, and maybe 10 chunks of tomato, jalape√±o and onion. 9 dollars‚Ä¶ really? Again he just chucked it all in the bowl as you can see, asked if it was to go, I said yes. He puts the lid on and gets it all saucy, gives me a knife and then I ask if it comes with tzatziki (which I know it does) and then he fills the cup maybe a quarter of the way and throws it on the counter.

I don‚Äôt want to spend half my break waiting in line, waiting for it to get thrown in the container, to spend 10 dollars or more for this quality of food or service.
You guys have one woman working here who you can tell she‚Äôs trying her best to make things better and the rest are a bunch of meat heads that could care less.

As a store manager myself, I‚Äôd be ashamed to have this team representing my company.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzNsmqArkMCrkqSIJ3U2yzJZX_AaqbUiD3axhh&fid=0x0:0xc674e91aae9ea939"],"When":"2021-7-6"},{"Name":"Fuck You","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3vrxkuPs6BZeEKGbfmnmUUimC6lf3QYX8kcEpC1mTHZE5wA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The only tasty thing was the chicken souvlaki and there was only one stick. The rest was balnd and dry. My cesar salad had no bacon bits and no permasian cheese...smh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOws0a_w6-JIUGMkKwwB0jNEtqH4_r135TpHrGe&fid=0x0:0xc674e91aae9ea939"],"When":"2021-11-1"},{"Name":"dolly friesen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPeC_DzYMfvbaujzQ5qOCnGlgfOa64CHJYrBPT8zbCddqaDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the second time I have used Skip for delivery. They were great. The food was disappointing. I‚Äôve enjoyed Opa many times, not so much now. Hot food in the same container as salad? Pita jammed into the rice? And the chicken, dry and tough. Really, so much for Opa. That‚Äôs a pricey almost inedible lunch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ifrat Hossain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGd9AIs-8zdYFjRihuAk7zTobbSfciu3ZP5AxOeRJwaHCPazsy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"OPA is always my favourite. The food was delicious but would be amazing if it was warm enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQVUShdBOTngXNn-Zz7IkcNpyjbK93Zhi4Nceb&fid=0x0:0xc674e91aae9ea939"],"When":"2022-9-25"}]

Hopefully coming  back when I go back to Van.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Canada Inc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU5fZ_vpo7uqnwC1auCoqxqYFyNlra0l3_gsdMpBvK-J2P0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I so wanted to go into this shoppe, when my husband went first and told me I HAD to go in. From the beautiful flowers outside you are drawn into this special place.

Jody's gluten free muffins, which are a must for when guests come, homemade soups, scrumptious cookies, hummus, ice cream are all so yummy. And during the holiday season, you can find great holiday treats.

Great bags, jewelry, shoes, jackets, sweaters, dresses, children's clothing! Whatever you are looking for...I know I can always find SOMETHING special here.

LOVE Jody!
LOVE Jody's Maison!
It is a special place to see and GREAT times to be had!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Asha B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSnDPWJnDhXS2Goox0w2EmkghyN76o3XIMO74bBmzkr0o57S0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best muffins I had in my life!
Everything from Jody‚Äôs store is just delicious but it‚Äôs not only the food. You can find unique and beautiful clothing and accessories there as well.I highly recommend to visit her store.üåπüåπüåπ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esmail Baku","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZTfvGohB6CCN7BESDs4N4O8N2NsGB0mGYMKOe-9shII0NiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Esmail Baku
stars
8 hours ago on Restaurant Guru
I live near Jody's Maison. Going out of my apartment, usually I change my direction just to pass Jody's uplifting colorful garden beautifully adorning around her shop. Saying hello to her and having a chat, if she is out watering or pruning the garden, further elevates my sense of gratitude to be a part of such a kind and welcoming neighbor....being surrounded all day with all those colorful blooms, I would say, must have an imprint on one's soul. Then, on top of all this, her delicious and healthy Pumpkin and Matzo Ball soup which I had yesterday, made my day. All I can say is Thank you Jody.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Judi Gibbs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzKGXmHDIUkkQ3oywnemwknUCiJOuDdC6_yZ4gdPTT9z04Db0AIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a coffee, which was wonderful and we had a freshly-made pastry (believe it was called "a nothing". But it is really SOMETHING). We sat outside in comfy chairs Paris-like watching the world go by. We also bought some amazing plants for our patio (saving ourselves a trip to the crazy garden center). AND she made me a huge bouquet of flowers for my Mother's Day gift from my girls!!! There is also the entire inside of her store which is a treasure trove of amazing goodies too varied to explain. Please ask about her catering service which is the best in town. Be sure to drop in and you will find something(s) you will love. Jodie always makes my day better!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Debra Jappy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6C1TolTCr4H1hhi0kLRpGIlyS5y5Bm_-8BRQd_0cAkIOn6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have shopped at Jody‚Äôs for over 20 years and have a closet full of treasures and happy memories. Not to mention a very satisfied tummy.

Jody has a phenomenal sense of style and taste and she curates incredible designers and jewelry. She is an exceptional caterer and florist. She did several conventions that I organized and received excellent reviews. Her chocolate cake is unparalleled and highly addictive. But the most amazing thing about Jody‚Äôs is the personal service, friendship and laughter that you will receive as a client.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sienna Josephson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIajILAUmXnaaa4TWg3_FW1gEnHfEmR3UIEq7YVwgZ6vaEXAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're anything like me, you were drawn to Jody's easthically pleasing exterior and came to the reviews to find out what's inside. When I finally went in I was not dissapointed. They are a cafe AND a local, sustainable retail store. Carrying ski suits, flowy dresses, shoes, candles makeup and much more. Jody is a real chef who makes her food fresh daily with the purest of organic ingredients. She caters and makes her own flower out of Walnuts and other great ingredients. No white flower. I came for the lasagne but they were sold out so I ended up with a carrot cake instead (oops). I forgot I had walked 10+ blocks to get there and froze my hands off walking back with it, but it was worth it. It was lovely meeting Jody and Karen, an impressive duo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnSNJtgM36cIvwa4n-kipIVf69CrSCe0dvXO05&fid=0x0:0x2320fa4c1d51a22f"],"When":"2022-11-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J.J. LaRocque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1wnHH1wE-6ehYO1ShgkgKN3A6ZFemN0kZy8RwdiX8HwJ30lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little course for practice! The tee boxes were in rough shape and the Greens were under repair when we arrived. Decent prices and fun little course with friends. The views of the course and the clubhouse was the highlight of the course. No power carts and no beverage attendant on the course. Beginner course.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH3ns5zi3v6JSVu7tA3gGYFDfrnrkBzkDpifTn&fid=0x0:0x86d52edac83c204a"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Wayne Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvXczlh76llO-fYZcAF0qf3D1j8dsTDAeORSYb3v8bdTQEsiwW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gleneagles is a 9 hole walking course that is always enjoyable. Best yet is that Seniors, Monday to Thursday, get to golf for $25.00......perfect. The Club House has a great restaurant called the Orchard which is always enjoyable. Great for a burger and a beer. All round fun place to spend 4 or 5 hours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful course tucked into the West Vancouver mountains. Only 9 holes but well worth it. Challenging typography and a quick and dirty game. Wholly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu0c1mg9n52B6MufjHIu4Fpa16_WkoaJoEjIzR&fid=0x0:0x86d52edac83c204a"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"Beetle Ranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJydz5g_nlYLqGM_pv7p8dEE9HBQHW10V6Ygi84OFW45HcQL6S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely dinner at the club's restaurant!
Easy going menu, nothing fancy but everything was very good.
The price point is very reasonable and the staff was amazingly welcoming.
Special thanks to our french waitress who gave us very good advices and was in a very polite and cheerful mood.
Me and my live will come back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgnLj9HERKAcbd6EXxHxTWxD-N2nXSd_TclQId&fid=0x0:0x86d52edac83c204a"],"When":"2024-1-11"},{"Name":"Melody Noble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT3sk_wNZ9SXscSoFHNyWVllw4kGj2xYl0wvEQm4XwzxqPB3gWZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast, inexpensive, family seating overlooking golf course, and great food. I‚Äôd recommend the Orchard Club house restaurant. There‚Äôs indoor & outdoor seating. They are awaiting their liquor license so current hours are 9-4pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlGmGPbaBEcjadlsQlNoZaMP_-0jII1qB_PUEm&fid=0x0:0x86d52edac83c204a"],"When":"2021-9-12"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYA4MHB4K8_LYs3D3S-W-1yMZ16YkTwayh2wodnALdho6hwUAH-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant (The Orchard) is open YAY!!! Only open from 9-4 right now awaiting licensing then evenings too. Can't wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP067IRTrPeG1ZsQwJ3O1dYByLSmJ8PatWrwErY&fid=0x0:0x86d52edac83c204a"],"When":"2021-9-3"},{"Name":"IamTheRealDeliCinq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsOKwMUks8hkqKQtgHmkEA-H9bJzym0amyBplgWbEvMC9k7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great public course, great rates for an awesome 9 hole track with one of the best patios in west Vancouver.
One of the few courses on the North shore that are public.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sacha Fivel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHC2PJIJ7DQVSOYEJjIb6-Uvv4r2c2zgut6W4ED0oPC3XNfHo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional dining experience at this restaurant! The breathtaking view added to the charm, and we were fortunate to be served by a genuinely professional and friendly waitress. Her insightful recommendations enhanced our meal, making it a memorable visit. The diverse menu and exquisite dishes truly impressed us. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeff Downer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl3HQ-1C4N-_a7ykvhIi5aM883AB-cDQVYb1xeenCY7zekayvZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! This is good. One of the LARGEST wraps I‚Äôve ever had, must have weighed several pounds. The quality and balance of meat and vegetables is perfect. I will eat these all the time. I ordered a mix wrap, chicken, beef and lamb and all three are cooked perfect and not dry.
The counter service was so nice and accommodating. Upstairs was clean and a generally great place for lunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm2KQDyO2c1CL0fzUMucqmbPUMgqg47YuRE_9v&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"FARZAM ameri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC2df7lOXeiqMsnPi2htms2568VuOUkmExj9MZ8kkh6j2hvhus=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered Loghmeh kebab, and I have to say optimistically under 40% of that kebab contains actual Meat. The food was tasteless and It was just waste of money. I STRONGLY suggest you not to go there.
Staff was really polite and friendly though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoCVXxYvNnPrU6RCsUdI-VTH87WanqMj-btLQ2&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely delicious and huge portion size (tho the size might vary some days, I have put the two pics for comparison). First time I went, the portion size was quite small for the price but the second time I went, they gave me a huge portion which lasted for 2 meals in total. I love the Vaziri meal that they have!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPih8L_Q2wK2QfkznE7CiefGaptLdidvJ3Bpds5&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the saffron chicken with zeresht rice and I was satisfied with how the food taste and how filling it was, that I even had leftovers. My husband ordered khoreshte ghayme and he said that this place made this dish very well. For dessert we got sholeh shard and I love how it this place didn‚Äôt make this dessert to sweet! Next time I‚Äôm in UBC I will probably go to this place again ‚ò∫Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCCrILJyF2kem_vb-iTitmN7-tSH1WfxWLBmab&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Negin Rahimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4DUUoCWRf2VeIHKqwIhVGBDp6aPH06WL8KyLGIL_eC6FWBXb5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited the UBC branch of this restaurant near closing time. Unfortunately, the two jooje kabab (chicken) dishes we ordered were not warm. When I asked for a replacement and for them to be warmed up, they simply reheated the same plate, which did not resolve the issue and took a long time. The taste of the food was also disappointing, and the chicken was not cooked well. We ended up requesting a refund, but since it was late at night (around 11 pm), we couldn't find another place to eat. I have had a great experience at their other branch, but I cannot recommend this particular branch due to the poor service and quality that fell short of my expectations for Sahel Restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7yKfp8eM4dYI6zdmfXa1F0jAkoq40k9-j-8vc&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Miyuki Food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIefbmBJIFd8vluRG1CtvO_cHUxsRdwtm3bVobO6E-icLpG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good!! I got the lamb and beef donair and the meat and everything was tasty, and the service was great. There is also a nice upstairs area with seating and a tv","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFpW22RVhCzjq0t8O64yMaiiDBQ5d2EBHb_Nw&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"New branch of Sahel at UBC featuring donair and Persian food. The ordering counter is downstairs with a seating area upstairs. It wasn't particularly clean: some tables had crumbs and there was trash on the floor under some tables, which weirdly is carpeted. The furniture, however, is in good condition and comfortable.
FIRST VISIT: I had a felafel plate and a rice pudding. The food was average quality. The sauces they use are a little different than the typical sauces: the white sauce was thicker and tangier and the red sauce had a hint of heat but mostly tasted like a zestier and thinner version of ketchup (this is maybe not the most appealing way of describing it - it was good, like a cross between hot sauce and ketchup). I liked the different flavours and the rice was actually pretty good, but I was indifferent about the felafel and hummus. The felafels were like the puck-shaped ones you can buy at the grocery store. The rice pudding had a nice flavour but was almost gelatinous in consistency, which I can't decide how I feel about.
Second visit: I wanted to see if the more distinctly Persian dishes would be better, so I tried the eggplant stew, the one veg stew on the menu. The ‚Äúbroth‚Äù that the eggplant and tomato were stewed in was straight oil, which I did not like. Again the rice was great, but they give so much with the stew that I didn‚Äôt know what to do with it all.
The prices ($17 for the plate and stew w/ rice, $5 for the rice pudding) are fair for the amount of food you get, which is pretty generous. I finished the whole felafel plate but was very hungry, so if you have a smaller appetite you will have leftovers. Two people could easily split a rice pudding.
The staff seems very nice, but I just can‚Äôt see myself coming back for the food. I‚Äôd get the felafel again if it was the ONLY place to get felafel in town, but it is very much not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY72ngJ2ZaAwXFb3jb_xOhzFGMNLItp0KiPLjO&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Abdullah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaOLs3U1NGAh-EH96OS0WG3dhkXXnjYtovUMs7UYINOdg16mA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go-to place to eat on and around campus! With the limited halal options at UBC, this is a lifesaver. Good food, phenomenal portions, and fresh! If I had to suggest one thing on the menu, it would be the soltani meal. The steak is really well cooked and tender. I‚Äôm so happy Sahel opened at UBC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9Y519rm1k_jiyVqRKLtV2JmvAIaOwnipoGyUb&fid=0x0:0x615e3b717137617d"],"When":"2023-12-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for the grad students meeting and absolutely loved it! The place was packed with vibrant people which gave such an energetic atmosphere. Staff was very friendly and contributed to the experience. The beers were great and the burger I had was good enough ‚Äì not very large but also not expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDgBUdvc8jRuHppQfgKjuHI0zVR3S0Q2HrSskp&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Aileen Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtnbeuRSCrTtTivdNIO4OHLKHO_ilmZOOqqMZVCM5535PBeWYx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our wedding at Koerner's Pub two weekends ago and we are beyond happy with the venue and how everything turned out! Caroline did such a great job with communication throughout the whole process and making whatever we wanted to do a reality. When we first booked, they said they're very flexible and can customize our wedding however we liked, and they really meant it! We added a signature cocktail a couple of months before the wedding and they made it happen with no hesitation. We are just blown away by how accommodating they are. We wanted a cozy, intimate, laid back wedding with the ceremony on the open patio and a cocktail style reception with canapes, platters and food stations and they more than delivered on that. The outdoor space is just beautiful surrounded by the tall trees, the atmosphere inside was absolutely perfect and the food was delicious! Our guests raved about everything! I could not recommend Koerner's Pub enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSpoODXsooMuueBjFMVUbAncCRWmoP1B6ORPuo&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2023-11-7"},{"Name":"Jerry J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9DQ7B_TRq3u3bo5NkgYrIEp3oIpu1Uv2owPApsfpA107EzZBD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Don‚Äôt come here for the food. They ‚Äúonly do two things, tacos and burgers, but hey do those well‚Äù according to the staff on duty - LOL ü´†

The burger patty was as thin and crispy (smashed burger) as the one tiny stripe of bacon that you get for an additional $2.50 - for me, the smashed thing is mainly a cost saving measure. No lettuce or fresh tomato, just the mushy bun and greasy undercooked fries, all served on a plastic tray (no plate) to give it the perfect canteen finish.

The person at the counter did not want to be here (bad day for them it seems). Deco and atmosphere is ok, nice garden/patio. Beer and water good.

In summary, the place called Freshii at Wesbrook and this pub battle for the bottom of the list of eating out on campus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV5sDHilMGHK49b7Ep2ceOcuYUZ4P5cInKnkPf&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Nat D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVq59Bz_Kc8jFzJNz9bEb180ByB9AU4nY2IRQXQnfI8npN0Tz_3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Koerner‚Äôs pub is my go to for the BEST vegan tacos in the city! ü§§üåÆ As a tasty side dish, be sure to order their yummy fries smothered in vegan mushroom gravy - truly heavenly! üòã The prices and portions are very fair as well. The staff is always super warm and welcoming, and I greatly enjoy the pub ambience as well as the large patio surrounded by the lush greenery and mature trees. On a side note, be sure to check in advance to see if the pub is open as sometimes they host special events and will close for the day. This place is truly a hidden gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV3UKCC0-8HY8nb3tMBs5r1g2Yp3mZ1z7ifA-D&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2022-8-2"},{"Name":"Jess A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQcaZCQGrB5OVS66pu43CkqxqUxwzuyGP2ki5075OI4cgNK_DdiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our wedding ceremony and reception at Koerner's this past weekend. It was one of the best nights of our lives, in no small part to the staff at Keorner's. Ana, the venue coordinator, is on top of everything and was an invaluable resource. She responded quickly to all our communications, and went the extra mile to fulfill every request, including accomodating allergies and liasing with vendors to get the site setup just how we wanted.

The venue looked stunning - more beautiful that we could have imagined. It is an idyllic setting. It looking like our own little forest oasis! We had a night ceremony and it felt right out of a Midsummer Night's Dream.

The food was exceptional. I wish the chef had a restaurant we could eat at all the time! Our guests were comfortable and happy the whole night. The staff were attentive and fun. The beers they had on tap were awesome - even my favourite, Four Winds saison! We really can't say enough good things.

It was fun getting to know the venue - we visited a few times in the leadup, and hung out eating burgers and tacos. The vibe is great. We will be back as customers and look forward to attending one of their drag nights someday soon!

Big recommend and lots of love for this place!! <3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsoFuH2exuiAgDyAF2BAIjMYZg0qGUDYavAiXb&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2022-8-29"},{"Name":"Nanook Bearkiller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGd-lKZGiw3s1Cstm96X_oNJSIZl-bTkcRWm3S82g26MG6YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really poor service.
Went there at 12:30 pm. I had to wait for one full hour only to receive my burger. And then had to devour it without really tasting the damn food because my class was starting. This team is not good enough to be on campus. They're severely short staffed with inexperienced undergraduate students serving tables of 6 people. But with absolutely no competition around, they survive on monopoly.
I don't think I want to go there ever again. I try to change my friends' minds too if they suggest this place for any sort of gathering.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good taco‚Äôs but the the menu is very limited.. Very crowded on the weekends.. very hip hang out for the UBC students..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK9pm6ZuPgIIUqe-PBzrXbwWZ2KyumEdlGl06e&fid=0x0:0x7bf6312548e5f7ba"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Daniella Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvrtZ9JggwDL2AwQ_WItI2VaTglWpBeElIlHroHM6ga-UoOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Beautiful Wedding Venue***
We recently had our wedding at Koerner's Pub and we are so happy with that decision. The location is beautiful, Loafe catering was delicious, and Marcela and her team were great.
Having our wedding at Koerner's made for an easy day with no extra travel for ourselves or our guests between the ceremony and the reception. It felt intimate in the garden ceremony with a beautiful backdrop for photos. The tables already at Koerner's provided a simple and elegant feel that didn't require a ton of decorations which made for easy planning. Multiple guests came up to share how delicious the food was (we definitely recommend the flank steak with chimichurri).
Would highly recommend considering Koerner's for your wedding!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cindy Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzge4iM_AthUe2Y8lEMYg2Y2ExA0fMxlIza7QeGpuo6ooWkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came for their Happy Hour menu which I thought was the most affordable. I tried almost all their items. Their chicken wings are a showstopper...definitely a must have. I liked their chicken burger but not the side salad. Ambience was comfortable and staff were attentive.  Will definitely go back again if I'm ever in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH91GTRSzk1oTMM9p1IO53xs2WIKdEM3AxtjvG&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came on a Saturday during happy hour. The restaurant was pretty empty. I love how it's laid out and the number of tables they have.

Our server was knowledgeable and friendly. Happy hour wildlight drinks get $2 off

Inverted dude - was a coffee based drink. I didn't really like it. I wouldn't get it again

Negroni - strong and delicious

Mussels and fries (16) - plentiful and well seasoned. Loved the sauce. The French fries were crispy and addictive. Would recommend

Chicken wings 10 pieces (12) - pretty standard. Crispy on the outside. On the sweeter side.

Overall would come back to try their other items. Prices during happy hour are a steal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDxXa1iPMIaDUb3dYUzqDVP3M8rux0dOeqzQqE&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Crabby Ermine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ghzWacgyIAQrG2Lk7qt0s7V3r_adVAnu6EbLXS1Ck1zLBRgjvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 experience. Great service. Great atmosphere. Great food.  Parking is free underground and register with check in. Loved all the dishes we had today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaJa3xW-fN0TaVwqmoUrrmVKfqPIH5GB-Ezcgu&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful service in a nicely appointed dining room with a fun and trendy atmosphere. The location is particularly convenient for parents who are looking for more upscale dining options while visiting their kids studying at the nearby university.  The seafood chowder, seafood linguine, and duck breast were particularly good. We went on ‚ÄúWine Wed‚Äù where select bottles were 50% off offering good value. Portions were just adequate but not what you would consider large, but that just means you get to leave room to try their yummy desserts (I particularly liked the Stawberry Fraisier, and the Basque Cheesecake with red wine reduction).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4tLmOOTAsLJvn5WtbD1OyzUmHRy-gI1MFkAD8&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Riley Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-9EcAoNHnhEH_CEFhkVuk3VNbTy11CmDBZ6MWN5FAekK6Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TOP TIER. Premium EVERYTHING.

Quite literally one of the best dining experiences that we have ever had. From the second we walked in, we were approached by GM Margot who made us feel the warmth and excitement to host us for supper. Victor, our bartender didn‚Äôt miss a beat with suggestions and promptness of beverage top ups! Food‚Ä¶. Don‚Äôt get me started!!! I‚Äôm salivating a day later writing this review thinking about how beautifully curated each dish was designed. Chef Chow is a total artist and a master of his craft. A few musts include the Tuna Tartar, Oyster Motoyaki, Beet and Burrata salad, duck, the scallops OMG, sable fish‚Ä¶ DOUBLE OMG and an array of desserts that the pastry team had skillfully curated to reflect British Columbia‚Äôs nature and environment.

From the bottom of our hearts- HUGE thanks to the entire team for the special hospitality and delicacies. You all truly outdid yourselves.

Thank you!!
Riley and Anna","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Z8XjNkHyhAvJM342-p_KpqBWYsIkY1rwLmYe&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuLCrwKa9NLpGvoI7KXeamb10EWAoAmRoPxgdu96hyYHG6mtPkhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came the other day as a solo diner for lunch. Had the smoked sable fish chowder and the harvest green salad. The chowder was the best I've ever had. Very nice atmosphere. My server Mel was also welcoming, attentive, and came across as a genuinely very lovely person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfJygC171kXxCcNsSJo3-wLP0SQ2Uyt1Mnw7Sc&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Alex Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuPG0P_xvSAHjLq3lehdcGbMVx_kB14iyd4zXzj-7VOUEMAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First and foremost, a huge thank you to our server Naomi for making our evening at Wildlight truly special. She was an absolute joy, incredibly sweet, and very attentive and informative throughout our meal.

We split the pescatarian board and mushroom gnocchi, had the strawberry frasier for dessert, and finished with the complimentary shortbread.

Everything was absolutely wonderful.

The pescatarian board showcased a fantastic mix of seafood and pickled vegetables and was a true pleasure to explore.

The mushroom gnocchi was the epitome of comfort food with some great textures.

The strawberry frasier was incredibly refreshing and had the best ripe strawberry flavor in several forms.

The shortbread was a lovely surprise and sweet treat to end the meal before we left!

My partner and I each had two cocktails (Awesome Blossom and Pacific Vesper in the picture) and were thoroughly tempted to try more! Each cocktail was delicious, well balanced, and complimentary to the food.

Wildlight was a lovely experience from start to finish. Both my partner and I would strongly recommend an evening here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORrSSDOzpPYS1WvgEYc9nnBneuVG28DZxfzgy3&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Mary Proulx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEhEtou551etajvQPOzB4dygQrXePqTCHvPLlyMk3uMrquxnRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love gnocchi - the mixed mushroom stroganoff gnocchi here is the most fresh and flavourful ever. Half price bottle of wine Wednesday a wonderful surprise. Dessert is beautiful and enough to share. A fabulous lunch with friends; food, location and space and great service - thanks to Brandon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTKSTnTBH98HWxtMSpyf0Dq2J26QKkVW-G2ebL&fid=0x0:0x2990e8c80679c2f1"],"When":"2024-10-23"}]

[{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places at UBC to hang out! Lovely staff and wonderful vibe. Tried the grilled chicken ramen and it was generously filled, almost couldn‚Äôt finish the whole meal. Other friends of mine ordered burgers and they said they were fantastic. Prices aren‚Äôt cheap, so it‚Äôs a place to go for a celebration once in a while.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCAcUJj4YsDoBohcTlkfqkVoKoS5nD30m0xhBk&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"M J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuOygw8Aep3D50DIY1TUyT5-BADbHqefvUMdU3qf0JomdEvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of food and craft beer, good place to hang out for a few drinks. The small nachos was enough for us to share between 4-5 people, loved the roast beef sandwich too. Deep fried Mac and cheese was nicely cooked and the tomato sauce helps with the heaviness of the Mac and cheese. Ordered the IPA and loved it - crisp and had a nice aroma. The service was fast and attentive although it was busy at the time of visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXcjzjGRoyy6vduMIRbCuk6WLqez6jCJo-pmrv&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Dylan Magierek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0kVFJpnKEbseG6UEIeqqL4lraFc9x941pplBP3I-C35nxYYtP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was a nice sojourn from a long day of driving and walking around the UBC campus moving my son into the dorms.  The food was very good: especially the fries, chicken sandwich, side salad and burgers.  The French Dip was just pretty good.  I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it.  It didn‚Äôt have enough meat to balance out the kinda hard roll it came on.  Lots of beer choices and I enjoyed the Pilsner.  Expensive for a brewery/sorta pub!  But good service and atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9A45j3pzrU9X5vPV34VvyOZ59GJCSIADcF_aQ&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Anthony Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIC22IEsZIbsu-lUm5EyMjgm7JYJbJkRjU13-W8XkZYXAuixkB6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place for a sit-down, fancy-ish meal. The drinks were pretty good, and the food is delicious; definitely a nice place for a formal meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE7MmrhhKXG2H5sjxLe8eW9H0WqnR-Tuz2xtla&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Vanessa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjP-M2atXZC7s46eJ4wd5XC-RHr2pn3fRoPwoLQqghdxSrQBA9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Browns is a nice pub type spot. We got seated quickly for lunch and our server was friendly and attentive. Drinks and food came out at decent times.
My sister has celiacs disease and had heard Browns has gluten free options. They were able to make modifications on a meal and she enjoyed it, Blackened chicken Caesar with no croutons.
I got a cheeseburger with Caesar salad.
There‚Äôs a ramp and accessible entrance and chairs can be moved to fit wheelchairs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgyStbHqW6IqBgmoutJLEDmIuxPuu1FMQBsNe6&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Maria N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvvSp5rMnSOuZlWMjCChnc3kIAvhaXhf7fzSVxvOmtGCdirlnS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food and quick service. There were barely any customers when we came in on Saturday afternoon.
We got a chicken burger with a side of fries and a salad with a chicken breast (came a bit late.) Both tasted good.
Very decent place to grab a bite around UBC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh6lhWfsmLChgTOHHA4RM65-xzqYFv7EYhpgf5&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Biggie Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJXTSWG9GRBzr7s-0VIl70S37U8PyPayiekKKBiKbK7ygPFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had our work Christmas Dinner here. Great workers great food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMIthBnLk1en1HwdUUDWZ3GIt9z3pNtalz6zAt&fid=0x0:0xefc97cb7df41fcd0"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Zibiah Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIV7J0QaWpaOWLAzK9jqKBW9H-FOCY6ViMt-aqG3Okqi6IgVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am following up from my previous review that I had left a few weeks ago. Despite having a negative experience, the staff at Browns Crafthouse went above and beyond to make sure that my friends and I had a good experience to make up for what had initially happened. The manager Matt reached out and was very kind and generous, and offered to make the experience better for us. They accommodated drinks and many appetizers for our large group, and were super sweet the entire time. I cannot remember our servers name, but she was a tall caucasian woman. She provided excellent service and took my friend's gluten allergy very seriously. It was some of the best customer experiences I had. Matt himself had come out and greeted us, apologized for the previous experience, and made sure we had a great time. They went above and beyond to make sure that we had a good experience, and it was really appreciated!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Michael Al-Agha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGQRKkGkT28Nw_HnPZ8BX0sThtMkrtWz6KwHY91bAS_T64hsPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most interesting restaurants! The food is amazing and the owner Moe is super friendly and takes great care of everything.

I asked him to make something special for me and he as I was hungry and everything on the menu looked great and he made this!!! üòçüòã

Truly made me happy üôè","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmczE1V5tZ3s5jhaBMo5muCLC3QYQmEsmc7dZT&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Mike Lapenna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFIvBa0AGMBL5-B8OS4f3WOp-gipDoffwdpfbukNi-vL6h9rwvJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a fast food joint, this place really excelled. Plentiful indoor seating and a nice patio outside but I didn't see any umbrellas.  The wraps and bowls were so generous you could probably skip your next meal.  And for creativity, they had a hibiscus lemonade drink at the counter.  Nice treat.  Tasty and fresh meal.  I love the sauces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcB_kfbjDKR1HShQ8gO3AdBIUSHqxUJoe-aySR&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Kimia Abtahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2CE2uN5zYA5-Ne2mDlfB8HQlAxJSeFJKc2I3kIPxW8BoK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the chicken shawarma bowl, and the portion size was more than satisfying. It came with a nice balance of half salad, half rice, along with hummus and garlic sauce. The chicken was fresh, juicy, and flavorful, making it a great combination with the sides.

Overall, it‚Äôs a solid choice for lunch if you‚Äôre looking for something tasty and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5tMhBUnSfYx0Cr-8VqZlMAnbMAitYLg05A3k&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Shim YoLo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9XiPT_KaiLFykPP5HSZvMvML6zZQZeEGREDSKbtc8Bydct1U4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"had a fantastic dining experience at jam-jar . The authentic Lebanese dishes were bursting with flavor, from the creamy hummus. The rice bowl platter was a highlight, and the freshly baked. The employees were welcoming and attentive, making the experience even more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre looking for delicious, authentic Lebanese cuisine, it is a must-try! I‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnJYdz6JnkHPDDMw6y_sTqX0CEM-Jrnc_zgW7c&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Johnny Fansher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG34f6YSi84gg3JANp3FyD1uZ_GsH9Yb1lFgk5CMGvn43qQ2J3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the food here and the staff are really great at Customer Service. Even though I eat meat, it‚Äôs really tempting to choose the veggie items because they‚Äôre so flavourful. Try the cauliflower- it‚Äôs incredible. Wish they‚Äôd bring back the spinach. It was amazing. The new beef option is very tasty too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPGvnkdl0HFrl-pb0NzOOsM1QrWVag5QwNIG_1&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"alisha kansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZFHEBGxDSCUAtm1heLmCmdHlRcTtsx3hB7a0Qzut6tn1RZD579w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a big fan of jamjar bowls, their quantities and the freshness of the chicken they serve. I went in to grab dinner tonight and the staff was so friendly and interactive. There were two people working, a girl and a guy wearing spectacles.. he provided exceptional service and was welcoming. It feel nice to be greeted with warmth when grabbing food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQm64vLitHt25cadzV4WLtHV7SUAIBjVVvKDOR&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Michael Carlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6cVvTpa16_EmiiPiUCrcIGqzT_hc2Ni8h3jpc_TOjUKi0id0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôm working near the UBC location, Jam Jar is the best tasting, healthiest lunch you can get in my opinion. Staff is always friendly and inviting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM0ajfTl-RehxQxLmiOpcFUPg9mHXH4Ntthgjs&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Mayur M Mallya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDKxfcqN1UfRRKrGKjQdS6iwFPS4aflX7K7F8xlBkS0QmnTloP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Falafel Friday gives you the vegan falafel platter for $12 which is a good deal. It's very filling and the falafels are very crispy and tasty. The beetroot spread is the specialty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDU8o201Ob4T3m-WUcmRlH7BUN38ISHv7iYPM9&fid=0x0:0xfb8dec509effaf79"],"When":"2024-10-13"}]
