[{"Name":"BHUMIBHAT ISARANKURA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq2q32lNqyFo0KrfGj24ttb54nWiOyfCeAojSy_7eifxLc4Py8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant has a great atmosphere with beautiful, open, and spacious d√©cor, making it feel comfortable and not cramped. The food is delicious with a refreshing Asian influence that keeps it from being too heavy. The steak is well-prepared to standard. Unfortunately, I haven‚Äôt had the chance to try the pizza yet. As for the service, it is excellent, with good recommendations and fast, high-quality service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjLfhXIDR4Gj6p_IRzYZO_wq_rdyEuvSQNax9e&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Terri P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKK8V2k_b6q_xipsk-_jElMG6v53U37z-XWReCyDQGCvLBoQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my second time here but my friends' first and we were not disappointed. The only downside was they had somewhere to be after dinner and we did not leave enough time for dessert! Because of the serving style of the restaurant, be prepared to be there for some time, we were there almost 2 hours. That being said, you will get incredible food during the time spent here, so time well spent! We had the tuna, beet salad, prawns, mussels, roasted mushroom pizza, delicata squash, pork belly and clam spaghetti. Everything was delicious and we left stuffed. Even their mocktails were tasty, the passionfruit palmer and cranberry ginger drinks were enjoyed! Every single item was cooked perfectly the sauces were delicious, we had no notes for any of it. Only disappointment was we didn't plan enough time for dessert, which means we'll have to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxtvC1Y5ZOKKGfKlqOjRavvVDfZYoO1Sm4G7yM&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Chelsea B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUseM37rrUf1ar_779i4KJivOgu2tjo1UJdueB0MluX_s2zKbqf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent! We did the chefs table - fun! The food was spectacular and the service was both friendly and prompt. I would certainly return. Ps: order the buttermilk fried chicken üòÅ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6ETnnVRRHdff502OTcuZbn5bx3XH2YkCkYraV&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Ramanvir Purewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCYQdpy65F35r7DLNpGggJMW3Ybmj9II2Vxr7JWwSGa5CT6Jc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here was incredible. Each dish stood out in its own way and had complex flavour profiles which we appreciated. We had the beet salad, buttermilk chicken, cauliflower hummus, rigatoni, and salted caramel pot for dessert. All of the staff members we encountered were kind. Our server was especially attentive and knowledgeable! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFLCjSmu6trYzX3ODwgeBWYLw1okOJya66S27r&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good service , tasty food and loved my passion fruit drink ,  I told them I had shrimp allergy and they were super supportive
Making sure nothing happens!
A bit busy on the weekend , we couldn‚Äôt make reservations sat for 15 mins gave us a table
Place is a vibe even for friends or colleagues to hang out , I recommend that
And their pizza is tasty
Beef tarter was tasty as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp6lHji0YHDP1kpSNpjMytJVOMAU3YKqcmDEY3&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"atoosa sheykhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkbyn4RD5NM37B4GUyWI1eZDZ5OhjA-z6H9ss2byCFyOEDaBSx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I liked the vibe but there were so many things that I didn't like about this place.
Some servers had attitude, the menu was set and we couldn't make "any" adjustments like removing or adding anything to our food.
The food was average. I ordered mushroom pesto pizza and it was tasteless, while the salami pizza was so salty... but i loved their fries and buttermilk fried chicken was okay too.
Overall, I think the only thing that I really liked was the interior... wouldn't visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFeKAnzZtZp31A6kiDswNz0HuEMLkP4Udo2nI_&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Jason Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuQkBpFBNxfDVCdPMZPlKNkod3AabrNZg7qk8g7qYjlMsYKR78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a nice date night upstairs next to the kitchen area where we could see the dishes being created. The food was spectacular and the atmosphere was pleasant. We recommend the beet salad which was probably our favorite dish. Their beef tartare and short rib special were also very tasty. Staff were very friendly and informative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlF4rZw5BCDdp4yzsqPL27KEw-LNg_rQqahaA7&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCJGg0CTgKU7ZkFsQNfOjgJN0qwUDxPFTy4gJ5kniUMsialxLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dinner experience. Casual but classy ambience. Excellent service with some great recommendations and nice pacing between meals. We shared the beet salad, cauliflower,  fried chicken and pork belly. All very good. Cauliflower was the stand out, tender and nicely seasoned with the addition of the turmeric vinegar. Chicken was excellent, the maple sauce didn‚Äôt overpower the flavor of the chicken. Normally not a fan of beetroot salads but this was excellent and a light way to start the meal. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP26uykstTeQ3tKFqs8qqm-1FRi1IbXFZFhqUBa&fid=0x0:0x581000e98d6c9fd9"],"When":"2024-7-9"}]

[{"Name":"Jeff Seto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN5eSiEJJYqhpXbvL8bGaB50DfYGUdv8NYlxsNP3x_sp8eEujrRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Family outing was a disappointment. My jambalaya was cold and had to send it back. Only one piece of andouille sausage (the cold bite) was a bummer and the chicken was dry. My wife and daughter had the beef stew and butter chicken and it was average. Service was friendly and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxCe4rokS2lf9BBaZE7_T91FcRuvw6tC1IlYDA&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Allana Berger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKWM8axIi4jm1P_J7hVKEEINnOaULvzQtvyXxpQ3RFKEW2ytXRaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've eaten here 5 times now. Every time I'm in BC I go back! The menu changes weekly and my meals have always been delicious. My favorite was a lamb stew. They also have delicious mocktails.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhuGXRYPmzVYMJztbkxH__z7JHRuEWRdXiMbIT&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"C.A. Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6TWw2B1gYniTx9Jv9I-sjHY7yvLKIKSb2UNOXsFxJKyeXfY8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good vegan friendly healthy conscious menu. Recommend Butter Chicken and French Onion soup .. also the Brie fondue was great- if they‚Äôre on the menu when you go. We were in Vancouver for a weekend getaway. Only 1 star for service because our reservation was for 7:45p we got drinks immediately..but no food until around 9:15.. yes you‚Äôre reading that correctly. They were very apologetic and gave us a discount on the amount owed but it was still quite expensive","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhHICAkL_sKB-ZBZ-EjwSeWQ4NZ9z0ntDCNs8&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Andrea J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK65HUpzpqY6517xF0fzpt6E222LL02oqw5uRrqd-JC0F_U3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A family lunch today. What amazing service. So friendly, helpful and attentive. I would go back just for the service. As for food I had the French onion soup. It is very impressive looking, however the taste of the broth was bland. I'd like to try the Mac and cheese next time I go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn6uYKQ5t4T6IGLJ25lRXeUHAo393hZ2YcA8dH&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Rhys G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhDN_RhBJBaKomIPKrjzczztaQgfWjWmKvGOPFus9xAhXjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined in and got served by Jan, so kind + welcoming + accommodating to my preferences! I ordered the lamb special and cherry cheesecake for dessert ‚Äî 10/10 need to go again!! Definitely give this place a try when you‚Äôre in the area, this location specifically","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blue Angel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7f51VtKBeHUyxFkPNC56JU91zCBjw1D7P5VQUMNOkHX1HFd_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Managed to locate a place nearby for dinner. Was quite a nice rusty restaurant with some special priced meals and drinks. Ordered the stew beef and lager beer for dinner. Beef was really great with rich flavour beef chunk. Hope to come again next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM57iEqsxZjXMgh47M_yP-vqPJrVMC7AbcfxNdv&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute comfort food eatery. Very warm atmosphere, from the design of the inside to the friendly service. Because the place is relatively small, it‚Äôs probably not a good idea to bring a large group, but it‚Äôs a nice place for a smaller hang or even to chill by yourself. I have been curious for a while and just tried it with some friends. I probably will be back.
They have a great drink menu with lots of specialty cocktails and nonalcoholic drinks. I got a nonalcoholic pineapple guava soda. I don‚Äôt like drinks that are too sweet and this was good for me, but some people might find it weak compared to commercial fruit sodas.
I got a soup and sandwich combo as my entree with the Eggplant Caprese sandwich and the Crab Bisque. I really liked this take on a caprese sandwich, and the baguette was very fresh and soft. The bisque was very good too. Rather than being a super creamy bisque, this was more tomato-based and a little tangy. Good flavour with a fair amount of crab meat. I also liked the little side of coleslaw that was included in the combo.
Wasn‚Äôt really planning on getting dessert but then I saw they had a Chocolate Banana Bread Pudding, and I will rarely pass up on bread pudding. It was delicious but, as you might expect from bread pudding made of banana bread, with ice cream, with caramel sauce, VERY rich and heavy, and I had to get some help to finish it. I think this would be ideal for splitting between two people.
For this meal, with tip, I paid $48, which surprised me. I thought it was a good meal, but not $50 good - I‚Äôd associate that kind of price with a more upscale experience than this. I can understand the soup and sandwich pricing, the dessert was a little expensive, but what really strikes me as obviously overpriced would be the $8 soda. I understand it‚Äôs made in house, but it was just a fruity soda - no fruit bits or anything fancy, and no alcohol. It was a nice refreshing drink, but for $8 I wouldn‚Äôt say it was worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA-33yhxlhuJWzrEmE3NBivENZ-qwhvFcoFjxN&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2023-5-20"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and good service! Loved the ambiance of the whole place. It gives me this vibe that you know you'll be ordering comfort food. Not only will it fill your tummy, but also your soul.

I ordered beef bourguignon and it reminded me of Filipino dish called Caldereta üß° - minus the mashed potatoes that is.

The whole place is accessible as they're located along Main street. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT835yv9VmYFeqt5AwiAEPtu_4O-xMZON9EBlg&fid=0x0:0x57c0ba4874667b57"],"When":"2023-6-5"}]

[{"Name":"Serap Kayalƒ± Gholami Dizgah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTFRQVXCX7SQS6BQ6pasSxIsKs3p4DSYMjolAlrUqYEl-cY8OH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited here for dinner with my husband two times. Service is great. Two smiling and sincere waitresses are working there. Meals that i order were delicious and the atmosphere was impressive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM3Op7EP5Y3nl8YYGsJgA4Kp3pz0kAAR3pByvb&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Pouyan Dehno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtwhkr-cJdKmoYQrxfRnXcXnvOyhOTcEYJpa6EHWO8tS2Gmx8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant offers a truly delightful culinary experience, with dishes that showcase high quality ingredients and skillful preparation. However, the service was notably slow, and the ambiance fell short of expectations, lacking the refinement typically associated with such fine dining. While the food impresses, improvements in service and atmosphere would enhance the overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIuo5tTmxMWN9zQZG9cUmPoszu8EZeKFdBpKpH&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"sepideh seif","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5UKhDTeeeLjQCfPKjxANVFavkAHOkG0tqy20oIcqf3zulO1i5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointing Food Quality and a Serious Health Concern!

I ordered Zereshk Polo with Chicken from Sahel Restaurant. I‚Äôve been a customer in the past, and while the food wasn‚Äôt amazing, it was decent enough. But this time, things took a turn for the worse.
1.¬†¬†¬†¬†Food Quality and Taste:
The food was a huge letdown. The rice was low-quality, and the chicken stew tasted off‚Äînothing about the meal was enjoyable.
2.¬†¬†¬†¬†The Bigger Issue:
After we finished eating, we noticed some of the chicken stew had spilled on our wooden dining table, leaving a bright yellow stain. We tried everything‚Äîwater, dish soap, glass cleaner, even bleach‚Äîbut nothing worked.

It made me wonder: if this stain won‚Äôt come off wood, what could it be doing to our bodies? This doesn‚Äôt feel safe at all.

My Concern:
I suspect they‚Äôre using industrial dyes, because no regular food coloring behaves like this. If that‚Äôs true, it‚Äôs a serious health risk, and I think people deserve to know.

Recommendation:
If you care about your health and your family‚Äôs well-being, I‚Äôd strongly recommend avoiding this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8jmpUQupvSWwC_-hv7GjUcfaG_zKSjB02EtvO&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was introduced to this restaurant by an Iranian friend. This was not my first Iranian meal at a restaurant so I have something to compare it to. While I can‚Äôt say we didn‚Äôt enjoy our meals, we found it a little pricey for what we received (even though everything costs more now).  Got lots of rice, a little meat and a large, simple salad with iceberg lettuce, tomatoes and strips of white onions. The salad is extra $ so without the salad I would have gotten just white rice with a bit of saffron on top, and the meat of our choice. The service was ok. The server could have been a little more like she wanted to be there and she kept asking us if we were ready to order even though we were clearly trying to read the menu and there were few people in the restaurant. The decor was interesting and pleasant. Overall, the food and atmosphere was nice and it was clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwpmGXxDV5_H-Z2ZZNGkH-7mykYYYJjQrpZGFE&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Elisa C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL2lUy5bxGLdwO14Ak-o90HTc6qoGSbKWqQb4UwvbHEn8AkSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here with childhood friends and had an awesome experience! The food was perfecy! Thr kebobs, the lamb shanks, the lambchops were cooked well! The appetizers were also superb! It was so flavorful and very well spiced! The atmosphere was very nice that we can actually have a conversation! Definitely will recommend to everyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgKKQnhhb9sPNhPot_r80_fQ-LPbzz7VZtMRit&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Sayed Mohammad shah Alamy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5MSJX1Myc5T-NKHbM57xYfgR4StG_GNfQk_78_5oLsRqO6J_v3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In case you meet Vancouver, don‚Äôt forget to serve your lunch here.
Thank me later.
Parking is available in the back and front( pay).
Peaceful environment, Great service, employees are respectful.
***      ***
Thank you for making Vancouver great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxRyrOrgx9pmZDch2L5H5-fhYWCjr7X4Ymig3g&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Anthony M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSwZ3gihtJCFDiJKXJxblhX11nnXU6XFc6KEDZWT5hbewV_tcP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Persian food restaurants around, which are also not as common in Kits! Excellent quality and their kebab dishes are fantastically prepared!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhkbMqPKz5MyxdB_0s_XfzWC4FMCO_COqlOYjW&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Marcus L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZLCsGchamGOA-Wtg05cndL2yjt6EBGtYR9Y9cWGpcdNb3N09u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Sahel Restaurant on Broadway with a group of friends, and we had a fantastic dining experience. The ambiance was warm and inviting, perfect for a relaxed evening out. We ordered a variety of dishes, including the chicken kebab, beef kebab, and several appetizers. The chicken kebab was tender and flavorful, while the beef kebab was perfectly cooked, juicy, and seasoned to perfection. Among the appetizers, the grape leaf wrap stood out with its fresh and tangy taste. I also tried their traditional yogurt drink, which was refreshingly good.

The portions were generous, and the prices were very reasonable, making it a great value for the quality and quantity of food we received. The service was excellent, with the staff being attentive and friendly, enhancing our overall experience.

In summary, Sahel Restaurant offers a delightful blend of delicious food, great service, and a pleasant atmosphere. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a satisfying meal with friends or family. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of kebabs or curious about trying new appetizers, this restaurant won‚Äôt disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWoD_Sdo1kreJlAOnVK0a-w6_MMYhCzXoA-Ks&fid=0x0:0xeb24604b18caa0d9"],"When":"2024-6-26"}]

Additionally, the quality of the chicken was subpar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfO5RDIAxL5yUixp2Xyode6M7MkXv8-zeEBtxY&fid=0x0:0xfba7b2899b4f414c"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"eshita Bhatia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY-tStRltFZvbyB3WKXJ4NtHfoS2-Wo4TtAutQDeWB3ZjsK7aNpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Only one worker working and doing everything. The milkshake tastes like chocolate milk, plain liquid, no thickness to it for $8. Waste of money, will not be returning","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Gong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU6Nrm_sRXxa4lpEjkIrZxamz6LceMGV7mYsCaPEW4FMeyz2s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Most over-priced burger and fries I have ever had in my life. I paid $20+ for those two low quality items, and I spent 20 mins waiting for my order. Unbelievable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN631R1cPS3wdtE7V2X44E-JEd_XK6KnfeYAx-X&fid=0x0:0xfba7b2899b4f414c"],"When":"2022-8-25"},{"Name":"Hoori Barkh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsmGMB0Ma8Q_QX1b7LIeHjfj2OE3c7JiglHyQcJ3rqf9KbgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Skip Vera‚Äôs!
Ordered online and paid, when we got to the store apparently they never received our order so we ordered again and paid (1 week later I‚Äôm still waiting for my online order refund).
Took a while to get the food ready (that‚Äôs fine, made fresh-ok) but the quality of the burgers was just mediocre. Nothing to complain about but nothing to rave about either.
Restaurant was completely empty on a Friday night. Surprised they are still in business to be honest.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhVR02aPzwVvQvqn63QlXyk0bgYy0E-LewKb9qSI5x_FX_h9ejyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There are many great mysteries in life. How were the Pyramids built? What is Love? And most mysterious of all, how is this place still in business? It is always empty. Never go to an empty restaurant.
Only thing I tried was the chocolate milkshake. Was disappointed with the size, price, and texture and the time it took to make it. Why does it take 15 minutes to make a milkshake when I am the only one there? If you are going to get one make sure to ask for it well blended or get a spoon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esmed P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPaVfVvhS7UlShhw7n3W_Eju3p15-TBYDAUGYnwKIb2zgwxN8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went during my lunch hour & ordered. I wait, & after 25 minutes pass watching the person who took my order have a conversation with another staff in the kitchen, I get up & start to hover at the counter. I guess they noticed, because I saw only then, did they start cooking my order. There's no ketchup available, so I asked for some. The lady seemed confused, then insited they keep it behind the counter. Finally after waiting another 20 minutes, I'm given my burger with smallest amount of ketchup possible, after this lady had sassed me about literally, 3 drips of water which fell from my fountain drink after pouring myself water. I didn't bother to try to ask for more kerchup I wanted. Bottom line, do not go here, unless you want horrendously slow & rude service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS9FnL1Xm2VSimjexdVbc5QM_VHkzVtM3eQen6wRNt-IyDFLYSYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not sure how this place stays in business. I used the Vera's app to order a burger and got confirmation of my order at 6:12 pm, but the burger wouldn't be ready until 6:45 pm (not that the restaurant was the slightest bit busy). I showed up at the restaurant at 6:35 and the staff weren't aware of my order and asked what app I used. Really? Once the order was located they proceeded to make the burger and it was ready by 6:50. I had ordered a Vera burger ($10.50) with a few free toppings, cheese ($2 extra) and bacon ($2.50 extra). When I sat down to eat the burger I thought they'd forgotten the bacon so I brought it up to the counter. It was pointed out to me that there was a piece of bacon on the burger, but at most it was one square inch! For $2.50? The burger tasted fine and I've enjoyed Vera burgers for a long time, but if there were a Five Guys anywhere on the West Side I would never go back to Veras.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tano Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZTH6gNWlc-cb4ja-Rt0oeskyJW7A4uEUVtm6QYAF2hoCk8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely terrible service on a non-school day at the UBC campus location by this employee. Had ordered my burger 35 minutes ahead on the app and she did not accept the order until I physically got there.
What is the point of skip the line function of the app if takes your money and not process your order","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuESOGkrJ4ca-F7MGAy2wyT8MDyLvBk6Wdks6G&fid=0x0:0xfba7b2899b4f414c"],"When":"2019-2-23"}]

You not getting what you pay for  üëéüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0Q15WSWaE7kDNYi33Fxr9jABALneqsv05hItD&fid=0x0:0x6b2fe19df9ea71b0"],"When":"2022-12-5"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place for a drink and food in between skiing. Above average for ski hill food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0EGy5FUBzBkTiE3p9zEpVVtmFie0X4GL6pdsp&fid=0x0:0x6b2fe19df9ea71b0"],"When":"2021-12-26"},{"Name":"Ryan Zimmerman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTWTrKtNoS0msCFKU5CqwYK57fAxPk13mbyXMGtvtJ_ZqfcRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is a dump. The service is actively rude to guests just trying to get food, the food is cold upon arrival to your table and sometimes prepared completely wrong. I found dirt on my lettuce in my salad! Completely disgusting, and when asking the server about, she said there was nothing she could do. Completely unhelpful. Avoid at all costs!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKarmcGZ1Js35SCZKS4LzTbiBHhnd6ukNdOqfbApRvwTocr3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Looking for a restaurant with an incredible ocean view? Look no further!

‚Ä¢Service: we ordered at the window since we wanted to sit and eat on the beach. The girl who took our order was very friendly! Our food didn‚Äôt take long, maybe 8-10mins.

‚Ä¢Chicken Burger with Fries, 3.5/5: I‚Äôm sad they don‚Äôt make the chicken burger they used to, it was a 5/5! The new burger‚Äôs served on a soft brioche bun, chicken was nicely cooked, lightly seasoned and deep fried. Coleslaw on the burger was a nice touch, it gave me pulled pork sandwich vibes. Unfortunately, as you can see in the photo, this seriously lacked BBQ sauce, or I would‚Äôve given this a higher rating. I‚Äôd still recommend trying this burger, just ask for extra sauce. *Boat Shed, if you‚Äôre listening, please bring back the old chicken burger, it was outstanding!

‚Ä¢Cod Burger 3.75/5: there‚Äôs nothing quite like eating fish and chips by the sea! Again, what‚Äôs with the lack of sauce? Also served on a fresh brioche bun, we got a generous piece of cod, which was cooked to perfection! The batter‚Äôs thick and well-seasoned. Once again, coleslaw‚Äôs a nice touch, especially on this burger. You‚Äôll want to eat this fairly quickly, between the soft bun, coleslaw, pickle and battered fish, it can get a bit soggy. I wish there was more tartar sauce, I would‚Äôve given 4/5, but I still highly recommend this, just ask for extra sauce. My friend and I agreed this was the better burger of the two!

‚Ä¢Parmesan Truffle Fries with Garlic Aioli, 2.75/5: truffle isn‚Äôt my favorite, but my friend loves it, so I tried a couple. We agreed that given the mild truffle flavor and sprinkle of Parmesan, these didn‚Äôt justify the $4 upgrade. *Side note, my friend said they‚Äôd get Garlic Aioli as a dip for the regular fries, it was good.

‚Ä¢Regular Fries, 5/5: delicious! Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, served piping hot. The fries alone make me want to come back!

Overall: Burgers cost $20 and come with French Fries, or upgrade to Yam or Parmesan Truffle Fries for an additional $4. Portions are generous, depending how hungry you are, two people could share a burger and fries. After these tasty meals today, (minus the sauce issue, which I know to ask for extra next time), I‚Äôd return to try other things!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3Y7axcqJYk4_N7QRJYRcj8o3iJaNYnHBjuP1Y&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Selena Di","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpeYx0Hy_h2KTOyIkW4-1JaPj6jgnO27OxLHg2-s4kfI5B0x9Tqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed a lovely evening there with great food and a beautiful sunset! I love how close it is to the playground. It helps to keep our little one happy! Lamb salad was really fresh and not gamy at all. And all three of us just can't stop munching on the yam fries! My husband particularly love the dipping sauce.  I love the nice Coastal decor. We would be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8XDiBffGx5w6QgL4dtPaaAdP8O3Azpm3u_3v1&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2022-6-14"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute, casual place with awesome beachfront location. Local beers on tap, and a great semi-enclosed patio with heaters or firebowls. Diverse menu. Breaded chicken burger with bacon/pineapple was a big hit! The fish in the fish tacos is just like in fish & chips rather than the more classic breaded or grilled, so just be aware - tasty tacos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLdUnJ3EAOQKM7ktCxAhPlA29f4ZwB6PgJF2BO&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2022-4-18"},{"Name":"Ann Badjura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf1oROONtXShauxBz8Kbl0XDKTAr0Sjwkq1X29oWc2s6lLWbaZug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed a delicious lunch in this beautiful decor right near the beach.  The service was  good and the food was very tasty.  My friend had the Lamb Chop Lollipops and I had the Baja Fish Tacos, very yummy!  Definitely will be back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-fHZ2SO-BsDC2uVn-BjbF0I46SS3XP4BTvHHQ&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2022-3-3"},{"Name":"Mahsoo Naderi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlMoke0JCqT8P0Sn3G7LxmNt9shKQNKnZZn122ipxf8HFR2YZs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gosh it doesn‚Äôt get better than this! Oceanfront, sandy beach and the best drinks and food with great service. The boat shed is a beautiful establishment and represents WestVancouver at its best.

There are three types of seating, one under the tents, one loung seating by fire tables as well as beautiful enclosed green house to sit indoors.

We also had the luxury of a live band called Kasual when we visited and we had a blast. We spent extended hours at the location and had food from lunch, snack and dinner through the day and evening üòÉ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe4luaflQxr1Qc4cJmfkSQOjd8g6DZXB2SjNqB&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2022-7-10"},{"Name":"Seyedeh Azadeh Yousefi Namini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTxov3jU5DoVsV-PYEDzHM6U7eeM8G84pGpbripabbIGrZ4QW7Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was walking beside the beach while I was looking  around for have a meal and then reached to this cozy restaurant. The atmosphere was pretty friendly and the beer was good enough. I ordered the ‚Äúboat-shed burger‚Äù which I though it should be their best burger, however it could be more delicious than what it was. I saw a lot of people who grabbed ice cream, so my next order will be this item in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkJm6sc_obfKJao6xYthSRerJqT3MJ7MVOrJu5&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2023-6-26"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had coffee ‚òïÔ∏è Here .... its got indoor and outdoor seating areas at this restaurant and take out  ,very busy here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEWmDa1AoTZe9osJpMNuc-kOVYSEwCIXOJ-CQa&fid=0x0:0x68a5abf78bd85733"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Nicole Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWltNSl1W9xOO9aX9k5F0EmnNY3QDQmo598V68Lw7btyS5ftLW7Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to love this place but the food has gone downhill. Fish & chips were greasy, barely any fish in the batter with soggy fries. The tuna poke is no longer a fresh bowl, it was so salty and served on salty chips with nothing else. So sad, hopefully by next summer it will improve.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Feast
address: 2525 West Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z3
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rowan Tetrault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfO97gMjqDhcxLto7LhpXIwpHTc_aV_Za2PD-ik6ShIa9lAwtk0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is one of the three conventional first year dining halls on UBC campus, and it is solidly alright.

They always offer a very wide selection of food at their various different stations including different types of pizza, burgers, pasta, and spins on traditional Mexican, homestyle, and Asian cuisine. They have all of this along with quite the yogurt/salad bar assortment + desserts and drinks.

Unlimited food with so many options is definitely a benefit, but some choices can be subpar at best and I noticed readily accessible protein options (primarily meat) are not always available.

My go to "clean" options (download nutrislice to be sure, but don't expect to see nutritional facts posted publicly ANYWHERE) that also taste pretty good include the sesame chicken salad with a hard boiled egg, any of their salmon meals, or a simple yogurt bowl.

It may be difficult to eat here everyday, but sometimes there are hidden gems and the staff never disappoint. This is why they deserve an absolute minimum of 4 stars :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp1PYN4xQ9rgNxumgQsKC0nK56EXU44ehjOiVv&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Robin Zhuo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4YJfTGesCXz1xbhn6UpYAqxjtSHa4hbLPPN34KDkRy9WuDw0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Best 1st yr dorm dining hall for sure, but the quality are not stable :‚Äô( , staffs are absolutely helpful and amazing. If u r not in meal plan pay this dining hall for 12-20$ are insane.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg61NRqlYqOY2-UH5B9vI8ZVC7VD4Ykn4YspXU&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Feast is Totem Park Residence's dinning hall. With 4-5 separate kitchens serving unique styles of food, students and guests eating here will enjoy the food.

The atmosphere here is wonderful. There are celling-to-floor windows, allowing much natural sunlight into the dinning hall. The seating can sit 200-250 people. Sitting varies from cafe tables, to Howarts style long tables or high-chair tables found in coffee shops. The food-serving area of the dinning hall is immediately at the place where you pay so you can line up to get your food. To avoid the line at the main entrance of the dinning hall, you can go to the back to pay as well.

The food here is okay. This is not a high-end restaurant. The food may not be for everyone. Also, there's a self serve ice cream machine, yogurt and salad bar. There are coffee machines and juice dispensers. There are plently of fruits, snacks and bread. At night, the pizza kitchen opens. Food is served in small to medium portion which is perfect for those who do not eat as much or want to try multple things. Chefs are polite and kind and will be willing to give you a bit of extra food if you ask.

There is no washroom in the dinning hall. You will have to leave the dinning hall and lose your ability to come back to use the washroom.

If you come here during regular meal times, expect there to be lots of students. If you come during 8:30am, 9:30 am or any time when class is in session, there are not as many people. Menu of the dinning hall can be found at both front and rear entrance. Menu can be found online as well through Nutrislice app.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWzm1_3n7h1l2H9rwoh2H89TZ0Fq1NXU3odOco&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Jarod Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvAxeA4y5ekP9kJ4EmyOw8TsE05_KmQ9ASGN1BZSNnDc39dHRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This buffet-style restaurant is amazing. You pay $16 and can enjoy unlimited servings of various foods, drinks, and desserts. While the food itself is just okay, it‚Äôs truly incredible considering the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4uPJeAZ6lVIORSxF5yULsp8ZpenwbVQF3Fcqh&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2023-12-7"},{"Name":"Brendan Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3Qlg33iKZu8wkzLBmt9R9RBp_9-J_M_xbmFoyCBbc0eyazMCC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome!  Very reasonable price and if you like to eat alot the variety is awesome.   I can't believe a place like this exists for the price.   It is not fine dining but it is deffinatly a few steps above what you would expect for eating lunch anywhere at a university campus.  Came here with my 9 year old daughter who is a healthy eater and we both had 3 breakfasts.  She loved being able to get up and go get whatever she wanted.   Good selection of different drinks avalible Aswell.   Highly recommend. For the price, nothing beats it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN7yTSIDM_65m4bBL6QwgHr2tRxv3ruxm0pDbJ&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is quite amazing and the food is very healthy, you can taste the health! For only a flat rate of $15.00 for lunch, it's an all you can eat buffet which includes roasted veggies, curry, rice, Bahn Mi, tacos, fries, burgers, smoothies, juices, milk, soft drinks, coffee, tea, salads, fruits, and desserts, including frozen yogurt! Where else are you gonna find a lunch buffet for $15.00 these days and such quality healthy ingredients!!! Highly recommend it! The only reason it lost a star is that the taste of the food is just average but for the price, it's awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMefaQLhCYBXkPvbE6zYnfa2QtOKPoJTciFo0p1&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2022-10-5"},{"Name":"Ahnaf Muqset Haque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9JdQZtXBMvD618JDWqRmaMkXk-I2NhqdPuW2NLQFP33Qn87KikQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Feast is one of the first year resident dining places at the University of British Columbia. They have a bunch of variety of cuisines and have all sorts of options(vegan, vegetarian, halal, etc.) to meet your needs. The food is not so great in terms of taste and is quite expensive. Ambience is great though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYAuVTb8ktuztAQgPbE2inlqJ4Yo-UDnubXkp8&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2019-3-28"},{"Name":"Ethem Can","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGyCt7ndLGEeKEaL2-gks_s7s8Q37Wov3ouVX3P4o--96Axg9t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Foods are delicious and perfectly designed. Only downside is there is always crowded and you need to wait some time to get your food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYUnLzVImnmGR01tQ3elsZg4CjFNKf14pGd5Sm&fid=0x0:0xec0f3de356e04cd1"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kenya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjtS4eKGwBDqvMLeplRLVDao5QH11bb1EySD0RN-X9yknz-EJeqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this pasta with shrimp, and it was very tasty. The place has a menu with several options, many drinks and dessert. It is worth sitting on the balcony with a privileged view of the Marina.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMiNIrNSGZMhlWYSunMchXP8lLaB8zGaHpaZVW\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Jesse Kleine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhDJwJtNoHhzkdPqehlICXjfVyD5X4CiEUSsmGimbrIfjosJxf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A true fusion experience! Loved the kimchi pancake. So much variety. The chefs are very talented and flown out from Korea. Upscale atmosphere, great spot to meet with friends or coworkers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpJjToh0oUKsCvpt0a2huDkWA9cOcTl_HlfkSk\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2023-6-26"},{"Name":"Hailey Back","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwFqhSE72as-im2u0svrKaoxVQi6V_ITIi98p64I654kuC-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time here and everything was really good ! I had their signature pasta, mushroom salad and mushroom risotto and I highly recommend the risotto. Atmosphere was also good. Good for night dates and friends gathering. 10/10 !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMahVX2LDqQnr_KDKgnXnS0oVcBCiR6IEbPd8Yb\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2023-6-21"},{"Name":"Rachana Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURZq_MYCCGK_JlH_IPj_kd7xHORfGeI01XuaDLnqI1WJOWfs1F=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot is a hidden gem amid many restaurants in West Van, convenient location and amazing food! We got in as we were strolling because it looked very chic and cozy. They have absolutely sophisticated dishes which are amazingly flavorful! I absolutely loved their Truffle Mushroom Risotto and the Bossam (Brised pork belly). Will definitely go back for them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJhjaEpVWCVjfHSd6bURIXUOLN9LFd3MRVpQCz\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Gautam Banerjee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHajhCwYW4DTbqgNNOlKY4tuSnTpTnDFUsfRBSgdw996ogOm0b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great. Great staff, menu and ambience have real character.\n\nPancake was perfect. Bridge chicken was great. Only chicken thighs which is the only civilized way to eat chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWVEmDxCh_RzzKNEGxc4NYY6hTnKlB9PZaKRzK\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Marie Allouche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlN5bPklw-2uGZKa_92H1dE8SfPvBdrTgb2Zvpwj0nt8zRNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this new restaurant in West Vancouver \"The Bridge\" and decided to try it as the reviews were excellent. We were not disappointed, the service, food and atmosphere were all very good. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnKZzRJHd8yRf0fg2txg0nFplJW_3EG7HG7jrh\u0026fid=0x0:0x71758283ba110515"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Lavish Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCtGGWygIgFcXWSX7O6-JqoSiN2MDTTvjgEXyGBGRTabqFLvtz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has left the best impressions! The dishes were high quality with a variety of appetizing options on the menu. The food was delicious with great presentation and inventiveness. The servers were extremely attentive, and polite. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sal Schr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbYs1NFTzrRMK7w7KKCEw7ckCT19Ub2FK5_CmWCvGcmgC6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate here recently and the food was delicious. We ordered the Crispy Seafood Pancake, Beef Tartare, Braised Pork Belly and Truffle Mushroom Risotto. I enjoyed every bite, but the star for me was the truffle mushroom risotto. My mouth is watering just thinking about it! The staff were very attentive and I loved the lighting and decor. We‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tri Chiem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV76ViCOxXXWMKP4lRuLunoG1loVzTHH80Dy_sbuwL0hytqMclkWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Happy to see a Vietnamese restaurant land here. Pho hit the spot, broth is clear and tasty.

Papaya Salad was nice and fresh, could use a little more seasoning or fish sauce.

On the pricey side for Vietnamese but given the location overall a great dinner out. Will be back to try more from the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRqVdmEWD8Bw-GnGlePl17fUR1DR7v0yVSXHjc&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2021-11-15"},{"Name":"Kim N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbdjDpWyXnvjc80j1Uggeb1c_m_wfTt6lOvg1Z_TeE5AinsEnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had Pho, Bun Bo Hue and spring rolls. The food is very decent with good potion. Won‚Äôt say it tastes the best in town but still good. The waitress is super nice too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvnKnrHhTaaaTnGyGu3z-1KykScPA1eUpj7P-e&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2023-1-8"},{"Name":"winter sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKGe1B1o42z4TkrS6ZTzd5bgqdgflwjHOABgnbES-oKX5uxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nice family run restaurant with friendly staff and homey vietnamese cuisine. we missed vietnam so much that we decided to take a day off today and try some authentic vietnamese food.

the restaurant is big enough for customers to social distance. all staff were wearing masks. hand sanitizer is also available in at the restaurant

salt and pepper chicken wings - wings were made to order. the flavour was enhanced by natural ingredients such as garlic, onion and chili pepper

lemon soda - refreshing and not too sweet. great pairing with the salt and pepper chicken wings

house special vermicelli with prawns, chicken, beef, and 2 spring rolls - generous amount of toppings on the vermicelli. the meats were nicely marinated. the vermicelli dipping sauce is also very tasty

house special beef pho - homey taste without msg. broth was made from real ingredients and we didn't feel thirsty afterwards. there were also generous amount of toppings on the pho

papaya salad - the papaya is really fresh and the house special sauce makes this dish memorable

shrimp on sugar cane - the shrimp paste has a good texture and taste. it was perfectly cooked

thank you five corners for bringing back our foodie memories from vietnam","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVh3aVTK5fhS905F7Pc4GeSi5WkgYAWkxqpNdW&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2021-10-7"},{"Name":"azadeh ghadimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3syZO8WZsUkBKmJPIrXXsLw3vXkHdsuB8NC5hQgaUdyCeVc8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good, we ordered spring roll, fried wonton and stir fried seafood and noodle.
I liked wonton more than spring roll in terms of flavor. Fried seafood was lacking strong flavor, but with chili sauce that you ask it make fantastic. Price was reasonable for the portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqFJKp1dZ1J1Ff1DpbByWsmPbQISLA28bOyMDJ&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"KC CLAY FLOWERS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjHlWzIim_FuzOFm9RWi0CgeKWQj7ySiZICNdORO2eQ9BAXZxWAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend to try this place the food was great and the taste is good . I went there yesterday and it was my dating day with my husband., actually it‚Äôs a wonderful mistake to walk in to here . This place was a Taiwanese restaurant before and we‚Äôre expecting to come for our day üôÇüòÜ
But we stop and we try !!  the papaya salad is so good without MSG . The noodles soup was great the best taste is short ribs and chicken wings I can‚Äôt describe more how good it is I really enjoy it and highly recommend  to this place for people who‚Äôs looking for a good Vietnamese restaurant and all the menu are no MSG in it.. Anybody needs to know please visit and enjoy the food!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzc35E8oHPBq8WJr7cpQRyHOtu5pvvKeayN2cP&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2021-9-26"},{"Name":"ÊùéÈõÖËéâ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7DWm95WZFHNeru6ATqFOhtZtBJ8GsGOfLXrWoOwWT182_3p29=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pho in this restaurant is tasty and big . The skewers are also delicious. I'll try others on the menu  next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbMGaUFuGuSFkUV4eGwcWX2QKDOby0UeitwZZ9&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2022-6-3"},{"Name":"Mike Luigi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw8q5r2qHhD6vGj4UABQHOdCDdnfMvH4kGe4goSbFbSAqD_L9PQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overrated on Google, in short, spring roll is  small and flavourless, pho is flavourless with overdose of noodle, chicken skew is either hard as rubber or partially uncooked. Hopefully the regular chef is on leave today; otherwise AVOID.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiRWtMIVaPH-hmsgji7qaGtBCXg2T20gWHaNjg&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2022-9-23"},{"Name":"Megan G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7jHOOTLpp25Zo5T64Gs41wRTQBcQDfl3Qty0bNNnd7q7dAReL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm sorry but the two Viet subs we got were extremely dry and tasteless.. there was NO mayo or pate, just a piece of dry pork, a fired egg, little bit of shredded carrots, piece of cucumber and little cilantro. Definitely cannot justify the price for this quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP08by_4OPWJJtKX9QmP1l8hU49wrv2ellvJ9gK&fid=0x0:0x397df20ca7317a8e"],"When":"2022-11-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing take-out dishes & soups, with the freshest possible seafood variety from the shop.

Clam chowder was amazing, with chunks of fresh seafood in it, and the ahi tuna poke was very fresh, with decent amount & price.

I would strongly recommend this take-out if you are looking for a quick, healthy bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFc9vS1TYdW1AOFtVzO-ISWnggMnMGZ0kaMPzD&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Bo Roberts-Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_u1cxwyaqZaE7qBoefcWC8EsyxV21H8EIJnKKF1sJSqqKjvJV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried a lot of different lunch spots. I would eat their food every single day. It was the freshest! So many different fresh fish dishes and other seafood items, mixed in healthy bowls, tacos, or sandwiches. Big fan, they were consistently really solid. My favourites were the miso halibut or sablefish bowls with an extra side of shrimp!
Food 10/10
Atmosphere N/A take out
Service 10/10
Value 10/10
Extremely rare that I give tens but this is well deserved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS30SSirrYMD3OJosm5O7YyO-ArqIbdclkl5wl&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2022-4-17"},{"Name":"Oleg G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqSAITgIuHrivchlCYYCNZTLp95MCOTFLHYCo0ZvhJWSTcxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in West Van area and decided to check Nell's Kitchen. It was the best bowls I have ever tried. Extremely delicious and healthy. I loved every single bowl and it was the best clam chowder I have ever tried! So bad I live pretty far from this area! Thank you Nell for your delicious bowls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAgxmnUWrys7yHR1N50z9EDBnO0ZuFdYxbVmSO&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2019-12-11"},{"Name":"Lena S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLi1cuQweV3wRBtWDW9TcKmxNwl26oduQC51b8c3El15qs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great lunch options, tasty made-to-order bowls with fish of choice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlTOPaMYdEi3NE_h3DmK_8ValXbYcRbAhmFTc&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We  came here for a late lunch. Their food is fresh, simple, & delish. There are chairs available outside. Why not enjoy your food by the ocean. There are plenty of benches and picnic tables along Ambleside. They‚Äôre located right inside the Village Fish & Oyster Market off 15th and Marine Drive in West Vancouver. Lunch‚Äôs from 11 am to 3 pm.

Food: 5/5 - tasty fresh seafood. Lots of fresh and healthy ingredients. If you like halibut and ahi tuna, go for the Halibut Tom Yum over a bed of rice or the Ahi Tuna Tataki bowl.

Ambience: 3/5 - seating outside but best to enjoy it at the beach.

Service: 5/5 great service & friendly staff

Free parking on the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHfTgw5JcmR9uLzcT6ZGPSVY4AmaPlUzjgxmxl&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"David Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfA-kOU7xliddqeq24f50pbZSzEpPCzW3VfNrEQUVJkz4Qd9Fp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nell's kitchen is a hidden gem. It's as close to a literal analogy as possible as it is tucked by the window of a fresh fish store. It was the first location where fish burgers and sandwiches are not dry. Albeit, 16 dollars for a salmon burger, the price, from my experience as an avid food consumer, is justified. The freshness of the fish as well as how recently the food was prepped is reflected not only in the flavours, but the texture as well. Nell was polite, concise, and quick with her orders. She was manning the kitchen by herself but went through the short line of customers with ease.

A must-visit location from anyone living in Greater Vancouver. I stopped by as I was in need of a lunch and was passing by, but it is a trek I am willing to make from Coquitlam.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEn_b_sWhjQxhVI7VzOykng4vNcDHtJgCJPWRM&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2022-1-13"},{"Name":"Uoo HKNK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhFgMxt793tXBA8E6Y6g3RzKzq7Ueaoavc-a8C1h7aDz7PpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No frills, good price, straight flavor.
Simple atmosphere and set up. Magnificent food. I bought the Salmon Burger which came with a salad. The price was excellent. The burger was excellent. They even had a table with spices. Ok!
p.s. I love these people for what they have down to cuisine","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Serena Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbrLK_jCIEl3uKWnHZXyx0Zrs4D4JHJ3wyh0KvOm-js3BTp0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôm visiting for a month in Vancouver since last week and it‚Äôs my first seafood local meal. They are very kind and all meals I ordered were great. So delicious. I want to go this place again before I go back to my country.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6Z0iZAFkM0l8POeDosBoEoPoIPuIuYbUOp2XO&fid=0x0:0xef5213fda728279b"],"When":"2022-1-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rowan Tetrault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfO97gMjqDhcxLto7LhpXIwpHTc_aV_Za2PD-ik6ShIa9lAwtk0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unless you live in Place Vanier, it may seem inconvenient to come all the way to Gather for food, but when their best options are available it is 100% worth it.

One thing I noticed about the 3 UBC dining halls is that they try their best to be high quality, so when it took 5 minutes for my ordered poke bowl to be made I knew that it would be good. The fish tasted fresh and the bowl was stuffed with kimchi, edamame, and other goodies that I did not expect them to include.

Just because of this experience and the other high quality options Gather frequently has (including their solid shawarma and gyro wraps and vegan brownies) I seriously believe this could be the best first year dining hall on campus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPMwUMSywIfBT8IVruFiiEXEKlWcFg9eiskGds&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Hugh Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFlJmYlj82sx6sLKOje56IkZUG693ZnITvHtJUekoopvQlVKt9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There‚Äôs a station here at Gather called ‚ÄúSimply Local‚Äù that makes some outstanding dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9pJkT3-BNBojmCwdrk9PX3Gn5zU2s_WhpLb6-&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Place Vanier's Gathering Student Residence Dinning Hall is one of the three dining halls available on the UBC campus. It is the farthest dining hall compared to the other two.

After entering the building, you will have to take a flight of stairs to get to the dining hall. The food available at Place Vanier comes from a variety of different cultures. Everyone will find something good to eat the dining hall. The dining hall can sit 200-300 people. It is a buffet style dining hall and you can get as much food you can eat.

There is a salad bar and custom sandwich making station. There is a  burgers, tacos, pork bun and pork belly ramen station. Food changes from time to time. It is best to check Nutrislice, the online menu app, to see what food the dining hall is serving before paying. The dining hall building has big windows overlooking the court yard of Place Vanier. You also have different kinds of seats like the Caf√© style seats and also the long dining hall tables.

During regular hours like mornings from 8-9am, lunch from 12-1pm, and dinner from 7-9pm, you will find lots of people there. You can avoid the traffic by avoiding these common times or arriving earlier to skip the potential line-up for food.

The presentation of the dish is average. The portions are small. Food is placed on the counter which may get cold and unclean. Food quality tastes ok, but the servers are more concerned about getting as much food out to as many students and people as possible. During peak hours, the place becomes hectic.  Food also is warm, not hot after peak times. Staff there are friendly and kind.

Washrooms are downstairs, separate from the dining hall.

Parking is very close to the dining hall about a 5 minute walk. Near this dining hall, there are lots of nice trees to look at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkJTXAZhQtPzHpRvjlF4cdHyFgKSktppk9ET2t&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Ra√∫l de Le√≥n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR1w_Ji0Yz-Xp82r5o46luBx2_3UdjKeiMHOkVr4mcBNjLxloC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't know why people give bad reviews, this place is amazing. Food is tasty, service is good, great choice of dishes, and for the quantity of food you can eat it's worth. I come here very often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSUe-AzPEDj9K7keJtauLlc84KoBtXeRrR1lB2&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2023-9-30"},{"Name":"Michelle Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrZc4FOCz7AcGuorZE4SGdMyBNzLpAyMERBSqnXndHoxWZ5T_e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really like the food here except for being repetitive.
I love Fresh Fare the most but they don‚Äôt change menu as often. I Iove the overnight oats, avocado toast and fajita bowl. A really good vegetarian station. Smoothie is my go to! Love the one with yoghurt, blueberries, chia seed, etc. Soup is pretty good too! They rotate all the time but I like their chicken soup, vegetables and legume curry, whatever bean soup, etc.

Gather has too much hate haha. It‚Äôs actually one of the healthiest and cheapest residence food among all the three.

I wish they have more cooked green vegetables. They always have potatoes and squash but they don‚Äôt have enough broccoli, spinach, green beans, etc.

Grill station is pretty good and they change menu around 2-4 weeks. Salmon burger is decent. I wish their chicken burger is cheaper.

Latino is also my favourite. The Havana bowl is pretty good but sometimes they don‚Äôt season the chicken or tofu enough.

Home cooking is also one of my favourite because they rotate the food daily. They have similar food every week. The vegetable lasagna with garlic bread is so good! Not a lot of cheese and love the sauce. Butter chicken is not really good imo.

Sandwich station is alright except they don‚Äôt have the press!!! Please we def need the press for sandwich especially for those who order with cheese.

Simply local is a lot of people‚Äôs favourite. Not too expensive unless you get a main with two sides (around 12-14?). They serve beef brisket, pork chop, chicken breast, salmon and a vegetarian day every week.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMSCT6VsYqtYkDRF-j31F88f1xfA6I9Q7h3tsB&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2021-10-16"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They offer a great variety of food, including Latino, vegan, burgers, sushi-inspired, world (rotates often), baked goods, salads, and soups. Everything is fresh and there are some interesting things to try. Portions are usually pretty filling for me. As with other UBC dining halls/markets, prices run a little high. Also it's hard to find a time that every station is open - stations will often close unexpectedly for the day or even for a few hours during the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqfjc_HqIif1hZmIstsralupMRNW7XFrdevVyw&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2018-12-4"},{"Name":"Luke Kuro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYgP_ll8ede6rokqjyo-gOuHJnPxjys9UFzHU35KFVwvMyuKs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Buffet, lunch for $16 per person
Best dine-in place in UBC with fair price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHAKj0GGdoJ6QYLEWd48pKfqiCkWAB268qMjiK&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Neil Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwJoC3pQnZZnUx7vr-pCC8C_c6dpXLIiL2qDjojVFRSBIWWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Only carbohydrates and fats, not much protein consistency. Desserts are good if you like sweets. Pic of cheese bagel attached!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTgtbx3C5QnopesabURqL1khnsdnXVg1nJAG3d&fid=0x0:0xe5bca09347600efd"],"When":"2023-11-1"}]

However, it was a bad Japanese Izakaya in Vancouver area.
Two stars only for the good services for all staff. All staff were so extremely friendly and ebullient. The food was so expensive among the Izakaya and tasted not well. All the foods were so salty. We ordered chicken skins and it came out but it was so salty‚Ä¶. The udon was so salty too. The miso soups were salty, too. Also, I did not recommend to order the grilled squid because it was hard to chew and it was tasteless. The beers are recommended to order.
Even one of the staff had compensated some treats for us but I don‚Äôt think I will come back again‚Ä¶..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ-T8vC28aj5GscFOYe-fuAmz59yJN-v6zAtLw&fid=0x0:0x24f357af8ee1f4f5"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Han Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkfurfZg45U2uYya7AdAzmcKQGQIYhVdmvpM5S9jlCLR9EBZCG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite restaurant on UBC campus. The owner is so nice. From the lanterns, to the utensils, to even the covered sofa seating places ‚Äî absolutely magical! Food was good as well and friendly servers. Wonderful experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhKfREHepccahaWZyY-s7eIyUjlIHTlGQ38SbI&fid=0x0:0x24f357af8ee1f4f5"],"When":"2023-1-22"},{"Name":"Leyang Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzMrUPVGrR0EtZhT9qs_cfAaSdxT3YLn7QBM3L8FKzcJbUJ4ut=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food. Especially loved their fish roe fried rice and japanese style chicken wings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTPt1RPQ1-ggQE9RfFMPoNutxIKZEWBuQNl5xs&fid=0x0:0x24f357af8ee1f4f5"],"When":"2022-6-30"},{"Name":"Avery Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrABv9x3_bbuaIeUAb6D3b2MGnnjFNfu1lDqc53tSA72_yLBJq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had a coupon through another app for Meet Night, so I decided to try it out! Unfortunately, I was rather disappointed with the food.

I ordered the Aburi Set, which is only available from 11am-4pm. It comes with 3 aburi sushi (salmon, tuna + shrimp), salmon teriyaki on rice, shrimp tempura √ó2, spring roll √ó2, vegetable tempura √ó3 (I think), salad, and miso soup. A breakdown of taste is as follows:

Aburi sushi: my expectations were highest for this, which is perhaps why I felt so let down. The salmon aburi was okay, but both the tuna and shrimp aburi were overcooked and dry. None of the aburi tasted like they were "melting in your mouth", which was unfortunate. Perhaps a kitchen error where they were flamed for too long.

Salmon teriyaki on rice: the rice was. Rice. The salmon was mid, super average tasting salmon. Nothing to write home about.

The tempura (both shrimp and veggies): I've had better, but I've also had worse- again, average.

Spring rolls: small, average tasting.

The salad: super simple side salad. could benefit from more dressing.

The miso soup: average. Had a good amount of tofu, seaweed, and enoki mushrooms.

Overall comments; I was able to purchase for about $8.50 because of my coupon. The people who passed me my food were nice and polite. The presentation of the food was also nice! However, I likely would not return if i didnt have a coupon. The regular price for the aburi set (at the time of writing) is $16.99. For that price, I'd rather go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0uoLrdVaAgxy_ima5kN_-EQZRYJwHiQNjcVeSqDwpGfPgQg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They charge you 5 dollars more for the lunch menu on ramens compared to dinner menu, because you have a very small portioned salad, a dry fish snack and a few bites of watermelon. Flavour below average, fair service, portion below average. And the California roll is worse than a cheap pack you purchase at a random ubc mart, the rice is too hard. Overall, very bad experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFFlg8ZCVJN5df9Ep-W5UtMD81ecLr09njsUdrmB7cjmu3VDsO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The waiters were busy but they seemed very distracted. Cheap & large lunch combos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOODfRsyiOOI7URwzrTcJZ-5DO4QjJwVXLf7tMk&fid=0x0:0x24f357af8ee1f4f5"],"When":"2023-2-25"}]
