user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my experience at the Gallery. Ordered burgers with salads and my friends also ordered some chicken wraps and fries. Everything was pretty tasty and well seasoned. Beers were fantastic. Prices a little bit on the high side, especially for a restaurant inside campus, but it‚Äôs definitely worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs1KGPNL5W9iWl4zIgcxQSrnJ2fRONlu24N4UE&fid=0x0:0x7b84d3debc8f1cec"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Anthony Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIC22IEsZIbsu-lUm5EyMjgm7JYJbJkRjU13-W8XkZYXAuixkB6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty good place for a nice meal for ubc students. There wasn‚Äôt necessarily any service, but nonetheless the food was pretty good. Definitely would go here for a drink it I was a ubc student","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9K99fN-Zftq2MUemombIFm2bz26P8kglKa8XA&fid=0x0:0x7b84d3debc8f1cec"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Randal Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-rLwNvZI_YNkKUeSaM-3PNFSDfyyf9aevvVnQDsEtEwj3jDdP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The dining room is spacious and has lots of natural light making it a good spot for lunch. During lunchtime there was no loud music playing so I could have a conversation with a friend. You order food and drinks at the bar, but I got both pretty quickly. I had a red sangria which seemed reasonably good. I had a citrus and beet salad which was also good but not very filling if you're expecting it to be a meal. The service from the staff serving the food and clearing the table seemed reasonably good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like this place. I wouldn't go here as a night out, but at the right times, it's a chill hang. The atmosphere varies wildly depending on the day. On some nights it's louder and is in line with what you'd expect a university bar to be like, and sometimes it's very relaxed, and you can even find some people using it as a study spot (not something I would consider or really recommend, but you do you as long as it's not busy and no one needs the table). Sometimes it's somewhere in between or a weird mix of both. It's not always predictable, but I've found that to hit the quieter days that I prefer, early evening during exam season at school is best, and summer in general are chiller than the main academic year.
The food is good, often surprisingly good. The menu items are well thought-out and tasty, and nicely presented. It's not a veg-centric establishment but there's lots of choice for vegans! Off the current menu, I've had the Power Punch Salad, the Vegan Pulled Jackfruit, the Vegan Burger, Vegan Chick'n Caesar Wrap, and the Tempeh Teriyaki. I wasn't particularly impressed by the Caesar wrap - it wasn't awful, I just didn't feel like it was worth $19.5, but everything else was a delight. I'm glad their vegan burger is a (seemingly) housemade, minimally processed black bean patty instead of beyond meat or similar! I usually won't order a salad as my meal, but the Power Punch is substantial! The side salad that comes with the sandwich orders is actually pretty nice too.
They make good cocktails and have a long list of local draft beers on tap which I haven't really had a chance to dip into, but I got the "Green Bird" for fun on St. Patrick's Day, which is just a version of their house "T-Bird" lager that's been coloured green (maybe naturally, judging by the grassy notes I got from it, but I don't know for sure). It was actually a good lager though!
Sometimes the staff is nice enough, sometimes I get the vibe that they're too cool to be serving me or something, but because the only interactions you have with them are when you order and pay at the bar and when they bring your food out, an unenthusiastic bartender doesn't ruin the whole experience. Because of this service style, you can expect to be in and out of here faster than you would at a full table service restaurant, but it's not fast food, so dishes still take as much time to prep as they would at a "regular" sit-down place. It's also pricier than typical counter service food, but very reasonably priced compared to off-campus restaurants that serve food of this quality, and there's no obligation to tip 20%. To me, the service model, fair prices, and high quality are a combination of the best elements of counter service and full service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQwEdJ88aXsSlarpRs-9jcRwBTBo0B-hIa3KfE&fid=0x0:0x7b84d3debc8f1cec"],"When":"2021-4-19"},{"Name":"Steve Morgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmgrmzSyB3CC_qWamR3pXmaZna6-RxfqDluiFzTGNrypDReGc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very large service area. Games. Foosball table. Big patio. Not the least bit crowded for lunch in summertime. They have a limited menu but it has decent variety. Quality of the food is good for a university joint. Beer list contains a good number of local, craft beers. Kids can dine here but no kids menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPovaBoxIJBbbrqqo0D1-7ZOWCRu2vS1WYswiw&fid=0x0:0x7b84d3debc8f1cec"],"When":"2019-7-10"},{"Name":"N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIY4v8Faubu_Z2iYv4KPw3dI0PsoX4C2vKMs2dyC6KeQw7f0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Almost no service (walk up to bar to order) and any service you do get is most often unfriendly. Like the type of attitude you would think takes more effort than being nice. They are not making a case for autogratuities in general because I think this is one of the reasons this place gets away with such unpleasant staff. The other reasons include that there just isn't that much choice on campus and the food is basic but decent here. The view is nice if you're out on the patio. And there's a lot of space. It's very sad that the sit-down nice restaurant didn't make it because that's exactly what the area needs. They just didn't promote it and since this is the top floor, no one discovers this space by walking by. The service at the Gallery when it was in the old sub was never this sad. Have pride in whatever you do. Just making people happy and not disappointed is a reward in itself. Or fake it. Whatever. Just don't make people more down than when they came in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyJzoLeWrDhvC2NhSPJXZCJklxu-S39z3hI0-Hrrv9m9AA5ZkKQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is my first review below 5 stars.
They automatically charge a tip without telling their customers (I didn't notice any signage). This makes their prices misleading. Also, since I wasn't with a group and I ordered at the register auto-grat does not seem reasonable. I will happily change my review and return as a customer when they are more forthcoming about their prices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there for a light food, beer and to listen to good #jazzmusic from amazing musician of UBC Jazz Club. The space was bright , spacious. I found it busy and big line up. The Jazz performance are on Wednesday 6pm to 9pm by UBC Jazz Club.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIUZZN56p20ZRBTeW6npihhigzi31LzbVDTis&fid=0x0:0x7b84d3debc8f1cec"],"When":"2022-9-22"}]

Perfect for when I‚Äôm too tired to make dinner but craving Chinese","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1DX7lVq9ld4Q52V57o_uVoz3hPUzwj1LiUyyz\u0026fid=0x0:0x69bd337e16eedc9c"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Sartaj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1doLfhIpPIdYO53EoD_63mHYE3jrQc1kxM-CAvFcju93a6Z1xPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favorite place to grab a bite on the UBC campus. You can‚Äôt go wrong with their selection, just trust your stomach! I recommend the fried rice + beef stew and the spicy chicken but really anything they have is fantastic. It‚Äôs a cost effective meal as well, $10 for a portion that can even be two meals for some people. The staff is very sweet, the auntie doesn‚Äôt really speak English so if she seems rude it‚Äôs not that it‚Äôs intentional- she‚Äôs just focused on making sure she gets you the meal you‚Äôre looking for. And having lived in Asia myself, I can attest to the authenticity of this restaurant, even the ambience makes me feel like I‚Äôm back in a Singaporean hawker center grabbing some lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2CM3eR8O11ttFsCFON4tixI0t3mA37Pt10uvj\u0026fid=0x0:0x69bd337e16eedc9c"],"When":"2021-1-19"},{"Name":"Caleb B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkCD0433fS17DhCODy94aOtpHFARwLHVGvT5G3oZFfI0pUamXYAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has FED me. These people are doing the Lord‚Äôs work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnpiFck4vT1SXGLlYHcRPry1UHkcRtIMr0E90dufMzsUiTZ78=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite place to grab quick and tasty Chinese food on campus. Still a solid 4 star and worth it though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNzg6tK7-FeBeXEPsdkQg9V7MTuDKhvpKgwps\u0026fid=0x0:0x69bd337e16eedc9c"],"When":"2021-10-22"},{"Name":"bill li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0uGtIzv7Th3Yzuwuqw7fxJf2s7NLb6-6h9RxeY59KsdLCGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had hairs from the beef. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ben K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkChymkBEqoHC-DSLY-BlpEm3X8tgGaeAvEy7G17xjM-zfjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bottom line: it‚Äôs a great pizza for an affordable price (they often have promotions) on campus.

I got the ‚Äúgrab n go‚Äù: any small pizza and a pop for $10.99+tax. The Deluxe pizza was decent: crust was crispy, toppings filled the pizza, beautifully melted/charred in their XLT speed oven. And around the outer edge of the pizza is a heavy sprinkling of sesame seeds, which lends a texture like crunchy pizza dough. Kind of nice.

The online ordering platform tells you the order will take minimum 20 minutes, which was spot-on for my order. They also sell pizza by the slice for $2.38+tax in-store.

Best thing: they give you your takeout pizza in a cardboard box, so there‚Äôs no $0.25 bag fee!

The restaurant itself has probably 10 small tables‚Äîsome inside, some outside‚Äîfor eating there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDOuHiDIZTmdoXWax2rwLSqlNZvYhweoWLQ0nu&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Iman Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_It5dFbhJ3ahD3y8wnnvsyYECBdVwU0ipYiueTLf-0IgvGbE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Uncle Fatih's Pizza is one of the best pizza experiences I've had in Vancouver. When comparing price and taste, it's honestly way better than other chain pizza places. We ordered a medium Meat Lovers and a medium Eggplant Artichoke, and enjoyed both of them. The chipotle dip was a nice addition, though it's not very spicy. The pizza itself is juicy and full of flavors.

If you were to compare it to an authentic Italian restaurant in Downtown, I can't say for sure how it would hold up‚ÄîI haven't tried that yet. But this place serves great pizzas with good quality. As long as the quality stays consistent, it will always be one of my favorite pizza places.

[Update, July 1, 2024]
We ordered an extra-large half-and-half pizza. One half was Sweet & Spicy Lovers, and the other was Eggplant Artichoke. We enjoyed both. The Sweet & Spicy Lovers pizza has pineapple slices, so if you enjoy the sweetness of pineapple on your pizza, it could be really nice. The spiciness comes from banana peppers, which are quite intense‚ÄîI‚Äôd rate the spicy level 9/10 and usually avoid the banana peppers with the last pieces. The meat on the pizza was very nice, though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3LNwcz4Mhb2_rAOeKq6HQ2yu9c_abTPsvF_gY&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Bruno Rodrigues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhILuyIb0LIP6MudwbcSE2BAlE-f9U9SKRT2p9lsRwJ4hM0FgDLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome bang for the buck ‚Äì 20th anniversary deal was any slice for $2.38 plus taxes. Slice was of a regular size and adequately filled. Ingredientes were good quality and the cheese was pretty tasty. Service was friendly, but I guess overwhelmed because there were only two people working at the whole restaurant. Maybe this setup will only last during the summer vacations, but there were some people waiting to make their order on the line even then.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr_x3LSgypONBL59pcXxllJnkv_odePZ2Iyp46&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Gurleen Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiPUG0uS2mNXBduiVsY6PVMjHnfxQ7NkDQyzxiXX7WnB_qcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôm really glad I stopped here with my family for lunch. The staff were helpful and answered all my questions. We ordered a small garlic chicken pizza, small spicy chicken pizza and veggie lovers (gluten free small pizza). The entire order was made quickly and tasted very good with fresh ingredients and a soft dough. They also had some dipping sauces on the side. Would have been awesome if they had small containers to place them in, but that wasn‚Äôt a deal breaker. All in all one of the best pizza places I‚Äôve had in a very long time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessy James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYtH31UTkbDUolpuvM8YhvZp6aRqCRrozjZhpKhJHwBksolrRrhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went in as they were closing (which nobody likes I know! üôà) but we had no where else that was opened so we gave it a shot!

The last 8-10 slices all assorted and they charged full price for everything. Almost $36 after tip for end of the night pizza was a little crazy IMO. However they did their best to give us a deal anyways, so we left a tip as much as we could.

The pizza was tasty, I would personally recommend the ham and pineapple! The others were great too but not as traditional in taste as they were a little more complicated in ingredients. Not a bad thing, I just like my pizza simple ü•∞

Otherwise felt the food was very tasty and would return if they had better prices, maybe some Italian style/thinner/cheaper made slices could help things as a recommendation? I love my Italian traditional pizza style myself, but I know this place is more westernized and that's also okay.

Otherwise a good experience, just think end of the night slices are typically sold at a reduced rate. They did give us 8 slices and the 9th free, but I feel it could have been half off. Maybe I'm picky, idk üòÜ.

Overall good stuff! üçï Thanks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I missed the old Pi[e]r¬≤ Pizza.
This is the closest we can get on campus.  Freshslice is ok but it just lacks a character.

Recommended for pizza lovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU3FmBdtQ7LMg_cBIVovU8hZILP6gYcvSoICF2&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Zay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrcv0nbceihjzzaPr2LIIin5v_Tj9YhzMv8cvDTNxNVU0GSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I always order from them via Ubereats. Sometimes they do have good offers ‚Äòbuy 1 get 1 free‚Äô on selected pizzas which is definitely better and cheaper, their prices are a bit pricey without the offer.
As for their crusts, they were always well cooked, soft and very tasty. I like their thin crust more.
Their pizzas are freshly made. I tried couple of veggie pizzas, they were all delicious. However, their bbq sauce is not the best (barely taste it)
This time I got pesto chicken pizza and it was good.My favorite is Garlic Lover Pizza!
Also I appreciate the fact they offer Halal chicken :)
Overall very good Pizza place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR6RA-QEUZg9mR9rrhkIy-hHpvwt5R5I40hL40&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2021-3-18"},{"Name":"Marcus Xiong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNKHkNu0r9L6u_s13vBOcHGIOl_tisn1xjH9tQbojiCd_NkDw-YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a quick place to grab a meal, and the food isn't low quality either. The pizza is freshly made and rebaked when someone orders them. The food is brought up quickly. I like the unique sesame seeds on the crust, and adds extra flavor to the pizza. Sauce is rich, and the cheese and toppings are a nice addition.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONHV1r73zgfzQ_I6yWeRBU7_1WpRBMDqnxvZ2_&fid=0x0:0x860b3a2c6558c7be"],"When":"2023-11-13"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for a delicious under 10$ meal on campus, definitely consider this! I love getting their rice burgers ($7)! They‚Äôre so filling and delicious! The dumplings ($7-8)are quite big and decent too. Highly recommend. And the service is very fast too. The lady (I‚Äôm guessing owner) is super sweet and nice! This has become my to go food place :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJtnYd6yS-h-3XGUnWH15MFjWbtolyyiBi0gUG\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Yesong Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ91KZByxRVp7hNBb-aKt5xKC5uCcHWJErPks1BHnBM5NsPqdN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easy to order, super quick pickup, and the Vegetarian Kimchi hotdog was good (I am from South Korea ü§£üëç). The staff were kindüíö Looking forward to coming back. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRlR3UB5562u53xdhKrOsGJiz4rkZrE-p0ZaKU\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Monique Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5hu9g1OY7Ix0dBixz7zsHrRgMIwTKO5A1wsJR8uSbYtgX4VMh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best and unique hot dogs I‚Äôve ever had! Got the vegetarian kimchi with marble cheese‚Ä¶ and the Seoul chicken dog‚Ä¶ SO DELICIOUS!! And the service was great, she was really nice and helped me choose the best options :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxGps2TpWl4ZaIo9igfjKn_o84hHy6SiiGWHBt\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of cool choices for hotdogs and very vegetarian-friendly since you can get a veggie sausage with any of the dogs on the menu (not as vegan-friendly since most options include mayo and/or cheese). The guy who works there is super nice. There are also Korean subs and other snacks, and bingsu. They use a good veggie sausage and the toppings are always fresh. The hot dogs and snack foods are very reasonably priced, the bingsu are more splurge-y, but they are pretty big. The shop is very small, but the buzzer system they have works well, so you can wait for your order outside and get a buzz to pick it up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQM6Ga7Xs7_kR11FSzwpQzsjueEtvJo9hL6iqh\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"J Psk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJysbWTRrHYTp8s-srkk4zt31Bl_q_WrtM2a-GsVp2w2ODMSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't order the chi-bap (fried chicken rice) whatsoever. What I got was comletely different from the photo on the menu. The chicken is not fried chicken at all, they use oven baked chicken nuggets. The corn salad had like 3 grains of corn. NOT worth 15$ at all...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7aidT799VL6AA3Zdo-Tt2GjLqBpKF4IutJdaK\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"NixOil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa0-gf5561LR0YaDvsEO2rH9HzBIiXnz8EIWyrMmynW44HE3yV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best hotdog I have ever had in my entire life. This place was super fast and the hotdog was just amazing. I got the pizza dog which sounds weird but was so good that I had to review this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV_LPo5uQklvQIOPMQmDjk9t5JYYTmqDNQoyQC\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8Kffru-eJ-MFdAxDjN_kWwnt7cEHBHmGbUwwPuMFBkRwEcGM5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best hot dog place we‚Äôve ever been to! The hotdogs were juicy, tasted fresh, and all of the toppings went so well together. We ordered 2 kimchi hotdogs ($9 each) and 2 seoul hotdogs ($10 each). Not going into lie, we had some difficulty finding this place but we would definitely come here again.  there‚Äôs not really a place you can sit and eat because it‚Äôs just a bench right outside the place, and you‚Äôre likely going to be harassed by birds so be cautious when you‚Äôre eating lol. The food took a bit of time (15 to 20 minutes maybe?) to make but we weren‚Äôt in a rush and there was only 1 guy making all the hotdogs fresh in front of us. Highly recommend this place if you‚Äôre at UBC!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyyvUswrdO-Ws48fgWp7Nkh-O9hEzBay1CETlT\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4456a08a1c33572"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Marvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOUB9fqPRyAnJAGsLqhyOV_Bp81x_bJC8wIyyATYNP2vGJzmc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small little shop with amazing customer service. Guy at the front was very welcoming and nice. Hot dog was pretty good, a little expensive for what it was but still great. Definitely will be back to try some other stuff.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Miyuki Food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIefbmBJIFd8vluRG1CtvO_cHUxsRdwtm3bVobO6E-icLpG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food comes very fast, portion size seems smaller than before. And there‚Äôs only 1 type of baked pasta a day (it was fine though). Garlic toast was fine, the salad dressing was great!! Pasta and garlic toast for 11 dollars is alright. UBC cinnamon bun was tasty but hard, maybe it was from the day before. I want to try the roast chicken leg next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTB5iX6q9Xe2yx-tVSbqgor_6fP9oxY5cREcs&fid=0x0:0x1edd3bffb80ccd29"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"April Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpjudrVHdeiNcmDBFdIqiSbVKaOOs-ms-BSD_TFGabSaEbLhkK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The server was busy cleaning and didn‚Äôt take my order right away. So I was waiting for her to finish her cleaning until she can finally take my order. It was a little bit awkward, but no big deal. Then I ordered a cup of earl grey latte. It came super hot with no lid or sleeve cup holder. I only had one free hand to hold the drink. While holding the drink and walking to a table, I spilled and burned myself. I don‚Äôt want to complain, but I think the server really needs some safety training regarding hot drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMvMzTQlQO5LNRU9akNZ9JACjxxTMjIqf6AQtZ&fid=0x0:0x1edd3bffb80ccd29"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I seem to remember the pasta here being better‚Ä¶ I had the Alla Norma today for the first time in a long while and was disappointed to get a stereotypical university cafeteria meal. The pasta sauce was fine and there were lots of veggies, so the dish likely would have been decent if it was cooked properly, but the pasta and vegetables were over-cooked and mushy, presumably from sitting in a hot-holding unit for who knows how long. The garlic bread was soaked and then some in butter. There was enough pooled in the nooks of the bread that I could just tip the bread over and pour it off. It‚Äôs not like the food was phenomenal before, but I thought it was good enough for a quick-service cafe, but this was just lazy.
The baked goods are still the same as you get at other UBC cafes, which I‚Äôm mostly a fan of. I find that the decaf espresso in drinks has kind of a burnt taste; it‚Äôs alright in lattes, but I had it as an americano today and it wasn‚Äôt really worth it for me.
On the upside, the value is decent. The pastas and flatbreads are heartier fare than you‚Äôll find at most of the coffee shops (UBC-owned or not) around campus, and my pasta and (big) cookie today came out to about $14 total. The service is usually friendly enough and the space is nice. They have dine-in plates and mugs but you need to specifically request them - they will not ask you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9ttobxFHARwLEw1f2WIn8975E7NUIg_MlZcrK&fid=0x0:0x1edd3bffb80ccd29"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"Mahish Rajdev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTK_NiWhybybG5OSaEBGMB4IPAR1DXKbumCjO5eTpafLGTEMHWRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pure and absolute garbage! Service was diminishing and incredible rude, to then have a disgusting, cold pastry with a coffee  that was made with an old shot she had laying around! Didn't even cared to be sneaky.
Even tim's is better than this waste.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good cafe to have a quick bite or takeout on campus! The prices are reasonable, and they have plenty of study space around as well. I highly recommend their barbecue chicken flatbread :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbNWTbTPrSs7CWgWXbrxFwMFw1NvcN3g4MK4Fm&fid=0x0:0x1edd3bffb80ccd29"],"When":"2023-10-25"},{"Name":"Fei B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCSPR4b-Aju_3xzgvNmgK79_SKNPWkqhiQHmMJksqE4GdZMXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"pretty decent food prices and they take UBC card here (at least when I last tried!)
I like the soups here as a filling and warming snack between my classes here. The pastas are pretty decent, but nothing special here. When I lived on campus, this was my favourite alternative to eating residence food!
The cashiers/servers here are honestly pretty unfriendly. Recently went and ordered soup and the lady didn't even look at me or say anything to me the entire time...not sure why.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Xinyue C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYz5MDYrhb1L2Ntf7XrdjiB5xemPws8aSeONm3ZAcvtG13jw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really nice and juicy chicken but drip coffee is always cold","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Graham Douglas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIhuQ7JFTpvGa5zi_15HH4FFQnLd20ANHeexPlC6QR2fUoaZ3XVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It‚Äôs a fine little cafe. Nothing really great or bad. The drip coffee is pour yourself which makes it fast when there is a crowd. It‚Äôs not the freshest coffee around though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx4debrcztXIVIujqqYuB5b32E7-zG52FVWZ0t&fid=0x0:0x1edd3bffb80ccd29"],"When":"2018-6-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Reliable for simple and satisfying homestyle Korean food. Nothing blows me away but everything is good and flavourful. The meals all include lots of vegetables which I appreciate, and things aren't overly oily.
There's no atmosphere to speak of and I think they probably have more takeout than dine-in customers, but having done both, dine-in is the way to go, because the food comes out super fresh. The people who work there are nice and hardworking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXR2zL3EAW7SvQOTWGiznVuK83Eyw_nBeqY_6G&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Yuchang Zhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCu1wqeMUBpitsBVSAyQ29MPKUdyLQ__YQ2QBJ3AHY3DJY3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went several times and recommended to all my friends. The owners are truly caring about the customers and always have THE BEST service ever. Once I mentioned I was cold, and later the owner offered me warm miso soup for free. This really made my entire evening.

Soups are always served warm with large portion. The pork bone is absolutely my to-go dish. So flavourful with so so much meat!

Never disappointed with their inari, I have tried beef, spicy salmon, shrimp, spam, tuna, kimchi, seaweed, some were even gifted by the owner. All the toppings are so delicious and flavourful, it‚Äôs hard for me to pick one favourite to be honest! The seasoning of rice makes everything even another level.

Foods are so authentic. My Korean friends said the dishes really brought them back to Korea. If you love Korean foods like me, you should definitely try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM3_rcDUbPQB4N10byn-i2gBKLWgdvTB41RrFy&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2022-3-10"},{"Name":"Sasha Sadiora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMB9CioB05yUeMJrchJN57cOo1BuZF_w3T8u4DS8Px3X91XTp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady was very nice but the fact I paid a EXTRA $3.50 for cheese and got a KRAFT SINGLES slice is CRAZY","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLwLofol73ghxQyaPInWLd2gYRGqz6pWOzjLKe&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Niloufar Sharif","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3A88lqgzyr_DZVby4DylCumivfYhcpesHqnFk78Ei2iZVsggWWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a student, this place is so comforting and the food tastes authentic and homemade. The owners here are AMAZING, so caring, and kindhearted! They gifted us three free inaris to try as well as miso soup! Now the food. The portions are so generous and they will not cheap out on quality or amount of protein despite the affordable prices.
We got the gamja-tang and galbitang. The galbitang has a very clean broth and you can taste the fresh ingredients. Gamja-tang was packed with flavors and spices and soooo much pork!

Cant wait to go back and try all of their other dishes üòã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNkVy2Nj_O8RT1_bytgunpwMTz22R8HjUrX_Hu&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2022-3-6"},{"Name":"Ahnaf Muqset Haque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9JdQZtXBMvD618JDWqRmaMkXk-I2NhqdPuW2NLQFP33Qn87KikQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only reason for my four star is their  customer service is heart warming. Really welcoming and good service. However, if you are actually looking for really really good Korean food then this probably isn't the place. It's okay as I would describe it but definitely not the best. Also, quantity is not adequate. However, trying to improve quantity first would be resonable step towards improvement!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPATOMJVNA_QXKyqiMpX11OXghmAXYiZDhRB6OR&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2019-4-19"},{"Name":"Anne W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVq8l7IxqCBT6CUTt6a8ydNheNQQYDJZKBxOYNsNiNzdtSpTCtW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The quality of the food here is excellent! I got the Jjajang Beef Udon today and it's now one of my favourite meals on campus. The sauce is delicious, as is the side of pickled daikon. The sauce is generous, so I might be able to get a side of rice and stretch it to two lunches (helpful with the high cost of living these days!).

Staff are lovely and helpful people. The outdoor seats on a good weather day are in the sun, so it's a great spot to enjoy your lunch. So glad this place is here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2GSZ-Y2SmizoNXA-E9OpCto2VOEvGfTSaozkJ&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered Inari, it‚Äôs ok. The meat or topping to rice proportion was a bit off. There‚Äôs more rice than topping. I ordered 3 but it‚Äôs not enough, and it came out to be around 14$ so I‚Äôll say just order a regular meal instead of this as it‚Äôs not that filling. The service was pretty good tho and the atmosphere was nice and cozy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOanBKptQ-R_H5eiyx4s67HHQU7ukggwSAkZ7tv&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"cbl Google","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKseLK4QE-uFmbW8_hEmTOkS9RGzjwTJs3q9tyPwtQSc-dy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Korean foods and such an awesome owner! Definitely a gem in the village area. Tried a few of their new inaris and was not disappointed. The spicy salmon and bulgigi are highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMixXDyBd0gN0Cf58omWSw-4LIfMRQAXe33CFI&fid=0x0:0x4ab7ff7074636253"],"When":"2021-10-11"}]

title: Kingyo
address: 871 Denman St, Vancouver, BC V6G 2L9
descriptions: Upbeat izakaya with inspired decor, offering inventive Japanese small plates & bento boxes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"T A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo8St3wu-RTYLXMSZOeU6BM3NROp5L4iY7PEJparMbzQlv3Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favorite places I‚Äôve tried on my trips to Vancouver! The portions were generous and our mains tasted authentic. The beef tongue on the hot stone was a fun and interesting experience. My partner and I enjoyed sharing our dishes, and I‚Äôd come here frequently if I lived closer.

Note: Came during the three-day weekend during rush hour, so it did take them a few minutes to acknowledge us and seat us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1osddQA0ZrAA4zVOMZWLJlOr0LuQQ-LJlORqu&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Kelly Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFwaPr76e37TrveST3bPssx8xqF-NgkqK8QyzDcVFwPA6QNJzv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here as a group of 4 scared because we didn‚Äôt have a reservation ahead of time but they were able to seat us in around 20 minutes! The food is absolutely divine and the server was kind and attentive, giving us great recommendations as well. We definitely over ordered but the wagyu and the sushi bowls we got are a must, and I personally loved the uni pasta!! I wish I could go back in time and experience this for the first time again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVCnzVT4ZhR3gSnAjNpTK-hQPzwCD6pKHGQCIl&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had somewhat high expectations due to their great ratings, but the food we tried didn‚Äôt quite live up to them. As a fried chicken lover, I ordered their karaage and Hell Chicken‚Äîa special menu item coated in hot sauce. Unfortunately, the sauce lacked flavor, and the chicken marinade didn‚Äôt do much to elevate the taste.

The sashimi was just okay; for some reason, the salmon and tuna tasted almost identical. The agedashi tofu felt a bit under-seasoned compared to the other dishes. We did enjoy the deep-fried fresh corn and pork cheek though.

The service was very friendly and attentive, which helped make up for the shortcomings in the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo3tUpHWTVLi1A8kB7kvINkewEfrv7mnRvdZU&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Jenny T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQiARxHBX2qOuMFCAcD1158hVepJ33cdQqK4D0HDfs-eTX1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"we ordered: wagyu beef tongue on a hot rock, yuzu tuna oshi, bluefin oshi, pork bibimbap, tomato kimchi, black sesame panna cotta, and they gave me a green tea creme brulee for free for my birthday ü§óü•≥

everything here was around $90 before tax and tip! (but I wasn't full after ü´£)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9pwB4mLTQxQV6sWw4sCZb2kJaXHSsa611YYlt&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Jinsu Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1mvmAs8N1dtWnSi6oyaNbWkyRCYP3ulyb2wN80hpzmWPyo-Odow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super unique experience with tons of Japanese options. Great to come with a bunch of people so you can try a bunch of things.

Braised Beef (9.5/10)
- really great charred flavour and meat just fell right apart

Octopus Calamari (9/10)
- tasted so good and you could really tell it was fresh octopus

Wagyu US (7/10)
- cool experience to cook it on a stone but taste wise nothing special

Sable Fish (7.5/10)
- fish was fresh but taste-wise just your standard grilled fish","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4jSNNjAC1RhvIpMaYVLaYWW2HjqY_5r886o3R&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a customer of Kingyo since 2007, and came across their restaurant by accident (because social media did not exist back in the day‚Ä¶) while walking along Denman to visit my mom at work. I was and still am a huge Japanese cuisine nerd and addict and so I absolutely had to visit with mom. Their menu has definitely evolved over the many years, but my undeniable staples are the Ebi Mayo, Uni Miso Udon, and stone grilled Kobe Beef. These are ALWAYS on point for me. I‚Äôm just so sad the Menchi Katsu with rice is no longer on the menu!!! (Why???)

We also tried the Kanazawa curry with tonkatsu and a Fish of the day teishoku. My aunt loved her fish set. Unfortunately I would recommend the restaurant try to change the bowl you serve your curry in to a more original round bowl or plate because a lot of the sauce was left on one end and wasted. Not as easy to mix into the rice due to the plate‚Äôs shape. However the Tonkatsu (pork loin cutlet) was simply outstanding in taste, texture and juiciness!

Service was very prompt, polite and our server even gave my daughter a lollipop at the end of a meal.

Every time I come back to Vancouver to visit my family, I have to dine at Kingyo at least once. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd5x3TxdGIJdBT3i4Hyshi6IK0VjgvxkdQbcIE&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Duane N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzLUOZlsSjqqQG7hRrakFmrEm11KHWz9zh0B_W2g4VgUNxH5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided randomly to eat here and we got there when they opened. We were accommodated even though we didn't have an appointment.  The servers we very friendly and the food was good. We had the cow tongue cooked on a rock, and it was delicious.  I have the sushi, and it was decent. The ebi mayo was good also. The Miso was different than I have eaten in my past. My wife, who is Japanese , said it's red miso. I liked another Japanese restaurant better, but my wife really enjoyed Kingyo. Everything was clean and classy. The bathroom was clean also. I have no complaints or regrets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5jmA91a2_d_3uNhSa7IzVx66nL5hWP1tnemxd&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Best sashimi I have had in a while, the ingredients used at this restaurant is fantastic.  I absolutely loved the raw fish, would definitely come back for their sashimi. I did not particularly love their carpaccio as the pieces of beef were pretty thick and it is nothing like what carpaccio really is. It was more asian flavoured marinade for sliced beef. As for the croquettes and the tofu dishes, those were okay, but not something that I would say I loved. Overall, an enjoyable experience and I wouldn‚Äôt mind going back, but it is not a must.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAKiQS6Qdkf-2u16ztVOkRD73_UDKl-5GoBQl7&fid=0x0:0x9acca6f1c0dda4a2"],"When":"2024-7-16"}]

The cookies are also fresh and a delight!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJXsVJrO-XbqAmeqPazDHE_HTPT_L_4-CmHhci&fid=0x0:0xdce51a93eda8f3fa"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Ungad Sangha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkUazR_2VV4TemNcUGN_UvEyuvu6ZmJtmHVz1blQhH5HB6PK8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff was kinda rude while making my taco felt like I was in a prison line getting food I came in around 330 aug28 and they made my tacos so bad and acted as if they were already mad at me or something. Also felt like they filled the ingredients like they were rationing for  an emergency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEtTSzyJfuM1pyoZ6Ckc6kyFCcMuEzlvOXg7Pi&fid=0x0:0xdce51a93eda8f3fa"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Landon Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYdubAbt9EcgS3VUvYti_EPa73MXu0tnbAZjnRAd9k06s9Gp4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered two burritos from this place off DoorDash, only one came after 45 minutes of waiting. I was on a tight schedule so it was not the greatest situation. The one that came had the wrong toppings on it, luckily I had a friend driving to Caulfeild village anyway so he picked it up there. That burrito also had the wrong toppings. Having put down the guacamole option that costs extra, there was no guacamole. I called to complain and infer on the situation, the woman who answered the phone expressed her apologies. After I asked about the guacamole, she said something like ‚ÄúYes, really sorry, I did not have time to put it on.‚Äù What!? You didn‚Äôt have time to put on the guacamole that I payed for that costs extra? I could be wrong about what she said but the microphone quality was very bad. I asked about a refund or something to make this whole situation a little bit better for my side but all she said was that I could come to the actual store and get a refund for the guacamole. Overall pretty good food, terrible experience. Please do better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"bjorn jensen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlIs8TKQWOKE506BxgMN_kJZmHr74Uc3DjvQvUb6CGAmrRQHc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy you guys came to Caulfield. The food was delicious and well priced, and the restaurant itself is clean. I look forward to many burritos","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORYqq70fie76Q2dwVR0ROR8FVa7mvIr4infEHD&fid=0x0:0xdce51a93eda8f3fa"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"J.P. Eleiz (JP)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFjKt-EYTCvOot47OCfxJziansbQhIZbhB3tRo77mhSaiVJbFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I love Mucho Burrito. My family has been going to Mucho Burrito for over 10 years in Langely and Abbotsford‚Äôs two locations and we were thrilled when one finally opened up in our new area of West Vancouver, Caulfield Village. Unfortunately, our excitement quickly turned to disappointment.

After several visits, we found that the experience at this location is consistently subpar. The staff are robotic and unfriendly and constantly skimp on the ingredients, as if they are trying to save on costs (?). Our experience at West Van‚Äôs Caulfield Village is far below the experience levels we have had other locations. It‚Äôs disappointing to see such a beloved brand fail to meet the usual standards.

(As of July 30, I emailed the mgr, per his request and didn‚Äôt get a response to date). As of Sept 2, still no response to my email.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"The legend","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiWIsRqSLVj482UaR9wU5ZmkCvqdJLFi4cHkRBjdxETyEpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm from Texas and honestly the food was terrible. I ordered a bowl and it was Cold, bland and unsatisfying. I'm not sure if these other reviewers have had authentic Mexican food before .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Chobaniuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYuRu8QfLzGcEfMHAyhkeJc2dlfEQvwZAqHiqe_2u3yI1PfNgY-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg I should have taken a picture of the beautiful taco trio I got from here. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Na","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbWRUtiYRRPvrKwMe6vdozzm8j4VVPvwRIWUtuWvW0eKAOr20j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place and it‚Äôs really surprising that the food is so good in this sad-looking hidden away food court.  They were open even when classes were not in session.  I love the Dan Dan noodle with 2 lamb skewers combo (comes with a canned drink).  Both were not too spicy for me, super tasty and generous portions.  I also had a breakfast crepe for the first time (ever. I‚Äôm just more familiar with Cantonese food) and it was so good and very large and filling.  I like their noodles which have a bit of a chew (look hand pulled rather than the skinny noodles you might expect normally in Dan Dan).  They were the same type of noodles in the meat sauce noodle dish (no soup).  The fried chicken is super crunchy so worth a try if you like fried chicken but I‚Äôm not looking for such an oily lunch/dinner.  Everything is fresh because it‚Äôs made to order.  They are open at night too. Looks like several of the other food court stalls did not open much.  Best thing to eat on the whole campus in my opinion.  Fair prices but if cost is an issue get their stamp card.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8ICOnqvJ0g5JPS6M6p7-6Q0WHwEXrNY8NPAUg\u0026fid=0x0:0x97af90bfdba20390"],"When":"2021-8-8"},{"Name":"Sartaj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1doLfhIpPIdYO53EoD_63mHYE3jrQc1kxM-CAvFcju93a6Z1xPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent food, decent price. Ordered the Dan Dan (egg) noodles, quite tasty but also quite oily. Would recommend for a staple cheap student meal but not more than that. Decent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz1PE39GZeDjp_uU0TwU4rZ1zCXKBiVoQNdxni\u0026fid=0x0:0x97af90bfdba20390"],"When":"2021-1-28"},{"Name":"J Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5nTjAm8gcoM8KEoMc5sPDIPLKdZEtk_2xDDFiiYwdxxyp1qQ7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty and relatively inexpensive. Unfortunately I misordered. Their spicy beef noodle soup does not have hand pulled noodles. It uses rice noodles! Get the hand pulled next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkPr0flQbuFkNy5blRTS4gtw1c4BAaOytWa_nW\u0026fid=0x0:0x97af90bfdba20390"],"When":"2019-3-13"},{"Name":"ÁâõÁäá","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjm733-p1EO9YisjFSmP81nw_wdJZywpGyNzzdUYijEmjJvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This lanzhou noodle is pretty bad. It's kind of instant noodles. Doesn't match with the picture at all.  I won't be there any more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaden Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM2ggNMzvyF3-mbTCuUBp5sV15NjtcwDNnBrTCqRD4nn9vAlRl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"(Trying everything at UBC journal #1)\nOn my first stop, I went to Kung Fu Noodle in the international food court and ordered the Dandan noodles. Initially, the dish was quite tasty and the savoury peanut-y sauce coated the noodles very well. However, to my disappointment, I would find a piece of small plastic in my food, which made me dock this place one star. The wait for the food was also a little long compared to other places at the IFC. However, I would potentially eat here again as the food was quite tasty and relatively cheap (~13).\nRating: 6.5/10 (without plastic, 7.3/10)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzr6Y0twlmtUXm9KeDl3Yec3FqKKWpE7LlW49p3XyuhSVOFIAH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is decent here and prices good but man, the service is so inefficient and SLOW!  Longest wait of all the stalls in this food court, unreasonably long.  Don't order here if you're in any kind of a time schedule.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Selje","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURoXUkvPHUEdcJaDZ94eznUuD660xrVnD-m6ao5pBk4TAoEygk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Waiting time is a bit slow but their spicy beef noodle dish is delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RUI HONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1yp8gOkQXQyev0kG3jcNVumkl-qssUud4UXK-ryZ8ZD7wkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve bought my meals here for 2 years, I just figured out that they have ‚Äúsecret menu‚Äù and that day I order a big plate chicken. The portion is huge and the flavor is outstanding.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The setup is cozy and well-maintained, with plenty of spots to enjoy a coffee and the mountain air. A must-visit for anyone who loves scenic spots and fresh vibes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ0c58LiSZqWaFUYNbNiLdux47S90txQOP69g4&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Cypress Lookout is gorgeous.  The area is well keep with a lookout patio and a big lawn.  The sunset from here is marvellous. The view is covered all Vancouver, Burnaby and Vancouver Island.
When you enjoy the view, you can also get a coffee,  a drink and pizza from the Shed Coffee and Bar there.
If you go there at night, bring a warm coat.
The washrooms are not enough.  There are always line up since it has only 3 washrooms. Hopefully, City of West Vancouver can add some more washroom there.  The washroom is clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPzvKUhkzzganiUjqNcJDYF0xMd398S0IyhdQD&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"Dom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcc1hh9TttugQ8FBV658gXs0FLq1uvkLSg_w0afrG4wrRrgA-izQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful lookout point with a relaxing atmosphere, ample parking and restrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOSDgMvRsJeFuRQdl7rje2_pd4LKLHm7vmUPoE&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"D McCarthy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_zcLhyhXJkf3UWzNSaWaa9pJjd34yoIyMrt3qqK7hZbWHCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing view over downtown Vancouver. Small grass area to set up and relax. Free parking and washrooms available. Can also buy food and drinks up there at the shed if you wanted. Gets very busy for sunsets so it may be a bit difficult to get parking at this time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mahdiar Gh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbIxetRDVxb-C_GJjhEaYdS4D5EVIHHK34qHyMTyC2jHR7z4zAiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful spot with stunning views and great picnic potential. It used to be much quieter and more relaxing, but lately, it‚Äôs become quite crowded, especially on weekends and around sunset. Despite the crowds, it‚Äôs still a lovely place to visit. The Shed pizza located on-site definitely enhances the experience and is a great addition.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Addington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyi4ivwklUECDSqRFhGLtiMIJ5LID4xfpzjpUqnskMYNb-qbQ0Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful car club drive , a tribute to a beautiful person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7Gjg06f_q_r6qyFrdb3eyvpN3n_vjoo2ZhXeV&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"nikhil hs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsv-10-bAIvQyavdwzmnxrY2V8l92ulg0G0w-EF9pWVaYzReByYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice relaxing place with a view to see sunset","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPN_2jqEqWzQINUVGtv8H7Mn-r1jczpYNdUMuN&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"BlackViking Gaming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX53qdmRRFEVKb6vRtcrhL2h206N2AT8XnNXg1aY40QiQj1UpzBUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A sunny day can be a perfect fit to go there with friends and family for the picnic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbpL0L_d8fUz6z3kLaUuAELzimrrXvOvd8IpRh&fid=0x0:0x44d9041e877b6648"],"When":"2024-8-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nick Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUibDwxzAeQrXErX9Y1TiPPhglkK5kq7peu8EfzekAZ8jG3ou-DkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"4/2/22 - update for dinner, downgrading to generous 3 stars from earlier 4 (for brunch). Service and food both very disappointing. You know it‚Äôs going to be a problem if they don‚Äôt ask you ‚Äúhow are the first few bites?‚Äù. Well, the gnocchi was bland; the halibut was tasteless; (although reportedly the fried chicken was excellent). Felt like we got quite a hard sell on the starters (burrata good; tuna poke very small and mediocre). Also they seem to have some sort of house wine ‚Äúbrand‚Äù called Steve smith - relatively expensive and relatively poor, at least in the case of the New Zealand SB.
>>>
Original review :
Good ambience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4lGDWzWHWeBGAH0A-tkdp5mKFylVsM0kvT_GG&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2021-9-26"},{"Name":"Lana Kaati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHNMDT4rbrkjua2RVAPwrZtqYif-yDK-z_fGQ2OgVYzufVZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall was good dinning experince .
Starters / Ceaser salad was below expectations very basic . The chips with artichock dip were stale .
Mains / fish was tasty as well ad steak and burger was speialy good.
Nice patio but cars are just parked along so its not much enjoyable outdoor seating .
Staff were friendly
It took 40 min for mains to arrrive after startes which was kinda of long wait specialy we had kids with us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUqiS7usPsYrtpvWuYSleFV8c3v7Bp05SjOULx&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2022-8-26"},{"Name":"Sabrina Scholkowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_oWd9NaU7z2C9izZM_2PQolbi2w61KlzUcGok1xLwtINP0qh8XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is really cute and the staff is extremely friendly, made it a great dining experience!
They don't have that many vegan options so just keep that in mind if you go there, but the ones they do are really tasy and good!
I had the avocado toast with hashbrowns, and my friends (whom also said was really tasty and good) had the special eggs benedict? And the first one on the menu (can't remember the name).
Lovely place to have brunch and enjoy some family time, will definitely be going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdMfX6KwZejARq5XbLES6jyj2VKFE_x9cJw09F&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2019-11-16"},{"Name":"Daniel Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJawI80c4qwvuA-pWmht_nhIypwFKNS8vUDHnZIepoqs0gJvft7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good service and food. The Mac and Cheese was yummy as well as the burger and chowder. I enjoyed the white sangria. If you have dessert I'd recommend the mini donuts over the cheesecake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwzZ_igdAwTXq0ffX8z6CiP83Z02ZA5eTWbqWj&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2022-9-26"},{"Name":"calvin wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE2bQcJxNZqRCGXAkw7vShVGNYOW3DUIqwuUbrffVZBnGFvH__=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great prices for the quality of food during the happy hour (3pm to 6pm). Half price for appetizers, and service was very good. We opted for the patio which is covered. Recommend getting the mussels, two orders of fries, and a order of calamari.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5uYj_sc4Fjyg-buB20JJfbOFWrvSgSybHWPCu&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2017-7-27"},{"Name":"adnan albeitawi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw544b-let8Fw2v7n4bqqMz-aXsebKoGvUQRce5k0ew3iPZ0x_7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, good portions, and, although pricey, worth every penny.
I would recommend this place for taking that special someone to eat a great dinner.
The food is fresh and cooked perfectly.
The service is great and the staff are very friendly. I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZvMAlz1uhJqAQIXh9Ct4eHpRHwR45nldT2kdE&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2017-9-20"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pure Yum! Every course of the Christmas Set Dinner set was delicous and nicely presented.

Fois Gras Terrine - creamy, marrowy, and rich... Wish there was more Fois Gras

Scallop Carpaccio - the scallops were naturally sweet and light

Roasted Quail - - kinda boney...like had to eat around the bones of the quail but other than that it was perfect. The roasted vegetables were done perfectly. The beets were so fresh and tasty.

Sablefish-- so soft and buttery.... Sooo good.

Cheese selection - - nice... Could have been better with more than one cracker.

Poire Belle Helene-- the chocolate tart was just right for sweetness and chocolateyness. The red wine poached pear reminded me of apple pie for some reason. But it was good.

Broad drink selection as well.

Great Experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLSjrV5zeKRXiURv3YGTKgdpRBd9dbKxOouePD&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2021-12-28"},{"Name":"Ren N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUq4N6p2XMtXDhjNj29hJ-E8sVgMlPO0AIqayYiPLU9ZOsPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place by chance. Met the owners on FB Marketplace for something they purchased from my husband.

We first came a week ago and then returned today for brunch. I'm celiac and it's so hard to find gluten free fried chicken.

These guys blew it out of the park! My husband couldn't tell the difference. Loved it so much I made him bring me back for brunch and we were not disappointed!

Service was great and the owners are super sweet! We'll definitely be coming back and with friends/family :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuEWaS_gh8cv6JZQQ8t4FTV_N0S5KePb28igA9&fid=0x0:0x5256d9652ee2d8b2"],"When":"2021-10-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2aGlD-TZ0FiVGrVu_tf4SQkQQqOxZxh4T-z8wzuYYaFQxKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had an amazing breakfast at Douce Diner! The Denver-inspired dish and Eggs Benny with Avocados were incredibly delicious. The hash browns stood out‚Äîlightly fried or grilled, perfectly crispy, and not heavy at all, one type made from freshly grated potatoes.
Every bite had a unique and delightful flavor. Highly recommend for a truly tasty start to your day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxuSbtRBN3gl_hVA3dsQWyzLfT6-ciTCqe566n&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Edward Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ5t1luJWZ0TXirubqGJZ41s6LG2QmSjyD9Fyi7Z2m-eTjmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serviceable (capable and adequate) establishment, with a nice selection of offerings...the food stands a little above 'middle-of-the-pack' in a very competitive market.  Our experience was marred by some misunderstandings placing our orders, but it was rectified in the end.   The food was enjoyable, plated in a pleasing manner, and I can see why they have positive reviews, but not what I would consider noteworthy.

Would we return?  If we were in the area, perhaps, but would not go out of our way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjgyTfQYXt95QTALsO1uo2a-wSiknGkFNAUzCo&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kayte Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDiMEOTVmCK9krDKP9rBBt4qUkjON4zCJHeEO8GB93YfpY3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place for breakfast. They have gluten free buns, so they're able to make GF breakfast sandwiches, which was a huge bonus for me. Food was excellent, staff were great, and the tea was actually really good tea! I had English breakfast tea, expecting the usual red rose garbage, but instead, they had really nice organic tea that had colour and flavour! I'll definitely be going back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHXwGq4nPs53vqmegD08K2Ml9AZTLL5BmCwT-d&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"SMF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILHGy5XoEayVUsxXvSpofvuoFCeG7cVMRInUa4z3aBM9ALrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to visit (the highly recommended) Douce Diner and loved everything about it. Their legendary buttermilk biscuits are incredible and everything else we ate was excellent and high quality. Love that it's all organic and seasonal. The decor is a classic retro vibe with character and the staff is lovely. Between the food and ambience, Douce Diner leaves you with a warm and cozy familiar feeling that will make you want to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNobfSJMZ2MOVk4zgROZ5wmhsBhRKIdCkPhl4xg&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited DOUCE for breakfast on a Saturday morning around 9 AM, and we were pleasantly surprised to find no wait. The food was absolutely awesome‚Äîdelicious and satisfying, with generous portions that offered great value for the price. The service was good, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting, making for a perfect start to the day. Overall, a wonderful experience at a fair price. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP24U8-DNYxaB91SHsWYSb-sP6yXBs6ueTUqhpm&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had been pretty curious about this retro diner-style brunch restaurant for quite a while and finally got a chance to drop in. The place was quite a bit smaller than it looks in the photos.

We ordered the ‚ÄúPastrami Hash,‚Äù which was the special of the day‚Äîdon‚Äôt remember the exact name‚Äîand the ‚ÄúBreakfast Sammy with Avocado.‚Äù Both dishes were good, but in terms of taste, they didn‚Äôt stand out like at many other brunch places. We also wished the dishes had included more veggies. The portion sizes were decent‚Äînot too small or too big, which I liked. The service was very casual but helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrDgVlai20RpylcIr4YOx_dcHyp_ifWLk2E88&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Mehrnoosh Hadizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKH8DmjlmAEMzEGUkWBQ2W9ZBtrP4ocUpsC3AgGIY-Jiy-R6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently returned to this place for brunch, excited to indulge in their famous French toast, as I had done on my previous visit. Unfortunately, my experience this time fell short of expectations.

Upon ordering the French toast, I was looking forward to the delightful combination of flavors, particularly the berries that were mentioned in the menu. However, I was disappointed to find out that they had run out of berries, and no one informed me before I placed my order. Instead, what arrived at my table was just the French toast topped with cream, lacking the vibrant and refreshing touch that the berries would have provided.

While the French toast itself was delicious, the absence of the berries made the dish feel incomplete and less satisfying. I had hoped for a more balanced and flavorful experience, so it was disheartening to miss out on that.

Overall, my second visit was not as enjoyable as the first. I understand that items can run out, but better communication would have been appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1PHK9gO0C4LVljdmQwWRJvefYRaB4gYSypVU&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place. Felt really like a diner... Where everyone goes to. We were able to finish everything on the plate... That's how good it was. I don't mind driving here for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO_m_NjJ-fRXqCPE57-Rsa2jtPHO5fMSGwBQBJ&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mohammad Kawser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU4CN-Rp-rgP-OBr8GIXtY7SxrzZWhWsCAzAapha06T450BuB-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Porteau Cove Provincial Park is a scenic waterfront park located along the eastern shore of Howe Sound in British Columbia, Canada. It's known for its stunning ocean and mountain views, pebbled beaches, and opportunities for outdoor activities like camping, picnicking, scuba diving, and kayaking. The park features a popular diving site with artificial reefs and sunken shipwrecks, making it a great spot for marine exploration. It's also a favored location for stargazing and spotting marine wildlife. Accessible from Vancouver, the park is a popular day trip and weekend getaway destination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTBJPBTBv2X-GJWUWZJsChwOTqq-9ut8Et4PNL\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Erick Inocentes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKln_OANHV08Uoa7rdcq7e1z_vx27pXIuUgsh8WOmLoERn9Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love it here !! The water is not cold , perfect scenery, and good place to relax and take in nature. Parking can be hard to find if you go late.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS4Puf7MMSqpyWP34GjiKL44wG2CDwBKTPneD5\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"The Weekender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmn_NP4ZpVaWddv5vtoqQzHqFtZ3ZE9pkkdceY9aQHEiOtgoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came up for the day because we heard how beautiful this place is. We were not disappointed! The perfect place to escape the city for the day, it's only about 45 minutes out of Vancouver and has scenic views of Howe Sound. The Provincial Park is also a famous dive site and there are special diving facilities on site. The camping area is small but most sites are ocean front and only $23 a night. You can show up for a first come first serve site or it's advisable to book online! If you want to know more, check out our video review here: https://youtu.be/n5zcCX6TaMU?si=EpZPAlaTZqMI5vbY","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMheDpyZ-K1OUfSsuVjLqSC-v9iZfVa4bqybJ1U\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This beachside park offers great views, boat launch, free parking, beach, pier with viewing areas. I have enjoyed having family and friends there to BBQ and sit at one of the many picnic tables. Great place to enjoy wildlife and nature while relaxing after a long drive. I can say the restrooms were ok but the parking and picnic areas fill up on nice days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbEf2UEhVVGN8iWL8SKq-mba9gW9OwT-jDz1uz\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous views at this provincial park! The water is a beautiful shade of blue in late summer/early fall. üåäüíô","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ_SF2GfyXK9x4fUncsJDrX0KZTtxsQuuBtACZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Ken Gehring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuHSZFLxsqJ9TCb1ROGZA5KfPR2UYsJbypZhOcPyfCavdNEPITtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great campsite.  Nicely tucked away off the highway on the ocean. Nice to have power too. We'll be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhnemHCoEMT34YWrcalnqrFkx8jTgYMLQX-SL8\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Gal N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2XdfDYCPt_cgiBt8j8cM6zHcI87DNDsylR1wlksYltRZLpynHnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A stunning stop on the way to Whistler. Beautiful view. An organized place with picnic tables and public toilets. There is a jetty from which you can see seals. There is a camping area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyRObjMAvrAMslm2CJn7RuanQFvgSFXtqYudLs\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Jane Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja80BS91BFDBjRMWTbbPLFrCV33vuvgI4rfMbObIOgluYb9mtSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the best camping spot ever I've been.\nIt's so beautiful üòç\nThere are lots of viewpoints, and amazing oceans view!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM_r2dkCg7wou1_71uTbMrMAIcx8ly3jZZnyPi\u0026fid=0x0:0x3919a32786f12c10"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

title: Tour De Feast
address: 319 Mountain Hwy, North Vancouver, BC V7J 2K7
descriptions: Bright eatery with contemporary decor & traditional French dishes like cassoulet & braised beef.
