user_reviews: [{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fantastic little restaurant hidden in a quiet North Vancouver neighbourhood. I came here with my partner for brunch after he had been talking it up for ages, and it still exceeded my expectations. We sat outside on the patio and enjoyed delicious a delicious French brunch with kind service. The Alsacienne Onion Tart was so incredibly rich and decadent, it immediately had me looking up recipes to try and recreate it at home. The duck salad had a perfect balance of flavours and the meat was tender and crispy all at once. This is a must-go restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9Oy_NHdoL_H3cgJ-yI2zP_NDVpsj9IKBGHYd3\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here on a Saturday for dinner and we were the only table when we walked in. Food was good but nothing too impressive. We order the duck breast and the braised beef along with the onion tart and a mushroom tartine. Before the food came, we were given some bread with butter to start. The mains were both not as tender as we expected, although the flavour of the dish was done pretty well. The onion tart was good but the tartine was lacking a bit of flavour. Service was quick and friendly. Since we don't live in the area, we probably won't drive all the way to come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4hDs3XDMw_oVQhAPkVxsU-AH84PwZQqvd-vsd\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Gochiso Foods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKt5Ijz7-ZlpHKfqrJTn-EfGNKh-naFNfqrhkRakR-ATQA_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best kept secret in North Vancouver. Mushroom appetizer and braised beef were absolutely delicious. Small but great selection on wine menu. Glad to have this neighborhood gem in Seylynn area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI2_c4lqaHOWy7IeXGNR6yIxPg8E_qt64LZka2\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Katherine Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_fbiyyufWMqoCFysCuKDQEuZRz-jR8Hk5G3BPhWwM2YISMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little French bistro tucked away in an industrial area. Free parking behind the shop. Service was impeccable. Food was delicious. Duck breast and beet salad were our favorites! Looking forward to coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmbaR8BPhWE8qHkzRmPoZXwak3YDJ3lnRWB0QS\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good experience. The lamb rack was fresh and cooked perfectly. Definitely a hidden gem, when it comes to French cuisine! Can 100% recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0aeyqtDZLzVvt5rwCCs6jDH4GlYQAGnQPY3EX\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Felix Rankin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpJ-yYQaqhIHkPOZ9xWbxX8zbVOuthsh7rV-GMj2_ucOkUKJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can‚Äôt say good enough things about this place. Everything was delicious. Just give it a try I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwcPak7KgsxtxGl0DmPAths3NaVpmU0P4k2SUS\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Lisa Palleson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXrmNnX0uw7uZfTzCYCSprjINSi1bNNvaM-7MYFSn3EuWX1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is excellent. Service was decent, could have been more attentive considering there were only a few tables. Its more of a cafe, bit the food is worth it forsure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS98R8aNgQhoXUUkDL9fni_W8W33ePGzFKXlR9\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Sarah Hearsum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWZKImXLGO6aBT9J9WxORvKvrk_-0dnkHnYZK_Yt-h4Fk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brunch spot. Delicious food - high quality ingredients and good balance of flavours - and friendly staff. We had the Smoked Salmon Breakfast and Cassoulet (pork sausage one). Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWrJIfugiALRoSwA1mtHbje76loc_dG2xh5Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our table was pretty close to windows so we enjoyed the view the whole time. It got quite busier and noisy but our server was attentive!
Tried the Thanksgiving soup, it was amazingly delicious üòç The vegetarian pasta tasted fresh but not very special to me üòÖ The design of pumpkin cheesecakes was epic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0ECJxMRUlwtl57Av8-96U9WH77jolIOTbPmA2&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Felicia Steinfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj0Zau45FH1ZEi76Ga0sKp8UxseYPsXP9uTK7YSm-9-e6iOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant itself is very nice. The king prawn appetizer was good but not worth the price tag. The bread was definitely the best part! The steelhead salmon was phenomenal. The flavours, the Smokey croquette, and raisin veggie mix was amazing. The steak was okay. It was very chewy, not a great cut and I was barely able to eat most of it. Potatoes are yummy though! Overall, would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMQcxr7hlkwaHOPowWgq3kqHZiLeUQNmeQtes7&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely restaurant with waterfront views, really liked the design where they have an aquarium wrapped along the counter of the kitchen with live fish. On the other side, the restaurant had huge windows to enjoy natural light. The staff were amazing, so attentive and efficient. Food took a little longer to arrive, it was decent, the service and the scenery were the highlights.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_iYDjHU8ipeK-Wv66jiDqksGfejOXj5PDlZyS&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Alice Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYVr5lNGa3-Y8JLpOz1WaR4g8Yuaf6R94oy88F85SRq_gBkxTFaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dockside restaurant has been a favorite of mine to hangout with my girlfriends, to celebrate a birthday or enjoy their fabulous patio and summer sunset! Food is excellent,  but portion is small. Their thin pizzas are delicious, so are the salmon dish. Parking is easy to find along the street and very affordable if you are lucky enough to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZJWRSjik8darmhuzvyjlN6eC-sQgX1s4_lUZO&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Sas Tullo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxQ0JGIzsDfwf8RrDe5bF2054As_LFHpGKwoMRJwFPRPl_RqU4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My mom picked this place to celebrate her 70th and my brother‚Äôs 43 birthdays. It was a small gathering so nothing that should have thrown the kitchen for a loop. The best part was the atmosphere as the location is stunning. The next best thing about the experience was the service. Not perfect and got a few things wrong, including additional items on the bill, but very willing to help and fix mistakes.

The food was the worst part .. not ideal for a restaurant. Edible but far from great. We got the charcuterie plate and there was no cheese and the prosciutto was cut to thick it was inedible (look at the picture). The main courses were ok with my steak being overcooked the first time. The presentation was plain and not consummate to the price or apparent experience.

Likely won‚Äôt be back and won‚Äôt recommend the restaurant other than for the location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq_GGiJitrM8CpZCJWSHmy1Nsz7BOyyN-g4Pz1&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Juliana Bergstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9z_V4_T4Kb4r0iN3AY1nc4y5c0skm3bc-4FOsN5--jOSweZ2U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a lovely dinner here. The view is stunning. This place skews a bit older, so a great place to take parents or just on a date (not where I‚Äôd choose a group dinner or gal‚Äôs night out).

The cocktails were exceptional. The Pidgen was our favourite and the others we ordered were great too.

The appies all sounded so good we got a few and opted out of mains. The burrata was mostly a salad and the piece of burrata itself was quite small, so I‚Äôd say choose something else. The mushroom calamari was really good, this would be a great dish to share between three or four people because they give you so much. Oysters were great! The Caesar salad was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdpd-LLmtHBy6LoFz9HeCgXnMryB3rib-p8v5L&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jacob Earls","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInhDD56nlv9BzIjJ7wjlDT8aHRqau_8nLT8k99eFn3hkIpgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon this place just walking around. Beautiful restaurant with amazing staff, very attentive. Would recommend for anytime of day. Did not get any drinks besides water but they looked amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQhE1Kga6jVr0kEzWMxbwiv6vsL8rYFI1H2ky2&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Daisy Shim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7FlXh5li6Gu28BxP6ht6L_GsITqqbf4cvI2UudicO556H1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dockside on Granville Island is my family‚Äôs favorite spot! We‚Äôve tried a lot around here, but Thanksgiving brunch at Dockside was a real treasure. Beautiful setting, quiet, with great views, and the food was delicious with competitive prices, actually lower than similar places. The staff was super friendly, though it was a busy morning and felt like they could use a bit more help to keep up. But honestly, it was a perfect brunch, cozy and welcoming. Love this place, and we‚Äôll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjHb2GYgWb7TRu9FsIxy_8aRGmH1P4F0Egc5Wx&fid=0x0:0xbb0025dce3bddd49"],"When":"2024-10-27"}]

title: Porteau Cove Campground

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUewRUS3Ydq2RJWFjKxTIaCd2qba4AaBYAfKLd_MEk6mfo-j8cy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This an amazing place to camp with some amenities. The other sites were quiet and friendly. Propane exchange, ice and fire wood available.

Amazing views all day long. We saw seals, a whale and lots of different birds.

It‚Äôs easy to see why this place is so difficult to book but it‚Äôs worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoK2Fi6rPBMxH406GLtB6YYV_2PiAhsusPrXZR&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Bon Bahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYxxmNBMITdTodddc7qtpvtfgOqgeiqQs8kgnCKdfy963lA74=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My all time fave place as a local! Beautiful Porteau Cove will always be the best spot to chase those epic sunsets or the Aurora!! Super busy on long weekends but perfect during the week and weekends. You can paddle board, kayak, swim, or just have a little picnic. Cabins can also be rented which are along the beach! Love this place so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmrjT1OeBVruD9pyGB6r39tXR3xDJq69y90MA&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Evelinn Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYP_MAFjycSucFLEYjq7UsM5hwnCuBTQvgH3Z2HUIc9EdR4AKxuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place to camp, quiet, natural, clean and amazing views.
The walk-in area is not too far from the parking lot, only 5 min. Good drinking water access. Electrical access in the picnic area and only pit toilets but clean.
Perfect for stargazing from the viewpoint at the end of the walk-in area.
Peaceful to walk around","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaofnovOKDFegzN6LS-dvDKrGyYqxfhhdCbrG9&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"MANN Niyati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWubntwYZNXMg53YnqxEgnFRqJ_UdGZ7jL8ci94QNjbjV3FqSNi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's truly a great spot to spend time with your loved ones. There are three parking areas, but they tend to fill up quickly in the summer. If you're patient and lucky, you should be able to find a spot to park your car. The washrooms in the upper parking area are generally cleaner than the others. If you plan to set up a tent on the beach, it's important to keep an eye on it as water can gradually seep in over time. It's best not to leave it in one place for too long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsNitmjkda69C078k12WA4lbDoDBNQ0CAkVRXZ&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"K Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-mbimipsims6Qkx1Hpo2rEW0jIXox2QDCi9diPcIe154ZVDlN_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved it even though a bit of walking is involved because we got a walk in site. The kids found a lot of things to do along the coast.

Could but a bit loud being close to water (lots of waves at night) and the highway but the scenery is worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX7RMmZUbalcB8mYEx58Xko6BDsOClUX_4ZtVO&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"JP Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgEaxhRYvFn6g4Z9NgAoUF5r5ENhJNKEVrYJI6r05w92Ot5OOy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the location and view. Great place to relax and paddle board.

+ Only about 40min driving from Vancouver

+ Fun to see a low tide and high tide as well if you are a sea(ocean) view lover.

+ They also had a power for each campground which was rare.

+ Sell ice and wood at the gate if needed (close pretty early, around evening time 5ish?)

- Only down side was probably a train, however, it was only about 2-3 trains max a day.  (At least for the time I was there)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiJQ8mvcEfgsC874iLHHIAGgvqBFvahvefgrdH&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Brandon Etzkorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfJzjwA2jLKOr8pyIU_-Lbl6K71E-k7NCtUm6dUsFNI8ca6dz3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful place to stop and take a rest from driving and get some fresh air. Listen to the sea loins talk to each other.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmq0zNc2kex9qLEUNXBykU37Ocs9q98qEy4yip&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Dharmik Prajapati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW01z9-A7MpyMnq7LuKaoGzu7h2fLXYtyq6peP4sPiBdoL6riOq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the  best place for stargazing,  camping or just picnic ... perfect spot with a lot of parking spots. Also has clean washrooms ... totally worth spending your day or entire night .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ122JxvX3qPTAk_aGHPN1w9j5TeYitgtbyGcP&fid=0x0:0x6b51b8e871db79d1"],"When":"2024-7-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ebrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPIKcLlYsRXzj_NU-cKrILAfiV6rHoottOnSl1Co3QI6YN1537=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is absolutely delicious ‚Äì every single item on the menu is worth trying! I‚Äôve been here many times, and it has never disappointed. Each dish is consistently flavorful, and you truly can‚Äôt go wrong with anything you order. The portions are generous and will definitely surprise you.

But the experience goes beyond just the amazing food. Meeting the owner, Hamid, is a highlight in itself. His kindness and warmth make you feel right at home from the moment you step in, welcoming every guest with genuine hospitality.

If you ever find yourself near Denman or English Bay, don‚Äôt miss the chance to visit this gem. Give it a try ‚Äì you won‚Äôt regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxEB6gny_yy85q8CeoNwU0NlJlzu-vW9oNUDBo&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I remember many late night ls in Vancouver when I was craving for any types of food and almost every place was closed, Thankfully, Mediterranean Griddle was a lifesaver! They offer a variety of kebabs and Persian dishes, along with some delicious Persian sweets. It's a great spot to hit up after a night of partying when those late-night munchies kick in. They also serve beer and other alcoholic beverages, which is a nice bonus. Just keep in mind that while it‚Äôs a solid choice for a late-night bite, don‚Äôt expect high-quality Persian cuisine‚Äîit's more about satisfying your hunger than fine dining. Overall, it gets the job done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNheIa0M7UzqyQrfrD4oqJIA1qkqeStBZ26KSY1&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Dilpreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrXCHqFsLEgI3P1pMNCMOWgF7fP5aTvaEyDwxygiee0b_oCYNy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its one of the best shawarma I have ever tried in Vancouver and it never disappoints. Taste, service, atmosphere everything was 10/10 and I highly recommend this place. Every time we have to take some home with us because the quantity is soo goodddd. Thank you so much Benzamin for your service - you were amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFjUTR0hxkTJT0Fpq4I8doenuYVCc-8SECP9xK&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"gabriela encalada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwqgw8VykBlyHXfPtnxu5Wi8kfPWIEd9luVhqMhsbQ3C4ld1M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is delicious, we always order the lamb chops, chicken shawarma & poutine or the ground beef kabob and it‚Äôs by far my favorite place to go for diner specially cause they are open until 4am. The service by Benjamin was really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLFk_Ii5avcdoefcs0KG2NOnePQ9qrc6jOer7X&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Maschanka Fernandes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ToBWhyLBbGLZ9_8uWWhNnrT3Kh2_4kSVOU9RxE3Xv4dVckVdYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I passed by on my way to English bay and the aroma was mouthwatering. Had to come back after watching the sunset and was not disappointed at all. The two servers were kind and seated us immediately. We ordered the box chicken shawarma with a drink for $13.99.  Our food was ready within 5-6 mins which really surprised us as they were very busy. The portions were really good and the food was absolutely delicious ü§§","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCdT3y-fMlQfKkV_7MMA_xUrYRcSpddXn3tEYF&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"shahrokh oghani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQhSCFe2qUXlPODyenM-z4xo3hoN88kPD2UXb0BpDqa-hsV1t1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We got 3 donair (shawarma)wrap 2 meat and 1 chicken and they‚Äôre awful and stinky
I don‚Äôt know it was beef or lamb anyway they had so bad smell and too hard for chewing.
I will share some evidence below üëá","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgBm_nRWw3J40sDNMDNC1hAop3fA-zMB4cIBh2&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Kermin Fortes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVronhzvFkfFEh0Pth4PapGMBcMbEY4Tl0OlPMHwjlPVG0HIGEl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mediterranean Grill Restaurant is a must-visit for Mediterranean cuisine lovers. The portions are generous, and the food is packed with flavor, made from fresh ingredients. The staff is friendly, welcoming, and helpful with recommendations. A great spot for a satisfying, delicious meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1dNfGGT6UzbtbADp4GMyEpb_GOshuUg2xTzaO&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Salim Khoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6akCIMssNMGSreWBJt69YfIq5wWOpE6tVrg0PyeWmvQaJL3P5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a nice restaurant if you would like to have Mediterranean style food. I was late and was looking a late night open place and found this one. This remains open till 4:00 am and has good choice for food. I liked their food which is very fresh and the good thing is that they put Safron on the rice which is really great and enhances the taste of food. Nice restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq8qbNFuXd5tu4Kl4Fddos0Wa5R3ll8wo5KCR5&fid=0x0:0xbe3aea0fe7a45770"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeffrey Adaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPaAxPoKhXvdG8vLoJvPgEthfw5Pks4tZs4YkH83J2gIBeVDE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the vibe of the restaurant offering Italian cuisine. Open for non-members with free parking. Over-looking view while having a great time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1gn7iG-GV8X71GFPxu-cIVJ76ttTkMEWnb3x1&fid=0x0:0x1d6efefcfba70b02"],"When":"2023-7-25"},{"Name":"Michael Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4KvYR7vxxDiTfOGFlShuNzETI3EmG3SwR1Aw03-PTs0nHc7ZP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped by on the way back from Sea to Sky Gondola. Staff was friendly and accommodating! Food came out quick and and good value for the price! Will come back for a round of golf next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQckNrahiSo1PbER-UmXsgi0nEaxJUVbhiXiM&fid=0x0:0x1d6efefcfba70b02"],"When":"2022-4-15"},{"Name":"Ben M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY7-DFsqx-InW5CnlXpJd6DWvP1u6nfShJnLWMiHPMX_9EZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food, good services. The lobster carbonara spaghettini and cornish game hen are both very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBdKnwVFdeSCgBvnK9Zla6vKxmi5jHphYyL41x&fid=0x0:0x1d6efefcfba70b02"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Vant Tharion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4aTJKF4MbmoPdFeBcqgYtkfOPuwdEU3oo3TXAlq7iKmwoo2Xy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not believe the pictures.
The menu had really limited options.
We got here during an admittedly fairly busy weekend, not even to golf. Just to eat for a nice date.

The food options were limited, overpriced, and underwhelming when they arrived. I feel bad for the server staff because they were clearly understaffed. One server was clearly called from elsewhere to help out and apologized as she had never been a waittress before. Shame on the management!
The tables were wobbly and a back of a chair came off. Poorly maintained.

The room was hot in the sun with bad ventillation and heavy glare.
A number of smarter other folks left before getting food.

We enjoyed each others company despite this place.

Stay away this is clearly a cost cutting business skimping on everything and resting on their laurels.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"classified4me","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIixODhpQXvq28YQeA7uYi1hfZnT6b-l9DOpCCMDLqPILdzYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The location is great, brought to you by Mother Nature, the staff is friendly too. Unfortunately the menu is limited and very pricey, not to have salt and pepper on the table and not have any flavor in your ravioli dish for such a restaurant is baffling. They have plenty of indoor seating as well as a couple chairs outside. I was greeted right away and the service was quick.

I tried their Bacon Breakfast Sandwich and a Caramel Latte with almond milk. The breakfast sandwich was delicious. I loved that they used a thicker cut bacon. All the flavors in the sandwich worked really well together. My coffee however was good, not great. I loved the art work/design on the coffee cups. Overall, I will definitely come back and try other menu items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ-blBqZ8rb5BEeOeXkURuRF4SDvmvEe6gX_8C&fid=0x0:0xacf864b9b6e315c7"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Gerald Shaffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuWCjKUEpSn8PC51gwUhFUMP1RPD-5YHye8CmIeW0xB9e7fdhStw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Forecast Coffee in Caulfeild Village is a fantastic spot! The coffee is consistently excellent, with a great selection of blends that cater to every taste. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it a perfect place to relax or catch up on some work. The staff are friendly and always ensure you have a great experience. Plus, they offer a free coffee when you leave a Google Maps review, which is a nice bonus! Highly recommend checking this place out if you're in the area."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGPoizgGgpZrdjrQTSK3Ta0DIE3x4dUnRxa9tI&fid=0x0:0xacf864b9b6e315c7"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJBG9CLn3Y36rlJM5g7EpMDGMBcYIEXDWQ5U6IE_89UPCSNv_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this cafe, a girlfriend and I split some cookies, I had the breakfast sandwich which was 10/10, iced coffees in my opinion run a little small size up. Good music, beautiful decoration and cool merchandise. Really great vibes overall!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO236LfqB48G4cPEf-1Xi220RDqsxxN8ZdffdgO&fid=0x0:0xacf864b9b6e315c7"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"David Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-bnEbo5KPNhJdEEKe18t8aeG7OlK3zgM_0wPi2q8zGdq5NoE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Forecast is a gem of a coffee shop nestled in Caulfield. My partner and I have been on a coffee tour across Canada and my partner literally said ‚Äúthese guys are the BEST!‚Äù

I agree. Not only that but the breakfast sandwiches were so spot on that we ended up coming back 3 days in a row","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vlado Milanovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXu9NjdYZ_2VIX2A93B-sd1tk2W9ewWL3zWW5Q0RwNHtFKhdJJxew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the service and coffee is amazing and that bacon breakfast sandwich is excellent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqDlcjPaGL3R-ncqjaBtdyM2DW-2mDXi-_Kyl5&fid=0x0:0xacf864b9b6e315c7"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Igor Tchouiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzrQ7xaZOCGb_9MaqonK_2LW0UUHAIPgpbsDZwJ3m8G_x4ljkc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow they have the best breakfast sandwich iv had in a long time and for a fair price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOL1pb4L3ml1BsBYY8RXXIJ9uQxHA9kqqHOfWNf&fid=0x0:0xacf864b9b6e315c7"],"When":"2024-11-22"}]
